input: name: creamy chicken crescents ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cooked chicken, cheddar cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Unroll crescent dough and place in a circle on round stone, with the wide ends in the middle and the pointed ends to the outside. You should have an circle in the middle of the stone. You will need to overlap the wide ends a bit to make a circle. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, using more mayo if mixture appears to be dry. Place the mixture in a circle on the crescent rolls on the wide ends. Fold the pointed ends over the mixture to the middle of the stone. Tuck the ends under. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown. Slice and serve. ; name: silly simple cheese and garlic filled crescents ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, process american cheese, garlic powder, butter-flavored cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f mix cream cheese and 2 tablespoons of the honey. Stir in almonds. Unroll crescent roll dough. Separate into 8 triangles. Spread 1 rounded tablespoons cream cheese mixture onto each triangle. Roll up each loosely, starting at shortest side of triangle, rolling to opposite point. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet. Curve each into crescent shape. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bale 12 to 14 minute or until golden brown. Serve rolls warm, drizzled with remaining honey. ; name: chili con crescent snacks ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, chili without beans, corn chips, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Remove ; name: crescent roll breakfast casserole ; ingredients: crescent rolls, brown and serve sausages, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, green peppers, salt, pepper, oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: shelly s mexi crescents ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, diced green chilies, cooked chicken, crescent roll dough, butter, corn chips ; preparation:

name: glazed baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, water, honey, orange marmalade, salt, ground cloves, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender. Drain. Return to skillet. In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots ; name: cinnamon glazed baby carrots ; ingredients: butter, baby carrots, salt, water, ground cinnamon, brown sugar ; preparation:Put 1 cup of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: brandied carrots ; ingredients: carrot, water, butter, salt, brandy, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: ginger baked carrots ; ingredients: carrots, lemon juice, salt, powdered ginger, pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed. ; name: orange glazed shredded carrots ; ingredients: orange juice, chicken broth, cornstarch, olive oil, carrots, butter, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving. ; name: alton s glazed carrots ; ingredients: carrot, unsalted butter, kosher salt, ginger ale, chili powder, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: crab dip surprise ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, crabmeat, seafood cocktail sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, white onion, tomatoes, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: shrimp cream cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, chili sauce, baby shrimp, parsley, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: cream cheese casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, sugar, worcestershire sauce, cream cheese, wide egg noodles ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. ; name: tomato salad served with cottage cheese ; ingredients: tomatoes, green onions, cilantro, fresh basil, oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic powder, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature. ; name: when this is served it s a party spread ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, canned shrimp, seafood cocktail sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, green onions, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: my cheese burgers ; ingredients: meat, breadcrumbs, onion, soy sauce, italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cheese slices ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from ground beef through pizza sauce. Separate the halves of the hamburger buns, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the hamburger buns. Top each with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly. ; name: easy pizza burgers ; ingredients: crusty bread, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, olive ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from crusty bread, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, olive. Separate the halves of the burgers, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the burgers, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Top with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: beef cups ; ingredients: sandwich bread, butter, ground beef, egg, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: two cheese pizza burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pizza sauce, sliced mushrooms, oregano, italian seasoning, salt, mozzarella cheese, monterey jack cheese, hamburger buns ; preparation:

name: japanese style potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, onion, oil, vegetable stock cube, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, eggs, cucumber ; preparation:Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve. ; name: new potato salad for a crowd ; ingredients: red potatoes, hard-boiled egg, onion, dill pickle, celery seed, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & pepper ; preparation:Peel, cube, and boil potatoes in large pot of salted water. In another pan, boil eggs. When both have been cooked through, drain and let cool. Peel eggs and chop. In large mixing bowl add cooled potatoes, chopped egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed, salt and pepper. Add sour cream and mayonnaise and stir gently to combine being careful not to mash potatoes. Refrigerate until completely cooled before serving or overnight. ; name: potato cheddar salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, scallion, roasted red pepper, sour cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese ; name: updated potato salad ; ingredients: fingerling potatoes, plain low-fat yogurt, whole grain mustard, olive oil, red bell pepper, celery ribs, red onion ; preparation:Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: asian potato salad ; ingredients: small red potatoes, salt, mayonnaise, soy sauce, light brown sugar, ground ginger, sliced water chestnuts, red bell pepper, scallions ; preparation:

name: honey moist cornbread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, whipping cream, vegetable oil, honey, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: honey buttermilk cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: chocolate cornflake cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, vanilla essence, egg, self raising flour, sultana, corn flakes, milk chocolate melts, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks. ; name: angel flake cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, dates, nuts, rice krispies, vanilla, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack. ; name: honey joys ; ingredients: corn flakes, butter, sugar, honey ; preparation:

name: smoked turkey and tomato wraps ; ingredients: cream cheese, basil pesto, burrito-size flour tortillas, smoked turkey breast, romaine lettuce, chopped tomato, red onions ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook turkey for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and turkey is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Place chicken and sauce over lettuce and top with blue cheese. Roll up and serve. ; name: blushing turkey and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: french rolls, goat cheese, bing cherries, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh basil, deli turkey, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts. ; name: turkey and dressing patties with gravy ; ingredients: cooked turkey, turkey stuffing, turkey gravy, breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together, cut up large pieces of turkey in the patties. Bake on the preheated grill for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool. ; name: turkey dinner casserole ; ingredients: turkey gravy, mixed vegetables, prepared stuffing, cooked turkey, mashed potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well. ; name: zesty turkey wrap ; ingredients: cooked turkey, green onion, sun-dried tomato, ranch salad dressing, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, flour tortillas ; preparation:

name: walnut rosemary quinoa ; ingredients: sesame oil, onion, quinoa, red bell pepper, water, tamari soy sauce, fresh rosemary, fresh peas, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow baking pan, toss the walnut rosemary with the olive oil. Spread almonds so that they are in a single layer. In small bowl, combine parmesan cheese with garlic salt and sprinkle over the almonds. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stir once while baking. ; name: eggplant walnut pate by dr andrew weil ; ingredients: eggplant, walnut pieces, fresh gingerroot, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, ground allspice, salt, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a medium size heavy skillet. Heat over medium-high heat to boiling. Cook, stirring constantly, until all of the liquid is evaporated and nuts are coated and sugary. Transfer to a non-stick baking sheet. Break nuts apart while still warm. Let cool. ; name: rosemary walnuts ; ingredients: butter, ground rosemary, salt, cayenne pepper, walnut halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Using a baking sheet with a lip, melt butter. Mix seasoning into the butter, and then toss in almonds. Bake seasoned nuts for about 10-12 minutes, stirring once, until toasted and fragrant. Remove from heat and serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: cranberry feta and walnut salad ; ingredients: mixed salad greens, dried sweetened cranberries, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Toss greens, cranberries, cheese and walnuts in large bowl. Mix vinegar, honey, mustard and pepper with wire whisk until well blended. Gradually add oil, whisking constantly until well blended. Pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: apple walnut turkey sandwiches ; ingredients: mayonnaise, celery, raisins, walnuts, tart apple, deli turkey, sourdough bread, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Heat oven 180c. Grease and line pan - 20cm x 30 cm. Melt butter, sugar and honey in pot. Stir gently till sugar dissolves. Stir in oats, flour and nuts. Cool mixture. Add choc chips. Press mixture into pan. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: walnut tacos ; ingredients: walnuts, soy sauce, ground cumin, tomatoes, cilantro, green onion, garlic clove, lemon, juice of, pepper, collard greens ; preparation:

name: spicy cabbage salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, chili, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, napa cabbage, green onions, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Combine sugar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour. ; name: caramelized onion and egg salad ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, oil-cured black olive, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs and sauté for 5 minutes. Add mayonnaise and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add more salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add more salt and pepper and cook ; name: sauteed red cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: paprika salad dressing ; ingredients: salad oil, sugar, vinegar, onions, dry mustard, paprika, celery seeds, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian paprika salad dressing. ; name: lettuce salad ; ingredients: lettuce, light cream, malt vinegar, dry mustard, sugar, egg yolk, salt, chives ; preparation:Tear the lettuce into small bite sized pieces and place in the bottom of 9x12 inch cake pan. Layer the rest of the ingredients in the order given, do not cook peas. Add the sugar to the mayonnaise and spread over the top as you would frosting. Top with grated cheese. Cover and refrigerate for 8 to 10 hours. Bacon bits can be used for bacon. ; name: cabbage and onion salad ; ingredients: cabbage, onions, sugar, vinegar, salt, celery seed, dry mustard, pepper, salad oil ; preparation:

name: spicy chickpea burgers ; ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, garlic cloves, dried oregano, chili powder, red chilies, chickpeas, dry breadcrumbs, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Pour the oil into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the olive oil and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Serve warm. ; name: spicy picnic chicken ; ingredients: buttermilk, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Mix breadcrumbs, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, picante sauce. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: spicy buffalo chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, hot sauce, hoagie rolls, blue cheese dressing, creole seasoning, carrots, celery, onion, chicken strips, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook chicken for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Roll up and serve. ; name: spicy cajun chicken with capers and lemons ; ingredients: unbleached flour, cajun seasoning, paprika, skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, olive oil, chicken stock, fresh lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: spicy chicken patties 3 points ; ingredients: ground chicken, breadcrumbs, egg whites, yellow onion, celery, chili sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: ham egg and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, eggs, salt, pepper, sourdough bread, ham, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham cheese noodle casserole ; ingredients: ham, egg noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: grilled ham egg and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: honey-roasted ham, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, egg, sourdough bread, butter ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham n cheese pie ; ingredients: cooked ham, swiss cheese, bacon, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, onions, skim milk, bisquick, eggs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: ham egg and cheese breakfast bake ; ingredients: cooked ham, cheddar cheese, bread, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: creamy polenta with parmesan and mozzarella ; ingredients: whole milk, yellow cornmeal, fresh rosemary, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter and saute until butter is melted. Add parmesan cheese and saute until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes. Add milk and saute until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes. Add parmesan cheese and saute until cheese is melted, about ; name: flavored polenta ; ingredients: cornmeal, chicken broth, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, olive oil, pasta sauce ; preparation:In a large saucepan bring the chicken stock to the boil and gradually add the polenta. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring often. When thick remove from the heat and stir in the herbs and cheese. Pour the mixture into a lined 19cmx19cm pan and leave to cool to room temperature. Once it is cool place in the fridge overnight. The next day slice the polenta in half horizontally and lay the salami, sun-dried tomatoes and pepper on the bottom half. Replace the top half and bake at 200c for 30 minutes. ; name: jalapeno popper dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, green chilies, jalapeno peppers, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place the peppers on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side. ; name: 7 minute rich and creamy polenta ; ingredients: half-and-half, water, salt, cornmeal, unsalted butter, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over high heat, bring the vegetable broth and the water to a boil. Slowly pour the cornmeal into the hot liquid, wisking constantly. Stir in the salt. Lower the heat to cook the mixture at a gentle simmer. Cook, stirring frequently, until the cornmeal is creamy and not grainy, about 30 minutes. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in scallion. Polenta can be served soft, or poured into a baking pan to cool. Once cooled, polenta can then be cut into solid squares. ; name: jalapeno jack polenta ; ingredients: water, yellow cornmeal, parmesan cheese, jalapeno jack cheese, salt, white pepper ; preparation:

name: chocolate ginger cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, light molasses, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, ground ginger, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream the butter and sugar. Add the dry ingredients. Mix everything together and roll into little balls. Put onto a greased baking tray, pressing the balls down very slightly with a fork. Bake at 350f and 180c for 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold. ; name: coconut oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, rolled oats, coconut, baking powder, baking soda, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: ginger date muffins ; ingredients: plain flour, ground ginger, baking powder, baking soda, egg, golden syrup, pitted dates, butter, dark brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: oatmeal drop cookies ; ingredients: margarine, milk, granulated sugar, cocoa, peanut butter, vanilla, oatmeal ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: date and ginger oat cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, oatmeal, coconut, sugar, dates, ground ginger, butter, golden syrup, water ; preparation:

name: applesauce squash souffle ; ingredients: squash, butter, light brown sugar, salt, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, cream of tartar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly grease a 12 cup muffin pan. In a medium saucepan with enough water to cover, boil squash 20 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and puree in a food processor. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pumpkin pie spice. In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg and applesauce. Stir in squash. Fold the squash mixture into the flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into the greased muffin pan, filling cups about full. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: apple muffins ; ingredients: cortland apples, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, whole milk, eggs, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean. ; name: baked apples ; ingredients: granny smith apples, puff pastry, sugar, cinnamon, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon. ; name: simple swedish apple pie ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: apple and maple pets de soeur ; ingredients: shortcrust pastry dough, butter, brown sugar, cortland apples, maple syrup ; preparation:

name: texas pecan pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell ; preparation:Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for about 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top. ; name: bittersweet chocolate pecan pie ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, pie crusts, pecan halves, eggs, light brown sugar, salt, dark corn syrup, lightly sweetened whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: pumpkin pecan crumble pie ; ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, white cake mix, pecans, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours. ; name: pecan pie brittle ; ingredients: sugar, pecans, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, baking soda, kosher salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: honey pecan pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, honey, sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, pecan halves ; preparation:

name: chocolate crispy bars rice krispies ; ingredients: sugar, white syrup, chunky peanut butter, chocolate chips, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: chocolate covered peanut butter krispies ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, smooth peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar& corn syrup. Stir. Occasionally, bring to a boil over medium heat. And boil 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter until smooth. Pour over cereal, stir to coat well. Press evenly into 9 inch square pan coated. With shortening or cooking spray. Cool completely. Invert pan on cutting board. And cut into bars. ; name: oreo rice krispie treats ; ingredients: cream-filled chocolate sandwich cookies, rice krispies, butter, marshmallows ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted. Remove from heat. Stir in pumpkin pie spice. Add crispy rice cereal. Stir until completely coated. Using a buttered spatula or waxed paper, evenly press the rice mixture into a 13- x 9- x 2-inch baking pan coated with cooking spray. Cool. Cut into 2-inch squares. ; name: peanut butter krispies treats ; ingredients: corn syrup, sugar, smooth peanut butter, rice krispies ; preparation:Grease 13 x 9 inch baking pan. In large saucepan over low heat stir together first three ingredients. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and boil 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add cereal, toss and coat with cooked mixture until coated well. Quickly press into pan. Cool, then cut into squares. ; name: easy frozen peanut butter rice krispie treat bars ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, butter, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: jacky s kugel ; ingredients: rice krispies, sugar, cinnamon, unsalted butter, eggs, cream cheese, milk, medium egg noodles, raisins ; preparation:

name: barbecued pork chops supper ; ingredients: red potatoes, carrots, pork chops, salt, barbecue sauce, worcestershire sauce, cola, pepper, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice. ; name: pol martin barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, cider vinegar, ketchup, brown sugar, onion, rosemary, worcestershire sauce, black pepper ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: zesty baked pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, italian tomato soup, water, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Arrange pork chops in a single layer in a 3 quart oblong baking dish. Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 20 minutes or until chops begin to brown. Spoon off excess fat. Meanwhile, in a small bowl combine soup, water, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, and hot pepper sauce. Spoon soup mixture over chops. Bake 15 minutes or until done and no pink remains. Stir sauce before serving. ; name: deviled pork chops ; ingredients: onion, lemon juice, dry mustard, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, pork chops ; preparation:In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops. ; name: easy oven baked beans and pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, garlic powder, pork and beans, onion, green bell pepper, barbecue sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake extra 15 minutes. ; name: oven barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, vinegar, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, salt, pepper, cayenne ; preparation:

name: baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, fryer chickens ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: chicken saltimbocca aka chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt and pepper, prosciutto, spinach, olive oil, parmesan cheese, lemon, chicken broth ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika. ; name: chicken with bacon cream sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, garlic powder, salt and pepper, bacon, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, cooked rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Wrap each chicken breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired. ; name: cream chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cream, butter, milk, flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika. ; name: bacon jack chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, butter, bacon, onion, fresh mushrooms, monterey jack pepper cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: chicken in a hut ; ingredients: chicken, cream cheese, milk, salt, pepper, crescent roll ; preparation:

name: sausage stars ; ingredients: sausage, sharp cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, black olives, wonton wrapper ; preparation:Cook sausage in large skillet until tender. Remove with slotted spoon& drain. Saute onion& celery in remaining sausage drippings until tender. Combine sausage, sauteed vegetables, bread cubes, cornbread, sage, marjoram& pepper in a large mixing bowl. Blend well. Moisten with chicken broth. Mixture can be stuffed into turkey, or placed into a greased 13x9 baking dish& dot with butter. Cover& bake 20 minutes at 350f. Uncover& bake 10 minutes more, or until golden brown. ; name: bob evans sausage gravy copycat ; ingredients: roll of pork sausage, all-purpose flour, milk, salt and black pepper, biscuits ; preparation:In a large no-stick skillet, melt the butter over medium heat and make a roux by adding the wondra flour and whisking constantly. As soon as the roux begins to start turning color, whisk in the chicken broth and then all other ingredients. Bring to a boil until the gravy thickens, then remove from the heat. Add in the cooked sausage and stir. If the gravy is too thin, sprinkle in a little more wondra flour and re-whisk over heat. If it comes out too thick, just add more chicken broth over heat and whisk until desired thickness is achieved. ; name: joe s sausage cheese balls ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, bulk pork sausage, mild cheddar cheese, milk, dried rosemary leaves, parsley flakes ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic salt. Brush over warm biscuits. ; name: beef cups ; ingredients: sandwich bread, butter, ground beef, egg, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: bob evans sausage cups ; ingredients: sausage, wonton wrappers, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, ranch dressing ; preparation:

name: crock pot cranberry pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: crock pot pork loin chops with apples ; ingredients: pork loin chops, chicken broth, apple pie filling, lemon juice, chicken bouillon granule, cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours. ; name: spiced cranberry apple juice ; ingredients: cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, whole allspice, honey, cranberry-apple juice, cheesecloth, ice ; preparation:In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, add the apple wedges. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and gently boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally until the apple wedges softened, approximately 15 minutes. Transfer sauce to a food processor and puree. Add the cinnamon stick. Let stand several hours before serving. ; name: chili cranberry pork over rice ; ingredients: heinz chili sauce, whole berry cranberry sauce, reduced-sugar orange marmalade, ground allspice, pork loin, vegetable oil, whole grain rice ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook until onions are tender, about 8 hours. With a large spoon, stir the mix, breaking the pork into large shreds by pressing the meat cubes against the side of the crockpot. ; name: rice with caramelized onions and cranberries ; ingredients: long-grain rice, chicken stock, onions, brown sugar, butter, orange-flavored craisins ; preparation:Brown rice with caramelized onions and cranberries in a medium mixing bowl. Add rice and broth to crock pot and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed. Add cranberry sauce, cloves and sugar to crock pot and mix well. Add cranberry sauce, cloves and sugar to crock ; name: easy cranberry glazed pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, garlic clove, salt, pepper, butter, apple juice, jellied cranberry sauce, applesauce, ground cloves ; preparation:

name: pasta with salsa cruda di pomodoro ; ingredients: tomatoes, chickpeas, basil, fresh parsley, garlic, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground pepper, salt, conchiglie, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and drain pasta according to package directions, rinse with cold water. In large bowl combine mayonnaise, salt, pepper and garlic. Add pasta, salsa and green onions. Toss with large spoon coat. Cover and chill 1 hour to blend flavors. ; name: salsa de tomatillo con aguacate ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, white onion, serrano chili peppers, tomatillo, cilantro, avocado ; preparation:Place the tomatillos in a blender or food processor. Blend either coarse or smooth, depending on your preference. Transfer tomatillo salsa to covered container and refrigerate at least 3 hours. Good with tortilla chips, enchiladas, tacos, etc. I always triple the recipe and freeze in 8 ounce containers. ; name: chile garden salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, green onions, jalapeno chiles, habanero peppers, serrano chilies, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: mexican tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, oil, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic cloves, red wine, dried oregano, dried ancho chile powder, cumin, dried basil ; preparation:Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks. ; name: bread dippin cilantro salsa ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, green onions, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, salt, water, french bread ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: salsa di pomodori prosciutto e capperi italian tomato sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, prosciutto, italian plum tomatoes, fresh basil, capers, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: bisquick pumpkin bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, canned pumpkin, eggs, bisquick, sugar, ground cinnamon, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Beat for an additional 2 minutes. Pour into pans and bake for an hour or till a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. ; name: baked cinnamon sugar french toast ; ingredients: butter, french bread, eggs, vanilla, sugar, milk ; preparation:Place the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup. ; name: old bisquick streusel coffee cake recipe ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, sugar, oil, egg, bisquick, butter, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat cake mix with eggs, oil and milk in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Pour evenly into 2 greased round cake pans. Mix first 5 dry ingredients together. Beat egg, add milk, sour cream, melted butter and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients only until blended. Pour into a greased, floured 8 or 9 inch round or square pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes. ; name: french toast or eggy bread ; ingredients: white bread, egg, water, caster sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup. ; name: cinnamon batter dipped french toast bisquick ; ingredients: bisquick, milk, ground cinnamon, vanilla, eggs, bread ; preparation:

name: torta pascualina argentine spinach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, frozen spinach, onion, nutmeg, oregano, salt, eggs, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the bottom crust in your pie plate. Cook the spinach, drain it, and chop it finely. Saute the chopped onion in a little cooking spray. Mix together the spinach, the onion, and the rest of the ingredients. Pour the mixture into the pie crust. Add the top crust and seal. Bake for 30-40 minutes. ; name: spanish baked eggs ; ingredients: eggs, onions, green peppers, butter, virgin olive oil, cheese, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Stir together eggs, yogurt, onion and mexican seasoning. Lightly toast english muffins and place on a foil covered baking sheet. Top each muffin with equal amounts of egg mixture, chilies and cheese. Bake for 10 min or until eggs are warmed and cheese is melted. ; name: baked eggs florentine ; ingredients: spinach, cottage cheese, light sour cream, eggs, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Drain spinach well, pressing between paper towels. Combine parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs in a small bowl. Cook onion in remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil in a medium skillet over medium heat 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic, and cook 1 more minute. Stir in spinach, and cook 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Remove from heat, and stir in salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Place tomatoes in a 9-inch square baking dish. Spoon spinach mixture evenly over tomatoes. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mixture. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: cheese and spinach pie ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, salt, nutmeg, frozen spinach, cheese, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: uruguay torta pascualina egg and spinach hors d oeuvres ; ingredients: phyllo pastry, butter, parmesan cheese, spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper, nutmeg, cream, flour, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:

name: marinated feta with greek olives appetizer ; ingredients: feta cheese, black greek olive, roasted red peppers, olive oil, red onion, garlic, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:Place feta cheese in a bowl. In a jar with a tight fitting lid, add all the other ingredients and cap jar. Shake until well blended. Pour over feta and stir gently as not to break up cubes. Divide mixture between 2 half pint jars with lids. Store in the fridge for up to a week. To serve, let cheese come to room temp for about 30 minutes. Serve with assorted crackers, chips or crisp breads. Makes 2 half pint jars. To serve as a spread, mash cheese with some of the marinade to desired thickness. ; name: baked peppers with feta cheese ; ingredients: red peppers, extra virgin olive oil, basil, garlic cloves, feta cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler to high. Arrange the baby peppers in a single layer on a foil-lined jelly roll pan, and broil peppers for 4 minutes on each side or until blackened and tender. Cool, combine peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon rind, red pepper, salt, and mozzarella balls, and toss. Cover, and refrigerate overnight, tossing after 6 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Stir in basil leaves, and lemon juice before serving. Serve with a slotted spoon. ; name: greens with feta and red onions ; ingredients: lettuce, red onion, feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, vegetable oil, sugar, fresh ground pepper, salt ; preparation:Place greens in a bowl. Add red onions, balsamic vinegar, vegetable oil, sugar, fresh ground pepper, salt & pepper. Toss thoroughly. Taste, and add more oil if desired. Scatter olives & feta cheese over the top and serve. ; name: broiled fetasaganaki ; ingredients: feta cheese, red pepper flakes, ground black pepper, olive oil, fresh parsley leaves ; preparation:Adjust an oven rack 4 inches from the broiler element and heat the broiler. Pat the feta dry with paper towels and place on a foil-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle with the red pepper flakes and ground black pepper. Broil until the edges of the cheese are golden, 3 to 8 minutes. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with the parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: greek low fat red pepper feta dip ; ingredients: sweet red peppers, feta cheese, red wine vinegar, granulated sugar, cayenne ; preparation:

name: sangria peaches ; ingredients: red wine, orange juice concentrate, triple sec, brandy, sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, peaches ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a large pitcher, stirring until sugar dissolves. Taste at this point and if you want it a little sweeter, add a little bit more sugar. Add fruit slices and peaches. Cover and chill at least 8 hours. Stir in club soda and ice cubes just before serving. ; name: fruit cups ; ingredients: frozen sliced strawberries, frozen orange juice concentrate, crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges, lemon juice, bananas ; preparation:In a dutch oven, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Remove from the heat. Add tea bags. Steep for 5-8 minutes. Discard tea bags. Stir in juice concentrates and remaining water. Serve over ice. ; name: fresh fruit macedonia ; ingredients: fresh fruit, dry red wine, sugar, lemon juice, whipped cream ; preparation:Bring sugar and water to a boil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add ginger and reduce heat to simmer. Stir until sugar dissolves and ginger infuses syrup, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and take out ginger. Cool and pour over chunks of pineapple, sliced kiwi, sliced bananas, or any of your favorite fruit combinations. ; name: grandma s winter fruit medley ; ingredients: green seedless grapes, red seedless grapes, pineapple chunks, mandarin orange segments, bananas, sugar, fruit juice, egg, all-purpose flour, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: orange witches brew punch ; ingredients: orange gelatin, sugar, boiling water, apricot nectar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, ginger ale ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice and lemon juice. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat. ; name: sangria fruit cups non alcoholic ; ingredients: orange juice, strawberry gelatin, peach gelatin, lemon gelatin, cold water, strawberries, nectarines, grapes, cool whip ; preparation:

name: coconut shrimp and rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, unsalted butter, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, medium shrimp, low sodium chicken broth, coconut milk, fresh lime juice, salt, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and stir-fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon toasted coconut and 1 tablespoon chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges. ; name: salt and pepper shrimp ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornstarch, sea salt, black peppercorns, cayenne pepper, chinese five spice powder, seltzer water, oil, shrimp ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce. ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: south seas shrimp and mango ; ingredients: jumbo shrimp, dijon mustard, olive oil, fresh orange juice, hot sauce, orange zest, mango, green onions, red bell pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: salt and pepper gambas spanish style shrimp ; ingredients: jumbo shrimp, vegetable oil, scallion, garlic cloves, fresh gingerroot, sea salt, mixed peppercorns, chile, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: chocolate marshmallow swirl fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, butter, vanilla extract, salt, walnuts, miniature marshmallows ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and butter in a saucepan. Bring mixture to a rolling boil stirring constantly. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate chips until completely melted. Add marshmallow creme and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 pan. ; name: mexican fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, unsalted butter, cinnamon, salt, miniature marshmallow, milk chocolate chips, vanilla ; preparation:In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container. ; name: burnt sugar fudge ; ingredients: sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large saucepan. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 7 minutes or until softball stage. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate until melted. Add marshmallow cream and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 inch baking pan. Cool at room temperature. ; name: white fudge opera fudge ; ingredients: sugar, heavy cream, salt, vanilla ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, heavy cream and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat. Stir in white chocolate and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: candy cane fudge ; ingredients: vanilla baking chips, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: paula deen s 5 minute fudge ; ingredients: white sugar, evaporated milk, unsalted butter, salt, milk chocolate chips, marshmallows, pure vanilla extract, nuts ; preparation:

name: white bean and ham soup ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, small white beans, chicken broth, tomatoes, cooked ham, dried thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: white bean soup ; ingredients: navy beans, water, ham bone, parsley, onion, garlic, celery & tops, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: slow cooker baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, onion, brown sugar, maple syrup, salt, water, ketchup, prepared mustard, ham hock ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes. ; name: quick cabbage and white bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, bacon bits, sweet onion, dried thyme, vegetable broth, small white beans, coleslaw mix, salt and pepper, italian cheese blend ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: german bean and noodle soup ; ingredients: dried navy beans, potatoes, carrot, onion, salt, pepper, thin egg noodles, cooked ham, cream ; preparation:

name: out of this world cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, milk, butter, rolled oats, unsweetened dried shredded coconut, cocoa ; preparation:Mix first three ingredients together in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil, remove from heat. Add the rest of the ingredients. Drop from teaspoon onto waxed paper. Let cool and serve. ; name: overnight cookies ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, sugar, vanilla, almond extract, pecans, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar together in a medium bowl. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: any flavour cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, salt, flour, liquid ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: cherry cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, salt, flour, maraschino cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: eskimo cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, water, cocoa, quick-cooking oats, vanilla, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: gluten free chex party mix ; ingredients: rice chex, gluten-free pretzels, gluten-free onion crackers, peanuts, butter, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, garlic powder, onion powder, gluten-free corn flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250. Combine rice chex, gluten free pretzels, gluten free crackers, and peanuts in a 13x9 pan and set aside. Melt the butter in the microwave and add the worcestershire sauce and spices. Stir until well combined. Pour the butter mixture over the chex mixture and toss until everything is coated. Add the corn flakes and toss to coat them in the residual sauce. Bake for an hour, stirring every 15 minutes. ; name: barbecue chex mix ; ingredients: rice chex, corn chex, pretzel twists, cheese crackers, honey-roasted peanuts, barbecue sauce, vegetable oil, onion powder, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250f. In a large bowl combine the cereal, oyster crackers, pretzels, pistachios and cheese. In a small bowl combine the butter, salad dressing mix, and garlic powder. Drizzle over the cereal mix, tossing to lightly coat mixture. Place on a cookie or baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven, stir in dry fruit, and spread mixture on buttered foil to cool. Break into bite size pieces and store in airtight container. ; name: chex lemon buddies ; ingredients: chex cereal, vanilla baking chips, butter, lemon peel, fresh lemon juice, powdered sugar ; preparation:In small bowl, mix brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In small microwave-safe dish, microwave butter on high about 30 seconds or until melted. Stir in vanilla. In large microwavable bowl, mix all cereals and pecans. Pour butter mixture over cereal mixture, stirring until evenly distributed. Add sugar and spice mixture and stir until coated. Microwave uncovered on high 5 minutes or until mixture begins to brown, stirring every minute. Spread on wax paper or a cookie sheet to cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: taco chex mix microwave ; ingredients: butter, taco seasoning, salt, chex cereal, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in 11-by-7-inch microwaveable pan for 60-70 seconds. Add taco seasoning and salt. Add chex and microwave for a minute to a minute and a half. Stir and sprinkle parmesan cheese on top and microwave for a minute. Stir and microwave for another minute. Cool. ; name: traditional chex party mix ; ingredients: butter, seasoning salt, worcestershire sauce, rice chex, wheat chex, corn chex, mixed nuts ; preparation:

Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: white bean and ham soup ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, small white beans, chicken broth, tomatoes, cooked ham, dried thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. name: onion bacon mushroom quiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, sliced mushrooms, cooked bacon, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: impossible quiche ; ingredients: mushroom, milk, cheese, eggs, onion, bisquick baking mix, salt, fresh ground pepper, thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a 9-10 inch pie plate. Sprinkle mushrooms, cheese, and onion evenly over bottom of pie plate. Place remaining ingredients in blender, cover, and blend on high for 1 minute. Pour into pie plate. Bake until golden brown and knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let stand 5 minues before cutting. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: herbed mushroom quiche ; ingredients: dried basil, eggs, water, salt, nonfat dry milk powder, black pepper, fresh mushrooms, margarine, 9 inch pie shell, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop mushrooms and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: mushroom onion quiche ; ingredients: pie crusts, margarine, onions, mushroom, non-dairy milk substitute, egg, flour, dry wine, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: all in one quiche ; ingredients: milk, bisquick, margarine, eggs, bacon, green onions, canned mushrooms, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour into pie plate. Bake until golden brown and knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let stand 5 minues before cutting. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: easy spinach and mushroom quiche ; ingredients: butter, mushroom, spinach, milk, eggs, cheddar cheese, thyme, pepper, salt, pie shells ; preparation:

name: paprikash csirke paprika chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, paprika, cumin, roasting chickens, salt, chicken broth, carrots, tomato paste ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, cayenne pepper and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: cauliflower with paprika ; ingredients: cauliflower, garlic clove, olive oil, sweet paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes. ; name: easy paprika chicken ; ingredients: butter, roasting chickens, salt and pepper, onions, garlic clove, paprika, ground red pepper, tomato paste, water, green bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: smoked paprika chicken ; ingredients: oil, chicken breast, onion, garlic clove, smoked paprika, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes.
