Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: massa de pimentao red paprika paste ; ingredients: red bell peppers, salt, garlic cloves, olive oil ; preparation:

name: creamy beef stroganoff ; ingredients: onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, beef sirloin, sour cream, sugar, salt, dry mustard, paprika, egg noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Sim ; name: ground beef stroganoff ; ingredients: lean ground beef, flour, salt, black pepper, paprika, onion, butter, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, sour cream ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once. ; name: quickie beef stroganoff ; ingredients: boneless round steak, oil, fresh mushrooms, water, onion soup mix, sour cream, flour ; preparation:Cut steak into bite size pieces. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in heavy skillet. Add beef and brown. Sprinkle with flour and cook an additional minute. Add water, wine, soup mix and bouillon and stir. Transfer to casserole dish with lid and bake at 325f for 3 hours. Ensure it does not go dry by adding wine or water. Fry mushrooms in pan with 1 tbsp olive oil. Add mushrooms to mixture and return to oven for an hour. Cook noodles as directed. Remove mixture from oven and stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles. ; name: mushroom beef stroganoff ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, sirloin steaks, fresh mushrooms, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, green onion, dried thyme, dried marjoram, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsley. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once. ; name: stroganoff 1953 ; ingredients: round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, butter, fresh mushrooms, onion, consomme, vinegar, sour cream ; preparation:Dust meat lightly with flour and season with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet. Add meat and saute until browned, about 3 minutes. Heat remaining butter in a separate skillet. Add mushrooms and onions. Cook until lightly browned, 3-4 minutes. Add consomme, vinegar and sour cream. Bring to a boil, then immediately reduce heat to low. Add meat to mushroom mixture, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, or until meat is tender. ; name: chopped beef stroganoff ; ingredients: hamburger, onion soup mix, flour, tomato paste, water, sour cream ; preparation:

name: pie crust cinnamon rolls ; ingredients: pie crust, butter, sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat 8 muffin cups with pam. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Dip each marshmallow in melted margarine and roll in sugar mix. Separate dough into triangles. Wrap one triangle around each marshmallow and pinch dough together. Place each one in a muffin cup. Drizzle extra margarine over rolls. Bake 8-12 minutes. ; name: baked sliced apples ; ingredients: apples, butter, cinnamon, maple syrup, nutmeg, rolled oats, salt, raisins, apple juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: tiny cinnamon rolls ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, sugar, ground cinnamon, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Spray 13 x 9 pan with cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut cinnamon rolls in half. Place in pan in 1 layer. Pour butter evenly over cinnamon. Pour ice cream evenly. Bake for 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Turn pan over onto serving platter. ; name: swiss apple and bread dessert ; ingredients: butter, day-old white bread, green apples, sugar, cinnamon, raisins, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: crescent roll apple dessert ; ingredients: apples, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, butter, sugar, orange juice, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: cranberry pecan muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, dried cranberries, pecans, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: pecan crispies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: butter pecan cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: apple pecan quick bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, orange juice, unsalted butter, eggs, golden delicious apples, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pie crust in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar and corn syrup. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Add pecans and vanilla, and teaspoon of melted butter and mix well. Set aside. Toss apples with lemon juice. Spread apples on bottom of pie crust and pour pecan mixture over apples. Fold edges of pie crust over filling. Bake pie until set, about 45 to 50 minutes. ; name: pear pecan muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, ground cinnamon, salt, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, pears, pecans ; preparation:

name: cranberry pecan muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, dried cranberries, pecans, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: cranberry cream cheese dessert ; ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, cool whip, nuts ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine whole berry cranberry sauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, cool whip, nuts. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container. ; name: cranberry cornbread ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, buttermilk, cranberries, cornmeal, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: cranberry pumpkin bread ; ingredients: eggs, pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, sugar, flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, salt, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil and pumpkin, mix well. Combine flour, spice, soda, and salt in a bowl. Make a well in the center and pour pumpkin mixture into well. Stir just until dry ingredients are moist. Stir in cranberries. Spoon into greased muffin pans. Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes. I start checking for doneness around 20 minutes. ; name: cranberry tassies ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, flour, egg, brown sugar, vanilla, fresh cranberries, pecans ; preparation:

name: grilled cheesy apple sandwiches ; ingredients: multigrain bread, sharp cheddar cheese, apple butter, butter ; preparation:Combine cheeses in bowl. Brush top side of each slice of bread with melted butter. Flip 4 slices over, sprinkle with cheese, and compact cheese lightly with hand. Cover with remaining bread slices, buttered side up. Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat for 1 minute. Place 2 sandwiches in pan and weight with round cake pan, pressing lightly. Leave cake pan on top and cook until first side is golden brown, 3-5 minutes. Flip sandwiches, press again with cake pan, and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining 2 sandwiches. ; name: grilled ham egg and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: honey-roasted ham, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, egg, sourdough bread, butter ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham egg and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, eggs, salt, pepper, sourdough bread, ham, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: grilled swiss cheese and apples sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, bread, granny smith apple, swiss cheese, apple butter ; preparation:

name: bechamel sauce ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, milk, nutmeg, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a large heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat. Add in fresh garlic saute for 2 minutes. Add in flour and nutmeg. Stir for 2 minutes. Slowly add in half and half cream. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Mix in the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and lots of black pepper. ; name: besciamella sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, whole milk, kosher salt, nutmeg ; preparation:In a large saucepan over medium heat, add butter. While whisking, slowly add in flour. When blended, add salt, pepper, nutmeg and cayenne. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking constantly. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Mix in the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and lots of black pepper. ; name: super tasty white sauce ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, paprika ; preparation:Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over medium high heat. Add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook 2 minutes. Remove pan from burner, add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook, stirring constanly, until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly, adding more milk if the sauce becomes too thick. Season with salt and pepper, add chopped egg and mix. ; name: thick and creamy white sauce ; ingredients: heavy cream, butter, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh basil, nutmeg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in sauce pan and stir in heavy cream. Cut cream cheese into chunks and stir into cream. Add parmesan cheese and spices and stir until thoroughly melted. Do not boil sauce, continue stirring on medium or low until smooth. Remove from heat and toss with noodles. ; name: garlic herb sauce ; ingredients: light butter, skim milk, flour, garlic salt, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set heat on stove to low. In a saucepan, melt butter, then add a tablespoon of flour. Add milk, garlic salt, parsley, then stir. Allow to heat thoroughly and start to bubble. Add the other tablespoon of flour, then stir until thickened. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: bechamel white sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, milk, salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, garlic cloves ; preparation:

name: italian tricolore salad ; ingredients: avocado, buffalo mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, basil leaves, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, salt, and pepper. Season with salt and pepper. Add tomatoes, green beans, potatoes, carrots, pickle, peas, tomatoes, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese. Toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours, and up to 8 hours. Just before serving, stir in basil. ; name: spanish style cauliflower salad ; ingredients: ripe olives, raw cauliflower, green bell pepper, chopped pimiento, onions, salt, vinaigrette, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add olive oil and sauté onions until translucent. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant. Add tomato paste and sauté until fragrant. Add tomato paste and sa ; name: orange black olive salad ; ingredients: oranges, red onions, olive, white wine vinegar, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, parsley, pine nuts ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the black olives in a large bowl and bake until just crisp, about 10 minutes. Let cool. Pour the olive oil in a steady stream until combined. Transfer to a container and store in the refrigerator. To serve, put the black olives in a large bowl. Toss with enough of the vinaigrette to coat the spinach. Sprinkle with the crisp prosciutto crumbles, toss again, and serve. ; name: mediterranean avocado and black bean salad ; ingredients: avocados, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, black beans, olive oil, limes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing. ; name: cavolfiore stufato italian stewed cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: arrosto insalata di cavolfiore italian cauliflower salad ; ingredients: anchovies, black olives, capers, cauliflower, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, herbs, olive oil, red wine vinegar ; preparation:

name: peach freezer jam ; ingredients: peaches, sugar, liquid fruit pectin, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine peach and raspberry jam in a large bowl. Stir in sugar and lemon juice. Let stand for 10 minutes. In a small saucepan, bring water and pectin to a boil. Boil for one minute, stirring constantly. Add to fruit mixture. Stir for 3 minutes. Ladle into freezer containers. Cool to room temperature, about 30 minutes. ; name: peach rhubarb jam ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, sugar, lemon juice, peach pie filling, peach jell-o ; preparation:Thaw berries according to package directions. Peel, pit and crush peaches. Measure thawed berries and add enough crushed peaches to make 4 cups fruit. Place in kettle, add lemon juice and sugar, mixing throughly. Bring to a full rolling boil over high heat and let boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, add pectin, stirring vigorously. Stir and skim alternately for about 5 minutes. Ladle quickly into hot sterilized jars. Seal 5 minutes in boiling water bath using 2 piece lids. ; name: microwave plum orange jam ; ingredients: blue plums, orange, rind of, sugar, lemon juice, liquid fruit pectin ; preparation:Place plum orange jam in a non-reactive saucepan and bring to a boil, stirring. Boil hard for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Take off the heat, stir in the pectin and ladle into hot sterilized jars. Seal and process in a hot water bath for 10 minutes. Place hot jars on a towel on your counter and let cool overnight. Check seals. ; name: blueberry jam half recipe ; ingredients: blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar ; preparation:Place blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar in a large bowl. Add to a large bowl and add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual. ; name: gooseberry jam ; ingredients: gooseberries, water, sugar, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Wash the gooseberries and put them in a saucepan with the water. Cover the pot and bring to a boil, stirring gently, until the gooseberries are all popped. Press them through a sieve, and reserve the puree. Discard the skins, stems and seeds. Gently rinse the raspberries and drain them well. Mix the gooseberries and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the gooseberries are all popped. Press them through a sieve ; name: peach lavender jam ; ingredients: lime, rind of, lavender flowers, boiling water, peaches, lemon juice, granulated sugar, liquid fruit pectin ; preparation:

name: slow cooker savory pork ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, marmalade, ketchup, garlic clove, pork ribs ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking. ; name: slow cooker country style ribs ; ingredients: country-style pork ribs, salt, ground black pepper, light brown sugar, garlic cloves, onion, apple juice, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 280f. In large baking dish place down 2 long pieces aluminum foil, criss cross. Put meat on foil pour bbq sauce on top drizzle honey over it. Sprinkle with garlic. Place onions all over. Salt and pepper it. Wrap up foil and seal it well. Cook for about 6 hours. ; name: barbecue ribs ; ingredients: spareribs, brown sugar, catsup, soy sauce, dry mustard, chili sauce, dark rum, worcestershire sauce, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Wrap ribs in double thickness of foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting. ; name: chinese ribs ; ingredients: sparerib racks, garlic, catsup, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, dry sherry, fresh ginger, honey ; preparation:Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Place all the remaining ingredients and the pork ribs in a wok. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup liquid. Heat a clean wok and sear the pork until browned. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes. Chop the pork into bite size pieces and serve. ; name: slow cooker teriyaki ribs ; ingredients: pork spareribs, ketchup, soy sauce, ginger powder, sugar, molasses, garlic ; preparation:

name: sauteed grape tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, olive oil, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings. ; name: roasted grape tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices. ; name: choose your own flavor herb vinaigrette ; ingredients: canola oil, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, garlic clove, dried herbs ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in the flavored oil until the dessing is creamy and blended. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to make thin shreds. Stir into dressing. Whisk together vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to ; name: mozzarella tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, tomatoes, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Whisk together 2 vinegars, shallot, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil until blended. Add the basil sprig and bruise it with the back of a wooden spoon. Let mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Discard sprig of basil. Put the tomatoes in a serving bowl. Drizzle with the dressing and add shredded basil. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature at least 30 minutes before serving. ; name: tomato basil pizza sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes. ; name: tomatoes with basil vinaigrette ; ingredients: olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, fresh basil leaf, coarse salt, ground pepper, plum tomatoes ; preparation:

name: fettuccine with pesto sauce ; ingredients: fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, pecorino romano cheese, fettuccine ; preparation:Heat butter over medium-high heat until melted. Add mushrooms, sauting 3 minutes. Add 2 cups of half and half, salt, and pepper, stirring for 5 minutes, but do not let it boil. Slowly add parmesan and pesto. Heat through and serve over fettuccine. ; name: pistachio pesto sauce ; ingredients: fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, unsalted pistachio nuts, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine basil, garlic, cheese and pistachios in a food processor or blender. Process to mix. With the machine running, slowly add the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper and process to the desired consistency. Let stand for 5 minutes. To serve, thin the pesto with a few tablespoons of hot pasta cooking water and toss with hot fettuccine or linguine. ; name: pesto marsala style ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic clove, basil, pecorino cheese, almonds, olive oil, oregano, salt and pepper, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Chop garlic, basil and the pecorino or provola cheese. Place in a bowl, add the diced tomato and mix in the olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper and the crushed red pepper. It can be refrigerated overnight but it is preferable to use it the same day that it is made. To make this sauce for 1 lb. Of pasta, use 2 cups of tomato and double the amount of the other ingredients. Drizzle some olive oil on top of each dish of pasta and sprinkle with some toasted breadcrumbs for a true sicilian touch. ; name: basil pesto lighter version ; ingredients: pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Add nuts and garlic to blender and pulse until minced. Add olive oil, pulse a few time more. Add basil leaves, cheese, salt and blend until smooth. Scrape sides of blender as you go to make sure everthing mixes well. Serve with your favorite pasta. ; name: pasta with tomato and pesto ; ingredients: dry pasta, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, dry white wine, pesto sauce, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top. ; name: light pesto sauce ; ingredients: romano cheese, garlic cloves, fresh basil, walnuts, salt, pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: fluffy white bread bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, flour, vital wheat gluten flour, sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Proof yeast in water. For bread machine - place all ingredients in order directed by your bread machine and process. By hand - combine all and knead until elastic, about 10 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise for an hour. Punch down. Place in a greased loaf pan, cover and let rise another 20 minutes. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or so. ; name: buttermilk pan rolls ; ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, buttermilk, vegetable oil, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the warm water, buttermilk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking soda, salt. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 30 minutes. Stir dough down. Fill greased muffin cups half full. Cover and let rise in a warm place ; name: whole wheat beer honey bread machine rolls ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, bread flour, active dry yeast, honey, salt, water, beer, oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the warm milk, yeast, sugar, eggs and oil. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise ntil doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until golden. ; name: country rolls ; ingredients: water, egg, all-purpose flour, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, salt, olive oil, active dry yeast ; preparation:Place ingredients in muffin cups in order as listed. Run on dough cycle. Shape rolls and place on lightly greased baking pan. Cover with cloth and let rise in warm place for 1 hour. Bake at 375 for 10 - 15 minute. ; name: softest ever bread machine bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, vegetable oil, bread flour, salt ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the bread machine in the order listed. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at ; name: prize winning crusty rolls bread machine dough cycle ; ingredients: warm water, egg white, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, bread flour, fast rising yeast ; preparation:

name: marinated roast beef ; ingredients: rump roast, vegetable oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic, ground pepper ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add flank steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill beef, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: beer marinated beef roast ; ingredients: beef roast, beer, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, onion salt, dry mustard, seasoning salt, paprika, pepper ; preparation:Roast meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls. ; name: rib roast au jus ; ingredients: rib roast, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red wine, beef broth ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking. ; name: grilled meat marinade ; ingredients: soy sauce, vegetable oil, apple juice, lemon juice, vanilla, ground ginger, garlic powder, pepper, chicken ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: venezuelan beef roast marinade ; ingredients: white wine, olive oil, lemon, juice of, lime, juice of, sea salt, dry oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves ; preparation:

name: cabbage skillet hasty tasty ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic powder, cabbage, brown rice, rotel tomatoes, broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender. ; name: sauteed red cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage ; ingredients: bacon, onion, flour, vinegar, water, salt, pepper, brown sugar, red cabbage, caraway seed ; preparation:Cook bacon until crips. Crumble. Measure 3 teaspoons of bacon fat into skillet. Stir in remaining ingredients, leaving out cabbage. Cook mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and clear. Cool to room temperature. Put cabbage into salad bowl. Pour cooled dressing over it. Add crumbled bacon. Chill. ; name: sweet n sour crunchy cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, green onions, fried chinese noodles, white vinegar, caster sugar, vegetable oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Chop cabbage into small pieces, place in large bowl. Chop green onions, mix into cabbage. Mix dressing ingredients well, add to cabbage and green onions. Add crunchy noodles just before serving. Enjoy. ; name: my favorite sweet and sour red cabbage ; ingredients: cider vinegar, brown sugar, caraway seed, celery seed, red cabbage, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine vinegar, brown sugar, caraway and celery seeds. Set aside. Place cabbage and onion in a saucepan. Add a small amount of water. Cover and steam until tender, about 15 minutes. Add vinegar mixture and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm. ; name: the best skillet cabbage you will ever taste soul food ; ingredients: green cabbage, yellow onion, smoked sausage, bacon bits, margarine, salt, black pepper, sugar, white rice ; preparation:

name: quinoa with garlic and soy sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, quinoa, vegetable stock, soy sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: chicken quinoa salad ; ingredients: water, quinoa, slivered almonds, white wine vinegar, olive oil, chicken breasts, grapes, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: orange flavored quinoa ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, orange juice, salt, quinoa, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, currants, orange zest ; preparation:In a medium nonstick saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft. Add orange juice, 1 cup water and salt. Bring to a boil. Add quinoa and stir once. Quickly return to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, until water is absorbed and quinoa is tender. Remove from heat and let stand 3 minutes. Add parsley, mint, currants and orange zest. Stir with a fork to combine and fluff up grain. ; name: tri color pepper salad ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, plum tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: quick lemon and garlic quinoa salad ; ingredients: quinoa, water, salt, carrot, parsley, sunflower seeds, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, gluten-free soy sauce ; preparation:

name: roasted dijon potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, sugar ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large baking dish or roasting pan. Combine remaining ingredients. Drizzle over potatoes. Toss to coat. Bake at 425f for 30-40 minutes, stirring often, until potatoes are tender. ; name: roasted potato wedges with herbs ; ingredients: dijon mustard, olive oil, rosemary, fresh oregano, parsley, table salt, black pepper, new potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the herbs alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: kentucky fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, vegetable oil, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley. ; name: bbq potato with onion garlic ; ingredients: baking potatoes, onions, garlic powder, butter, salt and pepper, aluminum foil, sour cream, bacon bits ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: grilled garlic potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, vidalia onion, butter, roasted garlic, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: grilled potato and onion packets ; ingredients: olive oil, dijon mustard, fresh thyme, salt, ground black pepper, white potatoes, red onions, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:

name: apple crack dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, mini chocolate chips, toffee pieces, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:Mix sugar, cream cheese and vanilla with mixer until smooth. Spread into a deep pie dish. Spread caramel topping on top, then sprinkle with toffee bits and nuts. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Just before serving, core and cut apples into wedges and arrange around the edge of the pie dish, alternating red and green slices. ; name: cheesecake no bake ; ingredients: white chocolate chips, cream cheese, cool whip, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Melt chocolate chips in the microwave for a minute, stir, then cook for another minute and stir. Cube cream cheese and add to the white chocolate. Mix with beaters until smooth. Fold in whip cream until completely incorporated. Pour into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. ; name: decadent chocolate chip cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, cocoa, sugar, butter, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, vanilla, mini chocolate chip, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: cupcake cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, whipping cream, miniature chocolate chips, brown sugar, butter, pecans, vanilla frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks. ; name: chocolate chip cheesecake dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, semisweet mini chocolate chips, pecans, honey, chocolate graham cracker ; preparation:

name: spicy mexican meatloaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, green bell pepper, yellow onion, egg, rotel tomatoes, taco seasoning, chili powder, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance. ; name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: home sweet home meatloaf ; ingredients: ground chuck, eggs, plain breadcrumbs, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, brown sugar, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance. ; name: tacos in a bag ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, corn chips, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Brown meat in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spoon into warmed taco shells. Serve with assorted toppings. ; name: mexican beef cheese and bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: texas meatloaf ; ingredients: tortilla chips, lean ground beef, milk, salsa, eggs ; preparation:

name: baked bean and tomato soup ; ingredients: baked beans, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired. ; name: creamy fresh tomato summer soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onions, soymilk, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. In a soup ; name: creamy tortilla soup vegetarian ; ingredients: rotel tomatoes & chilies, vegetable broth, vegetarian refried beans, black beans, corn, fresh cilantro, corn tortilla strips, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:In a blender, puree 2 cans of black beans and set aside. Under medium heat, saut onion and garlic for about five minutes in a medium size pot. Add salt, pepper& splash of dry sherry. Add puree black beans, 2 cans of whole beans, cumin, chili powder, bay leaves, cilantro and more salt and pepper if needed. Lower heat and let simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: big batch vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, celery, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, assorted fresh vegetables ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat 2 cups of stock to boiling over high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of stock. Add scallions, onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat until soft about 5 minutes. Add 3 cups stock and tomato paste. Add vegetables. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15 minutes. Add salt and pepper, cooked big batch vegetable soup. ; name: creamy tomato tortilla soup ; ingredients: tomatoes and green chilies, navy beans, milk, sea salt, black pepper, fresh parsley, tortilla chips ; preparation:

name: whole wheat fluffy pancakes ; ingredients: egg, milk, butter, vanilla extract, sugar, baking powder, whole wheat pastry flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: coconut flour pancakes ; ingredients: butter, heavy cream, splenda granular, salt, eggs, coconut flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: famous buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, baking soda, vegetable oil, egg, buttermilk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and mix well. Beat the yolks until pale and smooth. Beat in the buttermilk and then the baking soda and mix well. Beat in the dry ingredients mixing as you add. Make sure the batter is smooth. Add in the melted butter and mix well. Beat the egg whites in another bowl until stiff. Fold into the batter until no bits of white are visible. Let batter stand about 20 minutes before making pancakes. Make sure your griddle is really hot. Ladle batter onto griddle. Turn when bubbles form across the cakes and allow to lightly brown on the second side. Serve with warm maple syrup and sweet butter. ; name: pancakes waffles ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, unbleached white flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Sift flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar together. Separate eggs. Mix together the buttermilk, sour cream or yogurt and the egg yolks. Stir in the butter and vanilla. Brush the waffle iron lightly with oil and preheat it. Stir the wet into the dry ingredients. Beat the egg whites with the whisk or electric mixer until they hold soft peaks. Stir them gently into the batter. Spread a ladleful or so of batter onto the waffle iron and bake until the waffle is done, usually 3 to 5 minutes, depending on your iron. Serve immediately or keep warm for a few minutes in a low oven. ; name: 5 teaspoon pancakes ; ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, eggs, milk ; preparation:

name: new england creamy rice pudding ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, eggs, cooked rice, butter, vanilla, raisins, nutmeg ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except the sugar and cornstarch in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: pareve brown rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked brown rice, soymilk, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, egg ; preparation:In medium size sauce pan over medium-high heat combine soy milk with sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon bring to a boil while constantly stirring. In a separate bowl large enough to accommodate the hot liquid beat the egg with a whisk while slowly adding the hot liquid a little bit at a time until all of the liquid has been added to the egg. Place the 2 cups of cooked rice into the pan used to cook the soy milk mixture. Add the soy milk mixture to the rice in the pan and return heat to medium-high, stir constantly until the mixture comes to a boil then reduce heat to simmer. Simmer mixture for 15-20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes until the mixture is a creamy consistency. Remove from heat, cover top with wax paper and place in the refrigerator to cool. ; name: 15 minute vanilla rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, minute rice, raisins, vanilla instant pudding mix ; preparation:Bring 1 cup of milk to boil in medium sauce pan. Stir in rice and raisins. Cover pan. Remove from heat. Let stand for 5 minutes. Meanwhile prepare pudding. Beat pudding mix into remaining 2 cups of cold milk with whisk for 2 minutes. Add rice mixture to pudding and stir. Cover surface with plastic wrap. Cool 5 minutes. Stir. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: scandinavian rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, eggs, sugar, salt, milk, raisins, lemon juice, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also. ; name: it s doris s rice pudding ; ingredients: whole milk, sugar, white rice, salt, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Boil rice until done. Place rice in a baking dish. Add milk, water, butter, sugar. Stir all of it together and bake until done about 1 hr at 350 degrees. The water measurement is done with the can from the milk so 1 cup is a guess. Stir all of ; name: cherry rice pudding in a slow cooker ; ingredients: whole milk, cooked long-grain rice, eggs, granulated sugar, almond extract, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:

name: deluxe acorn squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, ground pork, apple, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes. ; name: roasted acorn squash with bourbon ; ingredients: acorn squash, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly. ; name: baked cranberry acorn squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, apple, fresh cranberries, orange rind, brown sugar, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and microwave on high for 10-12 minutes or until tender. Turn squash cut side up. Fill centers with brown sugar, butter and honey. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes or until heathed through. ; name: roasted acorn squash with chile vinaigrette ; ingredients: acorn squash, black pepper, salt, olive oil, garlic clove, lime juice, dried chili pepper flakes, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel squash and cut into cubes about 1 inch square. Put squash into plastic mixing bowl, add olive oil, lime juice, and minced chile vinaigrette and toss well so squash is all coated with oil. Arrange squash on roasting pan in single layer. Dot with butter. Roast for 40-50 minutes, turning several times, or until squash is quite softened and getting browned on the edges. Season with sea salt and fresh ground black pepper, and serve hot. ; name: maple orange chicken with acorn squash and sweet potatoes ; ingredients: acorn squash, sweet potatoes, leeks, skinless chicken thighs, salt & fresh ground pepper, orange marmalade, reduced-sodium chicken broth, orange juice, hoisin sauce, maple syrup ; preparation:

name: chocolate marshmallow frosting ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cocoa powder, marshmallow creme, butter, whole milk, vanilla ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: marshmallow cream frosting ; ingredients: sugar, water, egg whites, marshmallow cream, vanilla ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: milk frosting ; ingredients: butter, sugar, milk, vanilla ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: excellent frosting ; ingredients: sugar, flour, butter, crisco, salt, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool. ; name: cinnamon buttercream frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: sylvi s chocolate ice cream frosting ; ingredients: chocolate chips, milk, miniature marshmallows, heavy whipping cream, vanilla ; preparation:

name: copycat mrs field s chocolate chip cookies by todd wilbur ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugars, eggs and vanilla. In another bowl, mix together the flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Combine the wet and dry ingredients. Stir in chocolate chips. With your fingers, place golf ball-sized dough portions 2-inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 9-10 minutes or just until edges are light brown. ; name: susan s chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy. ; name: honey chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, honey, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: chocolate chipless chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, bread flour, kosher salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, egg, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: mrs fields chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: honey mustard roasted chicken ; ingredients: potato, chicken, carrots, olive oil, honey, mustard, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn. ; name: honey mustard chicken with glazed baby carrots ; ingredients: whole chicken breast, prepared mustard, honey, minced garlic clove, salt and pepper, italian dressing, carrots, brown sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken. ; name: creamy honey mustard chicken ; ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, coarse grain mustard, honey, cream, oil, chicken breast fillets, chives ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey, butter, dijon mustard, curry powder, red cayenne pepper and cayenne. Mix well to combine. Pour over the chicken pieces in the baking dish. Mix the chicken pieces slightly with your hands to coat. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Turn the chicken pieces over. With a spoon, baste with sauce. Bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked. ; name: honey and spice glazed chicken ; ingredients: honey, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper, chicken breast halves, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked. ; name: honey mustard glazed chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken drumsticks, carrots, condensed chicken broth, liquid honey, prepared yellow mustard, brown sugar, cornstarch, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: tomato orzo salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, fresh chives, fresh basil, garlic cloves, lemon zest, salt and pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: greek orzo pasta salad ; ingredients: orzo pasta, sun-dried tomato, kalamata olive, bell pepper, red onion, feta cheese, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: mediterranean orzo salad ; ingredients: orzo pasta, red bell pepper, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives, fresh basil, fresh basil leaves, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar ; preparation:Cook the orzo until tender but firm. Drain in a colander. Rinse under cold water to cool, and drain well. Mix the orzo, zucchini, parsley, and mint in a large bowl with a large spoon. Whisk the remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over the salad and mix with a large spoon. ; name: orzo with everything ; ingredients: orzo pasta, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kalamata olive, radicchio, pine nuts, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, garlic ; preparation:Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: orzo feta and tomato salad ; ingredients: orzo pasta, fresh lemon juice, fresh marjoram, dijon mustard, lemon, zest of, olive oil, feta cheese, scallions, kalamata olive, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:

name: tostadas burros pronto ; ingredients: refried beans, green chili, beef broth, tostadas, flour tortillas, lettuce, chopped tomato, cheddar cheese, salsa, enchilada sauce ; preparation:Mix beans, green chiles, and broth. Heat in microwave until hot or heat on the stove if desired. Warm tostada shells in 350 oven for 3 to 4 minutes. Place some of the bean mixture on the flour tortillas with cheese and roll up. Wrap with foil and place in oven for a few minutes to melt cheese. Serve the tostadas cafetieria style by having each person make their own. Put some bean mixture on top of the shell and sprinkle with cheese. Microwave to melt the cheese if desired. Put lettuce, tomatoes, and salsa on top and eat. Remove burros from the foil and top with any of the lettuce, tomatoes, salsa, or my favorite the enchilada sauce. ; name: mexican beef cheese and bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: mexican beef stew ; ingredients: vegetable oil, beef stew meat, onion, garlic clove, diced tomatoes, pimientos, ground cumin, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sear the stew meat in the oil for 2 minutes. Pour meat into bowl and combine chili powder, cumin and flour. Mix with the meat until evenly coated. Pour in broth. Add salt and ground black pepper pour into crock pot, add garlic put on high for an hour then reduce to low for six to seven hours stirring occasionally. ; name: spicy mexican meatloaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, green bell pepper, yellow onion, egg, rotel tomatoes, taco seasoning, chili powder, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance. ; name: mexican tostados ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, salt, pepper, refried beans, flour tortillas, oil ; preparation:

name: peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: no flour peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: crisp peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, peanut butter, granulated sugar, dark brown sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: protein peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, artificial sweetener, brown sugar, peanut butter, egg, all-purpose flour, protein powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: peanut butter cookies for a crowd ; ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, peanut butter, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: peanut butter flax seed cookies ; ingredients: flour, ground flax seeds, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar, brown sugar, butter, egg, vanilla, creamy peanut butter ; preparation:

name: chicken mango kabobs ; ingredients: olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cayenne pepper, salt, sugar, chicken breast halves, mangoes ; preparation:Heat the ghee, then add the onions and cook until golden, about 5 or 6 minutes. Add the chicken bouillon and water. Once the mixture boils, stir in the rice. Cover, reduce heat and cook on low for about 25 minutes until rice is tender. Serve rice with chicken on top. Garnish with toasted almonds. ; name: bbq mango avocado skewers ; ingredients: salad dressing, smooth peanut butter, chicken broth, honey, light soy sauce, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, avocados, mangoes, skewer ; preparation:Slice the mangoes in half or into thirds or whatever size you desire to thread on the skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the mangoes and discard the marinade. Thread mangoes on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat. ; name: savoury mango strawberry salad australia ; ingredients: mango, strawberry, spanish onion, sugar, ginger, lime ; preparation:Place your prepared mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lime juice, lemongrass and sugar. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint. ; name: mango and banana sundae ; ingredients: mango, bananas, lemon juice, orange juice, vanilla ice cream, cinnamon, brown sugar, peanuts ; preparation:Place mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lemon juice, lemon juice and honey. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint. ; name: mango and banana chutney ; ingredients: onion, peanut oil, mango, white vinegar, orange juice, banana, ginger, raisins, brown sugar, serrano chili ; preparation:

name: banana and coconut oatmeal ; ingredients: quick oats, water, coconut extract, banana, unsweetened coconut, walnuts, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20-25 minute until done. ; name: breakfast oatmeal ; ingredients: rolled oats, water, banana, peach, raisins, flax seeds, rice milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl combine cereal, wheat flour, and flour. Set aside. In a larger mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack. ; name: cherry oatmeal ; ingredients: water, salt, old fashioned oats, almond extract, light cherry pie filling, powdered sugar ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely. ; name: easy bananas foster ; ingredients: butter, bananas, light brown sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, ice cream ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container. ; name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: bananas foster oatmeal ; ingredients: rolled oats, rum extract, water, banana, salt, splenda sugar substitute, sugar ; preparation:

name: cabbage noodles with crispy bacon ; ingredients: cabbage, butter, sea salt, pepper, bacon, wide egg noodles, dried thyme, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook cabbage on stove until crispy. Cook noodles in boiling water until al dente. When bacon is cool, crumble it into small pieces. Add the sour cream and chopped onion to the cooked noodles. Add the bacon and half of the cheese into the noodles, stir well. Pour mixture into a square casserole dish and top with remaining cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 15 minutes or until bubbly and cheese has melted. ; name: ham cheese noodle casserole ; ingredients: ham, egg noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: chicken bacon ranch noodles ; ingredients: pasta, boneless skinless chicken breasts, turkey bacon, olive oil, parmesan cheese, frozen chopped spinach, chicken broth, dry ranch dressing mix, grape tomatoes, garlic ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: day after thanksgiving noodles ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, chicken broth, reames frozen noodles, cooked turkey, fresh parsley, flour, cold water ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, salt and pepper. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: noodles and shredded herbed carrots ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, carrots, fresh parsley, dried rubbed sage, tarragon, garlic powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook noodles according to pkg. Directions. Drain. Meanwhile saute the cabbage in the chicken broth until tender, about 10 minutes. Add cooked noodles and mix well. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder to taste. Take the pan off the heat and fold in the sour cream. ; name: schinkenfleckerlin noodles ham ; ingredients: butter, onion, cooked ham, medium egg noodles, salt, pepper, caraway seed ; preparation:
