name: cabbage bacon ; ingredients: cabbage, water, chicken stock cube, olive oil, bacon, onion, butter, cracked black pepper, parsley ; preparation:In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage ; ingredients: bacon, onion, flour, vinegar, water, salt, pepper, brown sugar, red cabbage, caraway seed ; preparation:Cook bacon until crips. Crumble. Measure 3 teaspoons of bacon fat into skillet. Stir in remaining ingredients, leaving out cabbage. Cook mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and clear. Cool to room temperature. Put cabbage into salad bowl. Pour cooled dressing over it. Add crumbled bacon. Chill. ; name: bacon cabbage stir fry ; ingredients: bacon, cabbage, garlic powder, salt, ground mustard ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok. Add cabbage, garlic, black bean sauce, stir fry for 1 minute. Stir in the spinach, chili sauce, and lemon juice, and mix well. Keep stirring for about 3 minutes, until cabbage is soft, about 20-30 minutes. Add cabbage to the skillet and saut for 1 minute or until aromatic. Add garlic to the skillet and stir to coat in bacon drippings and garlic. Add rotel, reserved crumbled bacon, salt and pepper and stir to combine. Simmer over low to med heat until cabbage is soft, about 20-30 minutes. Add garlic to the skillet ; name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: cabbage and piggies ; ingredients: white cabbage, reduced-sodium bacon, unsalted butter, salt and pepper, ground allspice ; preparation:

name: pasta with shrimp ww ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, capers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried oregano, dried tarragon, feta cheese, orzo pasta ; preparation:Shell and devein shrimp. In a large skillet heat olive oil and then add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss. ; name: creamy shrimp pasta ; ingredients: unsalted butter, green bell pepper, onions, fresh parsley, cajun seasoning, raw shrimp, heavy whipping cream, angel hair pasta ; preparation:In blender or food processor, puree the first 6 ingredients until smooth. Pour into serving bowl. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss. ; name: shrimp tomato and goat cheese pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti noodles, fresh shrimp, goat cheese, lemon, juice of, red onion, italian seasoning, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Add shrimp to pot. Cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done and pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture. ; name: baked italian shrimp ; ingredients: fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, large shrimp, fresh garlic, seasoning salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: shrimp with tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, cream cheese, sun-dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, dried basil, angel hair pasta, pine nuts, shrimp ; preparation:

name: brisket wiith sweet potatoes crock pot ; ingredients: beer, cornmeal, cumin, cinnamon, salt, chipotle pepper, garlic cloves, dried ancho chile powder, beef brisket, sweet potatoes ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in bottom of slow cooker. Mix spices and orange juice together. Stir into sweet potatoes. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Check for doneness because each crock pot cooks at a different heat setting. Before serving, stir in toasted pecans. ; name: crock pot beef brisket sandwiches ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, onion, garlic cloves, buns, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place brisket in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 2-3 hours or until brisket is tender. Discard brisket. Remove brisket. When cool enough to handle, shred brisket. Return brisket to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount. ; name: slow cooked corned beef for sandwiches ; ingredients: corned beef brisket, peppercorn, beer, bay leaves, garlic ; preparation:Roast meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls. ; name: traditional irish corned beef and cabbage ; ingredients: corned beef brisket, water, pickling spices, salt, peppercorns, cabbage ; preparation:In bottom of crockpot, place carrots, potatoes, onions and garlic. Trim fat from brisket and sprinkle with salt, black pepper and thyme. Place brisket on top of vegetables. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth. ; name: beef bean chile verde ; ingredients: ground beef, red bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, green chili salsa, water, pinto beans ; preparation:Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute. ; name: brisket cholent ; ingredients: lima beans, onions, beef brisket, paprika, garlic clove, red potatoes, barley, bay leaf, water ; preparation:

name: zucchini crostini ; ingredients: french bread, garlic, zucchini, ricotta cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place oil and garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute until garlic is browned. Add onion and zucchini. Toss well with garlic oil, gently stirring. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Turn into a 2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle on cheeses. Cover casserole and let sit for 2 minutes or until cheese melts- serve immediately. ; name: bleu cheese burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, blue cheese, egg, seasoned bread crumbs, black pepper, hamburger buns, tomatoes ; preparation:Mix all meat ingredients into a bowl until combined. Form 4 patties. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Heat oil and butter in a large non-stick skillet over med-high heat. Add burgers and sear to brown. Place burgers onto cookie sheet and bake for 20 minutes until cooked throughout. Serve with bleu cheese sauce on warmed buns. ; name: baby baked potatoes with bleu cheese topping ; ingredients: new potatoes, canola oil, kosher salt, sour cream, blue cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:To make filling, melt butter in a small skillet and cook apple over a low heat for 2-3 minutes or until just heated through. Remove pan from heat. Set aside and keep warm. To make omelet, melt butter in a small skillet. Place eggs, water and black pepper to taste in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Pour egg mixture into pan and cook over medium heat, continually drawing in the edge of the omelet with a fork during cooking, until no liquid remains, and the omelet is lightly set. Top half of the omelet with apple slices, cheese, and chives and fold in half. Slip onto a plate and serve immediately. ; name: tomato crumble pie ; ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, basil, garlic cloves, pine nuts, tomatoes, white onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 325 degrees. Prepare pastry. In small sauce pan, combine butter, breadcrumbs, basil, garlic cloves, pine nuts, tomatoes, white onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Cover with a layer of lemon slices, sprinkle with a layer of sugar. Layer tomatoes, lemon and sugar until pie is full. Bake at 350f until brown and bubbly, about 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: 2bleu s mushroom and swiss on crostini toast appetizers ; ingredients: crusty italian bread, garlic cloves, shallots, olive oil, red bell peppers, fresh mushrooms, herbs, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: mixed vegetable casserole ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, sliced water chestnuts, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, onion, butter, fine dry breadcrumb ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Fry onion, garlic, mushrooms and leek in a pan in the olive oil until softened. Rinse and drain mixed vegetables and sprinkle over some olive oil. Combine the parmesan and the grated parsnip in a bowl and put aside. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy. ; name: corn with bacon casserole ; ingredients: red bell pepper, green onions, butter, light cream cheese, light sour cream, salt, ground black pepper, whole kernel corn, bacon, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: chili corn ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, green chilies, cream cheese, margarine, milk, garlic salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine milk, cream cheese, and margarine in a medium sauce pan. Stir over low heat until melted. After melted, add corn. When heated through, place in dish and sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees. Garnish with cheddar cheese. ; name: cream corn casserole ; ingredients: cream-style corn, butter, corn muffin mix, prepared onion dip, eggs, salt, celery salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Transfer to a baking dish. Mix cracker crumbs and parmesan cheese together, then add in the butter and butter. Mix to combine, then sprinkle over top. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes or until heated through. ; name: cheesy corn and green bean bake ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, green beans, green chilies, laughing cow light swiss cheese, reduced-fat cream cheese ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, saute onions in butter until tender. Add beans, mushrooms and lemon pepper. Cover and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes or until onions are tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand for 1 minute or until onions are tender. Cover ; name: shoepeg corn casserole ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, sweet onion, celery, bell pepper, sour cream, cream of celery soup, white shoepeg corn, french style green beans, buttery crackers, butter ; preparation:

name: lemon velvet cake ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, eggs, vegetable oil, water, nonstick cooking spray, powdered sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: green tea pound cake ; ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, butter, green tea powder, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter in a bowl. Add sugar in the butter and mix well. Gradually add beaten eggs and stir well. Sift flour, baking powder, and green tea powder together and add the flour to the egg mixture. Pour the batter into a buttered loaf pan. Bake in preheated 340 degrees f oven for about 30-40 minutes. ; name: lakeland lemon cake ; ingredients: self raising flour, butter, caster sugar, eggs, salt, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, lemon, milk ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the middle, set aside. Mix the rest of the ingredients together in another medium sized bowl. Pour it in the middle of the dry ingredients, and stir just until it is mixed together. If you overstir it, it will become a tough piece of crap. Preheat an oven to 350 degrees and wait 2 minutes. Grease a loaf pan. Bake for about 45 minutes, until the crust is brown and if you stick a toothpick inside it will come out clean. ; name: coconut syrup cake ; ingredients: coconut, self-raising flour, milk, eggs, baking powder, unsalted butter, sugar, water, lemon, juice and rind of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold water and mix well. Make three holes in mixture for next three liquid ingredients. Pour vanilla into 1st hole, vinegar into 2nd and oil into 3rd. Pour cold water over all. Mix with fork or wire wisk just until well blended. Pour into two 9 inch pans coated with cooking spray. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Cool completely in pans on a wire rack. ; name: delicious lemon tea cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, lemon essence, lemons, baking powder, all-purpose flour ; preparation:

name: coconut french toast ; ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, eggs, vanilla, flaked coconut, salt, white bread, butter ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate ; name: french toast or eggy bread ; ingredients: white bread, egg, water, caster sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup. ; name: amazing coconut pie ; ingredients: milk, sugar, biscuit mix, eggs, butter, vanilla, flaked coconut ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool. ; name: baked cinnamon sugar french toast ; ingredients: butter, french bread, eggs, vanilla, sugar, milk ; preparation:Place the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup. ; name: coconut banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, yoghurt, flour, baking powder, baking soda, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: coconut toast ; ingredients: flaked coconut, sugar, butter, egg, vanilla, white bread ; preparation:

name: baked dijon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking. ; name: crispy oven baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, plain breadcrumbs, dried rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and spray a baking sheet with pam cooking spray. Put all the dry ingredients into a ziplock bag and shake to combine. Remove chicken from the ziplock bag and shake off any excess buttermilk and add to the breadcrumb mix, add 3 pieces at a time and shake to coat the chicken. Remove and place on baking sheet. Repeat till all pieces are coated. Spray chicken with pam cooking spray and bake for about 20 minutes. ; name: oregano dijon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, dried breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, garlic salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Dredge chicken in flour and shake of excess. Dip in egg, allowing excess to drip off. Saut in skillet a few pieces at a time, turn once, browning on both sides. Arrange chicken in a buttered, shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, oregano and cheese. Cover with foil, bake 15 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about 15-20 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about ; name: panko mustard chicken ala moi ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, sour cream, stone ground dijon mustard, garlic powder, panko breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add chicken breasts and cook until lightly browned, about 20 minutes. Remove chicken to a warm serving platter. Stir flour into pan drippings in skillet, cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken broth, half and half. Stir and cook until the sauce thickens and bubbbles, add in mustard, capers and frozen peas. Return chicken to skillet, cover and heat for 10 minutes. Garnish with tomatoes and sprinkle with parsley. We typically serve with tortolini or other pasta and cover with extra dijon sauce. ; name: crunchy crispy chicken dijon ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, all-purpose flour, honey dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: collard greens with tomatoes and garlic ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, jalapeno pepper, tomatoes, collard greens, bay leaves, thyme, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In large pot, bring 4 quarts salted water to a boil. Stir in collard greens. Cook 15 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Meanwhile, in skillet over medium-high heat, cook bacon 7 minutes, or until crisp, turning once. Drain bacon on paper towels. Cool and crumble. In skillet with bacon drippings, k cook garlic, leeks and peppers 2 minutes. Stir in cooked collard greens and cook 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Transfer mixture to serving platter. Top with crumbled bacon. ; name: bacon and brown sugar braised collard greens ; ingredients: smoked bacon, onion, garlic clove, water, brown sugar, cider vinegar, salt, ground red pepper, collard greens ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Stir together brown sugar, cayenne, and black pepper in a small bowl. Arrange bacon slices in l layer on a large broiler pan and bake in middle of oven for 20 minutes. Turn slices over and sprinkle evenly with spiced sugar. Continue baking until bacon is crisp and brown, 15 to 20 minutes more, then transfer to paper towels to drain. ; name: maple glazed barbecue chicken ; ingredients: maple syrup, tomato paste, red wine vinegar, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze. ; name: maple glazed barbcue chicken ; ingredients: maple syrup, tomato paste, red wine vinegar, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, pepper ; preparation:Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze. ; name: maple collard greens ; ingredients: collard greens, onion, real maple syrup, barbecue sauce, butter, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: bittersweet chocolate sauce ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, water, unsweetened cocoa powder, corn syrup, kosher salt, bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a small saucepan, melt butter and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly until melted. Stir in sugar, vanilla, salt, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake. The amount of time will vary with the amount of sauce being reheated. ; name: cherry brandy sauce ; ingredients: sour cherry, water, cinnamon stick, cornstarch, sugar, brandy ; preparation:Combine sugar and cornstarch in a heavy saucepan. Stir in cream, water and corn syrup. Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more. Remove from heat and stir in butter, vanilla and sour cherry. Let mixture stand at room temperature until cooled. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 months. ; name: sour cream bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, sour cream, bread flour, light brown sugar, gluten, salt, fast rising yeast ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing. ; name: lemon dessert sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, butter, lemon, rind of, salt ; preparation:In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath. ; name: fish with sour cream sauce ; ingredients: butter, onion, fish, paprika, salt and pepper, water, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish fillets in a greased 9x13 dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine butter, onion, fish, paprika, salt and pepper, water, sour cream and parsley, stir well. Pour over fish. Sprinkle with lime rind. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till flakes easy with fork. ; name: bratwurst in sour cream sauce ; ingredients: bratwursts, butter, cold water, flour, salt, sour cream ; preparation:

name: dijon orange chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, orange juice, dijon mustard, honey, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes. ; name: roast pork with maple and mustard glaze ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, real maple syrup, dijon-style mustard, cider vinegar, soy sauce, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast or grill pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast pork ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: maple roasted pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, pure maple syrup, soy sauce, ketchup, dijon mustard, orange zest, curry powder, ground coriander, worcestershire sauce, garlic ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. ; name: crock pot pork loin chops with apples ; ingredients: pork loin chops, chicken broth, apple pie filling, lemon juice, chicken bouillon granule, cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours. ; name: apple dijon pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, apple juice, dijon mustard, chicken broth, cornstarch, water ; preparation:

name: chili crusted salmon with roasted potatoes ; ingredients: chili powder, brown sugar, salt, potatoes, green onions, olive oil, ground black pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. In small mixing bowl, combine chili powder, brown sugar, and salt. In 13 x 9 glass baking dish, toss potatoes with onion, olive oil, pepper, and 1 tbsp of the chili mixture until evenly coated. Cover with foil and roast 20 minutes. Meanwhile, use remaining chili mixture to coat salmon fillets. Place on top of potatoes, skin side down, and roast uncovered 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and potatoes are tender. ; name: salmon pancakes ; ingredients: potato, scallions, self-rising flour, eggs, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, fresh chives, sour cream, smoked salmon ; preparation:In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve. ; name: salmon potato parcels ; ingredients: salmon fillets, potatoes, broccolini, butter, lemon rind, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine salmon fillets, potatoes, broccolini, butter, lemon rind, chives, salt and pepper. Place in a 9-by-13-inch casserole dish, sprayed with cooking spray. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Remove from oven. Top with salmon. Grind on pepper. Return to oven uncovered and bake 10 to 12 minutes, until fish is done to your liking. Garnish with almonds and parsley. ; name: baked salmon delight ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, tarragon, panko breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference. ; name: potato crusted salmon ; ingredients: cooking spray, seafood seasoning, baking potatoes, salmon fillets ; preparation:

name: pan seared filet mignon ; ingredients: beef tenderloin, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450 degrees f. A half-hour before cooking, remove filet from refrigerator. Heat a large skillet over high heat. Pat filet dry and season generously with salt and pepper. Add oil to hot skillet and when it begins to smoke add steak. Reduce heat slightly and cook steak until browned, about 4 minutes on each side. Transfer skillet to the oven. Roast until an instant-read thermometer inserted sideways into the steak registers 120 degrees f for medium-rare, about 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer steak to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes. Cut steak from the bone and carve meat across the grain. ; name: filet mignon with bacon and butter ; ingredients: steak fillets, bacon, black pepper, butter, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a heavy skillet over high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides about 10 minutes. Transfer pan to oven and roast until thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of meat registers 120 degrees, 25-30 minutes. Transfer beef to a cutting board and let stand 15 minutes. Temperature of meat will rise to about 130 degrees. Discard string and rosemary sprigs before slicing. ; name: filet mignon with avocado and sea salt ; ingredients: hass avocado, lime juice, filet mignon steaks, sea salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh cilantro stem ; preparation:Place salmon fillets, skin side down, on foil-lined baking sheet. Coat fish with cooking spray and season with salt and pepper. Preheat broiler. Cook salmon 10 to 12 minutes or until fish is opaque. While fish is cooking, combine avocado, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, hot-pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh cilantro stem. Process, scraping down bowl occasionally, until mixture is creamy and smooth. Serve a dollop of sauce next to each salmon fillet. ; name: grilled steak with garlic yogurt marinade ; ingredients: plain yogurt, fresh parsley, lemon juice, paprika, garlic, salt, beef steaks, mayonnaise ; preparation:Heat grill to medium high. In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter. ; name: filet mignon marinated ; ingredients: olive oil, seasoning salt, lemon-pepper seasoning, dried oregano, garlic powder, beef tenderloin steaks ; preparation:

name: red cabbage and fruit slaw ; ingredients: savoy cabbage, carrot, dried apricot, apple, mayonnaise, sugar, cider vinegar, red cabbage ; preparation:Combine the green cabbage, red cabbage, carrot and green pepper in a large bowl. Combine sugar, vinegar and water. Whisk. Salt and pepper the slaw. Pour wet ingredients over the slaw. Toss well to coat. Cover and chill at least 1 hour. ; name: pa german red cabbage slaw ; ingredients: red cabbage, carrot, onion, celery ribs, apple, almonds, light mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Combine the red cabbage, carrot, onion and celery ribs in a large mixing bowl. To prepare the dressing, in a small bowl combine the mayonnaise, lime juice, zest, cumin, chili powder, sugar, salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and stir to combine. Cover and allow the slaw to sit for at least 30 minutes, tossing every so often to combine well. Top with raisins before serving. ; name: mandarin orange carrot slaw ; ingredients: carrots, mandarin orange segments, green seedless grape, low-fat orange yogurt, cider vinegar, ground ginger ; preparation:In a large saute pan, combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender, stirring to glaze carrots. Just before serving, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: sauteed red cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: red cabbage cranberry and apple slaw ; ingredients: red cabbage, dried cranberries, rice vinegar, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, granny smith apples, pecans ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Combine salad ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture and toss well to coat. Allow salad to chill for at least 20 minutes before serving. Salad may not require all of the dressing. ; name: red cabbage slaw ; ingredients: red cabbage, carrot, cilantro, lime juice, apple cider vinegar, salt, chili powder ; preparation:

name: beans and greens soup ; ingredients: olive oil, italian sausages, carrot, celery, onion, garlic, chicken broth, chickpeas, spinach, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a 3-4 qt pot, saute the onion and carrot in a little olive oil until the onion is translucent. Add the sausage and brown a bit. Add the rest of the ingredients. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with crusty bread and a green salad. ; name: mediterranean chicken vegetables ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chicken breast fillets, chopped tomatoes, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, kalamata olives, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast. In a small bowl combine the feta and the chopped olives, then stuff of mixture into each pocket. In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 tbs. Olive oil on medium to high heat. Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 tbs. Olive oil and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer ; name: cayenne shrimp stir fry ; ingredients: salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of ; preparation:In a large sauce pan. Add the salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well. ; name: brussels sprouts with garlic and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, brussels sprout, lemon pepper, sea salt, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: greens from cameroon ; ingredients: oil, garlic cloves, onion, cayenne, greens, chicken broth, salt ; preparation:

name: aussie breakfast egg mess ; ingredients: sliced mushrooms, bacon, onion, red pepper, diced tomato, eggs, salt and pepper, cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: easter scrambled eggs 1950 ; ingredients: eggs, light cream, salt, pepper, fresh chives, bottled chili sauce, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: kentucky scramble ; ingredients: bacon, mushrooms, whole kernel corn, green bell pepper, pimiento, salt and pepper, eggs, water, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: scrambled eggs and mushrooms 1953 ; ingredients: eggs, butter, bacon, mushrooms, onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: blue cheese salad ; ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, dry mustard, oregano, fresh ground black pepper, blue cheese, garlic oil, lemon juice, fresh spinach ; preparation:Heat large non-stick skillet, swirl in oil, then add garlic. Saute 30 seconds. Add beef in two batches, cook til just browned, about 2 minutes. Drain pasta, add to bowl with yogurt dressing. Add steak and tomatoes, toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: south african green bean salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sweet white onion, stuffed green olive ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for ; name: fresh corn and green bean salad ; ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: three bean salad ; ingredients: green beans, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground cumin, chili powder, red onions, chickpeas, red kidney beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator. ; name: green bean blue cheese salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, blue cheese, red onion, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, pecan pieces, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: cherry cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, salt, flour, maraschino cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: cherry chocolate slice ; ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, flour, caster sugar, eggs, cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: cocoa fudge cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, brown sugar, plain yogurt, vanilla extract, dried tart cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: merry cherry fudge ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, maraschino cherries, semisweet chocolate morsels, bittersweet chocolate squares, sweetened condensed milk, maraschino cherry juice, pecans ; preparation:

name: broccoli pesto pasta ; ingredients: penne pasta, broccoli, garlic, lemon, chili flakes, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta until al dente. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside. Cook until chicken is no ; name: tomato and basil pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, basil, crushed red pepper flakes, chopped tomatoes, pasta, parmesan cheese, romano cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: chicken pesto and sun dried tomato pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken breasts, penne, sun-dried tomato, basil pesto, light cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the cooked pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top. ; name: pasta with tomato and pesto ; ingredients: dry pasta, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, dry white wine, pesto sauce, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top. ; name: country pasta ; ingredients: yellow onion, garlic, olive oil, fresh mushrooms, tomato sauce, black olives, crushed red pepper flakes, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Place pasta in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Serve over pasta topped with parmesan cheese. ; name: garden veg pasta ; ingredients: penne, broccoli, sugar snap peas, zucchini, olive oil, light cream cheese, parmesan cheese, lemon, fresh basil ; preparation:

name: cornbread with corn ; ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, low-fat milk, eggs, butter, corn ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: corn grits cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, buttermilk, baking soda, eggs, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: the ultimate fluffy cornbread ; ingredients: butter, yellow cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, seasoning salt, creamed corn, half-and-half, extra large egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: cornbread simply basic ; ingredients: butter, white cornmeal mix, all-purpose flour, sugar, buttermilk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. You can use butter spray to grease skillet, but it works best if you put a little oil in the skillet and put it in the oven while it is preheating. Remove skillet and tilt to coat pan bottom with oil right before you pour in the batter. Mix cornmeal, milk, egg and oil in bowl. Pour batter into hot skillet and return skillet to oven. Bake for 20-30 minutes depending on your oven. Cornbread is done when the top is nice and brown and the sides have pulled away from the pan. Turn over the pan and it should slide right out. Cut into wedges and serve hot. ; name: texas cornbread ; ingredients: milk, buttermilk, extra large eggs, vegetable oil, cornmeal, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt ; preparation:

name: cider tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, apple cider, honey, orange slice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes to allow the spices to permeate the liquid. Ladle into mugs. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator 2 to 3 days. Rewarm in the microwave. ; name: cocoa syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, dutch-processed cocoa powder, vanilla extract, kosher salt, light corn syrup ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: hot perked apple cider ; ingredients: apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves ; preparation:Place apple, orange and all remaining ingredients into crock pot to full. Add brown sugar. Stick whole cloves into skin of orange and apple wedges. Place apple, orange and all remaining ingredients into cheese cloth, tie with string and drop into crock pot. Bring to a boil, about 2 to 2 hours on high. Once the cider is boiling, reduce setting to low. Keep on low for 2 hours or more before serving. Replenish with additional cider when needed. If cider is cold, return setting to high until heated. Serve or have guests serve themselves from the crock pot. If desired, leave a bottle of spiced rum nearby. ; name: maple rum cider ; ingredients: apple cider, maple syrup, rum, whole cloves, whole allspice, cinnamon, oranges ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine all ingredients except garnish. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered 20 minutes to blend flavors. Remove cinnamon stick --. Stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately. ; name: apple pie moonshine ; ingredients: apple juice, apple cider, brown sugar, sugar, cinnamon sticks, everclear alcohol, vodka ; preparation:In a large stock pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, brown sugar, sugar, cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, ground cloves and whisk together, mixing well. Pour in 1 gallon of apple cider. Stir and mix well. Pour in everclear grain alcohol 190 proof. Lastly, add 2 cups of pinnacle whipped cream vodka. Continue to stir and mix well. Using a ladle or measuring cup with spout, pour moonshine mixture into mason jars, seal and refrigerate for 5-6 days. Shake well before drinking. Keep refrigerated and drink responsibly. ; name: amazing apple cider ; ingredients: apples, juice, boiling water, cinnamon, sugar crystals, vanilla extract, honey ; preparation:

name: cheese and onion on toast ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, whole milk, cornflour, fresh ground pepper, salt, red onion, bread rounds ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: my cheese burgers ; ingredients: meat, breadcrumbs, onion, soy sauce, italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cheese slices ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from ground beef through pizza sauce. Separate the halves of the hamburger buns, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the hamburger buns. Top each with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly. ; name: special grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: bread, cooked bacon, red onion, processed cheese, margarine ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread bacon mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each sandwich, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread ; name: grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: low fat spicy cheesesteak sandwich ; ingredients: lean roast beef, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, salsa, multi-grain hoagie buns, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: mushroom beef stroganoff ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, sirloin steaks, fresh mushrooms, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, green onion, dried thyme, dried marjoram, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsley. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once. ; name: stroganoff 1953 ; ingredients: round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, butter, fresh mushrooms, onion, consomme, vinegar, sour cream ; preparation:Dust meat lightly with flour and season with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet. Add meat and saute until browned, about 3 minutes. Heat remaining butter in a separate skillet. Add mushrooms and onions. Cook until lightly browned, 3-4 minutes. Add consomme, vinegar and sour cream. Bring to a boil, then immediately reduce heat to low. Add meat to mushroom mixture, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, or until meat is tender. ; name: creamy beef stroganoff ; ingredients: onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, beef sirloin, sour cream, sugar, salt, dry mustard, paprika, egg noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Sim ; name: ground beef stroganoff ; ingredients: lean ground beef, flour, salt, black pepper, paprika, onion, butter, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, sour cream ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once. ; name: low fat crock pot chicken stroganoff ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cream of mushroom soup, light sour cream, onion soup mix, crushed red pepper flakes, button mushrooms, garlic powder, onion, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour sauce over chicken in crock pot, and heat on low approximately 4 hours until chicken is tender and falling apart. Sprinkle with parsley flakes. Serve over pasta, egg noodles, or rice. ; name: mushrooms stroganoff ; ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, nutmeg, beef bouillon cube, sour cream ; preparation:

name: chocolate covered peanut butter krispies ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, smooth peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar& corn syrup. Stir. Occasionally, bring to a boil over medium heat. And boil 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter until smooth. Pour over cereal, stir to coat well. Press evenly into 9 inch square pan coated. With shortening or cooking spray. Cool completely. Invert pan on cutting board. And cut into bars. ; name: chocolate crispy bars rice krispies ; ingredients: sugar, white syrup, chunky peanut butter, chocolate chips, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: fudge krispies ; ingredients: milk chocolate chips, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, powdered sugar, rice krispies ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine chocolate chips, butter and corn syrup. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Remove from heat and add vanilla, peanut butter and powdered sugar. Mix well. Stir in cereal and pecans and mix ell. Spread into greased 9x13 pan. Chill until firm. ; name: peanut chocolate fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate frosting, peanut butter chips, peanuts ; preparation:In a medium bowl combine the crust ingredients, mix well. Press firmly into the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Refrigerate crust for 20-30 minutes. In another medium bowl, combine filling ingredients, and blend at low speed for 30 seconds, and then on medium high speed 2 minutes or until light and fluffy. Spread over crust. In a medium saucepan, melt chocolate chips over low heat, stirring constantly until smooth. Stir in peanut butter, blend well. Stir in peanuts. Spread over filling. Refrigerate at least 4 hours, store leftovers in the refrigerator as well. ; name: crackle candy ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, rice krispies ; preparation:

name: red lentil curry ; ingredients: red lentil, onion, oil, mustard, curry powder, chili powder, salt, milk, water ; preparation:Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry onion and garlic for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the paste. Add hot water. Wash the lentils and put into the water. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry onion till golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve warm with italian crusty bread or flatbreads. ; name: spinach and rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh spinach, tomatoes, water, salt & pepper, uncooked rice ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: seasoned spinach with garlic ; ingredients: frozen spinach, toasted sesame oil, garlic cloves, green onion, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: spinach dish ; ingredients: spinach, green onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, water, italian seasoning, hot green peppers, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: curried spinach and lentil bake ; ingredients: yellow onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, basmati rice, curry powder, salt, fresh ground pepper, frozen chopped spinach, brown lentils, coconut milk ; preparation:

name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: easy fresh guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onions, grape tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, garlic salt, lime ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: guacamole dip ; ingredients: avocados, lemon juice, hot sauce, salt, white onion, tomatoes ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt and salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: guacamole at the cottage ; ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: guacamole with mayonnaise ; ingredients: avocados, green chilies, roma tomatoes, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: fresh garlic green beans with olives ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, butter, yellow onion, oregano, black olives, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a separate bowl combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: great greek green beans ; ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, diced tomatoes, black olives, dried oregano, frozen french-cut green beans, feta cheese ; preparation:Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute longer or until heated through. ; name: greek style green beans with tomatoes and feta cheese ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, onion, roma tomatoes, black olives, oregano, french style green beans, salt and pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: fresh green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: tuna and green beans with rice ; ingredients: oil, onion, chicken broth, frozen italian cut green beans, instant rice, basil, pepper, tuna, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:

name: bruschetta with roasted sweet red peppers ; ingredients: italian bread, olive oil, roasted sweet red peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil, onion, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Prepare a medium-hot charcoal fire or preheat the broiler. Place on grill or under the broiler the slices of bread. Grill or broil, turning once, until golden brown, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from the heat and rub the surface with 2 large cloves of garlic. Brush with 3-4 t of the olive oil. Combine the tomatoes, basil leaves, salt and pepper in bowl. Divide the tomato among the brushetta and serve immediately. ; name: easy bruschetta ; ingredients: tomatoes, sweet onion, olive oil, fresh oregano, fresh basil, fresh parsley, italian bread, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Spray 9x13 pan with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange tenderloins in pan and sprinkle with mozzarella. In seperate bowl, mix tomatoes, chicken stuffing, and water. Mix until stuffing is moistened. Spread evenly over chicken. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: peach and roasted red pepper bruschetta ; ingredients: red pepper, peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture. Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette. Serve immediately. ; name: bruschetta pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti, diced tomatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, basil, oregano, onion powder, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to broiler. In a small saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the tomatoes, basil, oregano, onion powder, salt and pepper. Mix well to combine. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Top each slice of bread with equal amounts of the tomato mixture. Place the slices onto a large baking sheet. Broil for about 2 minutes or until bubbly and lightly browned. Sprinkle lightly with finely shredded mozzarealla cheese if desired. ; name: blt bruschetta ; ingredients: bacon, tomatoes, leaf lettuce, pesto sauce, fresh basil, salt, pepper, french baguette, olive oil ; preparation:

name: sweet steak ; ingredients: sugar, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, garlic powder, top sirloin steaks ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except steak in a large resealable plastic bag, mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade, reserving the marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan bring reserved marinade to a boil. Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve grilled steak with hot marinade. ; name: grilled beef tenderloin steaks in balsamic marinade ; ingredients: balsamic vinegar, olive oil, shallot, fresh rosemary, beef tenderloin steaks ; preparation:Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli. ; name: pepper beef steak packets ; ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, garlic powder, black pepper, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, teriyaki sauce, cooked rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings. ; name: italian beef patties with balsamic cream sauce ; ingredients: ground round, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, salt & fresh ground pepper, butter, onion, olive oil, heavy cream, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Cook patties with balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce mixture to skillet and cook over medium high heat. Add balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce mixture to skillet and cook over medium high ; name: beef tenderloin with blue cheese ; ingredients: beef tenderloin steaks, garlic powder, salt, sour cream, blue cheese ; preparation:

name: macadamia pine nut cheese ; ingredients: macadamia nuts, water, sea salt, lemon, juice of, pine nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix nuts, pineapple, and coconut in large bowl. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt and add to nut mixture. Mix well until mixture is completely coated with flour. Beat eggs until foamy and add vanilla to eggs. Pour egg mixture into dry mixture and stir until combined. Divide evenly between two 9 x 5 greased loaf pans and bake for 60-70 minutes or until centers test done. Remove from pans and cool completely on racks. Wrap in foil or plastic wrap and refrigerate. ; name: mac n cheese ; ingredients: milk, flour, black pepper, cheddar cheese, american cheese, cooked macaroni ; preparation:This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 while working on this step. Put macaroni to boil. In a medium pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. After cheddar has dissolved, add the mozzarella, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown. ; name: chili cheese log ; ingredients: velveeta cheese, cream cheese, pecans, garlic powder, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: pineapple cheese logs ; ingredients: cream cheese, crushed pineapple, pecans, green onions, seasoning salt ; preparation:Beat cream cheese with fork until smooth. Gradually stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt. Chill. Shape into ball. Roll in remaining nuts. Refrigerate until well chilled. Garnish with pineapple slices, cherries and parsley. Makes about 40 appetizer servings. The green pepper gets liquid when you process it in the food processor. I have to blot it with a paper towel. When i made the ball with the low fat cream cheese i either did not drain the green pepper and pineapple well or it was the cream cheese. Ever since i have used full fat cream cheese and have not had a problem. ; name: macadamia cheese log ; ingredients: cream cheese, ham, cheddar cheese, spring onions, black pepper, macadamia nuts ; preparation:

name: belizean traditional beans and rice ; ingredients: red kidney beans, coconut milk, garlic clove, salt & pepper, rice, onion, meat ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top. ; name: breakfast chilli beans ; ingredients: olive oil, red onions, paprika, ground coriander, chili flakes, salt and pepper, chopped tomatoes, butter beans, cannellini beans, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: one pan potatoes green beans chicken and peppers too ; ingredients: vegetable oil, red potatoes, boneless skinless chicken breast half, red bell pepper, green beans, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in the dutch oven and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until potatoes can be easily pierced with a fork. Return potatoes to the dutch oven and cover with water. Cover and ; name: beans and beer ; ingredients: dried pinto beans, onion, garlic cloves, beer, roma tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, sugar, salt, fresh ground pepper, cilantro leaf ; preparation:Place beans in a slow cooker and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: caribbean red beans and rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, jalapeno pepper, basmati rice, red beans, coconut milk, chicken broth, fresh thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: guacamole at the cottage ; ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: easy fresh guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onions, grape tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, garlic salt, lime ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: guacamole perfecto ; ingredients: avocados, serrano chilies, tomatoes, fresh cilantro, red onions, lime, oregano, salt & pepper ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl.
