Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: guacamole our way ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, jalapeno pepper, avocado, lemon juice, chili powder, salt, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: roast chicken with rosemary lemon salt ; ingredients: chicken, extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary, lemon, fresh lemon rind, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: classic roast chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, butter, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: italian oven roasted chicken and potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, flat leaf parsley, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, pepper and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: chicken roasted with artichokes and tomatoes w m ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, artichoke hearts, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, butter, dried oregano leaves, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast half ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: roast chicken with potato capsicum and tomato ; ingredients: chicken fillets, bacon, cherry tomatoes, red capsicums, potatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, parsley ; preparation:

name: omelet ; ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: oven baked omelet ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, salt, ground pepper, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: oven omelette ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, frozen hash browns, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: solo green chili cheese omelette ; ingredients: eggs, jalapeno peppers, cheddar cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: baby spinach omelet ; ingredients: eggs, baby spinach, parmesan cheese, onion powder, ground nutmeg, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a bowl, beat the eggs, and stir in the baby spinach and parmesan cheese. Season with onion powder, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. In a small skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat, cook the egg mixture about 3 minutes, until partially set. Flip with a spatula, and continue cooking 2 to 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 2 to 3 minutes, or to desired doneness. ; name: omelet brunch ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, milk, salt, pepper, green onion, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: pork chops dinner ; ingredients: pork loin chops, onion, vegetable oil, red potatoes, carrot, sliced mushrooms, low-fat cream of celery soup, water, salt, dried thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of the vegetables. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender. ; name: best and easiest pork chops ever ; ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, carrots, celery rib, onion, seasoning salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place chops in a 9x13 pan. Pour undiluted tomato soup over chops. Pour peas with liquid over soup. Place onions over all. Salt and pepper to taste. Do not stir. Cover with foil tightly and bake 1 hour 15 minutes or until meat falls off the bone. Serve over mashed potatoes. ; name: pork chops with tomatoes and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, rice, stewed tomatoes, salt, pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook pork chops over medium high heat, turning once until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate. Add rice and seasonings from mix to skillet, along with water, tomatoes and their liquids, scallions and raisins. Mix well. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and place pork chops on top of the rice. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes or until rice is cooked. ; name: country pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, zucchini, onion, pork loin chops, salt, pepper, mushroom, spaghetti sauce, dried oregano ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: easy pork chops dinner ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, stewed tomatoes, thin spaghetti ; preparation:

name: simple pie crust ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, milk ; preparation:To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight. ; name: sure thing pie crust ; ingredients: flour, shortening, salt, egg, ice water, vinegar ; preparation:To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight. ; name: favorite pie crust ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, salt, baking powder, lard, egg, vinegar, cold water ; preparation:To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and shortening in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight. ; name: sour cream pie crust ; ingredients: flour, salt, butter, egg, sour cream ; preparation:Place flour, sugar, salt, sugar, and shortening in large tupperware or other plastic container with lid. Seal tightly. Shake 3 minutes. Open & make sure mixture is uniform. Add water. Shake 3 more minutes & open to see if mixture is large dough ball of uniform consistency. Roll out on floured surface. Can be frozen for later use. ; name: tenderflake pie crusts ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, lard, egg, vinegar, cold water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust. ; name: food processor pie crust ; ingredients: flour, salt, shortening, butter, water ; preparation:

name: potato cheddar quesadilla ; ingredients: burrito-size flour tortillas, olive oil, cheddar cheese, mashed potatoes, onions, black pepper, hot salsa, canned jalapeno slices ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: full meal quesadilla ; ingredients: flour tortilla, cooked chicken, refried beans, onion, bell pepper, raw mushrooms, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: sweet red pepper mushroom quesadillas ; ingredients: red onion, fresh mushrooms, garlic, oregano, olive oil, tomatoes, red peppers, tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: sweet and spicy sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, brown sugar, paprika, ground black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, poultry seasoning, chili powder, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole sweet potatoes in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot. ; name: sweet potato quesadilla ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, sweet potatoes, garlic cloves, cumin, chili, cilantro, sour cream, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas ; preparation:

name: green beans with ginger butter ; ingredients: french haricots vert, fresh ginger, unsalted butter, lemon, zest of, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: baked beans don t get any better than this ; ingredients: pork and beans, butter beans, tomato soup, ground beef, bacon, onions, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes. ; name: barbecued butter beans ; ingredients: butter beans, ketchup, dark corn syrup, liquid smoke, hot sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Drain butter beans and pour into pan. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Bake for 1 hour or until brown and bubbling. ; name: green beans with garlic butter and almonds ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, brown sugar, soy sauce, white vinegar, toasted sliced almonds ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: basic refried beans ; ingredients: dried pinto beans, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt ; preparation:In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth. ; name: bess s best butter beans ; ingredients: butter, low-fat yogurt, brown sugar, molasses, dry mustard, salt, broad beans ; preparation:

name: marinated grilled veggie kebabs ; ingredients: bell peppers, red onion, mushrooms, broccoli spears, italian salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Lightly spray one side of the foil sheets with non-stick cooking spray. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl, stir to coat. Transfer ingredients to the sprayed side of one sheet of foil, place the other sheet of foil, sprayed side down, on top of the veggies and create a packet by folding and crimping edges tightly to seal. Place packet on the grill and cover with grill lid. Cook about 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender, be sure to turn packet over about halfway through cooking. ; name: lemon chicken kabobs ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, dried thyme, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, sweet green peppers ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once. ; name: bbq caribbean beef kabobs ; ingredients: beef, lemon juice, lite olive oil, honey, hot pepper, fresh ginger, soy sauce, allspice, cinnamon, clove ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 minutes. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: honey chicken kabobs ; ingredients: vegetable oil, honey, soy sauce, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, onions, mushroom ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 hours. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: marinated veggie kabobs ; ingredients: red bell pepper, orange bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, white onion, grape tomatoes, baby portabella mushrooms, light italian dressing, skewer ; preparation:

name: rice griddle cakes ; ingredients: rice, flour, caster sugar, butter, baking powder, egg, milk, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease an 8x8-inch baking dish. In a large mixing bowl, beat together milk, butter and egg substitute. Add the sugar, then gradually beat in the flour. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings. ; name: idaho potato cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, mashed potatoes, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, milk, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake ; name: yummy mashed potato bake ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion powder, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, butter, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately. ; name: jumbo skillet potato pancake ; ingredients: potatoes, green onions, eggs, fresh parsley, garlic, seasoning salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a pan with foil. Wash and slice potatoes very thin. Mix spices, lemon juice and oil in a separate bowl. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once. ; name: potato griddle cakes ; ingredients: potatoes, egg, flour, milk, sugar, salt, white pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: roasted garlic herb new potatoes ; ingredients: small red potatoes, olive oil, garlic, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. ; name: home style potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, water, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: stove top roasted red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, dried parsley, dried basil, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400-425. Spray cooking dish with spray if using fat free dressing. Put all ingredients into large zip bag and toss. Put in dish and bake for 15 minute then toss and bake. 20-25 min cooking time. Keep your eye on them. The thinner the slice the faster it cooks. Check in and toss to keep from over drying and baking. If you use a fattier dressing then it is less checking time. ; name: crispy roasted new potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian cheese blend, fresh basil, garlic cloves, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: perfect roasted potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, cornstarch, garlic powder, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, garlic clove, parsley, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: herb roasted new potatoes ; ingredients: baby red potatoes, italian seasoning, parsley flakes, onion powder, garlic powder, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil flavored cooking spray, olive oil, fresh parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: baked chicken and dressing ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, mozzarella cheese, water, cream of chicken soup, chicken stuffing mix, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: chicken macaroni casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, chicken breasts, milk, chicken broth, macaroni, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cook and drain pasta. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook and drain chicken. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, spinach and garlic powder. Add pasta, bacon, chicken, 1 c fried onions and 1 c cheese. Spread into a baking dish. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes. ; name: baked mushroom chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, dried parsley, onion powder, dry breadcrumbs, butter, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour. ; name: cheeseburger bake ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, condensed cheddar cheese soup, frozen mixed vegetables, milk, bisquick baking mix, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Generously grease rectangular baking dish, 13x9x2 inches. Cook ground beef and onion in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until beef is brown. Drain. Stir in soup, vegetables and milk. Stir bisquick mix and water in baking dish until moistened. Spread evenly. Spread beef mixture over batter. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 30 minutes. ; name: chicken tortilla bake ; ingredients: flour tortillas, cooked chicken, onion, green chilies, chicken broth, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup ; preparation:

name: beer mustard ; ingredients: mustard seeds, lager beer, malt vinegar, ground allspice, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, sugar, dry mustard, garlic, horseradish ; preparation:Mix the mustard seeds and spices in a bowl, pour the vinegar on top and leave to soak overnight. Place the mixture in a mortar and pound to a paste. Gradually work in the lager. The finished mustard should resemble a stiff paste, so add extra vinegar if necessary. Store the mustard in sterilized jars in the fridge. Use within 4 weeks. ; name: that mustard ; ingredients: dry mustard, white vinegar, turmeric, salt, italian spices, sugar, eggs ; preparation:Mix the mustard seeds and spices in a bowl, pour the vinegar on top and leave to soak overnight. Place the mixture in a mortar and pound to a paste. Gradually work in the molasses. The finished mustard should resemble a stiff paste, so add extra vinegar if necessary. Store the mustard in sterilized jars in the fridge. Use within 4 weeks. ; name: sharp dark mustard ; ingredients: cider vinegar, whole cloves, black peppercorns, bay leaves, salt, dry mustard, sugar ; preparation:Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks. ; name: balsamic mustard ; ingredients: mustard seeds, mustard powder, water, balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, sugar, salt, garlic clove ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add mustard to skillet. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with ; name: warm mustard sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, green bell pepper, garlic, celery seed, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, celery seed, dijon mustard, green bell pepper, garlic, celery seed and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add onion and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add green bell pepper and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add green ; name: gerry cohen s mustard ; ingredients: dry mustard, white vinegar, egg, sugar, onions, prepared horseradish, lemon juice, ground cloves, ground red pepper ; preparation:

name: grilled hawaiian chicken sandwich ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, teriyaki sauce, hawaiian sweet bread, pineapple rings, green leaf lettuce, pepper rings ; preparation:Mix together mayo, sour cream and garlic powder. Mash the eggs with a fork and drain the chicken well. Chop the onion very finely. Mix everything together and layer between the bread slices. Add lettuce, tomato as desired. ; name: healthy slow cooker polynesian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple juice, vinegar, light soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic clove, sesame seeds, crushed red pepper flakes, rice, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Spray inside of slow cooker with non-stick cooking spray. Place chicken on the bottom of the slow cooker. Add all other ingredients into slow cooker, cover. Cook on high heat for 4 - 6 hours. As slow cooker temperatutres can vary, you may need to cook for more or less time. Chicken pieces will break apart durring cooking. Spoon chicken and sauce over rice. ; name: thai chicken patties ; ingredients: chicken breasts, sweet chili sauce, fresh cilantro, garlic clove, fresh lemon rind, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degree f. In a large skillet, heat oil and butter over a medium heat. Lightly sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brown well on all sides and remove to baking dish. Add red curry and turmeric to skillet. Cook until fragrant and dissolved. Add coconut milk, fish sauce, lime juice and sugar. Stirring, bring sauce to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour curry sauce over chicken and bake 40-45 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve with jasmine rice or rice noodles with sauce spooned over top. ; name: portuguese chicken baked with potatoes and garlic ; ingredients: chicken, potatoes, onion, fresh rosemary, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer. ; name: baked hawaiian chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast half, salt, pineapple slices, garlic clove, cornstarch, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, rosemary, maraschino cherries ; preparation:

name: smoked sausage dish ; ingredients: smoked sausage, potato, corn, cheese, butter, salt and pepper, cajun seasoning, garlic powder ; preparation:In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread. ; name: smoked sausage with broccoli and cheese ; ingredients: smoked sausage, red peppers, velveeta cheese, milk, broccoli florets, cooked rice ; preparation:In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread. ; name: polish reuben casserole ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, onion, sauerkraut, kielbasa, breadcrumbs, milk, mustard, noodles, swiss cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13x9 inch baking dish. Combine mushroom soup, milk, chopped onion and mustard in medium bowl until well blended. Spread sauerkraut in prepared baking dish. Top with noodles. Spoon soup mixture evenly over noodles. Cover with sausage. Top with shredded swiss. Combine bread crumbs and butter in a small bowl. Sprinkle over swiss. Cover dish tightly with foil. Bake until noodles are tender, about 1 hour. ; name: tomato and smoked sausage casserole ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, egg noodles, smoked sausage, margarine ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot. ; name: smoked sausage sauerkraut casserole ; ingredients: smoked sausage, sauerkraut, onions, parsley flakes, fresh ground black pepper, salt, cream of mushroom soup, spiral shaped pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: banana rolls ; ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, splenda granular, bananas, vanilla extract, reduced-fat crescent rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown. ; name: chocolate roll ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, egg, powdered sugar, nuts, miniature marshmallow, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown. ; name: berry breakfast rolls ; ingredients: cinnamon roll dough, fresh blueberries, blueberry preserves, lemon peel, pecans, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 16 muffin cups. Cut each cinnamon roll in half crosswise to create 2 short round rolls. Press each half roll into one muffin cup, forming it into a cup shape. Mix together ther blueberries, preserves and lemon peel, and spoon some of the mixture into each muffin cup. Sprinkle each cup with pecans. Bake 12 minutes at 375 degrees until golden brown. Cool for 10 minutes in the muffin tin, then remove and place on wire rack. Drizzle icing over rolls. ; name: country rolls ; ingredients: water, egg, all-purpose flour, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, salt, olive oil, active dry yeast ; preparation:Place ingredients in muffin cups in order as listed. Run on dough cycle. Shape rolls and place on lightly greased baking pan. Cover with cloth and let rise in warm place for 1 hour. Bake at 375 for 10 - 15 minute. ; name: banana crispy rolls ; ingredients: bananas, butter, lemon juice, phyllo pastry, hot fudge, powdered sugar, caramel candies ; preparation:

name: brussels sprouts with pecans ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic, brussels sprouts, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, sugar, salt, pecans ; preparation:In a heavy-bottomed pot over medium, fry the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon and drain on paper towels. Saute the onion and garlic in the bacon grease over low heat until soft, about 3 minutes. Add the brussels sprouts and stir them around so that they are coated with the bacon grease. Add the broth and cook, covered, over low heat until the sprouts are easily pierced with a fork, about 12-15 minutes. Stir in the butter just before serving. Garnish each serving with bacon bits. ; name: sugar grilled baby carrots and onions with pecans ; ingredients: baby carrots, red onion, olive oil, light brown sugar, kosher salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large saucepan, add carrots. Add water to cover. Bring to a boil. Cook for 25 minutes or until carrots are tender. Drain and cool slightly. Process carrots in a food processor until smooth. Pour carrots into a mixing bowl. Add in remaining ingredients. Stir to combine. Transfer mixture into a greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. ; name: hot slaw cabbage in mustard pecan butter ; ingredients: chicken broth, cabbage and carrot coleslaw mix, green onion, salt, black pepper, pecans, butter, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat the chicken broth in a large saucepan over med-low heat. When broth is hot, add the cole-slaw mix, the green onions, and the salt & pepper. Cover and cook over med-low heat, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Mix together the melted butter and the dijon mustard, and stir in the chopped pecans. Pour the mustard-pecan butter over the cabbage, and toss well to coat. ; name: shredded brussels sprouts pecans salad ; ingredients: pecans, brussels sprouts, butter, olive oil, yellow mustard seeds, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat over to 450f. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss pecans and butter with brussels sprouts and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast on lower rack until golden brown and tender when pierced with a knife, 20 minutes. Serve hot, drizzled with balsamic vinegar, if desired. ; name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: butternut squash with onions pecans ; ingredients: butter, butternut squash, onion, garlic clove, pecans, vanilla, brown sugar, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: whole wheat fluffy pancakes ; ingredients: egg, milk, butter, vanilla extract, sugar, baking powder, whole wheat pastry flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: pancakes waffles ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, unbleached white flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Sift flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar together. Separate eggs. Mix together the buttermilk, sour cream or yogurt and the egg yolks. Stir in the butter and vanilla. Brush the waffle iron lightly with oil and preheat it. Stir the wet into the dry ingredients. Beat the egg whites with the whisk or electric mixer until they hold soft peaks. Stir them gently into the batter. Spread a ladleful or so of batter onto the waffle iron and bake until the waffle is done, usually 3 to 5 minutes, depending on your iron. Serve immediately or keep warm for a few minutes in a low oven. ; name: world s easiest pancakes ; ingredients: egg, low-fat milk, self rising flour, vanilla essence ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings. ; name: easy swedish pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, butter ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oilpreparation:In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings. ; name: crazy pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, flour, salt, butter ; preparation:

name: mom barbaras pepper relish ; ingredients: red peppers, green peppers, onions, sugar, salt, celery seed, vinegar, mustard seeds ; preparation:Place the pepper in a bowl with ice water to cover. Let stand for 30 minutes, then drain well in a colander and blot dry with a paper towel. Combine the vinegar and salt in a bowl and stir or whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the onion, tomato, pepper, cayenne, oil, and cilantro and gently toss to mix. Correct the seasoning, adding salt, vinegar, or cayenne. The relish should be highly seasoned. The relish is good now. It will be amazing if you let it stand to ripen for a few hours before serving. Serve the relish the same day you make it. 2 cups is enough to serve 4 to 6. ; name: german cucumber dressing ; ingredients: water, oil, apple cider vinegar, sugar, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next. ; name: sweet sour cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, onion, red thai chile, white vinegar, sugar, garlic powder, oil, salt ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: healthy exchanges creamy cucumbers ; ingredients: cucumbers, white onion, fat free ranch dressing, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: cukes and onions ; ingredients: cucumber, sweet onion, white vinegar, cold water, sugar ; preparation:Wash and peel cukes. Slice into bowl big enough for all ingredients. Peel onion and slice thinly into bowl with cukes. Mix vinegar and water with sugar. Pour over cucumber and onions. Put lid on bowl or cover tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. ; name: mom s cucumber relish ; ingredients: cucumbers, onions, red pepper, salt, sugar, flour, ginger, turmeric, celery seed, vinegar ; preparation:

name: semi dried tomato and feta frittatas ; ingredients: eggs, cream, parmesan cheese, green onions, sun-dried tomatoes, baby spinach leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed with feta and spinach ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, feta cheese, frozen spinach, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine chicken breasts, feta cheese, frozen spinach, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving. ; name: spinach olive cheese pastries ; ingredients: spinach, low-fat ricotta, black olives, parsley, pepper, sea salt, mountain bread, olive oil flavored cooking spray, sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: feta cheese foldovers ; ingredients: feta cheese, green onions, garlic powder, egg, frozen puff pastry, egg yolk, water ; preparation:In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions. ; name: pesto sun dried tomato artichoke spinach feta pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, pesto sauce, spinach leaves, mozzarella cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, frozen artichoke hearts, roma tomatoes, feta cheese, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions. ; name: spinach feta pastries ; ingredients: frozen spinach, feta cheese, eggs, sun-dried tomato, black pepper, frozen puff pastry, milk ; preparation:

name: sugar spice pumpkin seeds ; ingredients: brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, egg white, pumpkin seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a mixing bowl, combine all dry ingredients, except pumpkin seeds, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes. ; name: coffee liqueur with vanilla cinnamon cream ; ingredients: thickened cream, powdered sugar icing, vanilla bean paste, coffee liqueur, espresso coffee, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c. ; name: sugar free pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, canned pumpkin, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, equal sugar substitute, raisins ; preparation:Make pudding according to directions. Place raisins in hot water for 1 hour to plump. Drain raisins. Mix all ingredients together. Let chill for 2-3 hours. ; name: sugar spice roasted pumpkin seeds ; ingredients: pumpkin seeds, sugar, sea salt, pumpkin pie spice, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Place the seeds in a bowl and add the olive oil then the seasonings. Mix well. Spread pumpkin seeds on a single layer on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes depending on your oven. Stir half way through. ; name: sugar and spice cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, butter, eggs, apple pie spice, vanilla extract, almond extract, icing ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: pumpkin spice syrup for coffee or tea ; ingredients: white sugar, water, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, ground cloves, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: brown sugar pie ; ingredients: brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, milk, butter, chocolate chips, pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f and grease a large baking tin, approximately 9 x 12 inches. Melt the butter or margarine over low heat in a small saucepan. Add the flour and stir until smooth. Add the vanilla, sugar and eggs and stir constantly for 5 or so minute. Remove from heat and stir in nuts. Set aside. Mix brownie ingredients together in a large bowl. Spread topping over. Bake for 35-40 minute be careful not to overbake. Cool and cut into bars. ; name: minted brownie pie ; ingredients: thin mint cookies, egg whites, salt, sugar, vanilla extract, nuts, whipped cream, unsweetened chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f butter a 9x13-inch baking pan. Coarsely chop chocolate and place in a large microwave-safe bowl along with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, then stir until chocolate is melted. Let mixture cool to room temperature. Stir in sugar, then eggs and vanilla. Gradually stir in flour, then nuts and chocolate chips, if using. Spread mixture in pan. Bake in center of oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer inserted in center of brownies comes out clean. ; name: quick and easy brownies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla, cocoa powder, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, sugar, salt, and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: deep dish chocolate brownies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugar together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting. ; name: brownie pie ; ingredients: margarine, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, walnuts ; preparation:

name: applemint iced tea ; ingredients: of fresh mint, peppermint tea bags, boiling water, apple juice, fresh lime juice, apple ; preparation:In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: cider tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, apple cider, honey, orange slice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes to allow the spices to permeate the liquid. Ladle into mugs. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator 2 to 3 days. Rewarm in the microwave. ; name: autumn tea ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, apple juice, cranberry juice, sugar, lemon juice, pumpkin pie spice ; preparation:Bring 1 cup water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water. ; name: pineapple iced tea ; ingredients: tea bags, sugar, boiling water, lemons, lemon, pineapple juice, of fresh mint, pineapple ; preparation:In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: touch of mint iced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, of fresh mint, frozen lemonade concentrate, lemon slice, mint ; preparation:In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint. ; name: iced apple tea ; ingredients: apple juice, boiling water, decaffeinated tea bags, ground allspice, honey, lemon slice ; preparation:

name: basic chicken pot pie ; ingredients: onion, flour, margarine, mixed vegetables, chicken broth, milk, cooked chicken, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter, add onions- saut for a minute, add flour, mix till pasty, add broth and milk. Stir constantly until creamy and thick,. Add veggies & chicken. Dump into a pie crust. Freeze now for later or bake 40-50 minutes at 350. ; name: baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, fryer chickens ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: chicken pot pie casserole ; ingredients: egg noodles, chicken breast, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushrooms, frozen mixed vegetables ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving. ; name: portuguese chicken baked with potatoes and garlic ; ingredients: chicken, potatoes, onion, fresh rosemary, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer. ; name: pork chops potatoes and onion casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, baking potato, onion, bacon grease, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of potatoes. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender. ; name: baked game hens ; ingredients: cornish hens, apple, onion, butter, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: sugar cookie icing also for cakes ; ingredients: powdered sugar, crisco shortening, water, vanilla, almond flavoring ; preparation:Combine the shortening, water and vanilla. This will take some time to mix up but it will eventually. Add the meringue powder and powdered sugar. Mix well - beat for about 3 minutes. If this is way too stiff you can add a little water at a time. Just remember you want this to be a little thick so you can spread it. Bake at 400 for about 6-10 minutes, the time taken depends on the size of cutters you have used. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheet then transfer to a wire rack before decorating. ; name: my favorite cookie icing frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, almond extract, food coloring ; preparation:In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, food coloring with an electric mixer on medium-low speed until smooth and light. Beat in the sugar, a little at a time, until smooth and of desired spreading consistency. Gently fold in the oreos. Use frosting as desired. ; name: chocolate chip treasure cookies ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, sweetened condensed milk, butter, flaked coconut, semisweet chocolate morsels, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature. ; name: whipped buttery cookies ; ingredients: flour, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, whip butter, sugar, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla. Add cornstarch and cornstarch a bit at a time to incorporate. Form into two thick ropes, rolling on wax paper. Refrigerate 30 minutes. They will be firm and easy to slice into coins. Bake slices until they just begin to turn golden on the bottom. I added chocolate chips to half, and they were nice too. ; name: custard powder biscuits cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, custard powder, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: nelson cookie bake rolled cookie piped icing ; ingredients: powdered sugar, powdered egg whites, warm water, food coloring ; preparation:

name: hot dog pie ; ingredients: ground beef, hot dogs, baked beans, ketchup, brown sugar, prepared mustard, cheese, pastry shells, american cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately. ; name: oven barbecue ; ingredients: beef roast, cream of chicken soup, barbecue sauce, dry onion soup mix, onion hamburger buns ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Sautee onions in butter, margarine or oil over medium heat, until soft. Place chicken breasts in casserole dish and season with salt, pepper and garlic. Pour mushrooms and sauteed onions over chicken. Cover dish with bbq sauce. Cover dish with lid or aluminum foil. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: chili cheese coney dogs ; ingredients: hot dogs, hot dog buns, chili sauce, fresh onion, cheese sauce ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. Cover grill and grill for 15 to ; name: sloppy dogs ; ingredients: vegetable oil, green bell pepper, onion, barbecue sauce, ketchup, mustard, garlic powder, hot dog, hot dog buns ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread. ; name: beer brats with onions and peppers ; ingredients: bratwursts, beer, onion, hot pepper, olive oil, hot dog bun, mustard ; preparation:Put your brats in a large pot and dump in the 2 beers, onion, season all and garlic powder. Add water until the brats are fully covered. Cook 20 minutes on medium heat, meanwhile, heat up your grill. Transfer your brats to the grill and cook 4-5 minutes on each side. Be careful not to pierce the brats with a fork or anything because this will let the good tasting juices out. Discard the beer & onion mixture. Place a slice of cheese in each hot dog bun and add your brats on top. Add desired condiments. ; name: oven roasted hot dogs ; ingredients: hot dogs, hot dog buns, mustard, cheese, pepper ; preparation:

name: chile garden salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, green onions, jalapeno chiles, habanero peppers, serrano chilies, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: bread dippin cilantro salsa ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, green onions, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, salt, water, french bread ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: fresh key lime salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, fresh jalapeno pepper, fresh cilantro leaves, red onion, fresh garlic, granulated sugar, salt, black pepper, key limes, juice of ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: corn black bean salsa ; ingredients: black beans, corn kernels, rotel diced tomatoes, green onion, fresh cilantro, oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Combine beans, corn, diced tomatoes, green onions and cilantro in large bowl. Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving. ; name: katie s hot salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, jalapenos, garlic cloves, lime, juice of, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Sprinkle salt in bottom of crock. Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, sugar, spices, and lime juice. Daily, sprinkle just a little salt into crock and stir. On the 4th or 5th day, pack into hot sterile pint jars. Process in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: ghost pepper fresh salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, jalapenos, cilantro, dried ghost chilies, limes, olive oil, sugar, salt, hot sauce ; preparation:

name: ww spicy baked shrimp 3 pts ; ingredients: olive oil-flavored vegetable cooking spray, lemon juice, honey, dried parsley flakes, creole seasoning, olive oil, soy sauce, large shrimp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Arange shrimp in a single layer in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine lemon juice with butter, garlic, worcestershire sauce, lemon pepper, and red pepper. Pour mixture over shrimp. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes or until shrimp are done. Sprinkle parsley over shrimp. Serve immediately. ; name: spicy grilled shrimp skewers ; ingredients: garlic cloves, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, paprika, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, tabasco sauce, large raw shrimp, lemon wedge ; preparation:Heat olive oil, lemon peel, lemon juice, herbs, and s&p into a large ziplock bag. Add shrimp. Toss gently to coat. Cover, and refrigerate for one hour to marinate. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat. Remove skewers from the water, pat dry, and spray with nonstick cooking spray. Skewer the shrimp. Grill the shrimp on the grill on both sides until pink and opaque, about 5 minutes per side. ; name: fantastic marinade for grilled shrimp ; ingredients: olive oil, tomato sauce, red wine vinegar, black pepper, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, fresh cilantro, fresh garlic cloves, hot sauce, shrimp ; preparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, onion, garlic, lime and lemon juices, cayenne, tandoori paste, and sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected meat and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected meat to doneness. ; name: sweet and sour shrimp ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, cornstarch, chili sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, cooking spray, sesame oil, green pepper, onion, shrimp ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp, pineapple chunks, cornstarch, chili sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, cooking spray, sesame oil, green pepper, onion, shrimp and stir-fry sauce mixture to vegetables in skillet and cook 4 to 5 minutes or just until shrimp turn opaque throughout, stirring occasionally. To serve, spoon rice onto plates and top with shrimp mixture. ; name: sassy barbecued shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, green onion, ketchup, molasses, water, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, chili paste, garlic cloves, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: praline pecan fudge ; ingredients: praline liqueur, pecans, butter, sugar, evaporated milk, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Combine all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size. ; name: easy pralines ; ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, white sugar, dark brown sugar, evaporated milk, butter, pecan halves ; preparation:Combine all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size. ; name: creamy smooth pecan pralines ; ingredients: sugar, white karo, water, pecan halves, margarine, vanilla ; preparation:Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly. ; name: chocolate kisses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, flour, pecans, hershey chocolate kisses, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: louisiana pecan pralines ; ingredients: sugar, buttermilk, baking soda, butter, pecans ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring gently until sugar dissolves. Add pecans. Cover and cook without stirring to soft ball stage or until candy thermometer reads 235f. Remove from heat and stir in baking soda. Beat with a wooden spoon just until the mixture starts to thicken. Working rapidly, drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased wax paper. Let stand until firm. Working rapidly, drop by tablespoonfuls ; name: hershey s chocolate pralines ; ingredients: sugar, light brown sugar, cocoa, light cream, butter, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:

name: berrylicious smoothie ; ingredients: low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube ; preparation:Combine low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube and mix until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings. ; name: strawberry smoothies ; ingredients: strawberry, syrup, milk, sugar, ice cubes ; preparation:Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the strawberries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired. ; name: berry pink smoothie ; ingredients: orange juice, fresh strawberries, plain yogurt, ice cubes, whipped cream ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in blender. Pour into 6- 3oz molds or paper cups. Freeze for one hour, place sticks in the middle. Freeze for another 3 hours, until solid. To release pops, dip molds into hot water until pops loosen and slide out. If using paper cups, peel away paper. ; name: pear smoothie ; ingredients: pear, ice, cinnamon, apple juice, milk ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced to a chunky sauce, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen cubes in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time. ; name: yummy yogurt smoothie ; ingredients: nonfat milk, nonfat berry yogurt, vanilla instant breakfast drink mix, ice cube ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine yogurt, milk, berry yogurt and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: iced strawberry sensation smoothie ; ingredients: apple juice, fresh strawberries, cantaloupe, ice cubes, honey ; preparation:

name: coconut oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, rolled oats, coconut, baking powder, baking soda, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: grandma s kolachky cookies ; ingredients: margarine, cream cheese, flour, baking powder, eggs, preserves ; preparation:Sift flour, baking powder. Cream butter and cream cheese. Add egg yolks and the sifted ingredients. Refrigerate 2 hours. Roll out dough on a floured board. Cut using a circular cookie cutter. The thinner the better. Put thumb print in each with favorite preserves. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 10 to 15 minutes. ; name: ultimate oatmeal chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: no bake chocolate oatmeal nut cookies ; ingredients: milk, sugar, margarine, peanut butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, quick-cooking oatmeal, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, salt, butter and milk. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. ; name: kossmans oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, butter, egg, milk, oatmeal, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, raisins ; preparation:

name: fat free chocolate banana muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt, bananas, nonfat milk, vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: coconut muffins ; ingredients: butter, honey, buttermilk, eggs, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, baking soda, shredded coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool. ; name: double chocolate banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, baking powder, bananas, vegetable oil, egg, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: no fat banana applesauce muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, eggs, banana, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: fat free mini banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, applesauce, bananas, sugar, egg whites, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: cocoatana muffins ; ingredients: coconut, quick-cooking oats, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, bananas, butter ; preparation:

name: buttered fried parsnips ; ingredients: parsnips, salt & pepper, butter, parsley, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 c. Line a baking dish with non stick baking paper. Place parsnips, salt, pepper and oil in baking dish. Toss to combine. Roast for 30 minutes, pour over syrup. Roast for another 15 - 20 minutes till cooked through and golden. ; name: brandied carrots ; ingredients: carrot, water, butter, salt, brandy, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: carrot parsnip soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, curry powder, carrots, parsnip, vegetable broth, salt, ground black pepper, yogurt, parsley ; preparation:In a large roasting pan toss parsnips, potato, rutabaga, carrots and onion with oil. Sprinkle with salt. Roast for 15 - 20 minutes, in a 450 degree f oven. In a large saucepan bring broth and beans to a boil and add roasted vegetable. Reduced heat. Simmer, covered, 5 minutes. Stir in thyme. For a thicker soup, mash vegetables and beans slightly. ; name: sweet carrots ; ingredients: boiling water, salt, carrots, margarine, sugar substitute, lemon juice, parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: dressed up baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Use either a bag of whole baby carrots from the produce section or 2 15 ounce cans of sliced carrots. Add carrots to a medium sized sauce pan over medium heat. Quickly add the butter and brown sugar and toss the carrots in the melting butter. Just when they begin to bubble, reduce to low heat and simmer 15 minutes.
