Remember, sugar can scorch quickly, so stir occasionally and keep the heat low. ; name: whipped carrots snips ; ingredients: carrots, parsnips, sweet unsalted butter, nutmeg, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: southern iced tea cocktail ; ingredients: light rum, vodka, gin, fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, mint, lemon ; preparation:Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. To a cocktail shaker, add the vodka, rum, gin, tequila, blue curacao, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Pour into the glass. Add in the sprite to the glass. Stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge. ; name: peachy slurp ; ingredients: water, sugar, frozen lemonade, frozen peaches, vodka, lime juice, carbonated lemon-lime beverage ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place the peaches, lemon juice, sugar, and nutmeg in a blender and process for 1 minute or until blended. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes. ; name: cranberry citrus vodka slush ; ingredients: cranberry juice, fresh orange juice, vodka, fresh lime juice, grand marnier, lime zest, orange slice, fresh cranberries ; preparation:In a plastic container with a lid, combine all ingredients. Seal and place in the freezer until frozen solid. Take out of freezer and let thaw. Drink when it has thawed and is slushy. Or put in blender and blend until slushy. Garnish with fresh cranberries, zest of a lime or an orange slice. ; name: iced tea cocktail ; ingredients: sweet tea flavored vodka, lemonade, ice, lemon wedge ; preparation:In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5-10 minutes. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill. ; name: hot pineapple cranberry sip ; ingredients: pineapple juice, cranberry juice cocktail, honey, ground cloves, lime zest ; preparation:In a plastic container with a lid, combine all ingredients. Seal and place in the freezer until frozen solid. Take out of freezer and let thaw. Drink when it has thawed and is slushy. Or put in blender and blend until slushy. Garnish with fresh cranberries, zest of a lime or an orange slice. ; name: clear gummy bear cocktail ; ingredients: peach schnapps, raspberry vodka, diet sprite, lime wedge, ice ; preparation:

name: broccoli rabe and olives with lemon ; ingredients: broccoli rabe, lemon, olive oil, unsalted butter, garlic cloves, green olives, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broccoli rabe and stir until the leaves start to wilt. Season with salt and pepper. Cover skillet and let cook 3 to 5 minutes, turning occasionally. ; name: broccoli in garlic butter ; ingredients: broccoli, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the ; name: broccoli rabe with apricots and pine nuts ; ingredients: olive oil, salt, dried apricots, pine nuts, garlic cloves, broccoli rabe ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add apricots, pine nuts and pine nuts. Add pine nuts and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl. ; name: broccoli rabe with garlic ; ingredients: broccoli rabe, olive oil, garlic cloves, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic ; name: broccoli with cavatelli ; ingredients: cavatelli, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, chicken broth, broccoli, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook cavatelli according to package directions. Drain. Slowly melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and saut until lightly golden. Add chicken broth and bring to boil. Add broccoli, cover, simmer 6 to 8 minutes until broccoli is tender. Place cooked cavatelli in bowl. Add broccoli mixture and toss with parmesan cheese. Serve. ; name: broccoli with lemon garlic almond butter ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, butter, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, sliced almonds ; preparation:

name: spaghetti with garlic hot pepper and parsley ; ingredients: spaghetti, virgin olive oil, garlic, hot pepper flakes, salt, chicken broth, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: spaghetti aglio olio spaghetti with garlic and oil ; ingredients: spaghetti, breadcrumbs, italian parsley, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, dried chilies, salt ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with olive oil garlic and anchovies ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovy fillets, spaghetti, fresh lemon juice, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling, salted water according to package directions stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk the olive oil, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a large bowl. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Toss the pasta with the lemon sauce, and add the reserved cooking liquid and toss again. Season with the salt & pepper. Garnish with lemon zest and chopped basil. ; name: spaghetti with white crabmeat olive oil chilli and garlic ; ingredients: spaghetti, garlic cloves, chili pepper, extra virgin olive oil, crabmeat, parsley, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: any flavour cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, salt, flour, liquid ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: chocolate chipless chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, bread flour, kosher salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, egg, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: dirty thumbprint cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, egg, flour, cocoa, baking powder, preserves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat margerine and sugar until fluffy, add vanilla and egg. Stir in flour, cocoa and baking powder. Roll into balls and make an indentation in the middle of each cookie with thumb or end of a wooden spoon. Fill each cookies with about half a tsp of jelly, bake for 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: vacuum cleaner cookies ; ingredients: margarine, yellow cake mix, egg, eggs, cream cheese, powdered sugar, coconut, walnuts ; preparation:

name: pepper crusted turkey or chicken cutlets with chutney sauce ; ingredients: mixed peppercorns, turkey breast cutlets, olive oil, scallions, fresh ginger, fat free chicken broth, brandy, mango chutney ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: turkey scaloppine with parmesan cheese ; ingredients: turkey breast, flour, salt, pepper, egg, water, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, butter, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey breast, flour, salt, pepper, egg, water, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, butter, parsley. Spread top and bottom of halves of scaloppine with parmesan cheese mixture. Layer turkey on bottom halves. Spoon 2 tbs cranberry sauce over turkey. Add lettuce and scaloppine top. ; name: italian style chicken cutlets ; ingredients: white bread, half-and-half, ground chicken, egg, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, cooking oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch. ; name: turkey club appetizers ; ingredients: turkey, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, crackers, plum tomatoes, lettuce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, crackers, plum tomatoes, lettuce, parmesan cheese in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: parmesan crusted turkey cutlets ; ingredients: turkey cutlets, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, sage, salt, pepper, eggs, canola oil, lemon ; preparation:

name: nutty sweet potato salad ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, five-spice powder, walnuts, currants, table salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Place the nutty sweet potato salad in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: updated potato salad ; ingredients: fingerling potatoes, plain low-fat yogurt, whole grain mustard, olive oil, red bell pepper, celery ribs, red onion ; preparation:Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: new potato salad for a crowd ; ingredients: red potatoes, hard-boiled egg, onion, dill pickle, celery seed, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & pepper ; preparation:Peel, cube, and boil potatoes in large pot of salted water. In another pan, boil eggs. When both have been cooked through, drain and let cool. Peel eggs and chop. In large mixing bowl add cooled potatoes, chopped egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed, salt and pepper. Add sour cream and mayonnaise and stir gently to combine being careful not to mash potatoes. Refrigerate until completely cooled before serving or overnight. ; name: yam sweet potato salad ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, cider vinegar, sweet pickle relish, dijon mustard, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, green onions, red bell pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes just until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain, peel and dice. Toss with the lemon juice, oil and salt and pepper to taste. Let cool. Add the celery, eggs, chopped red onion, and parsley toss gently. Combine 1 cup mayonnaise with vinegar, blend well then toss over the potato salad, gently folding until completely coated. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary. ; name: sweet potato chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, red potatoes, sweet potatoes, fresh green beans, mayonnaise, nonfat plain yogurt, milk, dill weed, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: pasta with bacon tomato sauce ; ingredients: salt, spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, dried bay leaves, onion, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth, crushed tomatoes, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: yellow spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, eggs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti stuff ; ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, season-all salt, onion powder, pre-shredded mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: spaghetti pork savoury ; ingredients: pasta, oil, pork, onion, tomatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: orange beef and rice ; ingredients: oil, top round beef, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, carrot, rice pilaf mix, orange juice, beef broth ; preparation:Briefly heat oil in large, deep pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed. ; name: beef steak ; ingredients: steaks, lemon juice, soy sauce, water, garlic, ginger, flour, ground black pepper, onion, corn oil ; preparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: peking beef ; ingredients: stir-fry beef, peanut oil, hoisin sauce, five-spice powder, honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, sesame oil, dry sherry, cornflour ; preparation:In a wok or skillet, heat oon sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add chopped onion, chopped garlic cloves and a peeled and minced ginger. Stir-fry for a minute or so until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped bird chili pepper, water and soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry just until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped ; name: thai sesame beef ; ingredients: green onion, low sodium soy sauce, water, dry sherry, brown sugar, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, lean beef ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender. ; name: oriental beef with broccoli ; ingredients: cube steaks, broccoli florets, fresh garlic, fresh ginger, soy sauce, flour, rice vinegar, sesame oil ; preparation:

name: super creamy fruit salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas, miniature marshmallows, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas & marshmallows together. Gently fold in pudding mixture. Lastly, fold in cool whip. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: fluffy fruit salad ; ingredients: pineapple tidbits, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, cool whip, orange zest, lettuce leaf, pecan halves ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving 1 tablespoon juice. In a large bowl, combine the greens, carrots, pineapple and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk the mayonnaise, sugar and reserved pineapple juice, taste and then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour over salad. Toss to coat. ; name: jiggly fruit salad ; ingredients: mandarin orange segments, unsweetened pineapple tidbits, unflavored gelatin, v8 splash berry blend, frozen sliced strawberries in syrup, bananas ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving 1 tablespoon juice. In a large bowl, combine the mandarin orange segments, unsweetened pineapple tidbits, unflavored gelatin, v8 splash berry blend, frozen sliced strawberries in syrup, bananas. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: yummy salad ; ingredients: maraschino cherry, mandarin orange, pineapple tidbits, coconut, sour cream, marshmallows, mayonnaise ; preparation:Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill. ; name: summer apple salad ; ingredients: apples, pineapple tidbits, celery, grapes, carrot, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the apples, pineapple, celery, and raisins. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the sunflower seeds and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired. ; name: 24 hour fruit salad ; ingredients: pasta, pineapple tidbits, lemon, juice of, eggs, flour, salt, sugar, fruit cocktail, cool whip, colored miniature marshmallows ; preparation:

name: butter pecan cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: apple and pecan cake ; ingredients: wholemeal self-rising flour, oats, bicarbonate of soda, allspice, brown sugar, pecans, oil, egg, apples ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degree celsius. Lightly grease and line a 20cm cake tin and line with baking paper. In a bowl combine the flour, oats, bicarbonate of soda, allspice, sugar and pecans. Make a well in the centre and then add the oil and egg and then the apples and combine all ingredients well together. Pour mix into the prepared tin and cook for 35 minutes until golden brown. ; name: holiday pecans ; ingredients: sugar, salt, cinnamon, egg white, pecan halves, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, honey, oil. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar. ; name: pecan crispies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: cinnamon pecan pound cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, milk, pecans ; preparation:

name: banana coconut smoothie ; ingredients: banana, coconut milk, ice cube, pineapple, cinnamon, honey ; preparation:Place coconut milk, coconut milk, ice cube, pineapple, cinnamon, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherrypreparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: yummy yogurt smoothie ; ingredients: nonfat milk, nonfat berry yogurt, vanilla instant breakfast drink mix, ice cube ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine yogurt, milk, berry yogurt and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: berrylicious smoothie ; ingredients: low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube ; preparation:Combine low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube and mix until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings. ; name: pear smoothie ; ingredients: pear, ice, cinnamon, apple juice, milk ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced to a chunky sauce, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen cubes in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time. ; name: yogurt or sour cream crumb fruit topping ; ingredients: pumpernickel bread, butter, raw sugar, plain yogurt, apricots ; preparation:Slowly saute bread crumbs in butter until toasted and very crisp, stirring frequently. Allow crumbs to cool and drain on paper towel. Mix with sugar to sweeten. Whip chilled yogurt until smooth, turn into serving bowl and sprinkle with crumb mixture. Spoon over chilled fruits. ; name: creme caramel chai smoothie ; ingredients: yoplait custard style creme caramel yogurt, chai tea mix, banana, milk, caramel ice cream topping, ice, whipped topping, mint ; preparation:

name: cheddar scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, butter, low-fat sour cream, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, water, egg, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. ; name: easy scones ; ingredients: unbleached flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, chocolate chips, whipping cream, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a second bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: edmonds scones ; ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. ; name: breakfast scones ; ingredients: flour, eggs, baking powder, salt, sugar, cold water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add butter and sugar. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes at 170 degrees celsius. ; name: irish brown scones ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, wheat bran, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f lightly dust a baking sheet with some flour. Put the whole wheat flour and wheat germ into a large mixing bowl. Sift the all-purpose flour, salt and baking soda into the bowl. Mix the ingredients well together with fingers. Next, rub in the butter to pea-sized pieces. Then mix in the sugar. At this stage, put the lightly dusted tin into the oven to preheat. Stir in enough buttermilk to make a soft dough. Turn onto a lightly floured surface and gently knead for a few seconds. Cut out scones with a round cookie cutter. Put the scones on the preheated baking sheet and bake for about 15 minutes or until risen and a golden brown. Cool on a wire tray. ; name: cream cheese scones ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, butter, cream cheese, milk, vanilla ; preparation:

name: any flavour cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, salt, flour, liquid ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: wilton butter press cookies ; ingredients: real butter, sugar, egg, milk, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: whipped buttery cookies ; ingredients: flour, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, whip butter, sugar, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla. Add cornstarch and cornstarch a bit at a time to incorporate. Form into two thick ropes, rolling on wax paper. Refrigerate 30 minutes. They will be firm and easy to slice into coins. Bake slices until they just begin to turn golden on the bottom. I added chocolate chips to half, and they were nice too. ; name: original girl scout cookies ; ingredients: butter, vanilla, sugar, flour, eggs, baking powder, milk, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: pressed butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: peabody cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, real butter, egg, flour, vanilla ; preparation:

name: baked shrimp appetizers ; ingredients: mushrooms, small shrimp, dry breadcrumbs, egg, milk, lemon juice, onion, seasoning salt, butter ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce. ; name: garlic bread topped with crab meat and spinach ; ingredients: garlic bread, lump crabmeat, mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, frozen chopped spinach, scallions, garlic cloves, seafood seasoning, egg, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: cheese and spinach pie ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, salt, nutmeg, frozen spinach, cheese, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: coconut crusted tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, milk, shredded coconut, spices, limes, coconut oil ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat. Add coconut oil and sauté tilapia fillets on both sides of each fillet. Cook until just opaque in the center, gently turning halfway though. ; name: bikini bottom seaweed pie spinach really from sponge bob ; ingredients: bisquick, eggs, vegetable oil, fresh spinach leaves, onion, garlic clove, parmesan cheese, oregano, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: sauteed red cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: rotkrautsalat red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, vinegar, pepper, red wine, caraway seed, red cabbage ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium-size fry pan until crisp. Remove and reserve bacon. Add sugar, vinegar, and wine to bacon fat. Stir and cook until sugar is dissolved. Pour this hot mixture over the cabbage. Toss with vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and caraway seeds. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over mixture. Serve at room temperature. ; name: sauteed cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, garlic cloves, onion, fresh ginger, black pepper, salt, white vinegar, canola oil ; preparation:Place cabbage in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: pork sauerkraut skillet ; ingredients: pork blade steaks, salt, pepper, onion, sauerkraut, dry white wine, paprika, garlic cloves ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a roaster. Cover the roaster with plastic wrap and then foil to seal. Bake at 250 for 8 hours. Remove coverings and stir. Remove bone and cartilage as meat will have fallen off. Turn oven up to 350. Continue cooking for 1 hour stirring occasionally as the dish caramelizes. Serve with mashed potatoes. ; name: gedunstetes weisskraut skillet cabbage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cabbage, celery, green pepper, onion, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: caramelized pineapple with hot chocolate sauce ; ingredients: pineapple, bittersweet chocolate, malibu rum, whipping cream, brown sugar, wooden skewers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour batter into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: pineapple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: pineapple rings, brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic powder, pork chops, ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl combine all ingredients and set to the side. Heat the oil in a heavy bottom oven proof skillet until the oil shimmers. Pat the chops dry and add them to the hot pan. Cook for two minutes on the first side, flip the chop and cook for an additional minute. Transfer the chops to a plate. Pour the excess oil out of the pan. Add the sauce mixture, scrape up the browned bits on the bottom of the pan. Simmer the sauce over medium heat, stirring frequently until sauce is thick and glossy, about 4- 5 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and add the pork chops to the pan, turning to coat in the sauce. Place the skillet in the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Spoon the sauce on top of the pork chops and serve. ; name: mango and pineapple jam ; ingredients: mangoes, crushed pineapple, lime juice, sugar ; preparation:Make the pineapple juice by whizzing together the mangoes, crushed pineapple, lime juice, sugar. Press through a sieve into a jug. Add about 100ml water to the sieve and push through the pulp to get as much flavour out of it as possible. Stir in the lime juice and chill until needed. Put a few ice cubes and a slice of lime in each glass. Fill up with the pineapple juice, then top with the raspberry juice. ; name: fruit dessert ; ingredients: peaches, pineapple chunks, frozen strawberries, banana, vanilla pudding mix ; preparation:Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving. ; name: hot fruit and sausage ; ingredients: sausage links, pineapple tidbits, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, firm banana ; preparation:

name: sesame chicken with lemon sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, toasted sesame oil, pepper, reduced-sodium chicken broth, scallions, sesame seeds, lemon zest, lemon juice, cornstarch ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over. ; name: sesame baked chicken ; ingredients: egg, milk, whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, sweet paprika, sesame seeds, frying chicken, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over. ; name: oven baked sesame chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, garlic, sesame seeds, flour, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over. ; name: barbecued sesame chicken breasts ; ingredients: brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over. ; name: sesame seed chicken a turkish meze ; ingredients: chicken wings, milk, sesame seeds, breadcrumbs, ground cayenne pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: beefy bean enchiladas ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, refried beans, green chilies, black olives, enchilada sauce, chili with beans, corn tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add beef and onion. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: enchilada casserole ; ingredients: refried beans, scallion, chili powder, cumin, garlic, corn tortillas, corn, green chilies, tomatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low. ; name: light sour cream and cheese enchiladas ; ingredients: onion, mexican blend cheese, light sour cream, green enchilada sauce, diced green chilies, flour tortillas ; preparation:Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving. ; name: sour cream beef enchiladas ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, diced green chilies, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, salsa ; preparation:Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving. ; name: enchiladas red chili ; ingredients: corn tortillas, red chili sauce, cheddar cheese, onion, eggs ; preparation:

name: chocolate peanut butter truffles ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, heavy cream, butter, chunky peanut butter, vanilla, salted peanuts ; preparation:In a large saucepan combine the chocolate, cream, butter and peanut butter and heat over moderate heat, stirring, until chocolate is completely melted. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and a pinch of salt. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Keep in an airtight container, chilled, for up to 2 weeks. ; name: chocolate truffles with liqueur ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, egg yolk, butter, liqueur, icing sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:Melt chocolate in microwave on high for 60 seconds. Stir and continue to cook on high for another 30 seconds or until chocolate is completely melted. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Add powdered sugar and continue beating until well blended. Stir in chocolate, vanilla and extract flavouring. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll into cocoa, powdered sugar, nuts or dip into melted chocolate. Store in refrigerator. Alternative. Use white chocolate in place of semi-sweet chips and follow same directions. ; name: big batch rich chocolate truffles ; ingredients: dark chocolate, unsalted butter, heavy cream, brandy ; preparation:In a large saucepan combine the chocolate, cream, butter and butter and heat over moderate heat, stirring, until chocolate is completely melted. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and a pinch of salt. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Keep in an airtight container, chilled, for up to 2 weeks. ; name: raspberry truffles ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, unsalted butter, raspberry jam, raspberry liqueur, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended. Add melted chocolate and vanilla, mix well. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls. Roll in nuts or coconut. Store in refrigerator. ; name: almond disaronno truffles ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butter, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, almond liqueur, almonds, cocoa ; preparation:

name: tomato chilli dip ; ingredients: red chilies, hot peppers, onions, tomatoes, shrimp paste, salt, sugar, oil ; preparation:Place tomato in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: spicy chilli ; ingredients: birds eye chiles, shallots, garlic, dried shrimp paste, lime juice, sugar, salt and pepper, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add chicken and chilli mixture and cook on a low slow heat until the chicken is transparent. Add chillies to the chicken mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: thai green paste ; ingredients: coriander, ginger, garlic cloves, spring onions, green chilies, turmeric powder, fish sauce, olive oil ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the meat with garlic and ginger root in oil for a couple minutes. Add the curry paste, coconut milk, lime rind and juice. Simmer until meat is desired tenderness, or until tofu is heated through. Stir in the cilantro just before serving. Serve with rice. ; name: spicy mexican rice ; ingredients: red onion, garlic clove, salt, bacon grease, rotel diced tomatoes, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin, instant rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: charged up chilli paste ; ingredients: red chilies, tomato paste, soy sauce, garlic clove, sugar, onion powder, oregano, thyme, parsley ; preparation:

name: braised spinach with garlic onion and pine nuts ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sweet onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, nutmeg, lemon, juice and zest of, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, pine nuts ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over low heat. Add the garlic, pine nuts and soaked raisins and cook till the nuts and the garlic are light golden, 3-5 minutes. Increase the heat to medium add the chopped spinach and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: spinaci alla romana ; ingredients: fresh spinach, olive oil, pine nuts, garlic clove, raisins, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: spinach el greco ; ingredients: sweet onion, italian plums, mushroom, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt & pepper, fresh spinach, sliced almonds ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the spinach and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Remove with a slotted spoon and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve. ; name: spinach with pine nuts and almonds espinacas con pinones y almo ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, pine nuts, blanched slivered almond, spinach, serrano ham, salt ; preparation:

name: spinach and pea soup ; ingredients: butter, leeks, frozen peas, fresh spinach, chicken stock, dried savory, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plain yogurt ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve with a swirl of cream and chopped mint. ; name: spiced pea soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, curry powder, chicken stock, frozen petits pois, salt & freshly ground black pepper, low-fat creme fraiche ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer. ; name: spinach and green pea soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, vegetable stock, frozen peas, salt, black pepper, of fresh mint, skim milk, pine nuts, frozen spinach ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: carrot and ginger soup ww ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, celery, ginger, vegetable stock cubes, boiling water, carrot, plain low-fat yogurt ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan add leeks and garlic and cook until soft. Add carrots, pumpkin, stock and water and cook covered until pumpkin is soft. Spoon 2 cups of liquid out, blend or process soup until smooth. Add pepper to your liking. Serve soup in bowls pour a about 1-2 tablespoons of cream over top and serve immediately. Makes about 6-8 servings great for lunches or as a starter. ; name: springtime pea soup ; ingredients: butter, leek, curry powder, powdered ginger, salt, pepper, frozen peas, carrot, celery, milk ; preparation:

name: slow baked tomatoes with garlic and mint ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, salt, fresh ground black pepper, bread, goat cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices. ; name: easy broiled tomatoes ; ingredients: plum tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh herbs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices. ; name: spanish baked cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, saffron, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, smoked paprika, red pepper flakes, fresh thyme sprigs, sea salt, italian parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: garlic tomato slices ; ingredients: firm ripe tomatoes, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, hot sauce, garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes. ; name: fried tomatoes with garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt and pepper, hot pepper, fresh parsley, olive oil, tomatoes ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium-low heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley. ; name: quick and easy garden tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, green onions, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, basil, oregano, feta cheese, olives ; preparation:

name: kentucky fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, vegetable oil, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley. ; name: oven fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: paprika potato wedges ; ingredients: baking potatoes, vegetable oil, paprika, salt ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. ; name: garlic baked potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: potaddies ; ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chili corn on the cob ; ingredients: fresh corn, butter, chili powder, hot pepper sauce, salt ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with ice cubes. Center corn inside 1 reynolds hot bag, large size. Double fold ends to form packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Grill 15-20 minutes, covered, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Cut open top of foil bag, carefully, using a sharp knife. Allow steam to escape, fold back foil. ; name: frito chili casserole ; ingredients: fritos corn chips, onion, chili, american cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. ; name: chili pie casserole ; ingredients: corn chips, onion, cheddar cheese, chili ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: chili corn ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, green chilies, cream cheese, margarine, milk, garlic salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine milk, cream cheese, and margarine in a medium sauce pan. Stir over low heat until melted. After melted, add corn. When heated through, place in dish and sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees. Garnish with cheddar cheese. ; name: chipotle s spicy corn salsa ; ingredients: sweet corn, poblano chiles, red onion, jalapenos, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saute pan, heat the oil until hot but not smoking, add the onion, and cook over medium heat for 2 minutes. Add the corn, poblano chiles, red onion, jalapenos, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper. Mix well. Add the corn, poblano chiles, ; name: sliced chili hot dogs over corn chips for 2 ; ingredients: green pepper strip, onion, butter, kidney beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, hot dogs, sharp american cheese, corn chips ; preparation:

name: chunky chocolate bars ; ingredients: chocolate, unsalted butter, condensed milk, chocolate hazelnut chocolate chip biscuits, mixed dried fruit, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars. ; name: graham cracker bars ; ingredients: graham cracker, brown sugar, coconut, milk, butter, graham crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars. ; name: chocolate coconut bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk, pecans, hershey bar, creamy peanut butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies. ; name: butter brickle dessert ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, saltine crumbs, butter, vanilla, instant vanilla pudding, milk, butter brickle ice cream, cool whip, heath candy bars ; preparation:In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving. ; name: frozen snack bars ; ingredients: creamy peanut butter, instant chocolate pudding mix, milk, graham cracker ; preparation:

name: chocolate raisin oat bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, quick-cooking oats, chocolate-covered raisins, peanut butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: oatmeal crunch bars ; ingredients: quick-cooking oats, nuts, brown sugar, coconut, salt, butter, orange marmalade ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until set. Spread milk mixture over baked layer. Sprinkle remaining crumbly mixture on milk mixture. Press gently into milk mixture. Bake about 20 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely. ; name: quick easy oatmeal bars with chocolate topping ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, oatmeal, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan. ; name: plantation bars ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, chunky peanut butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: oat y nut bars ; ingredients: butter, honey, brown sugar, corn syrup, quick oats, raisins, salted peanuts ; preparation:

name: cauliflower with cheddar cheese sauce ; ingredients: cauliflower, cheddar cheese, milk, mustard powder, cornflour, egg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: simply roasted cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place cauliflower on a platter, cover with water and salt lightly. Bring to a boil and cook until easily pierced with a skewer, about 20 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving plate. Mix oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, pour over potatoes and cauliflower, breaking them up a bit as you do. Serve immediately. ; name: baked cauliflower ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, olive oil, frozen cauliflower, salt, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: cauliflower cheese bake ; ingredients: cauliflower, cream of celery soup, milk, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: roasted cauliflower with cheese sauce ; ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, salt and black pepper, butter, flour, milk, salt, black pepper, gruyere cheese ; preparation:

name: shirley s plain or blueberry muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, egg, milk, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly grease muffin cups or spray with cooking spray. Place shirley s plain or blueberry muffins in blender and blend until finely chopped. Add margarine, eggs, and milk and blend until well mixed. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Make a well in center and add blueberry mixture, stirring just until moistened. Fold in blueberries. Fill muffin cups and bake for 22-25 minutes or until golden. Cool 10 minutes in pan before removing. ; name: old fashioned blueberry muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, frozen blueberries, eggs, milk, canola oil ; preparation:In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in blueberries until coated with flour. Put eggs in 4 cup glas measuring cup and add enough milk to measure 2 cups. Add oil and whisk until blended. Make well in center of flour mixture and pour milk mixture. With large spatula, gently fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients just until moistened. Spoon into greased muffin pan. 400f for 30 minutes or until tops are firm to the touch. ; name: blueberry low fat muffins ; ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, baking soda, cinnamon, unsweetened applesauce, honey, vanilla essence, nonfat milk, egg whites, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f and grease a 12 cup muffin pan. Toss cereal with sugar, flour, baking soda and salt. In a seperate bowl, whisk oil, egg and buttermilk. Add buttermilk mixture to cereal mixture and stir just until blended. Stir in blueberries and spoon into prepared muffin tin. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until tester inserted in the centre of a muffin comes out clean. ; name: rbi s blueberry hot bread ; ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, milk, butter, flour, salt, baking powder, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: easy red white and blueberry shortcakes ; ingredients: ready-to-bake refrigerated buttermilk flaky biscuits, butter, sugar, cool whip, strawberries, blueberries ; preparation:

name: sweet carrots ; ingredients: boiling water, salt, carrots, margarine, sugar substitute, lemon juice, parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: brandied carrots ; ingredients: carrot, water, butter, salt, brandy, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: glazed baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, water, honey, orange marmalade, salt, ground cloves, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender. Drain. Return to skillet. In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots ; name: dressed up baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Use either a bag of whole baby carrots from the produce section or 2 15 ounce cans of sliced carrots. Add carrots to a medium sized sauce pan over medium heat. Quickly add the butter and brown sugar and toss the carrots in the melting butter. Just when they begin to bubble, reduce to low heat and simmer 15 minutes. Remember, sugar can scorch quickly, so stir occasionally and keep the heat low. ; name: cinnamon glazed baby carrots ; ingredients: butter, baby carrots, salt, water, ground cinnamon, brown sugar ; preparation:Put 1 cup of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: carrots with marsala ; ingredients: butter, carrot, sugar, salt, marsala wine ; preparation:

name: restaurant style onion chutney ; ingredients: vegetable oil, tomato paste, paprika, ground cumin, sugar, salt, garlic paste, red onion, cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until softened and starting to brown, about 10 minutes. In food processor combine sour cream, cream cheese, onion mixture, parsley, salt and pepper. Refrigerate for at least one hour. Serve with chips, pita or vegetables. ; name: green tomato chutney ; ingredients: lemon, garlic clove, green tomatoes, brown sugar, raisins, candied ginger, salt, cayenne, cider vinegar, red peppers ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a large pan, stir. Turn down heat and simmer uncovered until thickened. This may take up to an hour. Cool slightly, spoon into jars. Close jars, cool completely, then keep refrigerated. ; name: dried fruit chutney ; ingredients: seedless raisin, dates, currants, dried apricots, apples, onions, vinegar, chile, gingerroot, soft brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat grill and line the grill pan with foil. Mix the seeds and oil and spread them out in the pan. Grill for 12-15 minutes or until soft and charred. Put the seeds into a large bowl and add the hot seeds with all the reamining ingredients. Leave to marinate for 1 hour, then taste and add salt and pepper, plus a little extra sugar if you like. Goes great with cold meats or stuffed into a pitta bread with a strong cheese. ; name: ginger camembert ; ingredients: camembert cheese, ginger marmalade, ground cumin, herbs, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes. ; name: another mint chutney ; ingredients: mint sprigs, green chilies, green onions, vinegar, sugar, salt ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a large pan, stir. Turn down heat and simmer uncovered until thickened. This may take up to an hour. Cool slightly, spoon into jars. Close jars, cool completely, then keep refrigerated. ; name: chutney cheese spread ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese, mango chutney, onion, ground ginger ; preparation:

name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: mom s tangy beef casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, green beans, corn, condensed tomato soup, steak sauce, seasoned pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, potatoes ; preparation:Start potatoes to boil for mashing. Brown beef with peppers and steak sauce, add onions towards the end of the browning so they soften slightly. Drain browned beef leaving enough of the juices for flavor and place in a medium casserole dish. Add beans, soup and corn if desired and stir to mix well. Spread mashed potatoes on top of mixture. Bake covered in an oven preheated to 375 for 25 minutes. Optionally remove covering and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes to brown the potato. ; name: little league casserole ; ingredients: onion, potatoes, salt, black pepper, pork and beans, tomato soup, bacon, american cheese, ground beef ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: three layer beef casserole ; ingredients: ground sirloin, garlic cloves, brown onion, tomato sauce, dry basil, spinach fettuccine, sharp cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, milk ; preparation:Cook beef casserole according to package directions, drain. Saute onion and green pepper in butter, set aside. Cream together cream cheese and sour cream, add cottage cheese, mix well. Mix tomato sauce and tomato paste, set aside. Butter a 4-quart casserole. Pour noodle mix into casserole. Spread beef mix over noodles. Spread tomato mix over beef mix. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour. ; name: daddy casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, cooked long-grain rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: maple balsamic glazed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, pure maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, dijon mustard, shallot, salt, pepper, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. ; name: ginger salmon steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, unsalted butter, soy sauce, garlic powder, fresh ginger, sesame oil, limes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
