Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion. ; name: salmon with oregano ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, ground black pepper, butter, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. ; name: red lobster maple glazed salmon shrimp by todd wilbur ; ingredients: maple syrup, water, dried cherries, sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, shrimp, salmon fillets ; preparation:Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving. ; name: soy maple salmon ; ingredients: soy sauce, light maple syrup, sesame oil, salmon steaks, gingerroot, garlic cloves, scallion ; preparation:

name: chicken and tomato soup ; ingredients: water, chicken bouillon cubes, diced onion, carrot, celery, diced tomatoes, garlic clove, salt & pepper, chicken breast, noodles ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: big batch vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, celery, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, assorted fresh vegetables ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat 2 cups of stock to boiling over high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of stock. Add scallions, onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat until soft about 5 minutes. Add 3 cups stock and tomato paste. Add vegetables. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15 minutes. Add salt and pepper, cooked big batch vegetable soup. ; name: tomato carrot soup ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, carrot, curry powder, chopped tomatoes, chicken broth, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired. ; name: yummy broccoli veggie soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, celery ribs, chicken stock, broccoli, cannellini beans, evaporated milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, brown the broccoli in oil about 4 minutes at medium heat. Add remaining veggies and keep cooking 1 minute. Add chicken stock and pesto. Bring to boil and let simmer until the broccoli is tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Add pepper. ; name: wonton soup ii ; ingredients: water, wontons, chicken broth, broccoli stem, gingerroot, straw mushrooms, green onions ; preparation:

name: honey maple pork chops ; ingredients: honey, maple syrup, allspice, pork loin chops, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat grill. In small bowl, combine honey, syrup and allspice. Mix well. Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper. When ready to grill, brush pork chops with honey mixture. Place chops on gas grill over medium heat or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until pork is no longer pink in center, turning once and brushing occasionally with sauce. ; name: honey lemon boneless pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, chili sauce, honey, lemon rind, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sour cream, flour ; preparation:In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops. ; name: honey dijon pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes. ; name: honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, boneless pork loin chops ; preparation:Place chops in a shallow dish. Combine remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour marinade over chops. Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally. Remove chops from marinade. Place on grill, approximately six inches from medium-hot coals. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning once and basting with remaining marinade. Discard remaining marinade when meat is grilled. ; name: baked breaded pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, breadcrumbs, oregano, garlic ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using baked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: honey pecan pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, butter, honey, pecans ; preparation:

name: quick yellow cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: pineapple sour cream cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, crisco cooking oil, sour cream, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, nuts, crushed pineapple, sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Cream sugar and eggs until light in color and add vanilla. Mix soda into sour cream. Mix sour cream into egg mixture. Sift flour and cream of tartar together and fold into wet mixture. Pour into greased loaf pan and bake at 325 for 1 hour. ; name: sugar and spice cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, butter, eggs, apple pie spice, vanilla extract, almond extract, icing ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: cherry marshmallow cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, miniature marshmallows, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: yellow angel food cake ; ingredients: egg yolks, cold water, salt, sugar, lemon extract, cake flour, cream of tartar, baking powder ; preparation:Beat water and egg yolks and salt for 15 minutes. Fold in sugar and lemon extract. Sift dry ingredients together 5 times. Fold into egg mixture. Bake as for angel food cake. ; name: sour cream yellow cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, sour cream, vegetable oil, water, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: roasted asparagus with balsamic brown butter sauce ; ingredients: asparagus spears, olive oil, salt, black pepper, unsalted butter, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus. ; name: roasted asparagus with balsamic vinegar ; ingredients: cooking spray, asparagus spears, salt, black pepper, butter, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus. ; name: buttered balsamic asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, pecorino cheese, butter, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus. ; name: grilled balsamic asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, balsamic vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus. ; name: asparagus with balsamic butter weight watchers 0 points ; ingredients: asparagus spears, cooking spray, shallots, light butter, balsamic vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: hash browns frittata ; ingredients: vegetable oil, frozen hash brown potatoes, green peppers, onion, eggs, milk, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving. ; name: boursin cheese potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, salt and pepper, heavy cream, boursin cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Add a tiny dollop of red caviar. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve. ; name: boursin mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, boursin cheese, sour cream, milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter ; preparation:Wash, peel and cut the potatoes into pieces. Boil in salted water until tender. Mash and add the cheese, sour cream, the milk if needed for creaminess, and salt and pepper. Place in a large pan, top with butter slices and bake at 325 degrees until hot. Broil a few minutes to get the top nice a browned. ; name: basil frittata ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, butter, eggs, salt & pepper, prosciutto, basil, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly spray a baking dish with pam or other no oil spray. Place the cottage cheese in a strainer and drain for 5 minutes. Pack the spinach on the bottom of the dish. Add the sliced onion. Sprinkle on the adobe spice. Combine the eggs and cottage cheese in a food processor and puree until the mixture is very smooth. Pour over the spinach. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Sprinkle on the grated cheese. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes. ; name: potato and boursin frittata ; ingredients: eggs, salt, pepper, olive oil, frozen hash brown potatoes, green onion, boursin cheese ; preparation:

name: frozen jello pops ; ingredients: boiling water, gelatin, sugar, water ; preparation:Stir boiling water into gelatin and sugar in medium bowl at 2 minutes until completely dissolved. Stir in cold water. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or until almost firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Press firmly on bottom of mold to release pop. Store leftover pops in freezer. ; name: white jello ; ingredients: milk, sugar, gelatin powder, cold water, vanilla extract, sour cream ; preparation:Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or overnight until firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until ; name: topping low fat whipped ; ingredients: evaporated skim milk, unflavored gelatin, water, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon juice ; preparation:Line 8 x 4 inch loaf pan with foil. Mash 2 cups of strawberries in large bowl. Stir in condensed milk, juice and 2 cups of the whipped topping. Pour into pan. Top with combined chopped cookies and butter. Press into mixture. Cover. Freeze at least 6 hours. To serve, invert onto plate. Remove foil. Frost with remaining whipped topping. Top with remaining strawberries, sliced. ; name: yummy yogurt smoothie ; ingredients: nonfat milk, nonfat berry yogurt, vanilla instant breakfast drink mix, ice cube ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine yogurt, milk, berry yogurt and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: strawberry smoothies ; ingredients: strawberry, syrup, milk, sugar, ice cubes ; preparation:Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the strawberries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired. ; name: jello smoothie ; ingredients: sugar-free jello, boiling water, cold water, ice, fat-free cool whip ; preparation:

name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: easy fresh guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onions, grape tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, garlic salt, lime ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: guacamole perfecto ; ingredients: avocados, serrano chilies, tomatoes, fresh cilantro, red onions, lime, oregano, salt & pepper ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: guacamole at the cottage ; ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: guacamole refined ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, onion, fresh cilantro, fresh garlic cloves, fresh lime juice, mayonnaise, hot sauce, tomatoes, salt ; preparation:

name: herbed spinach ; ingredients: lite olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, dry basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: spinach and rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh spinach, tomatoes, water, salt & pepper, uncooked rice ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: spinach dish ; ingredients: spinach, green onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, water, italian seasoning, hot green peppers, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: sauteed spinach garlic and mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, mushrooms, garlic cloves, spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a big saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter with the olive oil. Add in the mushrooms and garlic. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Add in spinach. Toss with 2 forks, about 5 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Mix well. Serve immediately. ; name: braised spinach with garlic onion and pine nuts ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sweet onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, nutmeg, lemon, juice and zest of, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, pine nuts ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over low heat. Add the garlic, pine nuts and soaked raisins and cook till the nuts and the garlic are light golden, 3-5 minutes. Increase the heat to medium add the chopped spinach and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl. ; name: spinach dahl ; ingredients: red lentils, water, vegetable oil, hot red chili pepper, fresh ginger, fresh coriander, fresh spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: green bean cherry tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, shallot, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the green beans and cook about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside on a towel to cool. In large bowl, stir together shallot, vinegar, salt and pepper. Set aside for 15 minutes, then whisk in oil. Add cherry tomatoes and toss. Add beans and basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning. ; name: simple italian bean salad ; ingredients: spring onions, garlic cloves, red chile, cannellini beans, butter beans, olive oil, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the spring onions, garlic and chili. Add the three cans of beans and mix thoroughly. Whisk together the olive oil and white wine vinegar and season. Drizzle over the bean salad and stir in with the parsley. Serve straight away or refrigerate until ready. ; name: pecorino bean salad ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary leaves, edamame, cannellini beans, pecorino cheese, flat leaf parsley, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large saute pan combine the oil, garlic and herbs. Warm over very low heat for about 4 minutes. Add the beans and salt and pepper to taste. Toss gently. Cook over low heat until the beans are warm and have absorbed the flavors of the olive oil, about 5 mins. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice and toss gently. Arrange beans on a platter and surround with olives. Serve immediately. Makes 4 servings. ; name: fresh corn and green bean salad ; ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: fasolia piaz bean salad ; ingredients: dried navy beans, roma tomatoes, english cucumbers, onion, parsley, oregano, olive oil, red wine vinegar, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:

name: baked bbq meatballs ; ingredients: milk, ground beef, salt, pepper, quick-cooking oats, water, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, white sugar ; preparation:Place meatballs in crock pot. In a medium sized bowl mix together all remaining ingredients. Microwave on high for approximately 3 minutes or until boiling. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour. ; name: ham balls in sauce ; ingredients: ground ham, ground pork, ground beef, eggs, milk, graham cracker crumbs, tomato soup, vinegar, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix ham ball ingredients together. I use a stand mixer, but this can be done by hand. Form mixture into large meatballs. Place in a 9x13 pan. Combine sauce ingredients and pour over meatballs in pan. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. If desired, spoon some of the sauce over the meatballs a couple times as they bake to keep the tops moist. ; name: apple and turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, fresh breadcrumbs, apple, egg, thyme, flour, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: missouri burger ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion powder, honey mustard, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, brown sugar, olive oil, swiss cheese, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns. ; name: hamburger balls ; ingredients: ground beef, egg, rice krispies, salt, onion, brown sugar, catsup, tomato soup, dry mustard, vinegar ; preparation:

name: bok choy stir fry ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, ground ginger, ground black pepper, bok choy, chicken bouillon cube, soy sauce, granulated sugar, cornstarch ; preparation:Heat the oil in a wok over medium-low heat. Add the bok choy, green onions, mushrooms, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and black pepper. Cook, stirring often, 5 minutes. Stir in the bok choy and coconut milk. Cook, stirring until the leaves are tender and stalks are still crunchy, 3-6 minutes. Cook, stirring until the leaves are tender and stalks are still crunchy, 3- ; name: thai flavoured fish packets ; ingredients: sesame oil, leek, bok choy, plaice fillets, lime juice, chili pepper, light soy sauce, sugar, coriander ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius heat oil in a small frying pan and stir fry leek and bok choy until just starting to wilt. Cut 4 large squares of kitchen foi. Divide veg between them, and lay 2 pieces of fish on top of each square. In small bowl, mix together fish sauce, lime juice, chilli, soy sauce, and sugar. Pour over fish. Seal foil together and place on baking tray. Place tray in oven and cook 10 minutes. Let packets sit for a couple of minutes before opening to prevent steam burns. Open and scatter fish with coriander. Serve with noodles. ; name: garlic a choy ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, bok choy, cornstarch, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add bok choy leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over bok choy. ; name: baby bok choy with mushrooms ; ingredients: bacon grease, oil, garlic cloves, baby bok choy, button mushrooms, cremini mushrooms, chicken stock, soy sauce, salt and pepper, chives ; preparation:Heat a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add bok choy leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over bok choy. ; name: bok choy with thai style dressing ; ingredients: bok choy, salt, sunflower oil, fresh ginger, red chili pepper, garlic cloves, light soy sauce, thai fish sauce ; preparation:

name: roasted grape tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices. ; name: sauteed grape tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, olive oil, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings. ; name: tomato basil salad with balsamic dressing ; ingredients: tomatoes, fresh basil, dried basil, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, sugar, pepper, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover. ; name: sauteed cherry tomatoes with mediterranean herbs ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, salt ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings. ; name: roasted ricotta tomatoes ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, ricotta cheese, flat leaf parsley, fresh basil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven 400f. Slice tomatoes in half, set aside. Pour the olive oil onto a large baking sheet and spread it around the sheet. Sprinkle evenly the garlic, herbs, sugar, salt and pepper over the oil. Place the tomatoes cut side down onto the baking sheet. Roast for about 30-40 minutes, or until the skins start to lift from the tomatoes. Allow to cool. Remove the skins and put the sauce into a large bowl and break up the flesh with a fork. Reheat sauce if using immediately. ; name: roasted balsamic tomatoes ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground black pepper, salt substitute, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil ; preparation:

name: grilled greek lemon chicken ; ingredients: roasting chickens, olive oil, lemons, juice of, oregano, coarse sea salt, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Combine olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano. Pour over halved chicken in a large glass baking dish. Sprinkle chicken on both sides with sea salt and black pepper. Place in refrigerator and marinate for 2 or so hours. Turn chicken at least once during marinating process. Preheat gas grill on medium high for five minutes. Place chicken skin side down on middle of grill and turn off inner burners so that heat is indirect. Turn chicken when skin is nicely browned and continue to cook for 1-2 hours or until meat thermometer registers 170 deg f. Remove from heat, cover loosely with foil and let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: grilled garlic lemon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, garlic, salt, pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil ; preparation:Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: lemon grilled chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: grilled chicken breast w rosemary and thyme ; ingredients: olive oil, oregano, thyme, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Place chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: greek style grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, plain yogurt, garlic, of fresh mint, lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix ; preparation:

name: double dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, flour, unsweetened baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, sugar, brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: chocolate chip cookies from cooking light ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, sugar, butter, vanilla, egg whites, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: chocolate chipless chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, bread flour, kosher salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, egg, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: lower fat double chocolate chip cookies ww ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, table salt, butter, dark brown sugar, sugar, unsweetened baking cocoa, egg whites, miniature chocolate chip ; preparation:

name: jeanne s steak fajitas with special marinade ; ingredients: vegetable oil, soy sauce, green onions, garlic cloves, lime juice, red pepper flakes, cumin, skirt steaks ; preparation:Mix all marinade ingredients together in a small measuring cup. Place jeanne s steaks in a large zip lock bag. Pour marinade over steaks and seal bag. Place bag in a flat casserole dish so that the steaks are in a single layer. Refrigerate and marinate at least 4 hours, turning every half hour to marinate each side. Drain marinade and grill steaks to desired doneness. I double or triple this recipe for each addition package of steak. Any wild game steak can be used in this recipe. ; name: chipotle lime marinated grilled pork chops or tenderloin ; ingredients: pork chops, chipotle chile in adobo, oregano, garlic cloves, olive oil, lime juice, fresh cilantro, salt ; preparation:For pork, combine all but the salt in a large plastic zipper bag. Marinate in refrigerator, turning the bag occasionally, for 2 hours. Remove pork and discard marinade. Sprinkle pork evenly with salt. Grill pork over indirect heat for about 20 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 155. Let stand 10 minutes. Slice crosswise. For salsa, combine all ingredients in a large plastic zipper bag ; name: yevonne s fajita marinade ; ingredients: skirt steak, kiwi, worcestershire sauce, water, lemon pepper, fajita seasoning mix ; preparation:In a large plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add skirt steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: chipotle shrimp ; ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, raw shrimp, chipotle chiles in adobo, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Pure chipotles in adobo with garlic and honey in a blender until you have a smooth glaze. Pat pork dry and sprinkle with salt and allspice, rubbing the mixture into the meat. Put pork on a foil-lined baking sheet and spread with the glaze to coat well. Roast the pork in the middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer registers 155f, about 20 minutes. Let pork stand 5 minutes on a cutting board before cutting into thin slices. ; name: fabulous lime fajita marinade ; ingredients: chipotle chiles in adobo, lime zest, red onion, garlic cloves, cumin, ground coriander, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil, flank steaks ; preparation:

name: irish beer bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, egg, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix dry ingredients and beer. Pour into a greased loaf pan. Pour melted butter over mixture. Bake 1 hour, remove from pan and cool at least 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: raspberry blueberry tea bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, orange rind, milk, fresh blueberries, fresh raspberry ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: scottish brown bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, golden syrup, milk, baking soda, cream of tartar, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: boston brown bread new england ; ingredients: rye flour, cornmeal, baking soda, salt, dark molasses, milk, egg, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: irish tea bread ; ingredients: dried mixed fruit, tea, brandy, dark brown sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, mixed spice ; preparation:

name: green beans roasted with garlic shallots and pine or hazelnuts ; ingredients: shallots, green beans, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, fresh parsley, pine nuts, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: green beans and shallots ; ingredients: bulbs shallots, olive oil, kosher salt, green beans ; preparation:Place green beans in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shallots and saute until deep brown and crisp. Melt 1 tbutter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Melt 1 t butter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Whisk in mustard. Add green beans. Toss until heated through and evenly coated, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Mound beans on platter. Sprinkle with shallots. ; name: green beans with bacon and red bell pepper ; ingredients: bacon, green beans, red bell pepper, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Cook green beans according to package directions, using the lowest time given. In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally. ; name: asian style green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, red sweet bell pepper, oyster sauce, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving. ; name: fresh green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with shallots and red bell pepper ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, shallots, red bell pepper, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: lentil soup with italian sausage ; ingredients: olive oil, hot italian sausage, onion, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, italian seasoning, brown lentils, chicken broth, spinach leaves ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: spiced carrot and lentil soup ; ingredients: cumin seeds, dried chili pepper flakes, olive oil, carrots, lentils, stock, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: lentil and frankfurter soup ; ingredients: red lentils, potatoes, frankfurters, sunflower oil, onion, carrots, celery, garlic cloves, leek, rosemary ; preparation:Place the lentils in a large pan of boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the potatoes and cook for a further 10 minutes or until the potatoes are soft. Drain and return to the pan. Chop 7 frankfurters and fry in 1tbsp oil with the onion, carrots, celery, garlic, leek and rosemary until all the vegetables are soft. Add the mixture to the lentils then blend in a food processor, adding a few tablespoons of water to loosen the mixture. Pour the soup back into the large pan and add 1-2 cups boiling water and simmer for a minute. Add more water depending on your preferred thickness. Finely slice the remaining frankfurters and fry in 1tsp oil. Serve the soup with the fried frankfurters on the top. ; name: sausage and lentil stew ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, sweet italian sausage, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, rosemary, brown lentils, chicken broth, escarole, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: mushroom and lentil soup ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, vegetable broth, mushrooms, carrot, lentils, celery, dried rosemary, bay leaf ; preparation:

name: applesauce sandwiches ; ingredients: applesauce, bread, butter, sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Put apples and bread in sandwich. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and apple cider. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve warm over ice cream if desired. ; name: butter baked apples ; ingredients: green apples, butter, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place sliced apples in buttered 8x8 pan. Add spices, lemon juice and water. In separate bowl, mix butter, sugar and flour until crumbly. Sprinkle on top of apples. Bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown and apples are tender. ; name: 1 2 3 apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden. ; name: apple krinkle ; ingredients: sliced apples, flour, white sugar, oatmeal, brown sugar, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: a little apple crisp ; ingredients: cooking apples, lemon juice, flour, oatmeal, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute. Serve warm with icecream or caramel sauce. ; name: an apple condiment ; ingredients: butter, apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: linguini with fresh tomatoes and basil ; ingredients: tomatoes, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic clove, salt, pepper, linguine, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine tomato, basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in mixing bowl. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Top with tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese and olives. Serve. ; name: linguine with spinach ; ingredients: spaghetti, garlic clove, red pepper flakes, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, pine nuts, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. While pasta cooks, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add flour. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly with a whisk. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly with a whisk. Increase heat to medium-high. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat. Simmer 3 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly, stirring frequently. Remove from heat, and stir in cheese, salt, and pepper. Combine the sauce, pasta, and spinach, tossing gently to coat. ; name: basil linguine ; ingredients: linguine, olive oil, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook basil linguine just until done. Trim green onions and cut lengthwise into long thin threads, including green tops. While noodles are cooking, heat butter and sesame oil in a large skillet. Stir in green onions. Cook for 1 minute or until onions are wilted. Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder. Add drained pasta, toss well and serve. ; name: linguine with artichokes and olives ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, artichoke hearts, kalamata olive, vegetable broth, plum tomatoes, basil leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, linguine, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:Cook artichokes and olives according to diretions. Combine next 4 ingredients in large serving bowl. Add pasta and toss well. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss in parmesan cheese. Add asparagus and shrimp. ; name: broccoli with linguine ; ingredients: broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovy fillets, fresh chili pepper, linguine, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta in boiling water to the desired degree of doneness. Drain, but do not rinse. Return to the pot. Toss in the remaining ingredients and warm over low heat until the butter and cheese melts. Serve immediately as a side dish or entre. ; name: linguine montecatini ; ingredients: plum tomatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh spinach, linguine ; preparation:

name: tuna with olive sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, tuna in water, garlic powder, cumin, salt, ground black pepper, onion, black olives, fresh parsley, tomato sauce ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic powder and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the onion and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes ; name: curry tuna fish sandwiches ; ingredients: tuna in water, mayonnaise, curry powder, pepper, green onions, dill pickles, dijon mustard, whole wheat bread, lettuce leaves, tomatoes ; preparation:In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the curry powder is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the cooked curry powder, crystallized ginger, onion, pecans and cayenne pepper. Whisk again to thoroughly blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy. ; name: tuna sandwich ; ingredients: tuna, white bread, lettuce leaf, onion, butter, chili, parsley, lemon juice, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips. ; name: fusilli with tuna and tomato sauce ; ingredients: fusilli, tomato sauce, albacore tuna, capers, lemon peel, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh italian parsley ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the tomato sauce, tuna, capers, and lemon peel in a heavy large skillet. Using a fork, break the tuna into chunks. Simmer to blend the flavors, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Add the pasta to the sauce and toss to coat. Toss the pasta with enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Stir in the parsley and serve. ; name: tomatoes stuffed with tuna ; ingredients: tomatoes, tuna, capers, celery, parsley, basil, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: lemon mousse ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, heavy cream, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine the sugar or splenda and cornstarch. Over medium low heat, stir in milk until smooth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the lemon juice, zest and vanilla. Place the pan in a bowl of ice water and stir for 2 minutes to cool. Fold in whipped topping and food coloring if using. Spoon into dessert dishes, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving. Garnish with additional whipped topping if desired. ; name: orange and apricot mousse ; ingredients: oranges, apricots in juice, artificial sweetener, gelatin, yogurt, egg whites, orange rind ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve orange juice in boilingn water. Stir in ice cream and orange juice until blended. Chill until partially set. Fold in oranges. Pour into two 6 cup ring molds coated with cooking spray. Refrigerate overnight or until firm. Just before serving, unmold. ; name: peach melba mousse ; ingredients: peaches, raspberries, peach brandy, granulated sugar, unflavored gelatin, almond extract, salt, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream, egg whites ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in large bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Add milk and peaches, stirring just until blended. Spoon into greased muffin cups. Sprinkle with topping mixture. Bake at 400f for 20-25 minutes or until set and golden. ; name: butterscotch mousse ; ingredients: cashews, dates, water, nutmeg, cinnamon, butterscotch extract, kiwi fruits ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line an 8 inch square pan with nonstick aluminum foil, letting the ends entend over the pan on 2 sides. In a medium nonstick saucepan, combine the evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar and butter. Bring to a boil over med-high heat, stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Reduce heat to medium and boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in chips until melted. Stir in vanilla and walnuts until blended. Pour mixture into the prepared, foiled pan. Chill about 2 hours or until firm. Lift foil by ends out of the pan and transfer fudge onto a cutting board and cut into squares. Store in refrigerator. ; name: apple and date mousse ; ingredients: apples, lemon juice, lemon zest, maple syrup, dates, sesame seeds, lemon balm ; preparation:

name: 3 or 4 bean salad ; ingredients: yellow wax beans, green beans, red kidney beans, butter beans, onion, oil, white vinegar, white sugar, celery salt ; preparation:Combine beans, onions and parsley in a large bowl. Combine dressing, sugar and garlic. Pour over bean mixture and toss. Cover. Refrigerate at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally. Just before serving, remove bean mixture with slotted spoon to lettuce-lined salad bowl. ; name: make ahead three bean salad ; ingredients: french style green beans, wax beans, red kidney beans, green onion, parsley, italian salad dressing, sugar, garlic, lettuce ; preparation:Combine beans, onions and parsley in a large bowl. Combine dressing, sugar and garlic. Pour over bean mixture and toss. Cover. Refrigerate at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally. Just before serving, remove bean mixture with slotted spoon to lettuce-lined salad bowl. ; name: three bean salad ; ingredients: green beans, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground cumin, chili powder, red onions, chickpeas, red kidney beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator. ; name: south african green bean salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sweet white onion, stuffed green olive ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for ; name: fresh corn and green bean salad ; ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: george and pat s three bean salad ; ingredients: cut wax beans, cut green beans, kidney beans, onion, green pepper, vinegar, oil, sugar, celery seed, minced garlic clove ; preparation:

name: egg cheese ; ingredients: egg, milk, vanilla, sugar, salt ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: cherry pie squares ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, flour, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry. ; name: lemon pie in a blender ; ingredients: lemon, eggs, sugar, butter, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Mix egg, water, flour, sugar and butter together in a bowl. Add lemon to mixture and mix well. Pour filling into a pie crust and top with second pie crust. Cut air vents in top crust. Bake at 500 degrees for 5 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes, until it bubbles in the center. ; name: fluffy lemon chess pie ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, lemon, juice and zest of, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add sour cream, lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight. ; name: pavlova in a glass ; ingredients: egg whites, powdered sugar, vinegar, salt ; preparation:

name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: spicy cajun chicken with capers and lemons ; ingredients: unbleached flour, cajun seasoning, paprika, skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, olive oil, chicken stock, fresh lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: chicken thighs with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, olive oil, oregano, garlic, pepper, fresh parsley, kalamata olive, capers, diced tomatoes ; preparation:In a resealable plastic bag, combine chicken and salad dressing. Set aside in refrigerator for 20 minutes. Remove chicken from marinade, reserving marinade. Warm oil in a medium skillet over med-high heat. Add chicken and cook 5 minutes, or until no longer pink, turning occasionally. Stir in reserved marinade and tomatoes with juice. Heat to boiling, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes, or until a thermometer in thickest portion registers 160 degrees and juices run clear. ; name: chicken and mushroom marsala ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, mushrooms, marsala wine, low sodium chicken broth, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: chicken with capers ; ingredients: olive oil, skinless chicken breasts, season salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, mushroom, capers, white wine ; preparation:

name: cherry nut chocolate pie ; ingredients: chocolate ice cream, maraschino cherries, slivered almonds, chocolate crumb crusts, whipped topping ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries. ; name: cherry crisp pie ; ingredients: flour, brown sugar, butter, tart cherries, sugar, cornstarch, rolled oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Toast oatmeal in a shallow pan for 10 minutes to brown, watch carefully. Remove from oven and in small mixing bowl combine oatmeal with remaining ingredients. Press into 9-inch pie plate. Fill with desired filling and bake or bake crust empty for later use. ; name: cherry pie squares ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, flour, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry. ; name: coconut tapioca pie ; ingredients: coconut milk, sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, eggs, sweetened flaked coconut, pure vanilla extract, coconut extract, whipping cream, vanilla cookie pie crusts ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool. ; name: cherry oatmeal ; ingredients: water, salt, old fashioned oats, almond extract, light cherry pie filling, powdered sugar ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely. ; name: cherry heart pie ; ingredients: granola cereal, tapioca, brown sugar, butter, tart cherries, quick-cooking tapioca, almond extract ; preparation:

name: spaghetti stuff ; ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, season-all salt, onion powder, pre-shredded mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: creamy spaghetti with peas and bacon ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen peas, olive oil, onions, minced garlic clove, cooked bacon, cream cheese, milk, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Boil spaghetti until al dente. Prepare a large non-stick skillet on med-high heat with olive oil. Chop onion into large chunks and cook until browned in the skillet. Add garlic, salt, and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes and spinach. Mix well until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or mix it all up. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: pasta with summer squash and zucchini ; ingredients: spaghetti sauce, zucchini, yellow squash, onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, basil, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, whole wheat pasta ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm. ; name: spaghetti corn ; ingredients: cream-style corn, whole kernel corn, spaghetti, mozzarella cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: grandma s creamy fudge icing ; ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, milk, butter, chocolate squares, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Combine the icing sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add butter and milk. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan. ; name: grandma s brown sugar fudge ; ingredients: brown sugar, evaporated milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add butter & brown sugar. Stir around a few times and let cool slightly. Then add vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares. ; name: grandma s frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cocoa powder ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: uncooked fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces. ; name: mom s soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, warm water, salt, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, cream of tartar & baking soda till well combined. Drop tablespoon size balls in sugar, roll to coat. Place 12 cookies on a parchment lined cookie sheet, do not flatten. Bake at 350 for 10 - 15 minutes. Slide parchment with cookies onto wire rack to cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: mom s cooked fudge frosting ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, chocolate, milk, vanilla, butter ; preparation:

name: pinto bean soup ; ingredients: pinto beans, bacon, onion, celery, salt, pepper, garlic powder, marjoram, thyme ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: creamy bean soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic, refried beans, salsa, chicken broth, lime juice, ground cumin ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until beans are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: easy tomato bean soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, onion, jalapeno, garlic, no-salt-added stewed tomatoes, water, pinto beans, white pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until tomato beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: baked bean and tomato soup ; ingredients: baked beans, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired. ; name: creamy pinto soup ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, pinto beans, sodium-free vegetable broth, fresh tomatoes, cumin, oregano, salt ; preparation:

name: tasty tacos ; ingredients: ground turkey, taco seasoning, water, lettuce, black olives, cheese, refried beans, whole wheat tortillas, guacamole ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: tacos in a bag ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, corn chips, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Brown meat in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spoon into warmed taco shells. Serve with assorted toppings. ; name: creamy beef tacos ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, salsa, cream cheese, taco shells, lettuce, chopped tomato, green onion, sour cream, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: beef bean oven tacos ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, black beans, taco seasoning, diced tomatoes, taco shells, cheese, corn ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired. ; name: mexican beef cheese and bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: spooky eyeball tacos johnny 5 tacos ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, taco shells, salsa, sour cream, tomatoes, head lettuce, black olives, cheese ; preparation:

name: straciatella soup italian egg drop soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, combine chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat for 1 minute, or until sizzling. Add chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer, uncovered for 15 minutes. Add chicken broth, ; name: italian straciatella soup ; ingredients: chicken stock, eggs, parmesan cheese, fresh italian parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, combine chicken stock, eggs, parmesan cheese, fresh italian parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Stir occasionally over medium heat until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Add chicken. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. ; name: italian eggs ; ingredients: butter, onion, canned tomatoes, cheese, egg yolks, salt, pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges. ; name: low fat egg drop soup my way ; ingredients: low-fat chicken broth, splenda sugar substitute, egg whites, fresh spinach, green onions ; preparation:In a large saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas, scallions, salt and pepper. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later. ; name: egg drop soup with chicken 2 ww pts ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, soy sauce, cooked chicken breast, frozen green pea, green onion, egg ; preparation:In a saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas and scallions. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
