Serve, or freeze for later. ; name: italian egg drop soup ; ingredients: eggs, breadcrumbs, italian cheese, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: cheese and herb bread ; ingredients: self raising flour, cayenne pepper, butter, fresh parmesan cheese, tasty cheese, spring onions, parsley, egg, milk, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve. ; name: cheesy flat bread ; ingredients: frozen bread dough, olive oil, paprika, dried basil, garlic, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Pat dough onto the bottom and up the sides of a greased 14-inch pizza pan or 15 x 10 x 1 inch jelly roll pan. Brush olive oil over bread. Sprinkle with paprika, basil and garlic. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let rise for 30 minutes. Bake at 375 for 20-25 minutes or until golden. ; name: quicky garlic cheese and herb bread ; ingredients: italian seasoning, sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, milk, canola oil, egg, self-rising flour, cheddar cheese, margarine ; preparation:In a larger bowl, blend together flour, cheese, sugar, both powders, and italian seasoning. In a medium bowl, add milk, oil, and egg, mixing well. Stir into wet bowl into dry bowl, until moistened. Pour into a greased 9x5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted near centre comes out clean. When you remove from oven, spread margarine over top with paper towel. Cool for 10 minutes in pan. Remove to wire rack and cool for 10 more minutes, then enjoy. ; name: italian garlic bread ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, parsley, dried thyme, dried marjoram, paprika, parmesan cheese, french bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice. ; name: cheddar cheese herb bread ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, fresh parsley, garlic clove, garlic powder, paprika, french bread ; preparation:

name: south seas shrimp and mango ; ingredients: jumbo shrimp, dijon mustard, olive oil, fresh orange juice, hot sauce, orange zest, mango, green onions, red bell pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: coconut shrimp and rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, unsalted butter, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, medium shrimp, low sodium chicken broth, coconut milk, fresh lime juice, salt, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and stir-fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon toasted coconut and 1 tablespoon chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges. ; name: garlic shrimp with chilies ; ingredients: olive oil, raw shrimp, fresh chili peppers, garlic, coarse salt ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: shrimp in fiery hot garlic butter ; ingredients: medium raw shrimp, butter, lite olive oil, garlic, dried arbol chiles, fresh lime juice, salt, green onion tops, bread ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: shrimp jamaica ; ingredients: butter, scallions, jalapeno chile, garlic, thyme, chicken broth, large shrimp ; preparation:

name: creamy garlic mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, heavy cream, garlic, kosher salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic mashed potatoes ii ; ingredients: garlic cloves, butter, potatoes, flour, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: yummy mashed potato bake ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion powder, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, butter, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately. ; name: twice baked mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, unsalted butter, milk, season salt ; preparation:Place potatoes in a 2-quart, lightly greased, baking dish. The recipe states to divide the mixture evenly between 6, 6-oz. Lightly greased ramekins or custard cups- i preferred to make it in one big dish but you all can do as you like. Sprinkle evenly with cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or till thoroughly heated. ; name: garlic and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, garlic, unsalted butter, bacon fat, whipping cream, sharp white cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Simmer for ; name: simple kale mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, kale, ricotta cheese, butter, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: smoked gouda cheese grits ; ingredients: chicken broth, milk, salt, white pepper, quick-cooking grits, smoked gouda cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: ham and smoked gouda salad ; ingredients: rotini pasta, mayonnaise, honey, dijon mustard, cooked ham, celery, smoked gouda cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Rinse in cold water. Drain. In a small bowl, mix together the mayo, honey and mustard. In a serving bowl, add the pasta, ham, celery, and cheese. Stir to combine. Add the dressing mixture. Toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper if desired. Serve now or chill and serve later. ; name: it s a gouda hot ham sandwich ; ingredients: french roll, dijon mustard, honey, ground cayenne pepper, ham, raspberry preserves, onions, gouda cheese ; preparation:If using a strong onion or shallot, peel and soak in ice water. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Slice roll almost in half and lay open on a baking sheet. Combine mustard, honey and cayenne in small bowl, then spread on both halves of roll. Layer ham across both halves of roll, spread preserves over ham. Dice shallot and sprinkle over preserves, then top with cheese. Place in hot oven until cheese melts, about 3-4 minutes. Fold to close sandwich before serving. Enjoy warm or wrap tightly to serve later. ; name: cheese and chili souffle ; ingredients: bread, milk, eggs, dry mustard, salt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, chile ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the cheese mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: smoked paprika chicken ; ingredients: oil, chicken breast, onion, garlic clove, smoked paprika, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: smoked gouda bechamel ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, whole milk, heavy cream, smoked gouda cheese, paprika, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: sugar and spice cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, butter, eggs, apple pie spice, vanilla extract, almond extract, icing ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: pineapple sour cream cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, crisco cooking oil, sour cream, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, nuts, crushed pineapple, sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Cream sugar and eggs until light in color and add vanilla. Mix soda into sour cream. Mix sour cream into egg mixture. Sift flour and cream of tartar together and fold into wet mixture. Pour into greased loaf pan and bake at 325 for 1 hour. ; name: apple spice snack cake ; ingredients: spice cake mix, apple pie filling, eggs, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: cranberry pineapple cake ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, sugar, salt, vanilla, cranberries, crushed pineapple in juice, salad oil, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: pineapple spice cake ; ingredients: cake, spice cake mix, crushed pineapple, eggs, orange extract, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:

name: fluffy white bread bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, flour, vital wheat gluten flour, sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Proof yeast in water. For bread machine - place all ingredients in order directed by your bread machine and process. By hand - combine all and knead until elastic, about 10 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise for an hour. Punch down. Place in a greased loaf pan, cover and let rise another 20 minutes. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or so. ; name: softest ever bread machine bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, vegetable oil, bread flour, salt ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the bread machine in the order listed. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at ; name: whole wheat oatmeal bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, butter, egg, sugar, salt, rolled oats, wheat germ, whole wheat flour, bread flour, yeast ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices. ; name: sour cream bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, sour cream, bread flour, light brown sugar, gluten, salt, fast rising yeast ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing. ; name: hearty wheat bread not bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, molasses, vital wheat gluten, stone ground whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, sunflower seeds, salt ; preparation:Stir yeast and molasses into water. Mix all dry ingredients except additional flour. Combine dry mixture with yeast mixture knead in additioal flour to form elastic dough. Place in greased bowl, turn greased side of dough up. Let rise in warm place until double, 60-90 minute. Punch down dough and roll out on floured suface divide in half. Roll into loaves and place in greased bread pans. Let rise 45 min - 1 hour. Bake 350f for 40-45 minute. ; name: really yummy wheat bread bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, white flour, wheat flour, salt, honey, dry milk, shortening, yeast ; preparation:

name: baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, fryer chickens ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: simple lemon chicken ; ingredients: lemon, skinless chicken breasts, flour, salt, paprika, oil, soft brown sugar, chicken stock ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: zesty roasted chicken ; ingredients: chili powder, dried oregano, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper, roasting chickens, kosher salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: zesty lemon chicken ; ingredients: cooking spray, chicken breasts, lemon juice, lemon rind, chicken stock powder, brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, cornflour, water ; preparation:Coat a large non stick frypan with cooking spray. Fry the chicken until cooked through. Remove from the pan and leave to one side. Place all other ingredients into pan except the water and cornflour. Stir ingredients well until boiling. Combine cornflour with water and add to pan. Bring back to the boil stirring constantly. Cut chicken into large slices then return to the pan and re-heat, coating with sauce. ; name: sesame baked chicken ; ingredients: egg, milk, whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, sweet paprika, sesame seeds, frying chicken, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over. ; name: bittersweet farm chicken ; ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter, lemon juice, liqueur, honey, orange zest, soya sauce ; preparation:

name: quick bacon tomato quiche ; ingredients: cooked bacon, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, cheddar cheese, green onion, plum tomato, black pepper, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Beat eggs and combine with all other ingredients. Mix well and pour into pie shell. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 minutes. Cut while warm and serve. Any leftovers may be refrigerated and microwaved at a later date. ; name: bacon and double cheese quiche ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, cooked bacon, eggs, half-and-half cream, dried thyme, white pepper, gruyere cheese, white cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine eggs, cream, chives, salt and pepper in bowl and blend well. Sprinkle shredded cheese into bottom of baked pie shell. Pour egg mixture over top of cheese and sprinkle with the bacon. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: onion bacon mushroom quiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, sliced mushrooms, cooked bacon, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: cheese shrimp mushroom quiche ; ingredients: bacon, mushroom, onions, gruyere cheese, small shrimp, butter, eggs, heavy cream, white pepper, deep dish pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: crustless vegetable quiche ; ingredients: red pepper, broccoli florets, zucchini, american cheese, eggs, oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease or spray with pam a 9-inch pie plate. Press all the water out of the thawed spinach. Combine cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, spinach, eggs, oil, salt and pepper. Pour half of the mixture into the lightly greased pie plate. Arrange tomato slices over spinach. Cover with the remaining spinach mixture. Bake 40 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean ; name: broccoli bacon quiche ; ingredients: frozen deep dish pie shell, frozen chopped broccoli, yellow onion, bacon, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, sour cream, dried thyme, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:

name: apricot glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, apricot jam, light soy sauce, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: apricot balsamic skillet chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, apricot jam, balsamic vinegar, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: apricot orange chicken ; ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, long grain rice, cornstarch, cold water, boneless skinless chicken breast, canola oil, orange marmalade, dried apricot, chinese five spice powder, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: skillet glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, fresh ginger, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick saut pan over high heat for 2 minutes. Add the chicken, smooth side down. Pan fry for 2-3 minutes, until juices run clear. Turn the chicken over, reduce heat, and cook for 3-6 minutes, until juices run clear. Sprinkle with a little salt and thyme just before serving. ; name: apricot glazed chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, apricot preserves, ketchup, cider vinegar, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: lullaby muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, salt, baking powder, applesauce, bananas, honey, skim milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: healthy whole grain muffins ; ingredients: cornmeal, seven-grain cereal, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, egg, milk, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean. ; name: honey wheat muffins ; ingredients: buttermilk, old fashioned oats, honey, vegetable oil, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes. ; name: whole wheat dinner muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, oat bran, baking soda, baking powder, salt, low-fat buttermilk, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes. ; name: mabon harvest morning muffins ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, apple, carrot, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: apple pie with oatmeal cookie crust ; ingredients: rolled oats, flour, cinnamon, light brown sugar, regular margarine, vanilla, sliced apples, lemon juice, ground cloves, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: apple pie dessert ; ingredients: baking apples, orange juice, flour, white sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, butter, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. Remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is ; name: simple swedish apple pie ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: apple pie filling in a jar ; ingredients: white sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, water, lemon juice, apples ; preparation:Pack 6-7 quart jars with apple, tightly. Mix the first 5 ingredients. Add water and lemon juice. Cook until it thickens and clears. Pour over apples, leaving an inch of head space. Process in water bath canner for 35 minutes. ; name: the best apple pie ; ingredients: apples, butter, sugar, flour, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, unbaked pie shells, brown sugar, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: simple apple pie ; ingredients: pie shell, apple pie filling, applesauce, flour, brown sugar, old fashioned oats, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:

name: english beef steak pie ; ingredients: boneless round steak, russet potatoes, onion, flour, salt and pepper, water, pie crust ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Prepare pie crusts as directed on package for 2 crust pie using a 9 in pan. In large saucepan combine gravy, and cornstarch. Add frozen mixxed vegetables, mushrooms, worcestershire sauce and mix well. Cook over med-high heat until bubbly. Stir in the roast beef. Pour into pie crust lined pan. Top with the second crust and flute. Cut decorations as you like but at least put several slits into top crust to allow steam to escape. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive ; name: cheesy beef and potato pie ; ingredients: beef mince, onion, carrots, chopped tomatoes, beef bouillon cube, boiling water, potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: beef cups ; ingredients: sandwich bread, butter, ground beef, egg, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: basic meatlballs ; ingredients: egg, dry breadcrumbs, onions, salt, pepper, lean ground beef ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. ; name: appetizer meat pies ; ingredients: lean ground beef, mushroom soup, onion, egg, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, worcestershire sauce, salt & pepper, bread ; preparation:

name: my favorite potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hot water, chives ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and allow to cool. Slice cooled potatoes and layer in a large bowl or dish. In a saucepan combine water, vinegar and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for one minute. Remove from heat and pour over potatoes. Cover and chill for at least 12 hours. Drain excess marinade and add onions, eggs, salt, pepper, celery seed and mayonnaise. Mix well and serve chilled. ; name: japanese style potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, onion, oil, vegetable stock cube, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, eggs, cucumber ; preparation:Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve. ; name: potato salad with bacon and parsley ; ingredients: new potatoes, kosher salt, black pepper, bacon, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley. ; name: lime and thyme potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, mayonnaise, sour cream, lime peel, lime juice, fresh thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender. While potatoes are cooking, combine olive oil, rice wine vinegar, wine if using, mustard, salt and pepper in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When potatoes are tender peel or not. Dice potatoes. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave. ; name: potato salad w lemon ; ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, lemon, zest of, fresh lemon juice, kosher salt, cilantro, scallions ; preparation:

name: blueberry sour cream pie ; ingredients: pie crust, sugar, flour, sour cream, egg, vanilla, salt, blueberries, butter, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown. ; name: berry cream pie ; ingredients: blueberries, pie crusts, sugar, all-purpose flour, salt, eggs, sour cream, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Line 9 inch pie pan with pastry. In large bowl combine all filling ingredients except butter and toss lightly. Spoon filling into crust lined pan. Cut 4 slits in top of crust. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes ; name: blueberry crumble pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, egg yolk, blueberry pie filling, all-purpose flour, quick-cooking oats, sugar, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown. ; name: blueberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, blueberry pie filling, non-dairy whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Combine cream cheese, sugar and eggs in a small bowl. Beat until fluffy. Place crust on baking sheet. Pour mixture into crust. Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven. Cool. Spread blueberry filling on top. Garnish with whipped topping. Chill 3 hours. ; name: blueberry sour cream pie easy ; ingredients: sugar, salt, flour, eggs, sour cream, almond extract, graham cracker pie crust, blueberry pie filling ; preparation:

name: mixed vegetable casserole ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, sliced water chestnuts, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, onion, butter, fine dry breadcrumb ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Fry onion, garlic, mushrooms and leek in a pan in the olive oil until softened. Rinse and drain mixed vegetables and sprinkle over some olive oil. Combine the parmesan and the grated parsnip in a bowl and put aside. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy. ; name: koshie potato casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, eggs, onion, milk, bacon, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender and mash them. Cook broccoli until tender. Dot casserole dish with butter or mushroom. Add broccoli. Top the broccoli with the mushroom soup and grated cheese. Add the mashed potatoes on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Bake in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: loaded potato casserole ; ingredients: baking potatoes, milk, french onion dip, seasoning salt, ground pepper, asiago cheese, cooked bacon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: hot potato casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, mayonnaise, velveeta cheese, onion, salt, pepper, bacon, green olives ; preparation:In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: down home casserole ; ingredients: bacon, potatoes, fresh broccoli, celery, carrots, onion, kielbasa, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: hollandaise sauce french style ; ingredients: egg yolks, water, butter, salt, lemon juice, fresh chives ; preparation:Place egg yolks and water in the top of a double boiler and beat well with a wire whip or fork. Put all but 2 tbs of the butter in a small saucepan over moderately low heat until just melted. Add 1 tbs of the cold butter to the egg and water mixture and place over hot, not boiling water. Whip constantly until egg yolks thicken slightly. Remove from heat and whip in the second tbs of cold butter. Gradually pour the melted butter into the egg mixture, beating constantly. Place over hot, not boiling, water cook until thickened, whipping constantly. Thickened hollandaise should hold the imprint when a fork or whip is drawn across the surface. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice, salt, cayenne pepper. Sauce may be placed in top of double boiler over hot, not boiling, water, covered, and kept until serving time. Serve with vegetables, baked or broiled fish, and shell-fish. ; name: stuffed fish rolls with asparagus hollandaise sauce ; ingredients: white fish fillets, baby asparagus, bacon, gruyere, butter, white wine, lemon juice, asparagus, egg yolks, cayenne ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 with rack placed in the center position. Place asparagus in a brown paper bag large enough to hold the asparagus comfortably. Drizzle with oil to prevent the bag from burning. Place bag on a baking sheet, and drizzle with more olive oil. Bake for 20 minutes. Shake bag a few times before carefully opening. Transfer asparagus to platter. Drizzle with more oil. Serve immediately. ; name: fresh asparagus with hollandaise ; ingredients: asparagus, egg yolks, fresh lemon juice, water, dijon mustard, parsley, butter, salt, cayenne ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan. ; name: bechamel sauce ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, milk, nutmeg, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a large heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat. Add in fresh garlic saute for 2 minutes. Add in flour and nutmeg. Stir for 2 minutes. Slowly add in half and half cream. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Mix in the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and lots of black pepper. ; name: julia child s hollandaise sauce ; ingredients: egg yolks, water, fresh lemon juice, unsalted butter, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh ground white pepper ; preparation:

name: creamy horseradish mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, milk, unsalted butter, horseradish, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture. ; name: yummy mashed potato bake ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion powder, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, butter, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately. ; name: mexican mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, diced tomatoes, onion, hot chili sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tomatoes, onion, chile sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir in potatoes and cook until heated through. Spoon potato mixture into a 2 quart casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Serve when the cheese has melted. ; name: garlic and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, garlic, unsalted butter, bacon fat, whipping cream, sharp white cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Simmer for ; name: creamy garlic mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, heavy cream, garlic, kosher salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: caramelized onion and horseradish mashed potatoes ; ingredients: butter, onions, white wine vinegar, ground thyme, baking potatoes, dijon mustard, prepared horseradish, salt, cracked black pepper, half-and-half ; preparation:

name: sauteed cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, garlic cloves, onion, fresh ginger, black pepper, salt, white vinegar, canola oil ; preparation:Place cabbage in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: sweet sour cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, onion, red thai chile, white vinegar, sugar, garlic powder, oil, salt ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: rotkrautsalat red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, vinegar, pepper, red wine, caraway seed, red cabbage ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium-size fry pan until crisp. Remove and reserve bacon. Add sugar, vinegar, and wine to bacon fat. Stir and cook until sugar is dissolved. Pour this hot mixture over the cabbage. Toss with vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and caraway seeds. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over mixture. Serve at room temperature. ; name: belarussian carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, cider vinegar, salt, coriander seed, vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss. ; name: sauteed red cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: salvadoran cabbage salad curtido ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, boiling water, scallions, white vinegar, water, jalapenos, salt ; preparation:

name: honey dijon pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes. ; name: grilled honey mustard lamb chops or mutton extra yummy ; ingredients: honey, light soy sauce, hot english mustard, garlic, lamb chops, salted butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast ; name: honey dijon mustard chicken fillets ; ingredients: chicken, honey, dijon mustard, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, shallots, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: grilled onion flowers ; ingredients: onions, nonstick cooking spray, balsamic vinegar, fresh oregano, brown sugar, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with sterilised jars, and cook for 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and add the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Gently put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with sterilised jars, and cook for 15 minutes. Gently put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with steril ; name: bbq grilled honey onion ; ingredients: red onions, honey, soy sauce, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: low fat cornbread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking soda, salt, plain nonfat yogurt, eggs, whole kernel corn, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl whisk together flour, cornmeal, brown sugar blend, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, pumpkin puree, fat free greek yogurt, egg whitepreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In another bowl whisk together egg whites, yogurt and pumpkin puree. Add to dry ingredients and whisk until all are blended. Pour into greased pan and bake for about 35-45 minutes or until tooth pick comes out clean. Let rest 10 minutes in pan before cutting and serving. ; name: jalapeno cheddar cornbread ; ingredients: bacon fat, self-rising cornmeal, sour cream, frozen corn, corn oil, eggs, salt, shredded cheddar cheese, pickled jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Place the peppers on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side. ; name: texas jalapeno corn ; ingredients: frozen corn, fat free cream cheese, low-fat sour cream, garlic cloves, green onions, jalapenos, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the jalapeno, corn and onion. Saute until the vegetables are tender. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Stir in the thyme and season with salt and pepper. ; name: jalapeno peanut brittle ; ingredients: jalapeno, water, sugar, light corn syrup, peanuts, salt, butter, baking soda ; preparation:Mix and set aside the jalapeno. In a large pan, mix and boil the sugar, water, and syrup to hardball stage. Add peanuts and stir constantly until mixture turns yellow about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter mixture and vanilla. Pour onto greased cookie sheet. Pat into a thickness you like with the back of a spoon. Cool and break into pieces. Store in airtight container. ; name: jalapeno cornbread low fat to no fat ; ingredients: cornmeal, whole wheat pastry flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, fat-free buttermilk, egg whites, corn kernel, nonfat cheddar cheese, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:

name: decadent grilled ham and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: grilled ham egg and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: honey-roasted ham, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, egg, sourdough bread, butter ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham egg and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, eggs, salt, pepper, sourdough bread, ham, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: diner style grilled ham cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: mustard, italian bread, ham, swiss cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: pork tenderloins asian style ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic cloves, onions, lemon juice, soy sauce, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions. ; name: indonesian pork tenderloin ; ingredients: lime juice, soy sauce, stir-fry sauce, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, minced garlic cloves, pork tenderloin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions. ; name: pork tenderloin with lime beer marinade ; ingredients: beer, lime juice, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, chili powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, black pepper, pork tenderloin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the lime beer marinade. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes. ; name: oriental pork tenderloin ; ingredients: soy sauce, pineapple juice, ginger, garlic clove, sherry wine, brown sugar, pork tenderloin, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in ; name: marinated bbq pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, soya sauce, lemon juice, garlic, tarragon, basil, chives, sage, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. ; name: 48 hour pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, dry white wine, lemon juice, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, bay leaves ; preparation:

name: crock pot roasted herbes de provence whole chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, onions, parsnips, herbes de provence, salt and pepper, chicken broth, olive oil ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the shrimp. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. ; name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: crock pot low calorie lemon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon-pepper seasoning, assorted fresh vegetable, cream of chicken soup, dried rosemary, mixed italian herbs ; preparation:Put the chicken on top of low calorie lemon chicken. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the chicken. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until juices run clear. Stir ; name: crock pot oriental chicken ; ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, vegetable oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, garlic, ground ginger, slivered almonds ; preparation:Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add broiler-fryer chickens, vegetable oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, garlic, ground ginger, slivered almonds. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro. ; name: crockpot chicken and vegetables ; ingredients: chicken breasts, white onion, baby carrots, new potatoes, white wine, chicken broth, salt, paprika, pepper, thyme ; preparation:Place chicken in crockpot. Sprinkle with soup mix and garlic salt. Pour dressing and water over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way. ; name: lemon herbed roasted chicken crock pot ; ingredients: roasting chickens, onion, butter, lemon, fresh parsley, salt, thyme, paprika ; preparation:

name: mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, enchilada sauce, green chili peppers, velveeta cheese, corn tortilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: green chili rice casserole ; ingredients: uncooked rice, butter, sour cream, milk, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilies, salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook rice first, as per directions on the package, usually two parts water, one part rice bring to a boil, reduce heat until water is gone. Preheat oven to 350f. Add butter, sour cream, milk, jack cheese, chilies, and salt to cooked rice. Mix well. Put in a casserole dish, sprinkle top with cheddar cheese, and cook until center is hot. ; name: chili cheese burritos ; ingredients: chili, green chilies, taco seasoning, rice, water, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown. ; name: chili cheese casserole ; ingredients: butter, eggs, flour, monterey jack cheese, chilies, small curd cottage cheese, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: green chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tortillas, cream of mushroom soup, green chilies, evaporated milk, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: crisp peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, peanut butter, granulated sugar, dark brown sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: peanut butter cookies for a crowd ; ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, peanut butter, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: protein peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, artificial sweetener, brown sugar, peanut butter, egg, all-purpose flour, protein powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: the world s greatest peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, crunchy peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: great peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, vegetable oil, brown sugar, vanilla, salt, eggs, creamy peanut butter ; preparation:

name: asian glazed salmon ; ingredients: brown sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, dried red pepper flakes, garlic, fresh lime juice, salmon fillets ; preparation:Place the sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, a dash of red pepper flakes, garlic and lime juice in a nonreactive saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until the sauce forms a glaze. Set aside. Preheat the broiler. Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving. ; name: baked fish with spices ; ingredients: white fish fillets, onion, garlic, fresh ginger, fresh lemon rind, tamarind paste, light soy sauce, peanut oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: oriental style salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, vegetable oil, light soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, green onions, lime, juice and zest of, black pepper, lime wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion. ; name: basic steamed fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, mirin, granulated sugar, salt, sesame oil, green onion, cilantro, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Rinse and dry fish, then drench with juice of limes. Drain and season with salt and pepper. Place 1 layer of fish in a shallow pan. Cover with green pepper and onion, then sprinkle with curry powder. Drizzle with coconut oil or melted butter. Squeeze remaining lime juice on fish. Cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 10 minutes, then baste with liquid. Fish is done when it flakes easily with fork. ; name: fast asian fish ; ingredients: salmon fillets, light soy sauce, gingerroot, sweet chili sauce, steamed rice, spring onions ; preparation:

name: bread pudding with white chocolate brandy sauce ; ingredients: french bread, milk, sugar, eggs, vanilla, butter, cinnamon, heavy whipping cream, white chocolate, brandy ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the bread cubes in two greased 6-oz. Custard cups. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and creamer. Pour over the bread. Sprinkle with the caramel pieces, nuts, and cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly before serving. ; name: soft centred chocolate puddings ; ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, eggs, egg yolks, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, creme fraiche ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine dark chocolate, butter, eggs, egg yolks, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, creme fraiche. Reduce heat to medium low and add dark chocolate. Cook, stirring, another 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool 5 minutes. Add dark chocolate. Pour into dessert dishes and serve or lay plastic on pudding surface and refrigerate. ; name: frozen pudding ; ingredients: milk, heavy cream, instant lemon pudding mix, sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: canadian pudding ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, milk, raisins, nuts, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the flour. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: chocolate pudding shooters ; ingredients: instant chocolate pudding mix, milk, vodka, baileys irish cream, cool whip ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: mini christmas pudding treats ; ingredients: fruitcake, brandy, white chocolate, decorative candies ; preparation:

name: mushroom and shredded chicken salad ; ingredients: olive oil, button mushrooms, mushrooms, chicken, mixed salad greens, lime juice, soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat one tablespoon of oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and cook over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened. Toss the mushrooms in a large bowl with the shredded chicken. Combine all the lime and soy dressing ingredients in a small jug or bowl, mix well and pour two-thirds of the dressing over the warm mushrooms. Arrange the salad leaves in a serving dish and toss through the remaining dressing. Top with the chicken and mushrooms and serve warm. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: sicilian pasta salad ; ingredients: salt, pasta shells, fresh green beans, summer squash, marinated artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, red wine vinegar, fresh oregano, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. ; name: mushrooms in creamy wine sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, mushroom, green onion, flour, vegetable broth, ground nutmeg, pepper, skim milk, dry white wine, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat. ; name: italian mushroom salad ; ingredients: mushroom, salad oil, wine vinegar, lemon juice, salt, fresh ground pepper, green onion tops ; preparation:

name: shortbread pastry ; ingredients: plain flour, unsalted butter, egg yolk, egg, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares. ; name: easy french bread extra large ; ingredients: water, flour, sugar, salt, yeast ; preparation:Dissolve yeast, sugar and salt in water. Add flour and stir with a wooden spoon until blended. Do not knead -- it will be lumpy. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour. Oil a cookie sheet with olive oil. Oil hands and remove dough from bowl and divide into 2 rounds and place on cookie sheet. Sprinkle dough with cornmeal. Let rise 1 hour. Preheat oven to 425 degrees and brush dough with melted butter. Bake for 10 min then reduce heat to 375 degrees and bake an additional 15 minutes. When finished baking, brush again with melted butter. ; name: fast food biscuits ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: french bread ; ingredients: french bread, warm water, yeast, salt, sugar, shortening, flour ; preparation:Mix water, sugar and yeast in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: fran s easy shortbread bars ; ingredients: icing sugar, butter, flour, rice flour, sugar ; preparation:

name: lemon pepper tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, stock, salt, lemon juice, black pepper, dijon mustard, oil, chives ; preparation:In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush lemon pepper with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice. ; name: ginger marinated tuna steaks ; ingredients: garlic clove, reduced sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, dark sesame oil, rice vinegar, green onion, tuna steaks ; preparation:Place steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade. ; name: honey lime tuna steaks ; ingredients: light olive oil, old bay seasoning, lime juice, honey, basil leaves, tuna steak ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in shallow dish or self-closing plastic bag. Add tuna steaks. Turn to coat. Refrigerate 20 minutes. Turn occasionally. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes per inch of thickness. Discard leftover marinade. ; name: seared tuna and salsa ; ingredients: avocado, mango, jalapeno, red onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, lime, juice of, tuna steaks, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips. ; name: tuna sandwich ; ingredients: tuna, white bread, lettuce leaf, onion, butter, chili, parsley, lemon juice, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips. ; name: balsamic tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, salt, pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, orange juice ; preparation:

name: caramel frappe for 2 ; ingredients: warm water, sugar, coffee, milk, ice, ice cream, whipped topping, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: cappuccino mousse trifle ; ingredients: milk, instant coffee granules, vanilla instant pudding mix, frozen whipped topping, frozen pound cake, semisweet chocolate, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours. ; name: white chocolate mocha syrup recipe ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, vanilla, instant espresso, white chocolate ; preparation:Pour the white chocolate mocha syrup into 2 cups. Fill the tall cup with ice. Add the chocolate syrup, milk, sugar then fill the cup to the top with coffee and mix with the cross blade until smooth. Pour mixture into 2 cups. Add the white chocolate mocha syrup, milk, sugar then fill the cup to the top with coffee and mix with the cross blade until smooth. Add ; name: mcdonalds caramel frappe ; ingredients: coffee, folgers caramel groove cafe latte mix, skim milk, caramel ice cream topping, whipped cream, ice ; preparation:I use 2 tablespoons of general foods international vanilla caramel latte from the makers of maxwell house instead of folgers caramel groove cafe latte mix, but this site does not recognize it because it is new. Fill your blender almost to the top. Add skim milk to blender. Mix 2 tbsp vanilla caramel latte with your coffee until dissolved than add to blender. Blend on med to high speed. My blender has a frappe speed and that is what i use. Blend until you reach the consistency you prefer. You can always add more milk if this mixture is to thick. If you do not use enough ice, it will be very watery and it will not be anything like mcdonalds frappe. Top with whipped cream and caramel. I also stir in some caramel before adding the whipped cream. But to each his own. ; name: coffeemaker mochaccino frappe ; ingredients: water, coffee, sugar, low-fat milk, half-and-half, chocolate syrup, ice ; preparation:

name: grilled salmon with miso ; ingredients: green onions, red miso, egg yolk, sake, sugar, dashi, dark soy sauce, salmon fillets ; preparation:In bowl, mix the first 5 ingredients. Place onions in small bowl and chill until ready to use. Grill salmon over medium coals for 10 minutes, turn and grill the other side for 10 minutes. Brush with miso mixture throughout grilling.
