Place salmon on platter and sprinkle with miso mixture to taste. Combine soy sauce, brown sugar, water and oil. Marinate fish in soy mixture for 2 hours or more. Remove from marinade. Grill for 7 minutes per side. ; name: asian glazed salmon ; ingredients: brown sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, dried red pepper flakes, garlic, fresh lime juice, salmon fillets ; preparation:Place the sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, a dash of red pepper flakes, garlic and lime juice in a nonreactive saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until the sauce forms a glaze. Set aside. Preheat the broiler. Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving. ; name: brown sugar and ginger glazed salmon ; ingredients: dark brown sugar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, ground ginger, salmon fillets, sesame seeds ; preparation:Spray rack of boiler pan with nonstick spray. Preheat the broiler. Whisk together the brown sugar, mustard, and dill in a small bowl. Sprinkle on the broiler rack and spoon the brown sugar glaze on top. Position 7 inches from the heat and broil until lightly browned and just opaque in the center, about 6 minutes. ; name: oriental style salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, vegetable oil, light soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, green onions, lime, juice and zest of, black pepper, lime wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion. ; name: miso salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, miso, rice vinegar, sake, light brown sugar, sugar, soy sauce, gingerroot, panko breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: broccoli cheddar cheese with chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, curry powder, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken macaroni casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, chicken breasts, milk, chicken broth, macaroni, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cook and drain pasta. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook and drain chicken. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, spinach and garlic powder. Add pasta, bacon, chicken, 1 c fried onions and 1 c cheese. Spread into a baking dish. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes. ; name: easy cheesy chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, oil, cream of broccoli soup, milk, cheddar cheese, rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center. ; name: beefy macaroni casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, condensed cream of broccoli soup, del monte zesty jalapeno pepper diced tomato, macaroni, mild cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: cheesy chicken broccoli macaroni ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chicken broth, elbow macaroni, velveeta reduced fat cheese product, frozen chopped broccoli ; preparation:

name: citrus scallops ; ingredients: sea scallops, lemon juice, fresh parsley, orange rind, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil ; preparation:Whisk 2 tablespoons olive oil, pressed garlic cloves and oregano in medium bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper. Add sea scallops and toss to coat with oil mixture. Prepare barbecue or preheat broiler. Alternate 3 scallops, 3 lemon slices and 2 bay leaves on each skewer. Grill or broil brochettes until scallops are golden brown and just cooked through, about 4 minutes per side. Transfer to plates and serve. ; name: sauted scallops with lime ; ingredients: olive oil, sea scallops, cilantro, garlic clove, fresh lime juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper, crusty bread ; preparation:Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through. ; name: charbecued scallops ; ingredients: fresh scallops, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, white pepper, paprika ; preparation:Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through. ; name: scallops with herbed raw tomato sauce ; ingredients: garlic clove, grape tomatoes, fresh herbs, salt and pepper, sea scallops, extra virgin olive oil, butter, lemon wedges ; preparation:In lg skillet, melt butter and cook scallops for about 7 minutes, until golden brown. Remove and keep warm. In same skillet, add pepper, onion and garlic. Cook 2 minutes. Add wine, stir 1 minute. Add broth, milk, and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, 1-2 minutes. Add scallops and heat through. ; name: seared scallops and spinach salad ; ingredients: fresh sea scallop, flour, blackened steak seasoning, cooking oil, baby spinach leaves, carrot, balsamic vinegar, water ; preparation:In a large nonstick frying pan, add flour, blackened steak seasoning, cooking oil, baby spinach leaves, carrot, balsamic vinegar, water and cook on each side for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and add to serving dish. Sprinkle with fresh lemon. Place spinach over top and serve. ; name: crunchy lemon and herb crusted scallops robin miller ; ingredients: oyster crackers, parsley, lemon & herb seasoning, salt, cayenne pepper, sea scallops, dijon mustard, olive oil ; preparation:

name: easy cranberry sauce ; ingredients: cranberries, sugar, orange marmalade, lemon juice, nuts ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until cranberries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture. ; name: cranberry orange sauce ; ingredients: oranges, cranberries, sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, orange zest, cinnamon, orange juice, and brown sugar. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container. ; name: favorite cranberry sauce ; ingredients: frozen cranberries, fresh orange juice, sugar, liquid honey, cinnamon stick, whole cloves ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add fresh and dried cranberries and cook until dried berries soften and fresh berries begin to pop, stirring often. Remove from heat and stir in marmalade, juice, orange zest and allspice. Cool completely. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Can be made 3 days ahead. ; name: cran raspberry sauce ; ingredients: seedless raspberry jam, cranberries, ground cinnamon, allspice, fresh lemon rind ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water, sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, sour cream. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well. ; name: creamy rich and decadent cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, water, sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, sour cream ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally. Toward the end of the cooking time, use a potato masher to mash all of the berries. Reduce the heat to low and add the butter and salt. Simmer until butter melts, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well. ; name: baked cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, ground cinnamon, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts ; preparation:

name: spanish style clams ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, bay leaves, crushed tomatoes in puree, dry white wine, littleneck clams, hot pepper ; preparation:Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy. ; name: clams with jalapeno lemon and basil ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, jalapeno, tomato sauce, dry white wine, fresh lemon juice, littleneck clams, fresh basil, lemon peel ; preparation:Melt butter in very large pot over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and jalapeo. Stir until garlic is golden, about 2 minutes. Add tomato sauce, wine, and lemon juice and bring to boil. Add clams. Cover and boil until clams open, about 9 minutes. Add basil and lemon peel. Season with pepper. Transfer clams and sauce to large bowl and serve. ; name: tuscan style capellini with clams and garlic ; ingredients: clams, garlic cloves, olive oil, white wine, capellini, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of capellini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy. ; name: shrimp garlic w white wine ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, large shrimp, salt, fresh ground pepper, dry white wine, lemon juice, fresh parsley, parsley sprig ; preparation:Heat butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta. ; name: clams al forno ; ingredients: littleneck clams, onions, jalapeno pepper, dried red pepper flakes, water, fresh garlic, tomatoes in puree, scallions, lemon ; preparation:

name: asparagus mushroom and cheese omelet with herbs ; ingredients: eggs, water, ground black pepper, fresh thyme, asparagus spears, brown button mushroom, unsalted butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees f. Arrange asparagus and mushrooms on aluminum foil-lined 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan. Sprinkle garlic, salt and pepper on top. Drizzle melted butter over vegetables. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Serve immediately. ; name: omelet ; ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: omelet with corn and smoked mozzarella ; ingredients: fresh corn, water, eggs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, basil leaves, smoked mozzarella cheese, unsalted butter ; preparation:Cut corn from cob or use frozen and place in a small skillet with a few tablespoons water. Cook over medium heat until heated through and drain. Meanwhile, combine eggs, a tablespoon water in a medium bowl and beat lightly. Add corn to the eggs and season with salt and pepper, add cheese and basil. Stir. Wipe out skillet, add butter and heat over medium high heat. When the butter just starts to foam, add egg mixture and stir once or twice. Cover and cook until the bottom is pale golden, then carefully invert with a plate and slide back into the skillet. Cook an additional 1 or 2 minutes and serve. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: oven baked omelet ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, salt, ground pepper, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: mushroom n cheese omelet ; ingredients: mushroom, cheese, eggs, milk, butter, onion, garlic ; preparation:

name: steamed fish with ginger and onions ; ingredients: red snapper, fresh ginger, green onions, sherry wine, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil ; preparation:Rinse & dry fish well. Cut lemon in half and squeeze, rubbing juice into fish, inside & out refrigerate for about an hour then rub with vegetable oil and place in a shallow baking dish. In a blender, mix thoroughly soy sauce, corn oil, white wine, garlic, sugar and ginger. Pour over fish. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes until the fish flakes easily and juices are opaque. Baste frequently with sauce. Garnish & serve. ; name: steamed sea bass with ginger and shiitakes ; ingredients: sea bass fillets, sea salt, cayenne pepper, fresh ginger, shiitake mushroom, fresh cilantro, green onions, sesame oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients. Place onions in small bowl and chill until ready to use. Grill salmon over medium coals for 10 minutes, turn and grill the other side for 10 minutes. Brush with ginger sauce throughout grilling. Place salmon on platter and sprinkle with onions. ; name: fish house panko cod fillets ; ingredients: cod, flour, egg, panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, black pepper, dried parsley, pam cooking spray ; preparation:Lay out the flour, beaten egg and panko bread crumbs on three separate plates, or shallow pans. Mix the onion, black pepper and parsley into the panko. Blend well. Dip the seasoned fish in the flour, then egg and then press the fish into the seasoned panko bread crumbs, coating the fish evenly on all sides. Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Place the fish carefully in the baking pan. Spray the top with pam or oil. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: citrus cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillet, fresh parsley, pepper, onion, garlic clove, butter, orange juice, lemon juice, orange peel ; preparation:Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish. ; name: steamed cod with ginger and scallions ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, fresh ginger, cod fish fillets, coarse salt, fresh ground pepper, scallions ; preparation:

name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: roast chicken with rosemary lemon salt ; ingredients: chicken, extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary, lemon, fresh lemon rind, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: paprikash csirke paprika chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, paprika, cumin, roasting chickens, salt, chicken broth, carrots, tomato paste ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, cayenne pepper and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: smoked paprika chicken ; ingredients: oil, chicken breast, onion, garlic clove, smoked paprika, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: zesty roasted chicken ; ingredients: chili powder, dried oregano, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper, roasting chickens, kosher salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: peester s rotisserie chicken ; ingredients: roasting chickens, garlic cloves, lemon, smoked paprika, butter, olive oil, thyme ; preparation:

name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: mid eastern orange lentil soup ; ingredients: onion, celery, carrot, oil, orange lentils, vegetable bouillon granules, lemon, juice of, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: kurdish spicy lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentil, wheat berries, chickpeas, onion, celery, carrot, green bell peppers, tomato paste, dried hot red chili pepper, salt ; preparation:Rinse lentils, discarding and stones, or blemished lentils. Drain. Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until hot. Add onion and bell pepper, cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Add cumin and ground red pepper and stir 1 minute. Pour in the 4 cups of water and the lentils. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 20 minutes. Stir in salt and simmer 10 minutes more or until lentils are tender. Stir in lemon juice and serve. ; name: lentil soup with italian sausage ; ingredients: olive oil, hot italian sausage, onion, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, italian seasoning, brown lentils, chicken broth, spinach leaves ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: lentil tomato soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, smoked bacon, dried red lentils, vegetable stock, chopped tomatoes, salt & pepper, double cream ; preparation:

name: old time meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, saltine crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl use your hands to mix together the meat, eggs, onion, saltines, and worcestershire. Mold the mixture into a loaf and place in a pan or on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil. Mix together the spread in a bowl and smear onto the top of the loaf. Place your loaf in the oven and bake for 45minutes to 1 hour or until the top becomes a burgundy color and fat has gathered on the bottom of the pan. Serve with mashed potates and veggies for a yummy winter meal. Bon apetite. ; name: prizewinning meatloaf ; ingredients: ground round, milk, fresh white breadcrumbs, flat leaf parsley, onion, egg, chili sauce, prepared horseradish, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance. ; name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: leftover meatloaf soup ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, pepper, beef broth, diced tomatoes, condensed tomato soup, meatloaf, worcestershire sauce, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl, soak bread in soup for 5 mintes. Stir in the onion, egg, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into an 8 in x 4 in loaf. Line and 11 in x 7 in x 2 in baking dish with foil and grease the foil. Place meatloaf in pan. Top with tomato sauce. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: sunday meatloaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, breadcrumbs, eggs, spaghetti sauce, worcestershire sauce, onion, red capsicum, fresh herb, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: kid s fish stick casserole ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, eggs, skim milk, onion flakes, fresh dill, seasoning salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, frozen fish sticks ; preparation:In lg. Bowl, stir together all ingredients except for half of the cheese and the fish sticks. Spread into 13x9 baking dish. Top with frozen fish sticks in 3 rows of 6 longways. Sprinkle evenly with the rest of the cheese, spreading, making sure some of it gets down in between and around fish sticks. Bake at 350, uncovered, for about 35-40 minutes. Serve with coleslaw and garlic bread. ; name: baked caught fish ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, onion salt, pepper, butter, cod, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f until done, about 20 minutes. ; name: healthy baked potato chip fish ; ingredients: walleye, milk, reduced-fat potato chips, parmesan cheese, dried thyme, garlic powder, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, butter ; preparation:Cut fish into serving-size pieces. Place milk in a shallow bowl. In another shallow bowl, combine potato chips, parmesan cheese, thyme, garlic powder, pepper. Dip fish in milk, then with the potato chip mixture. Sprinkle a greased 8-inch square baking dish with crumbs. Drizzle with butter. Bake uncovered at 500 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: barbecued fish with crisp potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, fish fillets, olive oil, salt and black pepper, tomatoes, green onions, garlic cloves, capers, basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat potatoes evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Bake at 325 degrees f. until done, about 20 minutes. ; name: grilled cheese and fish stick sandwich ; ingredients: frozen fish sticks, bread, cheese, margarine ; preparation:Place fish sticks on top of grilled cheese sandwich and place on top of fish stick sandwich. Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool. ; name: fish stick supper ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, eggs, milk, dried onion flakes, fresh dill, seasoning salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, frozen fish sticks ; preparation:

name: banana chip bars ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, bananas, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar, then add egg. In another bowl, combine bananas and milk. Combine flour, baking powder and baking soda and add to creamed mixture alternately with banana mixture. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan and bake at 350 for 60 to 70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to cool on a wire rack. ; name: wheat germ bars ; ingredients: butter, egg, vanilla extract, brown sugar, flour, wheat germ, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: chris chocolate chip coffee bars ; ingredients: eggs, hot coffee, brown sugar, flour, salt, baking soda, oil, vanilla, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars. ; name: chocolate nut bars ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, flour, baking powder, chocolate shavings, nuts, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies. ; name: chocolate chip bars ; ingredients: brown sugar, shortening, eggs, flour, baking powder, salt, chocolate chips, pecans ; preparation:

name: heavenly chocolate cake ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, oil, water, sweetened condensed milk, caramel ice cream topping, frozen whipped topping, heath candy bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: chocolate thunder cake ; ingredients: swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: golden chocolate cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, vegetable oil, water, eggs, sour cream, chocolate candy bars, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans, coconut ; preparation:Cream together the sugar and the butter. Add the vanilla, coconut, and pecans and beat well. Pour mixture into a 9 inch x 13 inch pan and bake for one hour and 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree f oven. ; name: brown sugar angel food cake ; ingredients: egg whites, vanilla, cream of tartar, salt, brown sugar, cake flour ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done. ; name: sugar and spice cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, butter, eggs, apple pie spice, vanilla extract, almond extract, icing ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: no bake heath bar cake ; ingredients: angel food cake, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, cool whip, heath candy bars ; preparation:

name: 1 2 3 biscuits ; ingredients: salt, flour, baking powder, oil, milk ; preparation:Melt butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 17 minutes at 175c. ; name: fast food biscuits ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: butter dip biscuits ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220 degree c. Grease and flour a 8cm deep, 19cm square cake tin. Place flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Add butter and using finger. Make a well in the centre and add buttermilk and using a flat bladed knife, stir until dough almost comes together. Press out to a 3cm thick round. Dip a 5cm round cutter into flour to prevent dough sticking and cut out scones. Gently press leftover dough pieces together and repeat cutting out more scones - should make a total of 16 scones. Place scones, touching into prepared tin. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until light golden and hollow when tapped on top. Serve with jam and cream or honey and cream. ; name: basic biscuits from paula deen ; ingredients: yeast, water, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugar, solid shortening, buttermilk ; preparation:Melt the butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add golden syrup. Stir until golden syrup is dissolved. Stir in sugar, rolled oats and flour. In a small bowl or cup, dissolve baking soda in water and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put teaspoon lots onto a greased oven tray. Bake at 170 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden. Store in an airtight container. ; name: spelt biscuits ; ingredients: spelt flour, baking powder, salt, butter, honey, milk ; preparation:

name: stuffed pepper soup ; ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, ground beef, green peppers, onion, chunky tomato pasta sauce, italian-style diced tomatoes, beef broth ; preparation:In a pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: pasta with sausage and sweet peppers ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, hot italian sausage link, sweet red peppers, vegetable broth, ground pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, cut sausage into bite-size pieces. In a large skillet cook sausage and peppers over med-high heat until sausage is brown. Drain off fat. Add broth & pepper to skillet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Drain pasta and toss with sausage mixture. ; name: tiny pasta in broth ; ingredients: beef stock, pasta, roasted red peppers, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place the pasta in a large pot of water and bring to a boil. Add beef stock and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add parmesan cheese and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add parmesan cheese and bring to a boil ; name: simple italian sausage pasta sauce ; ingredients: italian sausage, red bell pepper, red onion, stewed tomatoes, flour, green onions ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta. ; name: chilighetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, onion, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, mushroom stems and pieces, water, chili seasoning mix, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Drain. While pasta cooks, mix sauce and next 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes. Coat a 13 x 9 baking dish with spray. Add pasta and top with sauce. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Top with onions if desired. ; name: italian winter soup ; ingredients: beef broth, elbow macaroni, ground round, red kidney beans, spaghetti sauce ; preparation:

name: beef bean chile verde ; ingredients: ground beef, red bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, green chili salsa, water, pinto beans ; preparation:Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute. ; name: beans on a bun ; ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, onion, baked beans, salt, hamburger bun ; preparation:Spray pan with cooking spray. Add chopped veggies and cook on medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until tender. Crush beans and mix in egg and bread crumbs. Spoon into 4 equal patties on a cookie sheet coated with non stick spray. Bake at 375 - 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Flip burgers and cook for another 10 - 15 minutes. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: easy beef and bean chili ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, kidney beans, chili beans, cumin, salt, celery salt, chili powder, brown sugar, tomato soup ; preparation:In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: quick beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, black beans, ground cayenne pepper, chili powder, flour tortillas ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: ground beef and sausage red beans and rice ; ingredients: white rice, kielbasa, ground cayenne pepper, lean ground beef, onion, kidney beans, pinto beans, pork and beans ; preparation:

name: grilled lemon herb shrimp ; ingredients: large shrimp, olive oil, lemon peel, lemon juice, oregano, thyme, salt and pepper, skewer ; preparation:Pour olive oil, lemon peel, lemon juice, herbs, and s&p into a large ziplock bag. Add shrimp. Toss gently to coat. Marinate at least two hours or overnight. Grill for 2 minutes per side. ; name: grilled ginger shrimp ; ingredients: fresh ginger, garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, dried chili pepper flakes, medium shrimp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place all other ingredients in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. ; name: coconut shrimp and rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, unsalted butter, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, medium shrimp, low sodium chicken broth, coconut milk, fresh lime juice, salt, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and stir-fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon toasted coconut and 1 tablespoon chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges. ; name: barbecue ginger prawns shrimp ; ingredients: prawns, olive oil, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Add the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper and mix well. Cover the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper and mix well. Cover the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: grilled shrimp pili pili ; ingredients: large shrimp, birds eye chile, garlic cloves, lemon juice, peanut oil, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:

name: easy lemon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, extra virgin olive oil, flour, chicken broth, lemons, juice of, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: quick and easy chicken in cream sauce ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cornflour, oil, sliced mushrooms, white wine, whipping cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat the oil and garlic over medium heat. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 7 - 10 minutes. Season with black pepper. Add white wine and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove chicken to a platter. Saute tomatoes in the skillet until tender. Place tomatoes over the chicken and cover with pan drippings. ; name: easy paprika chicken ; ingredients: butter, roasting chickens, salt and pepper, onions, garlic clove, paprika, ground red pepper, tomato paste, water, green bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: easy ranch chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, ranch dressing mix, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, pepper, butter, cracker ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned. ; name: easy 5 star chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, ketchup, vinegar, brown sugar, soy sauce, water, sesame oil, cornstarch, red pepper flakes, oil ; preparation:

name: chicken baked with shallots olives and thyme ; ingredients: chicken breast fillets, shallots, garlic cloves, green olives, fresh thyme, extra virgin olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Put the chicken skin-side-up in a small roasting tin. Mix together the garlic, thyme and butter and dot over the chicken. Scatter around the red onions and pancetta and drizzle with oil. Roast for 20 minutes until the chicken has cooked through and the onions are softened. Divide the salad between 4 plates and top with the red onions, pancetta and chicken. ; name: green beans and shallots ; ingredients: bulbs shallots, olive oil, kosher salt, green beans ; preparation:Place green beans in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shallots and saute until deep brown and crisp. Melt 1 tbutter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Melt 1 t butter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Whisk in mustard. Add green beans. Toss until heated through and evenly coated, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Mound beans on platter. Sprinkle with shallots. ; name: green beans roasted with garlic shallots and pine or hazelnuts ; ingredients: shallots, green beans, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, fresh parsley, pine nuts, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: haricots verts with warm shallot vinaigrette ; ingredients: french haricots vert, olive oil, shallot, red wine vinegar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic, vinegar, water, oil, mustard, salt and pepper. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the haricots vert and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the shallot vert and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the shallot ; name: chinese pork with shallots ; ingredients: pork fillets, oil, shallots, red chile, soy sauce, sherry wine, cornflour, garlic, sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together pork fillets, oil, shallots, red chile, soy sauce, sherry wine, cornflour, garlic, sugar, cornflour, salt and pepper. Pour over chops. Bake in preheated 350f oven for 1 hour or until done. ; name: roasted shallots ; ingredients: shallot, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh thyme sprigs ; preparation:

name: hawaiian banana bread ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, bananas, eggs, cake flour, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack. ; name: lynne s banana bread ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour batter into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: honey banana bread ; ingredients: butter, honey, eggs, banana, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: magnificent moist banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, cinnamon, pecans, eggs, canola oil, mashed bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: aunt carrie s banana bread ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, eggs, bananas, flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:

name: sweet and spicy sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, brown sugar, paprika, ground black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, poultry seasoning, chili powder, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole sweet potatoes in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot. ; name: spicy mashed sweet potatoes with raisins ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, salt, butter, pepper, ginger, cinnamon, cayenne, brown sugar, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: spicy sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: canola oil, sweet onions, sweet potatoes, water, golden raisin, light brown sugar, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix together the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown. ; name: honey and whisky glazed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: unsalted butter, honey, scotch whisky, dark brown sugar, sweet potatoes, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: spicy roasted sweet potatoes with orange honey ; ingredients: unsalted butter, honey, orange juice, cayenne, cumin, smoked paprika, sweet potatoes, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: chocolate swizzle nog ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, milk, vanilla extract, whipped cream, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the condensed milk, vanilla extract, whipped cream, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes, honey. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows. ; name: special chocolate eggnog ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, pure vanilla extract, milk, light rum, salt, whipping cream, semisweet chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: honey sweet soy nog ; ingredients: soymilk, egg white, honey, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: royal hot chocolate ; ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, boiling water, salt, vanilla extract, whipped cream, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make royal hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately. ; name: natural homemade eggnog ; ingredients: rum, cognac, sweet cream, whole milk, eggs, powdered sugar, nutmeg ; preparation:In a large saucepan, mix the eggs, sugar, and salt, if used. Stir in 2 cups milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and mixture coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat and add 2 cups milk and extract. Chill several hours or overnight. Whirl in blender before serving. Add rum or brandy as desired, top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg. ; name: hot chocolate nog ; ingredients: eggnog, milk, chocolate syrup, bourbon, ground nutmeg, miniature marshmallow ; preparation:

name: low fat fried chicken strips ; ingredients: flour, dry breadcrumbs, garlic powder, dried thyme, salt, black pepper, chicken tenders, low-fat buttermilk, olive oil ; preparation:Combine the first 6 ingredients in a shallow dish, and set aside. Combine the chicken and the buttermilk in a plastic zip-top bag. Seal and marinate in refrigerator 30 minutes. Remove the chicken and discard the marinade. Pour olive oil in skillet to just barely covering the entire bottom of the pan. Heat oil over medium heat. Dredge a few chicken strips at a time in breadcrumb mixture, tossing to coat. Add chicken to the pan, and cook 3 minutes on each side or until done. ; name: mamaw s creamed turkey over toast ; ingredients: whole milk, chicken stock, margarine, salt, white pepper, all-purpose flour, cooked turkey, white bread ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: sesame lamb chops ; ingredients: lamb, salt and pepper, egg, dijon mustard, dried breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, butter, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a nonreactive bowl, combine mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper with 2 teaspoons water. Slowly whisk in olive oil, forming a creamy marinade. Stir in basil. Add the chops to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to four hours. Remove from refrigerator and let sit until arriving at room temperature. Heat grill to very hot. Remove excess marinade from chops and grill uncovered about 3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warm platter and serve. Preparation time does not include marinade and sitting time. ; name: creamy vegetable bake ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, parmesan cheese, dried basil leaves, carrots, sugar snap peas, fresh asparagus, red pepper, chicken flavor stuffing mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream, milk, parmesan cheese, dried basil leaves, carrots, sugar snap peas, fresh asparagus, red pepper, chicken flavor stuffing mix. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: strip t s ; ingredients: shredded coconut, sesame seeds, dry breadcrumbs, turkey breast, egg whites, sesame oil, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: cranberry feta and walnut salad ; ingredients: mixed salad greens, dried sweetened cranberries, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Toss greens, cranberries, cheese and walnuts in large bowl. Mix vinegar, honey, mustard and pepper with wire whisk until well blended. Gradually add oil, whisking constantly until well blended. Pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: broccoli salad small batch ; ingredients: broccoli florets, bacon, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, white vinegar, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli florets, bacon, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, white wine vinegar, shredded cheddar cheese in a large mixing bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture, stirring well. Cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight. ; name: cranberry cinnamon salad ; ingredients: cranberry gelatin, whole berry cranberry sauce, salt, cinnamon, mandarin oranges, boiling water ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: red cabbage cranberry and apple slaw ; ingredients: red cabbage, dried cranberries, rice vinegar, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, granny smith apples, pecans ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Combine salad ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture and toss well to coat. Allow salad to chill for at least 20 minutes before serving. Salad may not require all of the dressing. ; name: pear walnut salad ; ingredients: mixed greens, red pears, honey, lemon juice, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing. ; name: wild rice cranberry and walnut salad ; ingredients: basmati rice pilaf, dried cranberries, celery, walnuts, olive oil, red wine vinegar ; preparation:

name: southern fried catfish nuggets ; ingredients: catfish nuggets, egg, buttermilk, cornmeal, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Preheat over to 375f. Dredge filets in butter. Dredge filets in bread crumbs. Dredge filets in minced garlic. Sprinkle with seasoning salt. Spay small casserole dish add filets and bake covered with foil for 25 minutes. Uncover and broil for 3 or more minutes, depending on if ya want them crispier. Good served with rice and veggie of your choice. ; name: spicy grilled catfish ; ingredients: olive oil, lime juice, white wine, dry mustard, chili powder, fresh ground black pepper, fresh cilantro, salt, catfish fillet ; preparation:Heat 2 tablespoons reserved oil in a large skillet, over medium heat. Saute garlic for 1 to 2 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle both sides of the fish with salt and pepper. Place fish in the skillet. Cover, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Add the spinach and sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with ; name: oven baked onion ranch catfish fillets ; ingredients: catfish fillets, sour cream, mayonnaise, ranch dressing mix, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Heat 2 tbs oil in small skillet, hold tortilia with tongs, dip one at a time in oil, for ten seconds, or until limp. Line a 10x6x2 inch baking dish with the tortilias. Keep warm. In same skillet add 2tbs oil and cook onion and garlic till tender. Stir in tomatoes, green chillies, and salt. Simmer 10 min. Pour over tortilias. Beat eggs and cook in skillet till set, put on top, and grate cheese on top. Put in oven just long enough for cheese to melt. Serve warm. ; name: herbed grilled catfish ; ingredients: paprika, salt, thyme, oregano, garlic powder, ground black pepper, ground red pepper, catfish fillets ; preparation:In a large shallow dish, combine the paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, thyme, salt and lemon zest. Add the catfish fillets and turn to coat both sides, pressing the herb-and-spice rub into the fish. In a large non stick frying pan over medium-high heat, heat the oil. Add the fish and cook for 4 minutes. Pour the lemon juice over the fillets, turn and cook until the fish just separates when pressed with a fork, about 4 minutes. Pour the lemon juice over the fillets, turn and cook ; name: tennessee fried catfish ; ingredients: catfish, salt, pepper, self-rising cornmeal, corn oil ; preparation:

name: maple syrup baked sweet potato ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, maple syrup, butter, fresh thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: crispy fried sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, bacon, onion, salt, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: sugar glazed kumara sweet potato ; ingredients: kumara, oil, sugar, sea salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350c. Place kumara in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: unsalted butter, heavy cream, salt, sugar, sweet potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a small pan and fry chili for 3-4 minutes over a low heat. Stir in chopped red pepper. Drain sweet potato and garlic and mash with 2 tbsp cream cheese and milk, adding more if needed. Stir red pepper, chili and coriander into mash. Add salt and black pepper to taste. ; name: sweet potato cakes ; ingredients: honey, sweet potatoes, egg, soy sauce, butter ; preparation:

name: frosted coffee chocolate punch ; ingredients: chocolate milk, coffee, sugar, coffee liqueur, ice cube, orange wedge ; preparation:In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, cocoa powder and cream cheese over low speed and mix until thoroughly combined. Increase speed to high and cream ingredients until light and fluffy. Reduce speed to low and slowly add the powdered sugar, buttermilk, and vanilla. Beat until mixture is smooth and thoroughly combined. Frost cake as usual. ; name: white chocolate buttercream ; ingredients: unsalted butter, milk, white chocolate, vanilla extract, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: coffee malted ; ingredients: brewed coffee, milk, instant malted milk powder, coffee ice cream, sugar ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine the coffee, milk, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into cups or mugs. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c. ; name: iced cocoa coffee ; ingredients: milk, hot water, unsweetened cocoa, instant coffee powder, brown sugar, vanilla essence, fresh cream, cinnamon ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: grandma s frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cocoa powder ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: snow whites second cup ; ingredients: white chocolate, brewed coffee, vanilla extract, evaporated skim milk ; preparation:

name: rosemary mustard lamb chops ; ingredients: lamb loin chops, salt and pepper, dijon mustard, dried rosemary ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Thicken pan juices for sauce, removing fat. ; name: maple mustard grilled pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, onion, vegetable oil, maple syrup, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill chops 12-15 minutes until done. Turn once and brush with the sauce mixture during the last 5 minutes of grilling. ; name: lick your chops ; ingredients: lamb chops, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt and black pepper, unsalted butter, dijon mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 ; name: cumin honey and mint marinated lamb chops ; ingredients: of fresh mint, balsamic vinegar, ground cumin, dry mustard, honey, salt, fresh ground black pepper, lamb loin chops ; preparation:In a nonreactive bowl, combine mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper with 2 teaspoons water. Slowly whisk in olive oil, forming a creamy marinade. Stir in basil. Add the chops to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to four hours. Remove from refrigerator and let sit until arriving at room temperature. Heat grill to very hot. Remove excess marinade from chops and grill uncovered about 3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warm platter and serve. Preparation time does not include marinade and sitting time. ; name: maple mustard lamb chops ; ingredients: maple syrup, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, fresh rosemary, garlic, orange zest, pepper, lamb loin chops ; preparation:

name: coconut french toast ; ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, eggs, vanilla, flaked coconut, salt, white bread, butter ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate ; name: coconut banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, yoghurt, flour, baking powder, baking soda, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: french toast or eggy bread ; ingredients: white bread, egg, water, caster sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup. ; name: toasted coconut and banana drop biscuits ; ingredients: white flour, fine sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, coconut flakes, butter, milk, vanilla, banana ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: toasted coconut bread ; ingredients: coconut, flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, milk, egg, vegetable oil, vanilla ; preparation:

name: shepherd s hamburger pie ; ingredients: crescent rolls, hamburger, salt and pepper, spaghetti sauce, cheese, whole kernel corn, mashed potatoes, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately. ; name: shepherd s pie roll ups 5fix ; ingredients: steaks, beef gravy, peas and carrots, simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Add steaks, beef gravy, peas and carrots and blend all ingredients together in the steaks. Pour mixture evenly into a standard pie plate. Bake uncovered for 30 minutes at 350. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over mixture and bake for five more minutes. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over ; name: hot dog pie ; ingredients: ground beef, hot dogs, baked beans, ketchup, brown sugar, prepared mustard, cheese, pastry shells, american cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately. ; name: joan s weeknight shepherd s pie ; ingredients: ground beef, cream of celery soup, milk, onion, salt, pepper, celery, mashed potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion and carrots. Cook 7 minutes. Then add turkey, thyme and salt. Cook until thickened. Stir in tomato paste and broth, bring to boil. Reduce and simmer until thickened. Transfer to a 2 quart baking dish and top with favorite prepared mashed potatoes. Bake 15 minutes in oven. ; name: ranch mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, ranch dressing mix, sour cream, milk, margarine, bacon ; preparation:In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: florida shepherds pie ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, ground beef, cheese, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, seasoning, real butter ; preparation:

name: flourless peanut butter chocolate toffee cookies ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, baking soda, brown sugar, chunky peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: chocolate chipless chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, bread flour, kosher salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, egg, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: flourless peanut butter and chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: chunky peanut butter, brown sugar, egg, baking soda, vanilla, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: mexican cheddar skillet chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, oil, long-grain minute rice, whole tomatoes, chunky salsa, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook chicken in skillet in hot oil 4 to 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in rice, tomatoes and salsa. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Continue cooking about 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: chili cheesy skillet chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, salt and pepper, boneless chicken breasts, salsa, diced green chilies, cumin, cheddar cheese, cream cheese ; preparation:Cook chicken in skillet in hot oil 4 to 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in rice, tomatoes and salsa. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Continue cooking about 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: southern living mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes and green chilies, ranch style beans, corn tortillas, processed cheese ; preparation:Cook gound chuck and diced onion in a dutch oven, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink.
