Drain meat mixture, and return to dutch oven. Stir in chicken soup, diced tomato and green chiles, and beans. Layer half of the tortillas evenly into 2 lightly greased 13 x 9 inch baking dishes. Top each with one-fourth of meat mixture and one-fourth of cheese cubes. Repeat layers with remaining tortillas, meat mixture, and cheese. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, enchilada sauce, green chili peppers, velveeta cheese, corn tortilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: mexican chicken penne ; ingredients: penne pasta, cooked chicken, salsa con queso, milk, salt, tomatoes, green onions, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: crispy roasted new potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian cheese blend, fresh basil, garlic cloves, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: canadian oven roasted potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, butter, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, lemon thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray 13x9 dish with cooking spray. Slice potatoes fairly thin and place in dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss to coat. Sprinkle italian seasoning and parmesan cheese on top. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: roasted potatoes and peppers ; ingredients: tiny new potatoes, onion, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. ; name: oven fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: perfect roasted potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, cornstarch, garlic powder, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, garlic clove, parsley, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: oven roasted new potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, salt and pepper, butter, bacon, cheddar cheese, scallion ; preparation:

name: fried garlic chicken ; ingredients: garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, paprika, seasoned bread crumbs, all-purpose flour, milk, egg, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: moist and juicy garlic chicken ; ingredients: butter, garlic, parsley, garlic powder, italian breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: oven fried chicken breast cutlets ; ingredients: butter, dijon mustard, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, chicken cutlets, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together butter, dijon mustard, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, chicken cutlets, fresh parsley. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: crispy parmesan garlic chicken ; ingredients: garlic mushroom soup mix, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, plain breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix together all ingredients except chicken or fish, in a flat dish. Moisten chicken with water. Coat with mixture. Place in a shallow baking dish. Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is baked through. At this time you may put the chicken under the broiler to turn the crust to gold. Watch carefully so the chicken does not burn, while under the broiler. ; name: oven fried garlic chicken ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, garlic cloves, chicken ; preparation:

name: cocoa syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, dutch-processed cocoa powder, vanilla extract, kosher salt, light corn syrup ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: marshmallow divinity ; ingredients: granulated sugar, water, marshmallow cream, vanilla extract, pecans ; preparation:In a large saucepan combine sugar, corn syrup, water, and salt. Cook to hardball stage,, stirring only until sugar dissolves. Meanwhile, as temperature of syrup reaches 250 degrees, very gradually add the syrup to egg whites, beating at high speed with electric mixer. Add vanilla and beat until candy holds its shape, 4-5 minutes. Stir in the chopped nuts or cherries, if desired. Quickly drop candy from a teaspoon onto waxed paper, swirling the top of each piece. Let cool. ; name: royal hot chocolate ; ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, boiling water, salt, vanilla extract, whipped cream, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make royal hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately. ; name: caramel frosting ; ingredients: unsalted butter, powdered sugar, light brown sugar, milk, dark corn syrup, vanilla ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: chocolate marshmallow frosting ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cocoa powder, marshmallow creme, butter, whole milk, vanilla ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: scottish tablet ; ingredients: caster sugar, golden syrup, sweetened condensed milk, unsalted butter, water, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: ranch mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, ranch dressing mix, sour cream, milk, margarine, bacon ; preparation:In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: grilled ranch potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, ranch dressing mix, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in 2 quart casserole dish, cover, and microwave on high 12-15 minutes, or until tender, stirring halfway through. Drain. Mix remaining ingredients, stir in potatoes gently. Cover, refrigerate 1 hour. Drain, reserving salad dressing mixture. Arrange potatoes on skewers. Place on grill over hot coals. Grill, covered for 4 minutes. Turn skewers, brush with reserved mixture, grill 4 minutes longer uncovered to crisp outside, covered if soft outside is preferred. ; name: easy ranch potato salad ; ingredients: hidden valley ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise, water, small red potatoes, bacon, green onion, celery ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: ranch potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, celery, onion, parsley, salt, black pepper, frozen baby peas, dijon-style mustard, ranch salad dressing, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve. ; name: linda s fluffy mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sea salt, cracked pepper, butter, milk, sour cream, eggs ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the sea salt. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mix well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies. ; name: linda s ranch potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: potato corn and tomato salad ; ingredients: frozen corn, boiling potatoes, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil, red onion, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Season with salt ; name: fresh corn and green bean salad ; ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: heirloom tomato salad with garlic oil ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, grape tomatoes, salt and pepper, chives, basil leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover. ; name: barley salad with tomatoes and corn ; ingredients: pearl barley, basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, corn kernels, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature. ; name: summer corn salad ; ingredients: corn, tomatoes, onion, fresh basil, olive oil, white vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: barbecue chicken packets ; ingredients: aluminum foil, chicken breast halves, barbecue sauce, frozen whole kernel corn, green bell pepper ; preparation:Spray one side of each sheet of foil. Lay four pieces of chicken on four sheets. Top with corn and green peppers and bbq sauce. Take other sheets of foil to enclose each to be a packet. Grill until done. Open and eat. ; name: ww bbq chicken packets 5 pts serving ; ingredients: aluminum foil, barbecue sauce, frozen whole kernel corn, green pepper, skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Spray one side of each sheet of foil. Lay four pieces of chicken on four sheets. Top with corn and green peppers and bbq sauce. Take other sheets of foil to enclose each to be a packet. Grill until done. Open and eat. ; name: chip and dip chicken ; ingredients: fryer, salt and pepper, french onion dip, potato chips ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: spicy chicken dippers ; ingredients: chicken breasts, tortilla chips, seasoned flour, eggs, oil ; preparation:Place chicken in a bowl and add other ingredients. Mix well. Heat oil approx 2cm in depth. Drop teaspoonfuls of mixture into the hot oil. Deep fry for a few minutes until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. Serve with cucumber mint dip. ; name: spicy picnic chicken ; ingredients: buttermilk, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Mix breadcrumbs, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, picante sauce. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: cotton bowl chicken with peppers and corn chips ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, green pepper, roasted red peppers, mild green chilies, frito corn chips, colby-monterey jack cheese, pam cooking spray ; preparation:

name: spinach and garlic penne pasta with bacon ; ingredients: penne pasta, fresh spinach, bacon, garlic, butter, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Put the pasta on to boil. While pasta is cooking, mix cottage cheese, cheddar cheese soup, and sour cream together, with a stick blender until creamy. Defrost the chicken and cut up into bite size pieces. Dice the spinach into small bits. Add half a cup of the cheddar cheese and the garlic. By this time the pasta should be done. Drain and add to the mix. Toss it all together, put in a 9x13-inch pan and bake at 350f for about 30 minutes. Some option include adding corn and peas. ; name: pasta with rosemary cream sauce ; ingredients: penne pasta, fresh rosemary, garlic, olive oil, tomato puree, salt and pepper, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, chives, hot pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat 2 tbsp oil in pan. Saute rosemary and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4. ; name: penne with sun dried tomatoes and asiago cheese ; ingredients: dry penne pasta, sun-dried tomatoes, oil, asiago cheese, dried basil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, kosher salt ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Closer to the end of the pasta cooking, heat oil in pan and add garlic. Saut for about 1 minute. Reduce heat to medium-low. Do not brown garlic. Combine sun dried tomatoes, basil, pepper flakes, salt and cheese for about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour oil mixture over pasta and mix. Serve with additional shredded asiago cheese on top. For additional flavour you can add kalamata olives to the pan and saut with sun dried tomatoe mixture. ; name: rice with broccoli and parmesan ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, broccoli florets, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, unsalted butter ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. Drain. Slowly melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and saut until lightly golden. Add chicken broth and bring to boil. Add broccoli, cover, simmer 6 to 8 minutes until broccoli is tender. Place cooked cavatelli in bowl. Add broccoli mixture and toss with parmesan cheese. Serve. ; name: radish penne ; ingredients: radish, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: fish house panko cod fillets ; ingredients: cod, flour, egg, panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, black pepper, dried parsley, pam cooking spray ; preparation:Lay out the flour, beaten egg and panko bread crumbs on three separate plates, or shallow pans. Mix the onion, black pepper and parsley into the panko. Blend well. Dip the seasoned fish in the flour, then egg and then press the fish into the seasoned panko bread crumbs, coating the fish evenly on all sides. Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Place the fish carefully in the baking pan. Spray the top with pam or oil. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: lemon crumb cod fillets ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, butter, lemon, juice of, corn flake crumbs, lemon pepper seasoning, salad supreme dry seasoning, water ; preparation:Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish. ; name: cod fish grilled in foil ; ingredients: cod fish fillet, butter, lemon juice, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, onion ; preparation:Use heavy aluminum foil cut into large squares. Place equal portions of the fish fillets on each piece of foil. In a saucepan, melt butter. Add lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper. Stir to blend well. Pour this mixture over the fish, sprinkle with paprika and top with onion slices. Fold the foil around the fish and seal. Grill for 5 to 7 minutes per side. Fish should flake easily when done. ; name: cod potato casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, bread dressing, cod fish fillets, onion, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: cod puffs ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, all-purpose flour, water, baking powder, lemon wedge, chili sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: mexican skillet eggs and rice ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, spanish rice, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until browned stirring often. When done cut into strips. Place back into skillet and add soup, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas. Bring to a boil. Cover, cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until hot. Top with cheese and serve. ; name: mexican beef cheese and bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: mexican dip ; ingredients: taco seasoning mix, ground beef, refried beans, avocado, cheddar cheese, black olives, chopped tomato, sour cream, salsa, green onion ; preparation:Mix first seven ingredients in a bowl and spread in a 3 quart casserole. Sprinkle with cheddar, then monterey jack. Top with second amount of chili powder. Can chill ahead of time. Bake, uncovered in a 350 oven for 20 minutes or until hot and cheese is melted. ; name: favorite taco casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, taco seasoning, tortilla chips, mexican blend cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, black olives, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: southwestern chorizo quesadillas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, monterey jack pepper cheese, chorizo sausage, scallions, plum tomatoes, jalapeno, white onion, fresh cilantro, coarse salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy. ; name: mexican breakfast tacos ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, onion, corn tortillas, eggs, milk, pepper, salt, monterey jack cheese, hot pepper sauce, salsa ; preparation:

name: barley bake ; ingredients: celery, sliced mushrooms, green onion, garlic clove, butter, barley, fresh cilantro, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute celery, mushrooms, onions and garlic in butter until soft. Add barley and cook until light brown. In a 2 quart buttered casserole combine barley mixture, parsley or cilantro and chicken broth. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes and then uncover and bake for 45 minutes more or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. If necessary, add more broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: toasted barley with mixed veggies ; ingredients: pearl barley, chicken broth, red onion, mushroom, carrot, green bell pepper, dried dill weed, salt, pepper, green onion ; preparation:In a large pot, bring stock to a boil. Add barley and cook on medium heat 40 minutes. Drain and rinse until cool. In a large bowl place all the vegetables, mix in the vinaigrette along with salt and pepper to taste. Combine with the barley. Salad can be prepared up to this point and stored, covered in fridge for 2 days. Sprinkle with toasted nuts just before serving. ; name: chickpea broccoli casserole ; ingredients: chickpeas, onion, carrots, broccoli, chives, breadcrumbs, olive oil, vegetable broth, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: barley casserole ; ingredients: butter, onion, green pepper, garlic, pearl barley, chicken broth, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: stir fried ramen noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, frozen vegetables, water, water chestnuts, soy sauce, beef-flavor ramen noodles ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non ; name: asian chicken noodles with vegetables ; ingredients: cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breast, ground ginger, salt & pepper, water, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, frozen mixed vegetables, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium- ; name: oriental beef noodle toss ; ingredients: ground beef, oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, water, frozen oriental-style vegetables, ground ginger, onion ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, brown ground sirloin or quickly stir fry chicken strips until no longer pink. Use a drop of vegetable is necessary. Remove with a slotted spoon. Season the meat with one of the seasoning packets from the noodles. Set aside. In the same skillet, combine water, vegetables, noodles, ginger and remaining seasoning packet. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and simmer 3 minutes until noodles are tender, stirring occasionally. Return meat to skillet. Stir in green onion. ; name: easy chinese dish ; ingredients: carrots, cabbage, oil, beef-flavor ramen noodles, hamburger, salt and pepper, soy sauce ; preparation:In a large skillet or wok on medium high heat, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce. Cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. ; name: asian ramen cole slaw salad ; ingredients: oil, cider vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, sunflower seeds, toasted sliced almonds, green onions, coleslaw ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients and half of the ramen flavoring packet. Refrigerate. Crush ramen noodles and mix with sunflower seeds and almonds. Mix chopped green onions with slaw mixture. Stir all ingredients together just before serving. ; name: oriental ramen one dish meal ; ingredients: oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, hamburger, onion, frozen mixed vegetables, water ; preparation:

name: baked cauliflower ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, olive oil, frozen cauliflower, salt, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: cauliflower cheese bake ; ingredients: cauliflower, cream of celery soup, milk, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: fried cauliflower ; ingredients: egg, plain breadcrumbs, cauliflower florets, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, parsley sprig ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: zippy cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, low-fat margarine, all-purpose flour, red pepper, salt, pepper, skim milk, low-fat cheddar cheese, green chilies, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: baked cauliflower mountain fashion ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, swiss cheese, light cream, egg yolks, nutmeg, salt, pepper, head cauliflower, butter, salt water ; preparation:

name: asparagus with country ham and egg gravy ; ingredients: asparagus, country ham, unsalted butter, unbleached all-purpose flour, whole milk, hard-boiled eggs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh dill ; preparation:In large skillet, melt butter, stir in flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk, cook until bubbly. Add cheese, salt and pepper, mix well. Remove from heat. Put 3 pieces asparagus on each ham slice. Roll up and place in 13x9 baking pan. Cover with the cheese sauce. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. ; name: ham asparagus pie ; ingredients: crescent rolls, ham, asparagus spears, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Spray a pie plate with vegetable spray. Press rolls out evenly into a 9-inch pie plate. Combine all remaining ingredients and pour into crust. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes before cutting. ; name: capellini with ham and asparagus ; ingredients: ham, olive oil, capellini, asparagus, chicken broth, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the asparagus in boiling water until just tender. Drain, setting aside some of the cooking water. Cool and slice on the diagonal. Heat the butter and olive oil in a frying pan, before adding the onion. Saut until soft and then add the ham, cooking for a further minute. Add the asparagus and a ladle full of the cooking water. Simmer until most of the water has evaporated. Set aside while cooking the pasta in a separate pot, until al dente. When the pasta is nearly ready, reheat the sauce and add the cream, parsley, salt and pepper. Simmer for five minutes or until reduced by half. Drain the pasta and toss with the sauce. Sprinkle parmesan on top. ; name: asparagus and mushroom saute with cilantro ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, mushrooms, shallots, salt, fresh ground black pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan. ; name: asparagus with serrano ham ; ingredients: spanish olive oil, serrano ham, asparagus spears, pepper ; preparation:

name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: the ultimate chocolate chip cookies soft and chewy ; ingredients: flour, butter, milk, vanilla, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, baking powder, salt, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat flour, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: chocolate chip cookies from cooking light ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, sugar, butter, vanilla, egg whites, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: honey chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, honey, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: super chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, hot water, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: chocolate chip eggnog muffins ; ingredients: flour, chocolate chips, baking powder, ground nutmeg, salt, sugar, eggs, eggnog, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add flour mixture to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack. ; name: raspberry chocolate muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, fat free raspberry yogurt, skim milk, canola oil, raspberries, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut almond paste into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of almond paste. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: moist banana chocolate chip muffins ; ingredients: soy margarine, sugar, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, vanilla extract, mashed bananas, dark chocolate chips, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: chocolate chip cookie cupcakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, light brown sugar, unsalted butter, vanilla, egg, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat until well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks. ; name: chocolate chip marshmallow muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, granulated sugar, milk, marshmallows, eggs, canola oil, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: baked chicken breasts with horseradish cream sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, horseradish, sour cream, sugar, dijon mustard, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with horseradish cream sauce. Wrap each breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired. ; name: baked chicken and dressing ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, mozzarella cheese, water, cream of chicken soup, chicken stuffing mix, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: baked buffalo thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, vegetable oil, hot sauce, margarine, water, white vinegar, pepper, cooking spray, blue cheese ; preparation:Coat a non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Add oil. Place over medium-high heat until hot. Add chicken. Cook 4 minutes on each side. Transfer to an 11x7 baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine hot sauce and next four ingredients. Pour over chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 400 for 25 minutes. Serve with blue cheese dressing. ; name: blue cheese stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: butter, blue cheese, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lemon juice, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone. ; name: baked buffalo chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, hot sauce, vinegar, margarine, celery seed, pepper, fat free blue cheese dressing ; preparation:

name: bite sized cherry cheesecakes ; ingredients: vanilla wafer cookies, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake. ; name: vanilla cream wafers ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, lemon rind, cake flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray an 8-inch square metal baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, whole milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, white vinegar. Add in milk, oil, and vanilla to the flour mixture and stir until just blended. Whisk in vinegar until just blended. Immediately pour batter into pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a pick comes out clean. Let cool completely in pan on a wire rack. Can eat as is, or dust with powdered sugar or top with frosting. ; name: cinnamon cheese coffee cake ; ingredients: crescent rolls, vanilla, sugar, egg yolk, cream cheese, cinnamon, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: cheese muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cheddar cheese, plain yogurt, butter, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: coffee cheesecakes ; ingredients: vanilla wafers, butter, sugar, egg white, cream cheese, coffee liqueur ; preparation:

name: pesto marsala style ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic clove, basil, pecorino cheese, almonds, olive oil, oregano, salt and pepper, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Chop garlic, basil and the pecorino or provola cheese. Place in a bowl, add the diced tomato and mix in the olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper and the crushed red pepper. It can be refrigerated overnight but it is preferable to use it the same day that it is made. To make this sauce for 1 lb. Of pasta, use 2 cups of tomato and double the amount of the other ingredients. Drizzle some olive oil on top of each dish of pasta and sprinkle with some toasted breadcrumbs for a true sicilian touch. ; name: basil pesto lighter version ; ingredients: pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Add nuts and garlic to blender and pulse until minced. Add olive oil, pulse a few time more. Add basil leaves, cheese, salt and blend until smooth. Scrape sides of blender as you go to make sure everthing mixes well. Serve with your favorite pasta. ; name: kittencal s perfect pesto ; ingredients: fresh basil leaves, olive oil, pine nuts, fresh garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Put the pesto into a bowl and mix in the olive oil, garlic and pine nuts. Slowly add the olive oil in a constant stream while the food processor is on. Stop to scrape down the sides of the food processor with a rubber spatula. Add the grated parmeasn cheese and lemon juice. Pulse again until blended. Add salt and freshly ground black pepper. Store pesto in a jar or airtight container in the refrigerator for about a week, or in the freezer for about six months. Keep it looking fresh and green by covering the top with a thin layer of olive oil or with a sheet of plastic wrap directly on its surface. This will keep it from oxidizing and turning brown. If your pesto darkens in color, it will still taste good. I freeze it by dropping tablespoons of it on a parchment paper, freezing it and storing in a zip lock bag in the freezer. ; name: mom s pesto ; ingredients: fresh basil leaves, walnuts, parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, virgin olive oil ; preparation:Combine the basil, garlic, walnuts, parmesan cheese, garlic and olive oil in a bowl and mix well. Arrange the baguette slices in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Broil the slices until light brown. Turn the slices and spread with the mayonnaise mixture. Return to under the broiler and broil until light brown and heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: basic almond pesto ; ingredients: garlic cloves, blanched almonds, basil leaves, pecorino cheese, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: italian turnip soup mellowed with rice ; ingredients: unsalted butter, olive oil, turnip, chicken broth, long-grain rice, salt and pepper, fresh italian parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the chopped onion and garlic and saute for about 3 - 4 minutes. To the skillet, add the cooked drained potato and turnip cubes. Add the salt and pepper. Continue to cook and stir until potatoes and turnips are lightly browned, adjusting heat as necessary. When done, sprinkle with the parsley and serve. ; name: sweet potato bacon and onion soup ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, rindless bacon, onions, extra virgin olive oil, bay leaves, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt & pepper ; preparation:Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve. ; name: 25 clove garlic soup ; ingredients: garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche ; preparation:Heat oil in a pot and saute garlic until golden brown. Add garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche. Stir, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Add more water if soup appears too thick. Stir in cheese and serve. ; name: carrot potato soup ; ingredients: margarine, onions, garlic, chicken broth, carrots, potatoes, italian seasoning, bay leaf, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large heavy pot. Add the margarine, onions, garlic, chicken broth, carrots, potatoes, italian seasoning, bay leaf, salt and pepper and cook, covered, for 10 minutes or so, until the vegetables are soft but still with some bite. Pour in the stock, bring to the boil and then simmer, covered, for 30 minutes or so, until the vegetables are tender. Pour into a blender and whizz until smooth - do this in batches if you need to. Return to the pan and gently reheat. Season if desired and either stir in the chilli oil or serve garnished with a few drops of the oil. ; name: turnip honey roasted garlic soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrots, potatoes, turnips, celery rib, chicken stock, garlic cloves, honey, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: new mexico spanish rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, long grain rice, onions, green bell pepper, celery ribs, crushed tomatoes, ground cumin, garlic cloves, salt, reduced-sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add butter, onion, and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 to 4 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. ; name: rice with sausage to have with barbecued chicken spanish style ; ingredients: sausages, onions, cooked white rice, frozen peas, tomatoes ; preparation:In a large saucepan saute onion and celery in 1 teaspoon oil. Mix in carrots and sausage. Place uncooked rice in bottom of a 9 x 9 or 3 quart baking dish. Place sausage mixture in baking dish on top of uncooked rice. In a medium size bowl mix soup, chicken broth, water, dry ranch mix and salt. Pour over sausage mixture and cover with foil. Bake in a 350 degree oven for approximately 50 minutes. ; name: low fat spanish rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, instant rice, onion, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin, pepper, salt, whole tomatoes, tomato juice ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, combine rice mix, special seasonings, water, chicken, beans, tomatoes, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin, pepper, salt, whole tomatoes, tomato juice. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring occasionally. Top with cheese, sour cream and cilantro if desired. ; name: leftover rice made into spanish rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, olive oil, butter, onion, minced garlic cloves, tomato sauce, water, coriander, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: cilantro and lime rice ; ingredients: olive oil, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, lime, juice and zest of, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water, butter, salt, and cumin to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook, covered, until liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat. Add lime juice and cilantro. Fluff with a fork until combined. Serve immediately. ; name: carolina style spanish rice ; ingredients: uncooked rice, wesson oil, onion, green pepper, celery, canned tomatoes, cubed ham ; preparation:

name: swiss and bacon salad ; ingredients: reduced-fat mayonnaise, sugar, turkey bacon, iceberg lettuce, romaine lettuce, low-fat swiss cheese, red onion ; preparation:Cover bacon with paper towel and microwave 2-3 minutes to crisp. Cool. Rinse bacon and cauliflower. Drain well. Break or chop florets into bite sized pieces. Place florets in bowl. Add celery and onion to the other vegetables. In bowl mix sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, and salt. Pour dressing over vegetables. Crumble bacon over the top. Toss to mix well. Serve at once, or refrigerate up to 24 hours before serving. ; name: b l t salad ; ingredients: fat-free buttermilk, fat-free mayonnaise, fat free sour cream, dried basil, dried oregano, fresh parsley, garlic powder, lettuce, bacon, tomatoes ; preparation:Blend together buttermilk, mayonnaise, sour cream, and spices. Refrigerate for 1-2 hours. Stir occasionally. Fry bacon crisp, drain and crumble in small pieces. Tear lettuce into bite size pieces. Combine lettuce, tomato and bacon. Toss with dressing about 1 hour before serving. Refrigerate leftovers promptly. ; name: blt fried egg and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: bacon, monterey jack cheese, white bread, mayonnaise, tomatoes, butter lettuce, unsalted butter, egg ; preparation:Slice the sandwich in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: turkey burgers with spinach and sun dried tomato ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, frozen spinach, sun-dried tomato, provolone cheese, granulated garlic, italian seasoned breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: inside out blt s ; ingredients: bacon, romaine lettuce, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, olive oil, plum tomatoes, ground black pepper, light mayonnaise ; preparation:Spray a large, flat skillet with cooking spray. Drop one tortilla in and fill with lots of cheese. Sprinkle bacon pieces over cheese. Top with another tortilla. Flip over when bottom tortilla is golden brown. Cook until cheese is melted. Slide onto a plate and cut into wedges with a pizza wheel cutter. Slather each piece with mayonnaise and top with a thick slice of tomato. Sprinkle with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve. Cooking time does not include cooking time for the bacon. ; name: b l t ; ingredients: turkey bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, fat-free bread, reduced-fat mayonnaise ; preparation:

name: rye popovers ; ingredients: rye flour, unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, milk, butter, eggs ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Combine the flours with the salt in a medium bowl. Add the milk, butter and eggs and whisk to combine thoroughly. Pour into well-greased muffin cups or a popover pan. Bake at 450 for 20 minutes, turn oven to 350 degrees and bake 15 minutes longer. ; name: rye bread soup ; ingredients: rye bread, water, salt, caraway seed, sour cream, egg yolk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: bavarian goulash ; ingredients: pork steaks, olive oil, yellow onion, sauerkraut, caraway seed, sour cream ; preparation:In large pot brown pork steaks in the olive oil, adding sliced onion after steaks are braised to caramelize onions. Add can of sauerkraut and caraway seed. Allow to simmer for 4-5 hours, adding water if liquid simmers off. Remove any bone after meat has boiled off. 10-15 minutes prior to serving add sour cream. Serve over spetzle or egg noodles. Also, just fine with plain old mashed potatoes on the side. ; name: teen s favorite goulash ; ingredients: onion, lean ground beef, salt, pepper, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, baked beans, tomato sauce, tomato paste ; preparation:Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: boston brown bread new england ; ingredients: rye flour, cornmeal, baking soda, salt, dark molasses, milk, egg, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: go bears party ryes ; ingredients: ground chuck, bulk pork sausage, velveeta cheese, worcestershire sauce, oregano, garlic powder, ground pepper, rye cocktail bread ; preparation:

name: herbed carrots and zucchini ; ingredients: carrot, zucchini, lemon juice, dried basil, onion powder, butter, pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: herbed veggie medley ; ingredients: butter, garlic, carrots, salt, lemon pepper, zucchini, crookneck yellow squash, red bell pepper, green onion, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: garlic lime zucchini ; ingredients: zucchini, salt, vegetable broth, garlic cloves, fresh lime juice, black pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: zucchini carrot saute ; ingredients: zucchini, carrots, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place carrots in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: minted zucchini and carrots ; ingredients: carrots, chicken broth, zucchini, salt, pepper, of fresh mint ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: carrots zucchini and basil ; ingredients: zucchini, carrots, scallions, extra virgin olive oil, water, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon juice, fresh basil leaves, chives ; preparation:

name: roasted fish with tomatoes ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, plum tomatoes, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Brush a baking sheet with oil. Lay the fish on the baking sheet in a single layer. Brush with 1 t of oil and season with salt and pepper. Combine the tomatoes and garlic in a small bowl. Stir in the remaining t oil. Season with salt and pepper. Broil the fish for 4 minutes. Turn over with a spatula, top with the tomato mixture, and continue to broil for another 4 to 5 minutes. Check doneness by inserting a knife between layers of the flesh. The meat should be just translucent. Spoon pan juices back over the fish and serve with lemon wedges. ; name: fresh tomato basil baked fish ; ingredients: white fish fillet, tomato sauce, breadcrumbs, scallion, fresh basil leaf, tomatoes, fish seasoning, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and set aside. Add fish fillet, tomato sauce, breadcrumbs, scallion, fresh basil leaf, tomatoes, fish seasoning, salt & freshly ground black pepper, and toss well. May be served hot. ; name: barbecued fish with crisp potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, fish fillets, olive oil, salt and black pepper, tomatoes, green onions, garlic cloves, capers, basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat potatoes evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Bake at 325 degrees f. until done, about 20 minutes. ; name: baked fish with spices ; ingredients: white fish fillets, onion, garlic, fresh ginger, fresh lemon rind, tamarind paste, light soy sauce, peanut oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: baked caught fish ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, onion salt, pepper, butter, cod, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f until done, about 20 minutes. ; name: oven baked fish with roasted tomato slices ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, orange rind, olive oil, garlic, green chilies, fresh thyme leave, white fish fillets, salt & freshly ground black pepper, basil leaves ; preparation:

name: sausage balls with apples and craisins ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, baking mix, granny smith apples, craisins, raisins, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange sausage balls in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f. ; name: crock pot pork loin chops with apples ; ingredients: pork loin chops, chicken broth, apple pie filling, lemon juice, chicken bouillon granule, cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours. ; name: chicken and apple sausage ; ingredients: granny smith apple, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, ground chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180dc. Heat oil in a heavy based pan, add onions, apples and ginger and cook until soft. Add mustard seeds and water and cook for 15 minutes. Remove mixture to warmed ovenproof dish. Deglaze pan with cider and add to onion mixture. Fry sausages in pan until browned. Drain and add to onion mixture. Bake in oven, uncovered for 25-30 mins. Serve with mashed potatoes. ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: red cabbage cranberry and apple slaw ; ingredients: red cabbage, dried cranberries, rice vinegar, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, granny smith apples, pecans ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Combine salad ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture and toss well to coat. Allow salad to chill for at least 20 minutes before serving. Salad may not require all of the dressing. ; name: polish sausage and apples crock pot ; ingredients: canned sauerkraut, polish sausage, tart cooking apples, brown sugar, salt, pepper, caraway seed, apple juice ; preparation:

name: microwave no bake oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, milk, cocoa, vanilla, peanut butter, quick oats ; preparation:In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes. ; name: no bake chocolate oatmeal nut cookies ; ingredients: milk, sugar, margarine, peanut butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, quick-cooking oatmeal, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, salt, butter and milk. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. ; name: unbaked chocolate chip oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, milk, butter, cocoa, vanilla, chunky peanut butter, quick oats ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add chocolate chips and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: peanut butter no bake cookies ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, milk, peanut butter, vanilla, rolled oats ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, margarine, milk and peanut butter. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. ; name: oatmeal drop cookies ; ingredients: margarine, milk, granulated sugar, cocoa, peanut butter, vanilla, oatmeal ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: microwave no bake chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, butter, old fashioned oats, creamy peanut butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: garlic and herb marinated artichokes ; ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh dill, fresh italian parsley, fresh basil, lemon juice, artichokes, red capsicum ; preparation:Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and herb marinated artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute garlic and herb marinated artichokes 3-5 minutes, add remaining ingredients and lower heat to medium low. Simmer about 10 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: marinated hearts of palm salad ; ingredients: garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, hearts of palm, artichoke hearts, grape tomatoes, fresh parsley, mesclun ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add the arugula, frisee and the beet cut outs and toss. Add the chives and toss. Add the ; name: lemon and olive oil dressing ; ingredients: sea salt, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, lemon, zest of ; preparation:In a large skillet combine olive oil and butter over medium heat. Add garlic, pepper and the lemon zest. Salt water when it boils then cook cappellini to al dente, 2 to 3 minutes. Add a ladle of cooking water to lemon pepper butter and stir in the lemon juice. Drain pasta and toss with lemon-pepper butter and salt, to taste. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course. ; name: ask marinated broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, cider vinegar, sugar, dill weed, accent seasoning, salt, pepper, garlic salt, oil ; preparation:Wash and cut broccoli into flowerettes. Place in shallow dish. Mix other ingredients and spoon over broccoli. So all areas are coated. Cover tightly and refrigerate overnight,. Stirring occasionally. Drain off marinade and serve. ; name: garlic herb sauce ; ingredients: light butter, skim milk, flour, garlic salt, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set heat on stove to low. In a saucepan, melt butter, then add a tablespoon of flour. Add milk, garlic salt, parsley, then stir. Allow to heat thoroughly and start to bubble. Add the other tablespoon of flour, then stir until thickened. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: honey marinated garlic cloves ; ingredients: garlic, water, vinegar, salt, honey, olive oil, lemon, pink peppercorns ; preparation:

name: karo pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, dark karo syrup, butter, salt, vanilla, pecans, whole pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375, parbake pie shell until golden. In a saucepan, bring the corn syrup, sugar and salt to a boil over high heat until the sugar dissolves. Very slowly, pour in a thin stream into the beaten eggs while stirring vigorously. Add the vanilla, margarine and pecans to the mixture and pour into prepared pie shell. Bake for 50 minutes or until puffed. ; name: texas pecan pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell ; preparation:Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for about 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top. ; name: pecan pie with kahlua and chocolate chips ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, corn syrup, kahlua, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, deep dish pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f and grease a large baking tin, approximately 9 x 12 inches. Melt the butter or margarine over low heat in a small saucepan. Add the flour and stir until smooth. Add the vanilla, sugar and eggs and stir constantly for 5 or so minute. Remove from heat and stir in nuts. Set aside. Mix brownie ingredients together in a large bowl. Spread into baking pan. Spread topping over. Bake for 35-40 minute be careful not to overbake. Cool and cut into bars. ; name: pecan pie brittle ; ingredients: sugar, pecans, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, baking soda, kosher salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: burnt butter pecan pie ; ingredients: butter, light karo syrup, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, salt, pecans, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:

name: another shrimp scampi ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, shrimp, salt, lemon juice, dry white wine, butter, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: scampi style shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic cloves, lemon peel, green onion, lemon juice, salt, dried parsley, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: california scampi ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, white wine, salt and pepper, lemon, juice of, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: famous red lobster shrimp scampi ; ingredients: medium shrimp, pure olive oil, garlic, white wine, fresh lemon, italian seasoning, butter, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat cast iron skillet and add olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until tender and no longer translucent, reduce heat. Remove shrimp and set aside. Add garlic and cook 2-3 minutes. Do not allow garlic to brown - it will make it bitter. Add white wine, and lemon juice. Cook until wine is reduced by half. After it is reduced, add italian seasoning. Reduce heat to low, and add butter. If pan is too hot, the butter will separate. Add shrimp back into sauce, add parsley, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: creamy basque shrimp scampi ; ingredients: shrimp, flour, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, white wine, butter, lemon, juice of, heavy cream, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: soft crust sourdough bread ; ingredients: sourdough starter, milk, sugar, salt, oil, flour ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing. ; name: sour cream bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, sour cream, bread flour, light brown sugar, gluten, salt, fast rising yeast ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing. ; name: honey wheat sunflower and raisin bread bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, honey, butter, white flour, whole wheat flour, dry milk, salt, yeast, sunflower seeds, raisins ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: wholesome homemade honey whole wheat bread ; ingredients: yeast, water, butter, molasses, honey, salt, whole wheat flour, white flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: multigrain sourdough bread ; ingredients: sourdough starter, butter, milk, salt, honey, sunflower seeds, millet, multi-grain flour ; preparation:

name: nicole s italian ricotta cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, whole milk ricotta cheese, sour cream, eggs, vanilla, anise, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days. ; name: ricotta pound cake ; ingredients: cake flour, baking powder, kosher salt, unsalted butter, whole milk ricotta cheese, granulated sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups.
