Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days. ; name: polenta ricotta cake ; ingredients: currants, sultana, madeira wine, ricotta cheese, sugar, polenta, milk, orange, rind of, orange juice ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, cream margarine, sugar and vanilla essence with electric beater. Add eggs and egg whites, one at a time, continue beating between additions. Blend in yoghurt, polenta, coconut, orange rind and orange juice. Beat well for further 2 minutes. Pour into greased ring pan. Bake in a moderately slow oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until cooked when tested and golden brown. ; name: mini honey cheesecakes ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, caster sugar, honey, eggs, ground cinnamon, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake. ; name: italian love cake ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla, instant chocolate pudding mix, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, fudge marble cake mix ; preparation:

name: monica s potatos with pepperoni pasta 5fix ; ingredients: simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, pepperoni, bow tie pasta, szechwan chili sauce, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: loaded mashed potato cakes 5fix ; ingredients: simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, egg, sharp cheddar cheese, bacon, panko breadcrumbs ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the mashed potatoes, egg, cheese and bacon. Shape mixture into 8 patties. Roll in bread crumbs. Place on broiler pan. Broil for 10 minutes or until delicately browned. ; name: baked italian mashed potato casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, butter, milk, salt and black pepper, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: mexican mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, diced tomatoes, onion, hot chili sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tomatoes, onion, chile sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir in potatoes and cook until heated through. Spoon potato mixture into a 2 quart casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Serve when the cheese has melted. ; name: potato and ricotta ravioli 5fix ; ingredients: egg roll wraps, simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, ricotta cheese, chives, garlic ; preparation:

name: peking beef ; ingredients: stir-fry beef, peanut oil, hoisin sauce, five-spice powder, honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, sesame oil, dry sherry, cornflour ; preparation:In a wok or skillet, heat oon sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add chopped onion, chopped garlic cloves and a peeled and minced ginger. Stir-fry for a minute or so until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped bird chili pepper, water and soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry just until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped ; name: beef and garlic ; ingredients: beef sirloin, garlic cloves, vegetable oil cooking spray, green onions, bok choy, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, low-fat beef broth, tomatoes, salt & pepper ; preparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: hawaiian fried rice ; ingredients: ground beef, carrots, celery, yellow onion, water, soy sauce, cooked rice ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the hawaiian rice in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: beef steak ; ingredients: steaks, lemon juice, soy sauce, water, garlic, ginger, flour, ground black pepper, onion, corn oil ; preparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: orange beef and rice ; ingredients: oil, top round beef, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, carrot, rice pilaf mix, orange juice, beef broth ; preparation:Briefly heat oil in large, deep pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed. ; name: chinese beef and greens ; ingredients: cornflour, dark soya sauce, sweet chili sauce, stock, beef steaks, bok choy, onion ; preparation:

name: grilled corn with cumin and lime ; ingredients: butter, ground cumin, lime juice, corn on the cob, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add corn before oil smokes and saute 2-3 minutes until lightly browned. Place corn in a mixing bowl and set aside. Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cumin and cook another 1-2 minutes. Turn heat to low, stir in remaining ingredients. Toss with corn and serve. ; name: chili corn on the cob ; ingredients: fresh corn, butter, chili powder, hot pepper sauce, salt ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with ice cubes. Center corn inside 1 reynolds hot bag, large size. Double fold ends to form packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Grill 15-20 minutes, covered, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Cut open top of foil bag, carefully, using a sharp knife. Allow steam to escape, fold back foil. ; name: corn couscous ; ingredients: couscous, chicken stock powder, boiling water, butter, spring onions, corn, parsley ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add couscous, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: grilled corn with hoisin orange butter ; ingredients: butter, hoisin sauce, orange peel, chili-garlic sauce, white corn, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium high heat, and place corn on grill rack coated with cooking spray, cover and grill for 10 minutes, or until lightly charred, turning occasionally. Place corn on serving plate and brush with hoisin orange butter. ; name: southwest sauteed corn ; ingredients: frozen corn, butter, plum tomato, lime juice, salt, ground cumin, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add corn before oil smokes and saute 2-3 minutes until lightly browned. Place corn in a mixing bowl and set aside. Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cumin and cook another 1-2 minutes. Turn heat to low, stir in remaining ingredients. Toss with corn and serve. ; name: north african grilled corn on the cob ; ingredients: ground cumin, ground coriander, dried oregano, ground ginger, salt, ground cinnamon, black pepper, clove, corn, butter ; preparation:

name: soy sauce and honey marinated chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, honey, spring onions, garlic, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, vegetable oil, walnut oil, port wine ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic and ginger with chicken breasts and allow to marinate. Pour rice and broth into rice cooker. Cover with lid and press brown rice setting. Allow to cook for 1 hour. Place chicken breasts and marinade on foil sprayed with nonstick cooking spray, top with slivered onion and make packet. Place vegetables in seperate foil packet. Carefully open lid of cooker and place steam tray into the rice cooker. Place chicken packet in tray. Close the lid and steam for 10 minutes then open lid again and place vegetables in allow to steam till cooker changes to keep warm. Carefully check chicken for doneness and using oven mitts carefully remove steam tray from the rice cooker and serve immediately. ; name: easy bbq chicken marinade ; ingredients: apple cider vinegar, barbecue sauce, soy sauce, honey, steak sauce, garlic, cayenne ; preparation:Combine apple cider vinegar, barbecue sauce, soy sauce, honey, steak sauce, garlic, cayenne, tandoori paste, and sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected meat and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected meat to doneness. ; name: bill knapp s honey ginger chicken marinade ; ingredients: honey, apple juice, garlic, ground ginger, soy sauce, cider vinegar, vegetable oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: fantastic marinade for grilled shrimp ; ingredients: olive oil, tomato sauce, red wine vinegar, black pepper, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, fresh cilantro, fresh garlic cloves, hot sauce, shrimp ; preparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, onion, garlic, lime and lemon juices, cayenne, tandoori paste, and sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected meat and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected meat to doneness. ; name: wonderful chicken marinade ; ingredients: honey, apple juice, garlic, soy sauce, cider vinegar, vegetable oil, black pepper ; preparation:

name: herbed peas ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, frozen peas, salt, pepper, dried marjoram, water ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet on med, add onions, cook until soft. Add celery, cook until crisp tender. Increase heat to med hi, add peas. Cook until peas are heated through. Stir in celery leaves, salt and pepper. ; name: creamed peas and carrots ; ingredients: carrots, fresh peas, butter, flour, salt, pepper, milk, paprika ; preparation:In a saucepan, bring water to a boil, add peas and. Cook 5 minutes or until peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Puree the peas in your food processor add 5 tbsp of the reserved water and the butter return to saucepan and stir in the orange peel& rosemary heat through. Meanwhile immerse the peas in boiling water and blanch for apprx 5 minutes or until the peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Meanwhile immerse the peas in boiling water and bl ; name: peas please ; ingredients: condensed cheddar cheese soup, sherry wine, frozen baby peas, sliced water chestnuts, green onion, bacon, herb seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: garden herb and onion frittata ; ingredients: eggs, herbs, whole milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, unsalted butter, onion, extra-dry vermouth, tomatoes ; preparation:Heat 2 t olive oil in a skillet that you can eventually place under the broiler. Add onion to skillet and cook until soft, about 4 minutes. Add 1 t olive oil and heat. Add eggs seasoned with salt, pepper, parsley and cheese. Cook until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Gently place the rounds of tomato on the egg mixture. Cover and cook over low heat until bottom of frittata firms, about 5 minutes. Finish by placing under preheated broiler for a minute or two until lightly browned. Cut into triangles. ; name: pea halloumi fritters ; ingredients: peas, cornstarch, plain flour, baking powder, milk, eggs, halloumi cheese, mint ; preparation:

name: delicious chicken garlic pizza ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast half, butter, garlic cloves, green onions, dried basil, pizza dough, roma tomatoes, fresh cilantro, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: garlic pizza sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, water, tomato paste, dried basil, dried oregano, dried parsley, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: moist and juicy garlic chicken ; ingredients: butter, garlic, parsley, garlic powder, italian breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: stuffed pizza bites ; ingredients: pizza dough, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, olive oil, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: garlic chicken pizza ; ingredients: light cream cheese, nonfat sour cream, garlic, chicken, red onion, tomatoes, mushroom, mozzarella cheese, pizza dough, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: cherry tea ; ingredients: orange drink mix, sugar, unsweetened instant tea, lemonade mix, cherry drink mix, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Boil water in a large saucepan over high heat. When water comes to a rapid boil, turn off heat, put the tea bags into water and cover. After the tea has steeped about 1 hour, pour the sugar into a 2-quart pitcher, then add tea. The tea should still be warm so the sugar will dissolve easily. Add lemon juice. Chill. Makes 2 quarts. ; name: orange blossom ; ingredients: oranges, almond syrup, gin, pink grapefruit juice, angostura bitters ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: citrusade citrus ade ; ingredients: lemons, limes, oranges, water, sugar ; preparation:In a pitcher, blend water and sugar until the sugar dissolves. Add orange blossom water, blood orange juice and lemon juice. Stir. Add what remains of one lemon and one blood orange. Let chill for 30 minutes. Serve over ice. ; name: orange lemon grapefruit marmalade ; ingredients: oranges, lemons, grapefruits, water, sugar ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. ; name: citrus coolers ; ingredients: water, sugar, fresh lime juice, fresh orange juice, ice ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place the lemon, lemon juice and sugar mixture into a blender and process for 1 minute or until blended. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes. ; name: orangeade new zealand style ; ingredients: lemon, oranges, honey, powdered ginger, cinnamon, cloves, ice, water ; preparation:

name: awesome brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprout, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean sprouts by peeling off any dark, dry, and discolored leaves. Cut off the stubby bottom stem. Rinse in cold water. While wet microwave on high for about 3 minutes, till fork tender. In fring pan on medium heat, add butter and sprouts. Turn every couple of minutes until the sprouts are mostly browned. Can even look a little burned. Add salt, pepper and serve. ; name: brussels sprouts and potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, brussels sprouts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, fresh oregano, salt substitute, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: gingered brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, water, low sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, minced garlic cloves, splenda granular, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold. ; name: pan roasted brussels sprouts with potatoes ww ; ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, brussels sprouts, garlic cloves, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the potatoes and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the potatoes evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: brussels sprouts with garlic and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, brussels sprout, lemon pepper, sea salt, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: brussels sprouts flash curried ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, vegetable oil, salt, garam masala powder ; preparation:

name: chili citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, jalapeno jelly ; preparation:In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken. ; name: pineapple mandarin ginger chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, skinless chicken breast halves, pepper, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, cornstarch, green onion, brown sugar, fresh ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: chicken with orange juice and fresh herbs ; ingredients: chicken breasts, orange juice, honey, dry sherry, lemon juice, fresh herbs, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve. ; name: rotisserie chicken with fire ice salsa ; ingredients: watermelon, strawberry, red onion, jalapeno peppers, of fresh mint, olive oil, lime juice, sugar, chicken ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season both sides of chicken with some salt& pepper and some cinnamon to taste. Saute chicken in oil about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink inside- but still moist. Spoon pineapple mixture over each serving and serve immediately. If you prefer, you may instead grill chicken. ; name: grilled chicken breasts with mandarin orange salsa ; ingredients: mandarin oranges, pineapple in juice, fresh lemon juice, jalapeno pepper, salt, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, black pepper, ground cayenne pepper ; preparation:

name: salsa sour cream chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, taco seasoning mix, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4. ; name: baked salsa chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, fat-free cheddar cheese, nonfat sour cream, pepper, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, green onions ; preparation:Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using. ; name: salsa chicken burrito filling ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, tomato sauce, salsa, taco seasoning mix, ground cumin, garlic cloves, chili powder, hot sauce ; preparation:Saute onion in a large skillet adding garlic and cilantro during the last minute or two. Add meat and seasonings and stir well. Allow to saute for a minute or two, letting the meat absorb some of the flavors. When it seems that it is really dry and the mixture is starting to stick add the tomatoes and liquid and scrape all the browned bits from the bottom. Tons of flavor there. Add sugar if using. Reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or so. When you are ready to use the mixture return heat to high and cook off almost all the liquid so that your filling is not runny or wet. Use to fill tortillas or in a casserole. ; name: salsa crock pot chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, taco seasoning mix, cream of chicken soup, salsa, black beans, sour cream, corn ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa crock pot chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4. ; name: salsa ranch chicken ; ingredients: chicken legs, ranch dressing, salsa, sour cream, bacon, cumin, chili powder ; preparation:

name: berry cream dessert ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, cold water, strawberry yogurt, raspberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, combine strawberry and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until strawberry is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top. ; name: mascarpone dessert with raspberry puree ; ingredients: fresh raspberry, mascarpone cheese, sugar, vanilla essence ; preparation:Combine mascarpone, powdered sugar, and raspberry essence in a medium bowl. Beat until creamy. Spread mixture evenly onto crust. Chill thoroughly in the refridgerator for at least 1 hour. Arrange sliced fruit over pie before serving. ; name: icebox cherry dessert ; ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cherry pie filling, cool whip ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spread on top of cake. Top cake with strawberries. Be careful to not put too much of the juice on the cake, or else it will be too moist. Refrigerate for an hour. ; name: bavarian strawberry cream pie ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, cold water, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large bowl, crush strawberries and add sugar. Let stand 30 minutes. Pour cold water in a bowl and add the unflavored gelatin to the top. Let stand 5 minutes. Add boiling water to dissolve the gelatin. Stir. Stir in the the strawberries and add fresh lemon juice. Chill the gelatin until it is the thickness of unbeaten egg whites. Whip the cream until firm peaks form. Gently fold into strawberry mixture. Pour into pie crust and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. ; name: chocolate raspberry trifle ; ingredients: skim milk, chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, whipped topping, brownie, raspberries ; preparation:Pour milk into large bowl. Add dry pudding mixes. Beat with wire whisk until well blended. Gently stir in 1 cup of the whipped topping. Place half of the brownie cubes in 2-quart serving bowl. Top with half of the pudding mixture, half of the raspberries, and half of the remaining whipped topping. Repeat all layers. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. ; name: blushing maid german raspberry dessert ; ingredients: raspberries, pumpernickel bread, dark chocolate, chambord raspberry liquor, cherry juice, whipping cream, yoghurt, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:

name: green beans and bacon ; ingredients: bacon, onion, frozen green beans, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry the bacon in a large cast-iron skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels, leaving the fat in the pan. Add the onion and cook until golden and tender, then add the flour and stir, cooking for about 1 minute. Add the sugar, salt, pepper, bean liquid or water, and vinegar, stir, and bring to a rolling boil. Allow to boil for about 3 minutes to thicken the sauce. Add the bacon bits at this time. Add the green beans and cook until heated through, about 7--8 minutes. Transfer the beans and sauce to a serving bowl and top with crumbled bacon. ; name: simple yet elegant fresh green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, tomatoes, garlic clove, onion, butter, water, salt & pepper, seasoning salt, slivered almonds ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: fancy tasting green beans ; ingredients: green beans, water, green peppers, green onions, garlic, bacon bits, soy sauce, accent seasoning ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with bacon and red bell pepper ; ingredients: bacon, green beans, red bell pepper, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Cook green beans according to package directions, using the lowest time given. In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally. ; name: green beans with garlic butter and almonds ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, brown sugar, soy sauce, white vinegar, toasted sliced almonds ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: holiday beans with cranberries ; ingredients: frozen cut green beans, orange rind, dried cranberries, honey, bacon bits ; preparation:

name: salsa chicken burrito filling ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, tomato sauce, salsa, taco seasoning mix, ground cumin, garlic cloves, chili powder, hot sauce ; preparation:Saute onion in a large skillet adding garlic and cilantro during the last minute or two. Add meat and seasonings and stir well. Allow to saute for a minute or two, letting the meat absorb some of the flavors. When it seems that it is really dry and the mixture is starting to stick add the tomatoes and liquid and scrape all the browned bits from the bottom. Tons of flavor there. Add sugar if using. Reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or so. When you are ready to use the mixture return heat to high and cook off almost all the liquid so that your filling is not runny or wet. Use to fill tortillas or in a casserole. ; name: crock pot green chile burrito taco filling ; ingredients: rump roast, onion, taco seasoning mix, dried oregano leaves, garlic powder, diced green chilies, tomato sauce ; preparation:Saute the green chile in the oil until tender. Add the chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until well blended. ; name: basic soft chicken tacos ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, salt, pepper, flour tortillas, limes, salsa, guacamole, diced tomato, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick. ; name: tasty tacos ; ingredients: ground turkey, taco seasoning, water, lettuce, black olives, cheese, refried beans, whole wheat tortillas, guacamole ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: turkey tacos ; ingredients: taco shells, ground turkey, onion, tomatoes and green chilies, ground cumin, garlic salt, oregano ; preparation:Cook turkey in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: chicken filling for tacos burritos ; ingredients: spring onions, oil, chicken, whole kernel corn, oregano, mexican chili powder, salt, black pepper, low-fat sour cream ; preparation:

name: great pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, pumpkin pie spice, yellow cake mix, butter, eggs, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350f. Grease or use non-stick cooking spray and prepare 13x9 inches pan. Reserve 1 cup dry cake mix for topping. Crust - combine remaining cake mix, butter and egg, press into bottom of pan. Prepare filling - combine pie mix, 2 eggs and evaporated milk, mix well and pour over crust. Topping - combine dry mix, sugar, cinnamon and cut in butter to crumble mixture. Sprinkle over filling. Bake 350 for 50-60 minutes or until set. Serve with dollip of whip cream. ; name: sugar free pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, canned pumpkin, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, equal sugar substitute, raisins ; preparation:Make pudding according to directions. Place raisins in hot water for 1 hour to plump. Drain raisins. Mix all ingredients together. Let chill for 2-3 hours. ; name: boston cream cup cakes ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, egg, oil, water, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, milk, dark chocolate frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: rainbow bright cupcakes ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, water, sour cream, vanilla instant pudding mix, food coloring, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired. ; name: easy pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: pumpkin, eggs, pumpkin spice, evaporated milk, sugar, yellow cake mix, butter, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together pumpkin, eggs, spice, milk, and sugar. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 pan. Sprinkle dry cake mix on top. Pour melted butter over top and then sprinkle with walnuts. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes until set. Serve with ice cream or cool whip. ; name: pumpkin pudding cupcakes ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, canned pumpkin puree, egg beaters egg substitute, agave nectar, cinnamon, salt, water, olive oil flavored cooking spray ; preparation:

name: red or green pepper jelly ; ingredients: granulated sugar, red peppers, white vinegar, liquid pectin ; preparation:Mix water, sure-jell and red pepper jelly together. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Stir and bring to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Quickly skim off foam with a large metal spoon. Pour into jelly glasses and seal. If you want to try to make it sugar free i think it would work, just make sure to get the sugar free pectin otherwise it will not set. If i try it anytime soon, i will post and let you know how it turns out. ; name: gaaaaarlic jelly ; ingredients: butter, garlic, sugar, apple cider vinegar, liquid pectin ; preparation:Wash gaaaaarlic jelly thoroughly and divide into 2. Take the leaves from one bunch, squeeze out the surplus water and chop finely. Put vinegar and sugar into a saucepan with the second bunch of mint and stir over a low heat until the sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil for 1 minute. Strain syrup through a muslin and return to the saucepan. Stir in the certo, bring to the boil and boil for 2 minutes. Add the chopped mint, garlic and chilli. Allow to cool slightly to prevent the mint from floating. Skim, pot and cover in the usual way. ; name: elderberry jelly ; ingredients: elderberries, lemon, juice of, fruit pectin, sugar ; preparation:In food processor add 1/2 cup of elderberries and 1/2 cup of lemon juice. Bring to a rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Add the pectin and lemon juice. Remove jars from water bath after 10 minutes and place on counter to cool. Listen for tops of jars to pop and seal. Cool completely. Jam should be good in jars for up to 1 year. ; name: manzanita jelly ; ingredients: manzanita berries, lemon, rind of, cinnamon stick, sugar ; preparation:Wash manzanita berries, lemon, rind of, cinnamon stick, sugar. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Stir in pectin. Bring to a rolling boil. Boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Quickly skim off foam with a large metal spoon. Pour into jelly glasses and seal. If you want to try to make it sugar free i think it would work, just make sure to get the sugar free pectin otherwise it will not set. If i try it anytime soon, i will post and let you know how it turns out. ; name: linda s caramel apple delights ; ingredients: granny smith apples, sticks, caramels, milk, peanuts, snickers candy bars ; preparation:In a microwaveable bowl, combine sugar, egg, flour, vinegar, and crushed pineapple. Microwave on high for 3 minutes. Stir. Repeat. Allow to cool. Chop apples bite size. When egg mixture is cool, fold in apples, whipped topping, and peanuts. Enjoy cold. ; name: grandmama s jalapeno jelly ; ingredients: bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, cider vinegar, sugar, cayenne pepper, certo ; preparation:

name: easy sauteed shrimp ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, butter, beer, salt, pepper, tabasco sauce, shrimp ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes. ; name: caribbean shrimp salad ; ingredients: rice, cooked shrimp, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine rice, cooked shrimp, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Whisk together mayonnaise, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add mayonnaise, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Add mayonnaise, ; name: my secret shrimp sauce recipe ; ingredients: mayonnaise, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, paprika, white pepper, water, heinz ketchup, black pepper, sugar, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprika, salt, white pepper, parsley sprigpreparation:In a large skillet, saute onion& garlic in vegetable oil until tender. Add shrimp and cook 3-5 minutes, just until done. Drain the shrimp well and rinse under cold water. Chill. Peel and devein the cooked shrimp and coarsely chop. Add remaining ingredients except parsley, mixing well. Garnish the spread with a sprig or two of parsley. Serve with party-size rye or whole wheat bread. ; name: curried shrimp salad appetizer ; ingredients: cooking spray, red onion, fresh ginger, curry powder, shrimp, fresh cilantro, cracked black pepper, salad greens, red bell pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately. ; name: quick easy shrimp salad ; ingredients: frozen salad shrimp, mayonnaise, ketchup, garlic salt, worcestershire sauce, green bell pepper, tabasco sauce, old bay seasoning ; preparation:

name: tomato orzo salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, fresh chives, fresh basil, garlic cloves, lemon zest, salt and pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: greek orzo pasta salad ; ingredients: orzo pasta, sun-dried tomato, kalamata olive, bell pepper, red onion, feta cheese, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: mediterranean orzo salad ; ingredients: orzo pasta, red bell pepper, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives, fresh basil, fresh basil leaves, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar ; preparation:Cook the orzo until tender but firm. Drain in a colander. Rinse under cold water to cool, and drain well. Mix the orzo, zucchini, parsley, and mint in a large bowl with a large spoon. Whisk the remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over the salad and mix with a large spoon. ; name: orzo and mushroom risotto ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, orzo pasta, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken stock, salt, white pepper, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place a skillet over high heat and add oil. Saute onion for 3 to 4 minutes. Add mushrooms and garlic and continue to saute until mushrooms have released their liquid and they are golden. Add chicken stock and bring to boil. Pour mushroom and stock mixture orzo and rosemary into a 8x8 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper and bake 35 minutes until liquid is absorbed. ; name: yummy salad ; ingredients: maraschino cherry, mandarin orange, pineapple tidbits, coconut, sour cream, marshmallows, mayonnaise ; preparation:Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill. ; name: rizzo salad creamy fruit salad w orzo ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges, eggs, sugar, salt, cornstarch, cool whip, orzo pasta ; preparation:

name: spicy chicken enchilada casserole ; ingredients: vegetable oil, green bell pepper, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast, chunky salsa, sliced ripe olives, corn tortillas, monterey jack cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: 3 cheese chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, enchilada sauce, cream cheese, sour cream, salt, ground cumin, pepper, chicken, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot. ; name: dana s chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: mild green chilies, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, chicken breasts, white corn tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Combine the chicken, cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chiles, taco seasoning and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Fill each tortilla with 2 spoonfuls of filling mix. Fold tortillas and place in baking pan seam side down. When the pan is filled, pour enchilada sauce over the top of all the filled tortillas. Cover the pan and bake for 20-40 minutes. ; name: dan s chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, garlic, oregano, basil, parsley, chili powder, salt and pepper, flour tortillas, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot. ; name: ww chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: cooked chicken, diced green chilies, green chili salsa, salt, fat-free half-and-half, oil, corn tortillas, reduced-fat monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: white chocolate covered ice cream crunch balls ; ingredients: ice cream, corn flakes cereal, white chocolate chips, vegetable shortening, corn syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Beat in egg, milk and orange extract. Stir in flour and baking powder. Add cereal and nuts. Mix well. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute before removing to racks to cool. ; name: milk chocolate and cherry crunch ; ingredients: milk chocolate chips, unsalted butter, cocoa krispies cereal, dried cherries ; preparation:Melt butter in a heavy 3-liter saucepan on low heat. Add the sugar, corn syrup, water, vanilla extract, toasted almonds, semi-sweet chocolate chips. Cook over medium heat. Stir constantly until it reaches hard crack stage, 300 on candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract and the almonds. Spread into a buttered 13 x 9-inch pan. Let stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. When chocolate is melted, spread evenly over candy. Let cool completely, and when chocolate is set, break into pieces. ; name: peanut butter crunch squares ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, flour, white sugar, light corn syrup, peanut butter chips, chunky peanut butter, corn flakes ; preparation:Preheat over to 350 degrees. Cream together the butter and brown sugar. Add the flour and press into a buttered 9x13 baking pan. Bake 15 minutes. In a sauce pan combine the sugar and light corn syrup and bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Add butterscotch chip and peanut butter. Stir until melted. Add corn flakes. Spread carefully onto the crumb crust. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: chocolate peanut butter crunch ; ingredients: crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, creamy peanut butter, powdered sugar ; preparation:Melt peanut butter, sugar and honey in a large saucepan. Boil fast for 4 minutes, it will turn a golden colour. Mix in the puffed rice, then press into a 8inch square tin lined with foil. Cut into squares while still warm, then allow to cool. Make your own imaginative additions, like chopped nuts etc. Kids love these for a snack or in their lunchbox. ; name: chocolate crunch ice cream bowls ; ingredients: margarine, mini marshmallows, chocolate chips, peanut butter, vanilla, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: garlic shrimp with chilies ; ingredients: olive oil, raw shrimp, fresh chili peppers, garlic, coarse salt ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: cayenne shrimp stir fry ; ingredients: salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of ; preparation:In a large sauce pan. Add the salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well. ; name: ww spicy baked shrimp 3 pts ; ingredients: olive oil-flavored vegetable cooking spray, lemon juice, honey, dried parsley flakes, creole seasoning, olive oil, soy sauce, large shrimp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Arange shrimp in a single layer in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine lemon juice with butter, garlic, worcestershire sauce, lemon pepper, and red pepper. Pour mixture over shrimp. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes or until shrimp are done. Sprinkle parsley over shrimp. Serve immediately. ; name: shrimp and broccolini stir fry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, large shrimp, fresh ginger, garlic, broccolini, water, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, hot red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a large sauce pan. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, broth, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well. ; name: stir fry lemon chili shrimp ; ingredients: raw shrimp, soy sauce, honey, fresh lemon juice, hot chili oil, garlic powder, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: sausage and pepper frittata ; ingredients: pork sausage, red onion, red bell pepper, butter, eggs, heavy cream, water, muenster cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the eggs, cream, and water in a bowl. Add salt and pepper to taste. Beat the egg mixture until thoroughly combined. Set aside. Melt butter in a 10-inch non-stick skillet with a tightly-fitting lid. Add onion and bell pepper and saut over medium heat until onions are translucent. Add crumbled sausage and cook for another minute or two. Distribute mixture evenly in pan and pour the egg mixture over the top. Sprinkle the grated muenster evenly over the eggs and pat down with a wooden spoon so cheese is completely covered by egg mixture. Reduce heat to low and cover pan. Cook 25-30 minutes, or until set in the middle. Remove from heat and let sit about 5 minutes before cutting into wedges. ; name: swiss chard and tomato frittata ; ingredients: swiss chard, garlic cloves, onion, olive oil, egg whites, eggs, fresh basil, salt, black pepper, tomatoes ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature. ; name: shortcut skillet frittata ; ingredients: vegetable oil, frozen shredded hash browns, green pepper, bacon, eggs, milk, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot. ; name: three cheese frittata ; ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, mozzarella cheese, bel paese cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh chives, ground pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature. ; name: fritatta ; ingredients: smoked sausage, diced onion, eggs, milk, sour cream, salt and pepper, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: grandma s frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cocoa powder ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: nana s chocolate frosting ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool. ; name: grandma s creamy fudge icing ; ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, milk, butter, chocolate squares, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Combine the icing sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add butter and milk. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan. ; name: 300 icing ; ingredients: milk, flour, butter, granulated sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add powdered sugar and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool. ; name: chocolate peanut butter icing ; ingredients: brown sugar, margarine, milk, smooth peanut butter, cocoa, icing sugar, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine brown sugar, margarine, milk, smooth peanut butter, cocoa, icing sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, crunchy peanut butter. Spread in a greased 7x11-inch greased baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until it is set in the center. Cool completely and cut in squares. ; name: granny s chocolate icing ; ingredients: sugar, whole milk, unsweetened chocolate squares, vanilla, butter ; preparation:

name: thanksgiving dessert ; ingredients: eggs, pumpkin pie filling, condensed milk, cinnamon, nutmeg, yellow cake mix, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the yellow cake mix, sugar, oil, pumpkin, water, cinnamon and eggs. Beat until well blended. Transfer to the baking dish or cake pans. Bake for 45 minutes. For glaze, cook together the butter, whipping cream and brown sugar for 3 minutes, stirring. When slightly cooled, pour over cake. ; name: angelic lemon cake dessert ; ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, sugar, cool whip, lemon flavor instant pudding and pie filling, walnuts ; preparation:In 13x9-inch pan, layer the cubes of cake, packing them tightly together. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Fold in cool whip. Spread over the cake cubes in pan. Spread pie filling over top of cream cheese mixture. Sprinkle with nuts, if desired. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: icebox cherry dessert ; ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cherry pie filling, cool whip ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spread on top of cake. Top cake with strawberries. Be careful to not put too much of the juice on the cake, or else it will be too moist. Refrigerate for an hour. ; name: chocolate thunder cake ; ingredients: swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: angel food pudding cake angel lush with pineapple ; ingredients: angel food cake, vanilla instant pudding mix, crushed pineapple, whipped topping ; preparation:Mix pudding and pineapple in bowl. Gently stir in whipped topping. Cut cake horizontally into thirds. Spread one-third pudding mixture over bottom layer of cake. Top with second layer. Repeat layering, ending with pudding. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with your favorite seasonal berries. ; name: valentine s day parfaits ; ingredients: angel food cake, fresh strawberries, prepared vanilla pudding, whipped cream, red food coloring ; preparation:

name: quick beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, black beans, ground cayenne pepper, chili powder, flour tortillas ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: the hot hamburger ; ingredients: butter, yellow onions, beef gravy, ground beef, french fries, white bread ; preparation:In a skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until they are soft and golden brown. Prepare gravy and keep warm. Grill or fry hamburgers to desired degree of doneness. Cook french fries in the oven according to package directions. Right before the burgers and fries are done, toast the bread. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Cut each burger into bite-size pieces and place on top of fries. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately. ; name: onion noodle burger skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, chili sauce, fine egg noodles, onion, onion soup, water ; preparation:Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, pepper, cream-style cottage cheese, cream cheese, medium noodlespreparation:Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Stir in tomato sauce, ; name: hamburger patties smothered in gravy ; ingredients: lean ground beef, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, salt, black pepper, brown gravy mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine all gravy ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: last minute helper like hamburger helper ; ingredients: hamburger, wide egg noodles, instant minced onion, brown gravy mix, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: easy cranberry sauce ; ingredients: cranberries, sugar, orange marmalade, lemon juice, nuts ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until cranberries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture. ; name: cranberry sauce with dried cherries ; ingredients: cranberries, dried cherries, shallot, red wine vinegar, fresh orange juice, orange zest, gingerroot, dark brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan and cook over medium heat intil cranberries pop. Reduce heat to low. Cook, stirring occasionally, until cranberries release their juices, about 15 minutes. If the cranbgerry sauce becomes too thick, add water until the desired consistency is reached. Transfer to a bowl to cool. ; name: favorite cranberry sauce ; ingredients: frozen cranberries, fresh orange juice, sugar, liquid honey, cinnamon stick, whole cloves ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add fresh and dried cranberries and cook until dried berries soften and fresh berries begin to pop, stirring often. Remove from heat and stir in marmalade, juice, orange zest and allspice. Cool completely. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Can be made 3 days ahead. ; name: cranberry orange sauce ; ingredients: oranges, cranberries, sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, orange zest, cinnamon, orange juice, and brown sugar. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container. ; name: creamy rich and decadent cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, water, sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, sour cream ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally. Toward the end of the cooking time, use a potato masher to mash all of the berries. Reduce the heat to low and add the butter and salt. Simmer until butter melts, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well. ; name: spirited cranberry apricot sauce ; ingredients: dried apricots, sherry wine, water, sugar, honey, fresh cranberries ; preparation:

name: black walnut banana muffins ; ingredients: bananas, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, margarine, all-purpose flour, wheat flour, baking soda, buttermilk, black walnut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely. ; name: banana nut muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, egg, water, vegetable oil, banana, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: wonderful banana muffins ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, unbleached all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, bananas, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: spiced banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, natural bran, baking powder, salt, ground nutmeg, bananas, eggs, brown sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: fat free chocolate banana muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt, bananas, nonfat milk, vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: banana and walnut muffins ; ingredients: bananas, brown sugar, vanilla essence, margarine, skim milk, egg, whole wheat self-rising flour, self-rising flour, bicarbonate of soda, walnuts ; preparation:

name: veggie topped tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, white wine, onion, green pepper, tomatoes, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, garlic powder, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a med saute pan spray with non stick cooking spray. Saute onions about 2-3 minutes until translucent. Add tilapia filets on top of sauteed onions. Add chopped garlic on each filet. Add tomato slices or chopped tomatoes. Place pan with topped filets in the oven. Bake 12-15 minutes until fish is white. ; name: spanish tilapia ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, italian stewed tomatoes, green olives, black olives, lemon, dry white wine, black pepper, tilapia fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place the fish fillets in a baking pan coated with cooking spray. Salt and pepper to taste. Combine the tomatoes, artichoke hearts, olives, and feta cheese. Top the fish with the mixture. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until the fish flakes easily. ; name: steamed whole tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, soy sauce, minced ginger, sesame oil, fresh garlic, red pepper flakes, napa cabbage, scallions, toasted sesame seeds, ground pepper ; preparation:Scale and gut the tilapia. Make 3 or 4 shallow slashes on each side of the fish, to absorb the marinate. Mix soy sauce, ginger, sesame oil, garlic and peppers. Rub a small portion of this sauce into the fish, including into the slashes. Add shredded cabbage and scallion to the remainder of the sauce, and mix. Layer cabbage onto a heat-resistant plate which will fit into your steamer, and place the fish atop the cabbage. Put the plate into the top portion of the steamer. In the bottom of the steamer, pour three inches of water. Set steamer over range on high, and allow water to boil. When the water is at boiling, put the steamer basket over the lower portion, and cover. Steam fish until it has just turned opaque, approximately 15-20 minutes. Serve, and sprinkle sesame seeds atop. ; name: parmesan coated tilapia ; ingredients: parmesan cheese, butter, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, dried basil, ground black pepper, onion powder, celery salt, tilapia fillets ; preparation:In a 9x13 pan pour crushed tomatoes in bottom spread evenly. Place tilapia fillets on top of tomatoes and sprinkle salt and pepper on them. Crush corn chips until pieces are small and mix with cheese and bread crumbs. Melt butter and mix with the breading mixture. Spoon topping over fish and bake 400 for 20 minutes. ; name: smothered tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, butter, salt and pepper, roma tomatoes, green onions, fresh basil leaf, olive oil, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: ginger baked carrots ; ingredients: carrots, lemon juice, salt, powdered ginger, pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed. ; name: candied carrots ; ingredients: water, carrots, cinnamon sticks, ground cumin, ground ginger, honey, lemon juice ; preparation:Put 6 cups of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: ginger baby carrots ; ingredients: unsalted butter, baby carrots, crystallized ginger, dark brown sugar, chicken broth ; preparation:Put the baby carrots in a large saute pan over medium heat, melt butter, add sugar, pineapple juice and the ginger. Bring mixture to a light boil and stir until sugar has melted and incorporated into all the other ingredients. Pour mixture over the carrots and toss gently. ; name: carrot orange ginger dressing ; ingredients: carrot, pickled ginger, orange juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put the dressing in a small mixing bowl and put it on to boil. Put the sultanas into a small bowl, then cover them with boiling water and set them aside. To make the citrus dressing, peel and finely grate the ginger into a small mixing bowl. Finely grate half the rind from the lemon and then from the orange into the bowl. Squeese the juice from half of the lemon and then from half of the orange and add it to the ginger in the mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream or yogurt and set the dressing aside. Peel the carrots and grate them into a serving bowl, then drain the sultanas and add them. Stir the dressing into the carrots and sultana mixture, then season with salt and add honey or sugar to taste. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and serve. ; name: orange roasted baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, oil, salt, orange marmalade, fresh ginger, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: peanut ginger carrots ; ingredients: carrots, lemon juice, fresh ginger, onion, salt, peanuts, pepper, water ; preparation:

name: oatmeal raisin bread abm ; ingredients: water, nonfat dry milk powder, honey, butter, salt, bread flour, fast rising yeast, old fashioned oats, raisins ; preparation:In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled. ; name: yoghurt raisin bread ; ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, salt, egg, plain yogurt, raisins ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: oatmeal bread bread machine bread maker ; ingredients: water, buttermilk, oil, honey, old fashioned oats, white flour, wheat flour, salt, baking soda, yeast ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 5x9 loaf pan. Combine oats, flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, water and beer and put into the prepared loaf pan. Bake for 30 minutes. Generously brush top of loaf with melted butter, reserving some for a second brushing. Return to oven and bake for 30-40 minutes more until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Remove from the oven and brush with reserved butter. Remove from bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. ; name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: olie bollen ; ingredients: flour, yeast, salt, raisins, apple, water, milk, eggs, sugar, oil ; preparation:

name: spinach broccoli bake ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, frozen chopped broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, egg, pepper, salt, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Place broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. ; name: spinach dish ; ingredients: spinach, green onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, water, italian seasoning, hot green peppers, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: spinach and rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh spinach, tomatoes, water, salt & pepper, uncooked rice ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: balsamic chicken with baby spinach ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach, balsamic vinegar, low sodium chicken broth, chopped tomatoes, whole wheat couscous ; preparation:Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce. ; name: chicken spinach bake ; ingredients: baby spinach, salt, pepper, chicken broth, boneless chicken breast halves, creole seasoning, tomatoes, green onions ; preparation:

name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer.
