Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: casserole italiano ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, oregano, salt, black pepper, tomato soup, cooked elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef with onions and seasonings. Drain fat. Combine beef mixture, soup, and cooked noodles in a 1. 5 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese over top of casserole. Bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: cream cheese casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, sugar, worcestershire sauce, cream cheese, wide egg noodles ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. ; name: cheeseburger and fries casserole ii ; ingredients: lean ground beef, pepper, garlic powder, dry mustard, onion soup mix, water, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, frozen french fries ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown ground beef and onions, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes. ; name: dobie casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, wide egg noodles, canned corn, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Put 1 can biscuits on top and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until biscuits are brown on top. Bake uncovered at 375 for 10 minutes. Put 1 can biscuits on top and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until biscuits are brown on ; name: tallerina casserole 2 ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato soup, cheddar cheese, cream-style corn, mushrooms, black olives, egg noodles ; preparation:

name: velveeta broccoli cheese soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, flour, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, milk, velveeta cheese, frozen broccoli ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan on medium-high heat. Add onions. Cook 3 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring frequently. Whisk in flour until blended. Add broth and milk. Cook on medium-high heat 2 minutes or until heated through, stirring frequently. Add velveeta and broccoli. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until velveeta is melted and broccoli is heated through. ; name: rice broccoli soup ; ingredients: cooked brown rice, frozen broccoli, cream of chicken and mushroom soup, low-fat milk, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, black pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed. ; name: broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, velveeta cheese, mayonnaise, eggs, cracker crumb ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice. ; name: creamy chicken broccoli skillet ; ingredients: mayonnaise, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen broccoli cuts, velveeta cheese, rice ; preparation:Heat a bit of oil in a large and fry the chicken until done. Shred or cut into bite-sized pieces, if desired. Remove from skillet and set aside. Add the can of soup, water, paprika, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Add the broccoli, mushrooms, and rice inches reduce heat to low and add chicken back in the skillet. Cover and cook until the rice is done, anywhere from 5-10 minutes. Let rest a few minutes. ; name: velveeta broccoli rice casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, reduced-fat cream of chicken soup, skim milk, velveeta cheese, instant rice, broccoli ; preparation:

name: corn oysters ; ingredients: frozen corn kernels, milk, flour, egg, salt, pepper, butter, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f grease an 8-inch square baking dish. Using a food processor, puree 1 cup corn. In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chorizo. In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the milk, pureed corn and tortilla crumbs. Add the onion-chorizo mixture and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the mixture to the prepared pan and bake until set and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes. Let sit for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with the scallions. ; name: baked oysters and bacon ; ingredients: oysters, bacon, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven 375f oil a 13x9x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine olive oil and garlic. In another bowl, combine crackers and parmesan cheese. Dip oysters into oil mixture then coat with sherry and any remaining cracker mixture. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes to brown. ; name: dried oyster and scallop congee ; ingredients: medium grain rice, water, oil, carrot, dried oysters, dried scallops, spring onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: seafood salad stuffed shells ; ingredients: seafood salad, jumbo pasta shells, green pepper, red pepper ; preparation:Boil shells in plenty of water until just done. Allow them to cool completely and discard any broken ones. Chop peppers and add to the seafood salad. Break up any large pieces of seafood. Fill each shell with salad mixture. Sprinkle with old bay seasoning as a garnish if you wish. ; name: beef cabbage casserole ; ingredients: head of cabbage, lean ground beef, onion, tomato soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown beef with onion. Boil cabbage 3 min, than drain. Alternate layers of beef and onion with cabbage in 2 qt casserole or crock pot. Pour soup, undiluted, over top. Bake uncovered 30 min at 350 f, or 6-8 hrs on low in crock pot. ; name: oysters mangetsu ; ingredients: cabbage, oysters, onion, egg, flour, milk ; preparation:

name: spicy sweet glaze chicken ; ingredients: garlic, apricot preserves, soy sauce, ketchup, tabasco sauce, chicken pieces ; preparation:Mix together garlic, apricot preserves, soy sauce, ketchup and tobasco sauce. Put chicken pieces of choice in a gallon ziplock bag. Add the sauce mixture. Place in a freezer. To cook the chicken, thaw completely in the refrigerator. Dump into a 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit until done, 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: soy sauce and honey marinated chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, honey, spring onions, garlic, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, vegetable oil, walnut oil, port wine ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic and ginger with chicken breasts and allow to marinate. Pour rice and broth into rice cooker. Cover with lid and press brown rice setting. Allow to cook for 1 hour. Place chicken breasts and marinade on foil sprayed with nonstick cooking spray, top with slivered onion and make packet. Place vegetables in seperate foil packet. Carefully open lid of cooker and place steam tray into the rice cooker. Place chicken packet in tray. Close the lid and steam for 10 minutes then open lid again and place vegetables in allow to steam till cooker changes to keep warm. Carefully check chicken for doneness and using oven mitts carefully remove steam tray from the rice cooker and serve immediately. ; name: chicken in tomato basil cream ; ingredients: butter, onion, diced tomatoes, heavy whipping cream, fresh basil, salt, ground pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In medium skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and water and cook 10 minutes or until browned. Add more water if necessary to prevent chicken from getting too dry. Set chicken aside. Pour off fat and water. Add remaining ingredients. Heat to a boil. Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: skillet glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, fresh ginger, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick saut pan over high heat for 2 minutes. Add the chicken, smooth side down. Pan fry for 2-3 minutes, until juices run clear. Turn the chicken over, reduce heat, and cook for 3-6 minutes, until juices run clear. Sprinkle with a little salt and thyme just before serving. ; name: chick n que sauce ; ingredients: corn oil, lemon juice, water, tabasco sauce, sugar ; preparation:

name: grandma mabel s fry pan cookies ; ingredients: dates, brown sugar, egg, walnuts, butter, coconut, rice krispies ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Grease 2 40cm x 30cm baking trays with oil spray. Cream butter until close to white. Add caster and brown sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add egg and vanilla essence. Beat well. Fold in sifted flour, chocolate chips and salt. Combine. Pinch off tablespoons of mixture and place on greased trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on wire rack and place in airtight container. ; name: brownie chip cookies ; ingredients: brownie mix, eggs, vegetable oil, semisweet chocolate morsels, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease bottom only of 13x9-inch pan. Make brownie mix as directed on box, using oil, water and 2 eggs. Spread in pan. Make brownie mix as directed on pouch, using butter and 1 egg. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls evenly onto brownie batter. Press down lightly. Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted 2 inches from side of pan comes out almost clean. Cool completely, about 1 hour then frost. For brownies, cut into 8 rows by 6 rows. ; name: butterscotch coconut drop cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, flaked coconut, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays. ; name: cherry cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, salt, flour, maraschino cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: fry pan cookies ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, dates, vanilla, walnuts, candied red cherries, green glazed cherries, crisp rice cereal, desiccated coconut ; preparation:

name: turmeric rice ; ingredients: butter, onion, minced garlic clove, basmati rice, turmeric, chicken broth, bay leaf, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews. ; name: portuguese rice ; ingredients: canola oil, yellow onion, garlic cloves, long grain white rice, boiling water, bay leaf, tomatoes, salt ; preparation:Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste. ; name: kitchari indian seasoned rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, mung beans, ghee, cumin seed, brown mustard seeds, turmeric, rock salt, water ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium size saucepan over a medium-high heat. Add the rice and fry it in the oil for about 1 minute. Add the water and salt and bring to a boil. Once the water is boiling, reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook the rice for approximately 15 minutes. If you feel the rice is getting burnt near the base of the pan as it cooks, one trick is to place the saucepan on another flat pan or griddle which is directly on the flame. Toss with a fork. ; name: thai garlic ginger coconut rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, jasmine rice, coconut milk, water, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add coconut milk and ginger to boiling in saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed. Add lemon rind and green onions. Fluff rice lemon rind and onions lightly with fork to mix. Garnish with coconut and lemon slices. ; name: yellow savoury rice ; ingredients: long grain rice, vegetable oil, shallots, ground turmeric, ground coriander, ground cumin, coconut milk, cinnamon stick, cloves, kaffir lime leaves ; preparation:

name: zesty lemon chicken ; ingredients: cooking spray, chicken breasts, lemon juice, lemon rind, chicken stock powder, brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, cornflour, water ; preparation:Coat a large non stick frypan with cooking spray. Fry the chicken until cooked through. Remove from the pan and leave to one side. Place all other ingredients into pan except the water and cornflour. Stir ingredients well until boiling. Combine cornflour with water and add to pan. Bring back to the boil stirring constantly. Cut chicken into large slices then return to the pan and re-heat, coating with sauce. ; name: homebasic lemon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, lemon juice, garlic clove, cornstarch, chicken broth, corn syrup, lemon zest, canola oil, broccoli florets, red pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until cooked through. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice. ; name: lemon grilled chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: rachael ray lemon chicken 30 minute meals ; ingredients: chicken breasts, unbleached all-purpose flour, coarse salt, wok oil, white vinegar, chicken broth, lemon curd, hot water, lemon, zest of, scallions ; preparation:

name: cilantro and lime rice ; ingredients: olive oil, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, lime, juice and zest of, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water, butter, salt, and cumin to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook, covered, until liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat. Add lime juice and cilantro. Fluff with a fork until combined. Serve immediately. ; name: jasmine rice and barley ; ingredients: jasmine rice, chicken broth, quick-cooking barley, peanuts, salt ; preparation:Rinse the rice under cold water. In med saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Add rice and all ingredients. Cover and reduce heat to simmer. Cook for 15 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed. ; name: peppermint liqueur ; ingredients: sugar, water, brandy, peppermint oil, green food coloring ; preparation:Combine the sugar and water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil and stir to dissolve the sugar. Stir in the peppermint oil and green food coloring if using. Allow to cool slightly before stirring in brandy. Pour into a bottle and seal. Tastes best after a couple of weeks. ; name: tilapia with a touch of lime ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, unsalted butter, kosher salt, black pepper, lime juice ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tilapia fillets to the pan. Sprinkle the fish with garlic powder. Pour lime juice over fish. Saute the tilapia until the fillets are opaque and easily flake with a fork. Serve while hot. I like to serve this with a side of rice pilaf and california blend veggies. ; name: mint limeade ; ingredients: water, sugar, of fresh mint, fresh lime juice, mint sprigs, lime slices ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired. ; name: lime barley ; ingredients: barley, water, olive oil, lime, juice of, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chocolate crispy bars rice krispies ; ingredients: sugar, white syrup, chunky peanut butter, chocolate chips, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: easy frozen peanut butter rice krispie treat bars ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, butter, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: peanut butter krispies treats ; ingredients: corn syrup, sugar, smooth peanut butter, rice krispies ; preparation:Grease 13 x 9 inch baking pan. In large saucepan over low heat stir together first three ingredients. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and boil 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add cereal, toss and coat with cooked mixture until coated well. Quickly press into pan. Cool, then cut into squares. ; name: chocolate covered peanut butter krispies ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, smooth peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar& corn syrup. Stir. Occasionally, bring to a boil over medium heat. And boil 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter until smooth. Pour over cereal, stir to coat well. Press evenly into 9 inch square pan coated. With shortening or cooking spray. Cool completely. Invert pan on cutting board. And cut into bars. ; name: white chocolate and maple rice krispie squares ; ingredients: butter, mini marshmallows, rice krispies, white chocolate, maple syrup ; preparation:In a large saucepan over low heat stir together first three ingredients. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and boil 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add cereal, toss and coat with cooked mixture until coated well. Quickly press into pan. Cool, then cut into squares. ; name: cheese rice krispie rounds ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, flour, rice krispies, pecan halves ; preparation:

name: hamburger patties smothered in gravy ; ingredients: lean ground beef, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, salt, black pepper, brown gravy mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine all gravy ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: the hot hamburger ; ingredients: butter, yellow onions, beef gravy, ground beef, french fries, white bread ; preparation:In a skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until they are soft and golden brown. Prepare gravy and keep warm. Grill or fry hamburgers to desired degree of doneness. Cook french fries in the oven according to package directions. Right before the burgers and fries are done, toast the bread. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Cut each burger into bite-size pieces and place on top of fries. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately. ; name: best hamburgers in bbq sauce ; ingredients: ground chuck, soft breadcrumbs, milk, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes. ; name: barbecue burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, barbecue potato chips, onion powder, salt, black pepper, cheese slices ; preparation:In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes. ; name: deviled beef hamburger patties ; ingredients: ground beef, egg, chili sauce, salt, pepper, prepared mustard, prepared horseradish, onions, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:

name: pineapple cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, bell pepper, onions, seasoning salt, pecans, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, savings some pecans to roll cheese ball in. Pack mixture into a bowl or mold. Chill until firm. Remove and roll in pecans to coat exterior. Serve with crackers. ; name: pineapple cheese ball or spread ; ingredients: cream cheese, crushed pineapple, pecans, green pepper, onions, salt ; preparation:Mix cream cheese and add pineapple, pecans, green pepper, onion and salt. Mix and form into ball. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with crackers. Will not form ball, but makes a creamy spread. ; name: thanksgiving cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, blue cheese, onions, garlic clove, worcestershire sauce, green olives, pecans ; preparation:Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time. ; name: tasty cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, havarti cheese, ground pepper, garlic salt, pecans, cracker ; preparation:Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time. ; name: shrimp cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, cream cheese with chives, garlic powder, shrimp, pecans ; preparation:Place all ingredients except chives in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap up the ball in plastic wrap and chill for 2-4 hours. Once the ball is firm, roll in remaining 1 cup of chopped pecans. Roll on plastic wrap into a ball. Once the ball is firm, roll in remaining ; name: holiday cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, pecans, green onions, seasoning salt ; preparation:

name: hot beef and cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, milk, dried beef, green onions, green peppers, chopped pimiento, pepper, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: shrimp cream cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, chili sauce, baby shrimp, parsley, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: chile con queso melted cheese dip ; ingredients: tortilla chips, salad oil, onion, diced green chilies, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, green bell peppers ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: cheesy hot pizza dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, green peppers, green onions, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: chili cheese casserole ; ingredients: butter, eggs, flour, monterey jack cheese, chilies, small curd cottage cheese, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: easy baked layered chili cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, jalapeno pepper, chili, green onions, green chilies, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: updated potato salad ; ingredients: fingerling potatoes, plain low-fat yogurt, whole grain mustard, olive oil, red bell pepper, celery ribs, red onion ; preparation:Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: creamy potato salad made over ; ingredients: red potatoes, kraft calorie-wise italian dressing, miracle whip calorie-wise, dijon mustard, hard-cooked egg, green onion ; preparation:Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all. ; name: new potato salad for a crowd ; ingredients: red potatoes, hard-boiled egg, onion, dill pickle, celery seed, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & pepper ; preparation:Peel, cube, and boil potatoes in large pot of salted water. In another pan, boil eggs. When both have been cooked through, drain and let cool. Peel eggs and chop. In large mixing bowl add cooled potatoes, chopped egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed, salt and pepper. Add sour cream and mayonnaise and stir gently to combine being careful not to mash potatoes. Refrigerate until completely cooled before serving or overnight. ; name: potato salad with bacon and parsley ; ingredients: new potatoes, kosher salt, black pepper, bacon, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley. ; name: louisiana potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, italian dressing, paprika, ground red pepper, bacon, green onions, celery, red peppers ; preparation:

name: cajun spiced peanuts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, dry roasted salted peanuts ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in seasoning and cayenne. Add peanuts to skillet. Cook for 2 minutes stirring constantly. Serve warm or at room temperature. Store for up to 3 weeks in a tightly covered container. ; name: spicy fried chili peanuts ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic cloves, unsalted peanuts, dried ancho chile powder, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving. ; name: sugar and spice nuts ; ingredients: brown sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, egg white, salted cashews, pecan halves, dry roasted peanuts, dried cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: nuclear nuts ; ingredients: peanuts, maple syrup, dried chipotle powder, ground habanero chile pepper, cumin, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving. ; name: crunchy chili lime spiced nuts ; ingredients: egg, lime zest, fresh lime juice, salt, unsalted nuts, sugar, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: chili roasted peanuts with dried cherries ; ingredients: butter, raw peanuts, mild chili powder, ground cumin, white pepper, salt, dried oregano, cayenne pepper, dried cherries ; preparation:

name: fried bananas ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, egg, milk, salt, bananas, peanut oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: cooked plantain bananas ; ingredients: plantain, butter, allspice, coconut, cloves, raw sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing. ; name: easy bananas foster ; ingredients: butter, bananas, light brown sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, ice cream ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container. ; name: coconut baked bananas or plantains ; ingredients: butter, bananas, ground cinnamon, coconut milk, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour. ; name: rummy baked bananas ; ingredients: bananas, brown sugar, lemon, juice of, butter, rum, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine the brown sugar, butter, cream and maple syrup. Cook and stir over medium heat for 4-5 minutes or until sauce is smooth. Stir in bananas. Heat through. Remove from the heat. Stir in extract. Serve over ice cream. ; name: sauteed bananas ; ingredients: butter, cornstarch, water, brown sugar, raisins, lemon juice, bananas ; preparation:

name: summer apple salad ; ingredients: apples, pineapple tidbits, celery, grapes, carrot, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the apples, pineapple, celery, and raisins. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the sunflower seeds and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired. ; name: sunny fruit salad ; ingredients: orange marmalade, mandarin orange segments, almond extract, kiwi fruits, peaches, strawberry, red seedless grapes, cantaloupe, honeydew melon ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: fancy fruit salad ; ingredients: watermelon, cantaloupe, honeydews, green grape, red grapes, sugar, lemon juice, lime juice, orange juice ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: minted fruit salad ; ingredients: strawberry, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, grapes, honey, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: grandma s winter fruit medley ; ingredients: green seedless grapes, red seedless grapes, pineapple chunks, mandarin orange segments, bananas, sugar, fruit juice, egg, all-purpose flour, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: summer fruit bowl ; ingredients: bananas, oranges, strawberry, seedless grapes, sour cream, honey, orange juice ; preparation:

name: chocolate nut balls ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, chocolate sprinkles ; preparation:Melt butter and while hot, stir in nut butter. Mix well and add vanilla, powdered sugar and rice krispies. Work in with hands until it will form balls. If using paraffin shred on a box grater then add to the chocolate in a double boil and heat till melted and combined. Dip into melted chocolate and paraffin or shortening with toothpick. Cool on waxed paper. ; name: pecan balls ; ingredients: pecans, butter, vanilla essence, sugar, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream butter with sugar. Add flour and pecans, mix well. Roll into balls, about the size of a large gumball, and place on a cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, or until very lightly browned. While still warm, roll in superfine sugar - this is important because the dough does not have much sugar. ; name: sugar free peanut balls ; ingredients: margarine, vanilla extract, water, splenda granular, all-purpose flour, egg white, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 325. Grease a baking sheet with cooking oil spray or a small amount of margarine. Cream margarine and sugar in medium mixing bowl. Add peanuts, vanilla & flour, mix well. Using your fingers roll dough into small balls about 1 inch across. Place the balls on the greased baking sheet. Bake for 35 minuites. Remove from the oven. While still warm roll puffs in the powdered sugar. Roll in the sugar again when puffs are cool. ; name: chocolate dipped snowballs ; ingredients: butter, marshmallows, dipping chocolate, honey bunches of oats cereal ; preparation:Melt butter and while hot, stir in marshmallows and honey bunches of oats cereal. Mix well and add to the chocolate in a double boil and heat until melted and combined. Dip into melted chocolate and paraffin or shortening with toothpick. Cool on waxed paper. ; name: butternut balls a ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, vanilla, flour, salt, pecan halves, hershey chocolate kiss ; preparation:

name: pumpkin cream pie ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, 9-inch graham cracker crust, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Beat first 5 ingredients together until fluffy, 1-2 minutes. Blend in pumpkin. Spoon into crust. Chill throughly. Top with whipped cream. ; name: two point pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pumpkin, sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, water, pumpkin pie spice, graham cracker crust, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired. ; name: simple chocolate cream pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, instant chocolate pudding mix, dream whip topping mix, milk, cool whip ; preparation:Pour 2 cups milk into a medium bowl. Add pudding mix. Beat with an electric mixer 1 minute. Spread mixture evenly into crust. Beat cream cheese, sugar and 1 tablespoon milk with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping on low speed. Spread over chocolate mixture. Sprinkle with chocolate, if desired. Cover with dome. Chill at least 3 hours before serving. ; name: no bake pumpkin cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, pumpkin pie mix, granulated sugar, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large mixing bowl until well blended. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Serve plain or with pie filling of choice. ; name: easy pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: pumpkin, eggs, pumpkin spice, evaporated milk, sugar, yellow cake mix, butter, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together pumpkin, eggs, spice, milk, and sugar. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 pan. Sprinkle dry cake mix on top. Pour melted butter over top and then sprinkle with walnuts. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes until set. Serve with ice cream or cool whip. ; name: easy double layer pumpkin spice pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, sugar, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust, instant pumpkin spice pudding mix ; preparation:

name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: lemon garlic chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic clove, chicken broth, lemon juice, salt & pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper and roast for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear when you prick it with a fork. ; name: lemon and thyme quick roasted chicken breasts ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemons, salt, ground pepper, fresh thyme leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: lemon grilled chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: orange braised chicken breasts with capers ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, onion, ground cumin, fresh orange juice, lemon juice, orange zest, black pepper, capers ; preparation:

name: easy glazed grilled salmon ; ingredients: dark brown sugar, hot mustard, soy sauce, rice vinegar, salmon steaks ; preparation:Whisk together first three ingredients. Transfer 1 tablespoon glaze to small bowl. Mix in rice vinegar and set aside. Brush 1 side of salmon steaks generously with half of glaze in medium bowl and place salmon steaks, glazed side down, onto barbecue. Grill until glaze is slightly charred, about 4 minutes. Brush top side of salmon steaks with remaining glaze in medium bowl. Turn salmon over and grill until second side is slightly charred and salmon is just opaque in center, about 5 minutes longer. Transfer salmon to plates and drizzle reserved glaze in small bowl over salmon and serve. ; name: orange marinated grilled salmon ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salmon steaks ; preparation:Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre. ; name: seared salmon with mustard vinaigrette ; ingredients: salmon fillets, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, horseradish, fresh herbs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or ; name: grilled salmon with horseradish sauce ; ingredients: oil, white horseradish, soy sauce, garlic clove, salt & pepper, salmon fillets, sour cream, mayonnaise, basil, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: new mexico spanish rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, long grain rice, onions, green bell pepper, celery ribs, crushed tomatoes, ground cumin, garlic cloves, salt, reduced-sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add butter, onion, and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 to 4 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. ; name: leftover rice made into spanish rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, olive oil, butter, onion, minced garlic cloves, tomato sauce, water, coriander, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: amazing mexican rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, yellow onion, rice, garlic clove, chicken broth, salt and pepper, chipotle chiles, corn ; preparation:In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15 ; name: hawaiian fried rice ; ingredients: ground beef, carrots, celery, yellow onion, water, soy sauce, cooked rice ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the hawaiian rice in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: easy mexican rice ; ingredients: long-grain rice, rotel, vegetable oil, chicken broth, carrot, zucchini, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeos and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: betty crocker 1950s spanish rice ; ingredients: bacon, onion, green pepper, cooked rice, canned tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: two tone grilled cheese ; ingredients: butter, whole wheat bread, mayonnaise, white bread, process american cheese, swiss cheese ; preparation:Spread desired amount of butter over one side of each slice of whole wheat bread. Spread mayonnaise over one side of each slice of white bread. Place whole wheat bread, buttered side down, on a hot griddle. Layer with american cheese and swiss cheese. Top with white bread, mayonnaise side up. Cook until golden brown on both sides. ; name: grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham egg and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, eggs, salt, pepper, sourdough bread, ham, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: special grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: bread, cooked bacon, red onion, processed cheese, margarine ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread bacon mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each sandwich, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread ; name: cheese cutout sandwiches ; ingredients: process american cheese, processed swiss cheese, butter, white bread, cooked ham ; preparation:

name: caramelized pear and toasted almond salad ; ingredients: baby spinach, pear, almonds, sugar, water, balsamic vinegar, salt, dijon mustard, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing. ; name: roasted carrot salad ; ingredients: carrots, slivered almonds, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & fresh ground pepper, honey, cider vinegar, dried cranberries, danish blue cheese, arugula ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: glazed brussels sprouts and carrots with almonds ; ingredients: brussels sprout, carrot, butter, brown sugar, lemon juice, salt, pepper, chives, toasted almond ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Cut the bottoms off the brussels sprouts and trim any damaged leaves. Cut in half. Add the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix to combine. Add brussels sprouts and mix until coated. Put in a roasting pan in the oven for 45 minutes, stiring once after about 25 minutes, until brown and caramelized. ; name: belarussian carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, cider vinegar, salt, coriander seed, vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss. ; name: carrot salad with toasted almonds ; ingredients: low-fat sour cream, low fat cottage cheese, parsley, tabasco sauce, lemon juice, salt and pepper, carrots, baby spinach, toasted almond, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:

name: house balsamic vinaigrette ; ingredients: salt, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, pepper, olive oil, minced garlic clove, scallion, parsley ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl, stirring with a whisk. Add oil, whisking until well blended. Cook balsamic vinaigrette in boiling water for 4 minutes. Add onion and celery and cook an additional 1 minute. Drain well. Add balsamic vinegar mixture to vinaigrette. Toss well to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: ask marinated broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, cider vinegar, sugar, dill weed, accent seasoning, salt, pepper, garlic salt, oil ; preparation:Wash and cut broccoli into flowerettes. Place in shallow dish. Mix other ingredients and spoon over broccoli. So all areas are coated. Cover tightly and refrigerate overnight,. Stirring occasionally. Drain off marinade and serve. ; name: choose your own flavor herb vinaigrette ; ingredients: canola oil, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, garlic clove, dried herbs ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in the flavored oil until the dessing is creamy and blended. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to make thin shreds. Stir into dressing. Whisk together vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to ; name: balsamic mustard ; ingredients: mustard seeds, mustard powder, water, balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, sugar, salt, garlic clove ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add mustard to skillet. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with ; name: chilled lentil salad with spicy vinaigrette ; ingredients: water, salt, dried lentils, olive oil, white wine vinegar, ground cumin, ground coriander, cayenne ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium high heat. Add lentils, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and lentils in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: broccolini with balsamic vinaigrette ; ingredients: broccolini, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, sugar, fresh lemon, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: wine shallot sauce dijon ; ingredients: butter, shallots, cornstarch, dry red wine, beef broth, dijon mustard, fresh chives, pepper ; preparation:Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add wine and lemon juice and simmer for about 45 or 50 minutes, or until tender. Remove to warm serving platter. Make mustard sauce. Stir flour into drippings in skillet until smooth. Stir in cream, mustard and cayenne. Boil, stirring 1 minute. Serve chops with sauce. ; name: chipotle barbecue sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic powder, dried chipotle powder, cumin, red wine, brown sugar, soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth, 1-2 minutes. Refrigerate. Sauce may become quite thick once refrigerated. Just heat for a few seconds in microwave. Recipe can be doubled or tripled and the level of chipotle pepper can be adjusted to suit personal preferences. ; name: spicy cream sauce with seafood poultry ; ingredients: butter, flour, garlic powder, onion powder, dried cilantro, milk, cream cheese, cheese, diced green chilies, chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Wrap each chicken breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired. ; name: seared king fish and mustard cream and caper sauce ; ingredients: fish steaks, garlic, lemon pepper, lime, chicken stock powder, fresh cream, red onion, whole grain mustard, capers, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500 degrees farenheit. Brush seared king fish with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. In a 9-in metal baking pan, combine the butter, scallions and garlic. Reduce oven heat to 425. Cook the scallion mixture for 5 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and capers and cook for 3 minutes. Top the mixture with salmon and cook for another 20 minutes. Top with fish. ; name: shallot butter sauce for seafood bbq ; ingredients: butter, shallot, beer, cider vinegar, fresh lemon juice, cayenne pepper, hot pepper sauce, fresh parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: eggplant rice casserole ; ingredients: eggplant, marinara sauce, onion, rice, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Dice the two eggplants into approximately one inch cubes. Toss the eggplant cubes with 2-4 tbsp of olive oil. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a single layer on a baking sheet and pop into preheated oven. Roast until eggplant is tender and beginning to brown, 15-20 minutes. When eggplant is done roasting, pull out of the oven and top with crushed red pepper, tomato sauce, parmesan, and mozzarella cheese. Place back in oven for approximately 10-15 minutes or until cheese is bubbling and starting to brown slightly. Serve with salad. ; name: oven fried eggplant ; ingredients: eggplants, egg, oil, salt, black pepper, flour, seasoned bread crumbs, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cook the eggplant in water until al dente. Drain well. Dip into egg, then bread crumbs and fry in hot oil until golden brown. Drain. This can be made ahead of time and kept warm, uncovered, in the oven. ; name: eggplant aubergine mediterranean style ; ingredients: nicoise olives, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, dried oregano, eggplants, fresh parsley, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add parsley and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook until fragrant, ; name: fried eggplant stew ; ingredients: eggplant, oil, tomatoes, hot water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick oil spray. Arrange eggplant rounds on the cookie sheet and sprinkle parmesan over the eggplant. Can peel the eggplant also, if preferred that way. Layer one slice of tomato on top of each eggplant round. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. If using olive oil, brush the eggplant with olive oil then add seasonings, then parmesan and tomato. Can also add slices of onion or fresh mushroom to make this a deluxe meal of yummy veggies. Feel free to add additional variations of cheeses. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes. ; name: eggplant aubergine and feta rolls ; ingredients: eggplants, salt, olive oil, basil leaves, feta ; preparation:Boil eggplants until soft. Saute onion, chopped shrimp, and celery in butter or oil. Combine with eggplant. Put in baking pan and sprinkle with bread crumbs or cracker crumbs. Bake approximately 30 minutes at 350f. ; name: baked eggplant ww ; ingredients: eggplants, marinara sauce, basil leaves, fat free mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy mushroom potato bake ; ingredients: white potatoes, onion, fresh mushrooms, butter, sour cream, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with the flour. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with parmesan cheese. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: country potato pie ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, eggs, milk, dry mustard, garlic powder, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: yummy mashed potato bake ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion powder, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, butter, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately. ; name: potato and mushroom pie ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, sour cream ; preparation:

name: amazing homemade meatballs ; ingredients: meat, yellow onion, egg, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, garlic, salt, black pepper, milk, cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: biscuit wrapped meatballs ; ingredients: biscuits, marinara sauce, frozen meatballs, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients except the cheese together in a bowl. Mold a tbs of meat around a cube of cheese to form a small shaped meatball. Repeat with all of the meat. Spray an edged cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray and place meatballs on the cookie sheet. Bake for 7-10 min or until meat is done and cheese is melted. ; name: make ahead meatballs ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic cloves, ground beef, breadcrumbs, parsley, paprika, kosher salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: emergency meatball sub dinner ; ingredients: frozen meatballs, pasta sauce, cheese, submarine rolls ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Mix first six ingredients and form into emergency meatballs. Place on jelly roll style pan with lip. Bake meatballs in oven for 15-20 minutes until done. Melt butter in saucepan. Add garlic and saut for 1-2 minutes. Stir in flour. Stir in chicken broth and cook until thickened. Combine meatballs and sauce. Keep warm in crockpot if serving for party. ; name: saucy meatballs ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, milk, nutmeg, sour cream, parsley ; preparation:Combine the meatballs, soup, milk and nutmeg in a large skillet. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15 minute. Stir in the sour cream, cover and heat for 2 or 3 minute more. Sprinkle with parsley if desired and serve warm. ; name: wrapped meatballs ; ingredients: meatballs, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, parmesan cheese, pasta sauce ; preparation:

name: spiced cabbage with coconut ; ingredients: cabbage, butter, cumin seed, dried red chilies, onion, carrot, desiccated coconut, salt, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small bowl combine first 5 ingredients. Core cabbage, cutting out a good size cavity and then place the seasoned butter in the cavity. Wrap cabbage with heavy duty aluminum foil. Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Unwrap cabbage and discard any blackened leaves and then cut the cabbage into wedges. ; name: stir fried spiced cabbage la pai ts ai ; ingredients: chinese cabbage, sugar, white vinegar, soy sauce, salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: simmered cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, olive oil, butter, salt, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth, dry sherry ; preparation:Heat oil and saute cabbage along with the oregano. Stir in cabbage and water mixing well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Serve immediately. ; name: chili roasted carrots ; ingredients: canola oil, chili powder, cumin, salt, carrots, fresh cilantro, lime juice ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: cumin marinated cauliflower and carrot salad ; ingredients: cauliflower, baby carrots, lemon juice, vegetable oil, fresh parsley, cumin, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl. Toss to coat. Spread in a single layer on prepared baking sheet. Roast cauliflower until tender and lightly caramelized, turning cauliflower over once, 35 to 40 minutes. ; name: spiced cabbage and coconut ; ingredients: peanut oil, bay leaves, whole cumin seed, green chilies, savoy cabbage, salt, sugar, dried coconut, ground cumin ; preparation:

name: souvlaki ; ingredients: lemon, olive oil, soy sauce, dried oregano, garlic, pork tenderloin, green peppers, yellow onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the spice rub. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes. ; name: pork souvlaki ; ingredients: pork shoulder, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon juice, oregano, dried mint, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately. ; name: pita stuffed souvlaki ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, garlic cloves, lamb, pita bread, tzatziki, roma tomatoes ; preparation:Over medium high heat, warm the oil in a non-stick skillet or wok. Separate the onion into rings and add along with garlic to oil. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until onions are lightly brown. Stirring frequently. Add the sliced meat and cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until meat is warmed. Fill pita halves with meat and onion mixture, garnish with sliced tomatoes and tzatziki. Serve immediately. ; name: lamb with spinach ; ingredients: lamb, salt and pepper, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, bouillon, fresh spinach, oregano, lemon juice, feta cheese ; preparation:Sprinkle salt and pepper over the cubed lamb, heat the oil in a dutch oven and brown the meat on all sides. Add the onion and garlic and fry until the onion gets translucent. Add the stock, bring to the boil, lower the heat, cover and simmer slowly for 40- 50 minutes or until the meat is tender. Was the spinach and cook for about 5-7 minutes, without adding any water, drain very well and chop roughly. When the lamb had its cooking time, add the spinach together with the oregano and the lemon juice. On a medium heat and stirring regularly, cook until most cooking juices have evaporated, but it should still be moist. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with the feta cheese. ; name: classic souvlaki ; ingredients: lean boneless lamb, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: criss cross peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks. ; name: awesome peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: crisco shortening, butter, crunchy peanut butter, white sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy, 11-13 minutes for crisp. ; name: original chipits cookies ; ingredients: crisco shortening, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips, nuts ; preparation:Cream together shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in 2 eggs and vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually blend into creamed mixture. Stir in chipits and nuts. Drop from spoon onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 10-12 minutes. ; name: no flour peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: crozy s chocolate chip peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, baking soda, egg, vanilla, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: chicken black bean chili ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast, chicken broth, chili powder, ground cumin, black beans, diced tomatoes, corn ; preparation:Heat oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook turkey, onion, chilies and garlic in oil, stirring occasionally, until turkey is no longer pink in center and onion is tender. Stir in remaining ingredients. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: salsa chicken burrito filling ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, tomato sauce, salsa, taco seasoning mix, ground cumin, garlic cloves, chili powder, hot sauce ; preparation:Saute onion in a large skillet adding garlic and cilantro during the last minute or two. Add meat and seasonings and stir well. Allow to saute for a minute or two, letting the meat absorb some of the flavors. When it seems that it is really dry and the mixture is starting to stick add the tomatoes and liquid and scrape all the browned bits from the bottom. Tons of flavor there. Add sugar if using. Reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or so. When you are ready to use the mixture return heat to high and cook off almost all the liquid so that your filling is not runny or wet. Use to fill tortillas or in a casserole. ; name: easy beef and bean chili ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, kidney beans, chili beans, cumin, salt, celery salt, chili powder, brown sugar, tomato soup ; preparation:In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: chili citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, jalapeno jelly ; preparation:In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken. ; name: chicken and corn chili ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salsa, garlic powder, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, ground black pepper, mexican-style corn, pinto beans ; preparation:

name: brownie bites ; ingredients: butter, unsweetened chocolate, sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, walnut halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: glazed brownies ; ingredients: sugar, butter, water, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, pecans ; preparation:Cook first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan over high heat stirring constantly, until sugar melts. Add 2 cups chocolate morsels and vanilla, stirring until mixture is smooth. Let cook 15 minutes. Add flour, baking soda, and salt to cooled chocolate mixture, stirring until blended. Stir in eggs and pecans until blended. Spread batter into a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 325 for 30 minutes. Sprinkle remaining 2 cups chocolate morsels evenly over warm brownies and let stand 5 minutes to soften. Spread over top.
