Cool on wire rack before cutting. ; name: easiest brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: brownies fudgy style ; ingredients: butter, unsweetened chocolate squares, sugar, eggs, flour, vanilla, salt, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325c. Butter 20cm square cake tin. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares. ; name: lemony lemon brownies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, flour, eggs, lemon zest, lemon juice, granulated sugar, sea salt, icing sugar ; preparation:

name: basic soft chicken tacos ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, salt, pepper, flour tortillas, limes, salsa, guacamole, diced tomato, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick. ; name: tasty tacos ; ingredients: ground turkey, taco seasoning, water, lettuce, black olives, cheese, refried beans, whole wheat tortillas, guacamole ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: turkey tacos ; ingredients: taco shells, ground turkey, onion, tomatoes and green chilies, ground cumin, garlic salt, oregano ; preparation:Cook turkey in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: easy cheesy chicken tacos ; ingredients: ground chicken, taco sauce, mexican blend cheese, taco shells, lettuce, sour cream, black olives, chopped tomato ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: stewed chicken taco meat ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, low-sodium taco seasoning, garlic clove, ro-tel tomatoes, colby-monterey jack cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Put all ingredients except cheese in crockpot and cook on low for 6 hours. Use two forks to shred the chicken into chunks. Add cheese and stir. Serve immediately in tacos or use as a filling for enchiladas. You can also use chicken breasts, but it turns out drier and not as tasty. ; name: grilled chicken tacos ; ingredients: olives, lime juice, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, ground cumin, dried oregano, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour tortillas ; preparation:

name: honey pecan chicken ; ingredients: pecans, corn flake crumbs, honey, soy sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Mix cornflakes, pecans, sugar, salt, onion powder, black pepper, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 400e toss chicken legs with egg to coat. Combine cornflakes, pecans, sugar, salt, onion powder and pepper in large resealable plastic food storage bag. Add chicken legs two at a time. Shake to coat. Place chicken on foil-lined baking sheet. Drizzle with melted butter. Bake 40 to 45 minutes or until tender. ; name: sugar and spice candied pecans ; ingredients: pecan halves, butter, sugar, water, salt, cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg ; preparation:In small bowl, combine sugar with spices. In large bowl, whisk egg whites until frothy. Stir in pecans until coated. Sprinkle with sugar mixture, tossing with spoon to coat nuts evenly. Spread on 2 lightly greased baking sheets and bake in a preheated 325f degree oven, rotating sheets half way through, for 30 minutes or until coating is crisp and nuts are fragrant. Let cool. ; name: sugar grilled baby carrots and onions with pecans ; ingredients: baby carrots, red onion, olive oil, light brown sugar, kosher salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large saucepan, add carrots. Add water to cover. Bring to a boil. Cook for 25 minutes or until carrots are tender. Drain and cool slightly. Process carrots in a food processor until smooth. Pour carrots into a mixing bowl. Add in remaining ingredients. Stir to combine. Transfer mixture into a greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. ; name: holiday pecans ; ingredients: sugar, salt, cinnamon, egg white, pecan halves, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, honey, oil. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar. ; name: baby sweet peas with honey pecan butter ; ingredients: frozen baby peas, butter, honey, pecans ; preparation:

name: zucchini quiche ; ingredients: zucchini, onion, garlic, olive oil, salt, unbaked 10-inch pie shell, eggs, milk, heavy cream, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning. ; name: bacon and double cheese quiche ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, cooked bacon, eggs, half-and-half cream, dried thyme, white pepper, gruyere cheese, white cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine eggs, cream, chives, salt and pepper in bowl and blend well. Sprinkle shredded cheese into bottom of baked pie shell. Pour egg mixture over top of cheese and sprinkle with the bacon. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: basic quiche ; ingredients: pie shell, eggs, scallions, milk, cream, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning. ; name: mini quiche ; ingredients: eggs, milk, cream, nutmeg, plain flour, frozen puff pastry, dried chives, bacon, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 8 or 9 inch pie plate. Mix eggs in large bowl. Add shredded cheeses, folding. Fold in milk. Add salt and pepper to taste and any other spice to taste. Add any meats or veggies at this time, fold gently. Pour into pie plate and spread out. Bake for about 40 minutes. ; name: quiche ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, swiss cheese, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, onion, milk, eggs, salt, oregano, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: cheesy summer squash spears ; ingredients: summer squash, garlic powder, salt, pepper, mexican blend cheese, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: my squash and pepper casserole ; ingredients: yellow squash, red pepper, eggs, onion, all-purpose flour, mozzarella cheese, white pepper, salt, butter, ritz crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut squash into 1-inch cubes if too large. In a large bowl, toss together squash, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic, parsley, black pepper, and salt to taste. Pour into a 2 quart flat baking dish. Sprinkle parmesan evenly over the top. Bake squash approximately 50 minutes until tender. Can use cooking spray instead of olive oil. Can use 1 green and 1 red pepper if desired. ; name: skillet spaghetti squash ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, spaghetti squash, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add pasta, and cook until pasta is tender, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add salt, pepper, red pepper, and black pepper. Toss gently then sprinkle with cheese. ; name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: herbed veggie medley ; ingredients: butter, garlic, carrots, salt, lemon pepper, zucchini, crookneck yellow squash, red bell pepper, green onion, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: mexican style squash medley ; ingredients: vegetable oil, crookneck yellow squash, onion, garlic cloves, jalapeno, tomatoes, corn, chili powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: quick homemade applesauce no sugar added ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon slices, salt ; preparation:Peel and core apples. Cut apples into approximately 1 inch cubes. Add all ingredients to pot, and turn heat on high. Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes or until the apples have softened significantly. Stir frequently, making sure that the apples are not sticking to the bottom of the pot. Add more water if necessary. Remove lemon slices. Mash with a potato masher or use a food mill for a smoother consistency. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: cinnamon chip applesauce cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, applesauce, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon baking chips, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture, beating until well blended stir in cinnamon chips. Pour into two loaf pans. Bake for 60 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean cool completely in pan. Drizzle with glaze or wait until the cake is sliced and then drizzle with glaze to maximize the glazed area. ; name: no fat banana applesauce muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, eggs, banana, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: crispy crusted apple cake ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, granny smith apples, unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Grease and flour a tube or bundt pan, then sprinkle walnuts in the bottom. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil and water. With mixer at medium speed, beat for 3 minutes or until well blended. Stir in chopped apples, plus raisins if desired. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in preheated oven for 55 to 65 minutes or until a tester inserted in centre comes out clean. Cool in pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack and cool completely. Dust with icing sugar, if desired. ; name: healthy applesauce pancakes with no sugar added ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, butter, milk, egg, vanilla, applesauce ; preparation:

name: sesame garlic beans ; ingredients: green beans, garlic clove, butter, sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: asian style green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, red sweet bell pepper, oyster sauce, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving. ; name: green beans and almonds ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, olive oil, lemon juice, toasted almonds, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cook beans in a 5-quart pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest. ; name: fresh green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: mustard green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute until beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: sesame green beans ; ingredients: sesame oil, sesame seeds, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: indonesian stir fried carrots ; ingredients: butter, shallots, green chili pepper, garlic cloves, carrot, vegetable broth, dark soy sauce, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: orange glazed shredded carrots ; ingredients: orange juice, chicken broth, cornstarch, olive oil, carrots, butter, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving. ; name: oven baked carrot fries ; ingredients: carrots, sugar, olive oil, salt, fresh rosemary, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: asian carrots ; ingredients: toasted sesame oil, carrots, light soy sauce, hoisin sauce, orange juice, gingerroot, honey, sesame seeds, pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed. ; name: spiced carrot fries ; ingredients: carrot, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, chili powder, cumin, ginger, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Slice potatoes into 12 wedges each. Place all the potatoes into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and cumin over potatoes, drizzle oil over seasonings and toss the potatoes until all are coated. Spread potatoes onto baking sheet in a single layer. Bake for 10, remove from oven and turn. Place back into oven and cook for 10 more minutes, then turn again. Return to oven and continue cooking until golden brown -- probably 5 - 10 more minutes. Each serving size is 12 wedges. ; name: carrot orange stir fry ; ingredients: sunflower oil, carrots, leeks, oranges, ketchup, brown sugar, soy sauce, peanuts ; preparation:

name: yummy pork chop stuffing bake ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, pork chops, condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, dried thyme, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving. ; name: baked breaded pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, breadcrumbs, oregano, garlic ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using baked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: savory biscuit bites ; ingredients: butter, parmesan cheese, dried onion flakes, dried parsley flakes, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: bisquick italian pork chops ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, italian dressing, breadcrumbs, boneless pork loin chops, vegetable oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning. ; name: biscuit stuffing pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, condensed cream of mushroom soup, celery, onion, egg, pepper, poultry seasoning, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:

name: rice pilaf with mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, onion, mushroom, salt & freshly ground black pepper, long-grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Melt butter in a large flameproof casserole and cook the onion over low heat for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, salt and pepper and continue cooking 5 minutes longer or until the mushrooms release their liquid. Turn up the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the moisture in the mushrooms evaporates. Add the rice and stir it for a few minutes or until the grains are transparent. Pour in the stock or stock mixed with water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, cover the pan and cook the rice for 20 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed. Transfer half the rice to a plastic container. Serve remaining rice at once. ; name: white wild rice pilaf ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, wild rice, vegetable broth, long-grain white rice, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium-high heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add onion and celery. Cook for 2 minutes more. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: two rice pilaf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, wild rice, onion, chicken stock, long grain rice, butter, salt, marinated artichoke hearts, sweet red pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: vegetable rice pilaf ; ingredients: green pepper, garlic powder, dried basil leaves, black pepper, long-grain white rice, chicken broth, veg-all ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: wild rice and shiitake mushroom pilaf ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, celery, carrot, pecans, wild rice, brown rice, mushroom, beef broth, chicken broth ; preparation:

name: whole wheat fluffy pancakes ; ingredients: egg, milk, butter, vanilla extract, sugar, baking powder, whole wheat pastry flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: breakfast eggcake ; ingredients: egg, milk, pancake mix, butter, bacon bits, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Stir ingredients together gently. Add more milk as necessary to make batter the consistency of buttermilk. Melt butter in omelette pan or small skillet over medium high heat. Pour batter into skillet and cook until edges appear dry. Flip eggcake over and cook until set, about another minute. Slide onto serving plate and serve with maple syrup or your favorite pancake topping. ; name: easy swedish pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, butter ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oilpreparation:In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings. ; name: pancakes waffles ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, unbleached white flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Sift flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar together. Separate eggs. Mix together the buttermilk, sour cream or yogurt and the egg yolks. Stir in the butter and vanilla. Brush the waffle iron lightly with oil and preheat it. Stir the wet into the dry ingredients. Beat the egg whites with the whisk or electric mixer until they hold soft peaks. Stir them gently into the batter. Spread a ladleful or so of batter onto the waffle iron and bake until the waffle is done, usually 3 to 5 minutes, depending on your iron. Serve immediately or keep warm for a few minutes in a low oven. ; name: hearty thin pancakes ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, eggs, milk, cinnamon, fruit jam, real maple syrup ; preparation:

name: quick mediterranean chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, diced fire-roasted tomatoes, orange juice, garlic, capers ; preparation:Season both sides of the chicken thighs with salt and pepper. In a large nonstick skillet with a lid, heat the oil over high heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until well browned, about 2 minutes per side. Add the tomatoes, orange juice, garlic and capers. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover the pan and cook for 8 minutes. Uncover the pan and continue cooking, turning the thighs once, until the chicken is no longer pink in the middle and the sauce has thickened, about 10 minutes. ; name: chicken thighs with tomatoes ; ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the tomatoes. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve. ; name: chicken thighs with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, olive oil, oregano, garlic, pepper, fresh parsley, kalamata olive, capers, diced tomatoes ; preparation:In a resealable plastic bag, combine chicken and salad dressing. Set aside in refrigerator for 20 minutes. Remove chicken from marinade, reserving marinade. Warm oil in a medium skillet over med-high heat. Add chicken and cook 5 minutes, or until no longer pink, turning occasionally. Stir in reserved marinade and tomatoes with juice. Heat to boiling, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes, or until a thermometer in thickest portion registers 160 degrees and juices run clear. ; name: baked mushroom chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, dried parsley, onion powder, dry breadcrumbs, butter, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour. ; name: greek baked chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, cherry tomatoes, potatoes, garlic cloves, dried oregano, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: quinoa with garlic and soy sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, quinoa, vegetable stock, soy sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: quinoa and green chile casserole ; ingredients: olive oil, quinoa, chopped tomatoes, vegetable broth, green onion, fresh basil, fresh cilantro, balsamic vinegar, diced green chilies, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: orange flavored quinoa ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, orange juice, salt, quinoa, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, currants, orange zest ; preparation:In a medium nonstick saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft. Add orange juice, 1 cup water and salt. Bring to a boil. Add quinoa and stir once. Quickly return to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, until water is absorbed and quinoa is tender. Remove from heat and let stand 3 minutes. Add parsley, mint, currants and orange zest. Stir with a fork to combine and fluff up grain. ; name: quinoa black bean broccoli deliciousness ; ingredients: quinoa, roasted red pepper, sun-dried tomatoes, black beans, capers, zucchini, fresh garlic cloves, fresh spinach, broccoli florets, olive oil ; preparation:Make the quinoa according the directions on package. Typically 2 parts liquid, 1 part quinoa, cooked for 10-15 minutes until liquid is absorbed. While the quinoa is cooking, heat the garlic in the olive oil for 2 minutes. Add the zucchini and cook until tender. When the quinoa and zucchini are done, add all other ingredients and allow to reheat over medium low heat. Serve hot. ; name: quinoa tabouleh ; ingredients: quinoa, fresh parsley, tomatoes, lemon, juice of, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, rocket, sumac, cracked black pepper ; preparation:

name: slow cooker country style ribs ; ingredients: country-style pork ribs, salt, ground black pepper, light brown sugar, garlic cloves, onion, apple juice, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 280f. In large baking dish place down 2 long pieces aluminum foil, criss cross. Put meat on foil pour bbq sauce on top drizzle honey over it. Sprinkle with garlic. Place onions all over. Salt and pepper it. Wrap up foil and seal it well. Cook for about 6 hours. ; name: pork ribs perfection ; ingredients: rack of ribs, light brown sugar, paprika, salt, fresh ground black pepper, thyme, oregano, onion powder, garlic salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Cut pork ribs into sections of 3 or 4 bones. Mix remaining ingredients well, sprinkle on both sides of ribs and rub into the meat. Seal rib sections in foil with a tablespoon of water in each package, and bake for 2 hours on a cookie sheet in the center of the oven. Open foil carefully as steam escapes. Can be crisped on a hot bbq if desired but will be great just the way it is. ; name: barbecue ribs ; ingredients: spareribs, brown sugar, catsup, soy sauce, dry mustard, chili sauce, dark rum, worcestershire sauce, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Wrap ribs in double thickness of foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting. ; name: hong kong ribs ; ingredients: pork spareribs, flour, salt, fat, garlic cloves, ground ginger, soy sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Place the pork in a wok and sear the pork until browned. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes. Add the reserved liquid and ; name: plantation ribs ; ingredients: molasses, vinegar, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, spareribs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice. ; name: vienna country style ribs for pressure cooker ; ingredients: country-style pork ribs, prepared mustard, salt, black pepper, paprika, light olive oil, onion, beer ; preparation:

name: potato salad with bacon and parsley ; ingredients: new potatoes, kosher salt, black pepper, bacon, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley. ; name: roasted root vegetables with truffle oil thyme ; ingredients: red potatoes, carrots, parsnips, red onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme, salt & pepper, white truffle oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients together, and toss until all vegetables are coated with olive oil and spices. Spread vegetables into pan. Bake 45 minutes, removing from the oven and stirring twice during cooking. For crisper vegetables, cut cooking time a few minutes shorter. Switch oven setting to broiler. Place pan under the broiler for 7-10 minutes, sliding out and stirring vegetables once or twice. ; name: special spinach ; ingredients: spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, shallot, tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: potato corn and tomato salad ; ingredients: frozen corn, boiling potatoes, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil, red onion, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Season with salt ; name: vegetables provencale ; ingredients: onion, cooking oil, zucchini, green pepper, garlic clove, salt, pepper, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: shikshuka scrambled eggs and tomatoes ; ingredients: eggs, onion, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, ground cumin, ground coriander ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c. In a large mixing bowl, mix the eggs, onion, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, ground cumin, ground coriander. Spread this mixture evenly in a baking dish. Pour the crushed tomatoes and any juices over the potatoes. Pour water into the pan. Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes. After this time, reduce oven temperature to 180c, remove foil and bake an additional 30 minutes until the potatoes are tender and the sauce has thickened. ; name: thai steamed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, soy sauce, broth, onion, pepper, garlic, fresh coriander leaves ; preparation:Heat oil in a small frying pan and stir fry eggs until just starting to wilt. Cut 4 large squares of kitchen foi. Divide veg between them, and lay 2 pieces of fish on top of each square. In small bowl, mix together fish sauce, lime juice, chilli, soy sauce, sugar, coriander. Pour over fish. Seal foil together and place on baking tray. Place tray in oven and cook 10 minutes. Let packets sit for a couple of minutes before opening to prevent steam burns. Open and scatter fish with coriander. Serve with noodles. ; name: easter egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, purple onion, capers, frozen peas, curry powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches. ; name: creamy chicken curry pie ; ingredients: onion, garlic, frozen mixed vegetables, cooked chicken, water, milk, cream of chicken soup mix, curry powder, puff pastry ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving. ; name: shakshuka yemani basted eggs ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, tomatoes, eggs ; preparation:

name: greek style burgers ; ingredients: feta cheese, olive, steak sauce, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hamburger patties, pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: greek salad pita sandwich ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lemon juice, kalamata olives, dried oregano, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, pita breads ; preparation:Place the pita in a large resealable plastic bag. Add ceaser dressing. Seal bag and turn to coat. In a large nonstick skillet, saute pork in oil for 7-8 minutes or until juices run clear. Fill each pita half with pork, cucumber, and onion. Drizzle with cucumber dressing. ; name: greek potato patties ; ingredients: potatoes, reduced-fat feta cheese, spring onions, fresh dill, egg, lemon juice, ground black pepper, flour, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown. ; name: barbecue feta turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, feta cheese, olives, dried oregano, black pepper ; preparation:Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over high heat for 15 minutes or until no longer pink in center. Top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Grill pepper rings for two minutes. Place burgers on bun, top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Top with cheese during last ; name: greek appetizer bread ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, all purpose greek seasoning, french bread, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives, pepperoncini pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread. ; name: greek burger ; ingredients: feta cheese, kalamata olive, ground beef, dried oregano, salt, pepper, pita bread round, tzatziki ; preparation:

name: butter brickle dessert ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, saltine crumbs, butter, vanilla, instant vanilla pudding, milk, butter brickle ice cream, cool whip, heath candy bars ; preparation:In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving. ; name: boysenberry graham cracker dessert ; ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, milk, butter, boysenberries, mini marshmallows, whipped cream, nutmeats, lemon juice, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: pink lady dessert ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, orange juice, marshmallows, whipping cream, frozen raspberries ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f or mark 4. Bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm and brown on top. Remove from the oven and spread the jam on top of the pudding. Reduce the oven to 300f or mark 2. Whisk the egg whites stiffly and fold in the remaining caster sugar. Pour into the pie dish and bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm and brown on top. Pour into the pie dish and bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm ; name: lime pineapple dessert fluffy green stuff ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, water, sugar, lemon, juice of, evaporated milk, crushed pineapple, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Process until smooth. Spoon pineapple over the bottom of a greased deep-dish 9 inch pie plate. Pour batter over pineapple. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. ; name: hawaiian marshmallow dessert ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, margarine, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, pineapple juice, dream whip ; preparation:

name: spanish style clams ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, bay leaves, crushed tomatoes in puree, dry white wine, littleneck clams, hot pepper ; preparation:Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy. ; name: super simple clam chowder ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half ; preparation:In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half, salt and pepper. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half, salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through. ; name: clams with jalapeno lemon and basil ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, jalapeno, tomato sauce, dry white wine, fresh lemon juice, littleneck clams, fresh basil, lemon peel ; preparation:Melt butter in very large pot over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and jalapeo. Stir until garlic is golden, about 2 minutes. Add tomato sauce, wine, and lemon juice and bring to boil. Add clams. Cover and boil until clams open, about 9 minutes. Add basil and lemon peel. Season with pepper. Transfer clams and sauce to large bowl and serve. ; name: mussels steamed in broth ; ingredients: clam juice, tomatoes, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, tomato paste, mussels, butter, cilantro, green onion ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat add olive oil and onions. Cook until tender. Stir in garlic and cook stirring until golden. Stir in mussels, wine and broth and let simmer for 2-5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and anisette and let simmer for 5 minutes or so. Pour into bowls to serve. ; name: linguini with clams ; ingredients: clams, olive oil, margarine, garlic cloves, parsley, clam juice, linguine ; preparation:Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy. ; name: steamed clams for two ; ingredients: butter, white wine, water, parsley, hot pepper sauce, clams, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: diner style baked potato home fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, onion, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: oven roasted home fries ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, red peppers, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: baked chipotle sweet potato fries ; ingredients: sweet potato, olive oil, sea salt, chili, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time. ; name: sweet potato home fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, orange sweet potatoes, smoked paprika, kosher salt, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, shallots, black pepper, scallion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together olive oil, paprika and cinnamon. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes. ; name: baked fries ; ingredients: nonstick spray coating, baking potatoes, parmesan cheese, paprika, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: diner home fries from leftover baked potatoes ; ingredients: vegetable oil, potatoes, onion, green bell pepper, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, paprika ; preparation:

name: vegan chocolate pudding ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa powder, cornstarch, sea salt, soymilk, agave nectar, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine water and agar-agar flakes and bring to a boil. Gently simmer until agar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes. Add espresso and stir until dissolved. Cool slightly. In a food processor or blender, blend tofu, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla, salt and cooled espresso mixture until completely smooth. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight until firm. Serve topped with non-dairy topping. ; name: cinnamon raisin bread pudding with apples w vegan options ; ingredients: soymilk, vanilla extract, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, cinnamon-raisin bread, apple ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix dry ingredients together. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cinnamon. Add applesauce and mix well. Bake for 10 minutes. ; name: everyday vegan choco brownies ; ingredients: natural cane sugar, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsweetened applesauce, soft tofu, chocolate soymilk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. In a bowl combine flour, sugar, sifted cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. In a small bowl combine soy milk with oil and vanilla. Pour into the flour mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until the top is no longer shiny. Let cool about 20 minutes or more before slicing. ; name: quick and easy vegan brownies ; ingredients: plain flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, salt, water, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, sifted cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. In a small bowl combine soy milk with oil and vanilla. Pour into the flour mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until the top is no longer shiny. Let cool about 20 minutes or more before slicing. ; name: silky chocolate pudding vegan ; ingredients: pitted dates, hot water, unsweetened cocoa powder, salt, avocado, vanilla ; preparation:

name: peanutty apple s more ; ingredients: granny smith apple, cinnamon, peanut butter, graham cracker ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place sliced apples in 9 inch pie plate and sprinkle with orange juice and amaretto. Combine sugar, flour, and spices in a medium mixing bowl. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle mixture over apples evenly. Bake at 375 degrees f for 45 minutes until apples are tender and topping is crisp. May serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. ; name: chocolate raspberry s mores ; ingredients: chocolate graham crackers, marshmallows, chocolate candy bars, raspberries ; preparation:Add the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips. ; name: low fat peanut butter s more bars ; ingredients: brownie mix, egg substitute, non-fat vanilla yogurt, water, low-fat graham crackers, miniature marshmallow, peanut butter and milk chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: chips ahoy warm s mores ; ingredients: chocolate chip cookies, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, flaked coconut, mini marshmallows ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen. ; name: chocolate peanut butter s mores fondue ; ingredients: milk, peanut butter and milk chocolate chips, marshmallow creme, graham cracker crumbs, granny smith apples ; preparation:

name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: oat bran apple cinnamon muffins ; ingredients: oat bran, brown sugar, cinnamon, baking powder, raisins, skim milk, frozen apple juice concentrate, egg whites, canola oil, apple ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 12 cup muffin tin with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, bran flakes, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean. ; name: no fat banana applesauce muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, eggs, banana, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: apple muffins ; ingredients: cortland apples, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, whole milk, eggs, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean. ; name: no fat low sugar high fibre apple pear oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, cinnamon, oatmeal, brown sugar, apples, pears, skim milk, egg whites, nonfat plain yogurt ; preparation:

name: vegetable and stuffing bake ; ingredients: salad dressing, milk, seasoned stuffing mix, broccoli, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving. ; name: onion chicken stuffing bake ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, mushroom stems and pieces, sliced water chestnuts, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: one dish chicken stuffing bake ; ingredients: herb seasoned stuffing mix, boiling water, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: easy cheesy stuffed chicken ; ingredients: butter, zucchini, onion, stove top stuffing mix, cheese, chicken, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: so easy stuffing egg bake ; ingredients: oil, fresh mushrooms, eggs, milk, mayonnaise, chicken flavor stuffing mix, tomatoes, green onion, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: unsalted butter, heavy cream, salt, sugar, sweet potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a small pan and fry chili for 3-4 minutes over a low heat. Stir in chopped red pepper. Drain sweet potato and garlic and mash with 2 tbsp cream cheese and milk, adding more if needed. Stir red pepper, chili and coriander into mash. Add salt and black pepper to taste. ; name: candied sweet mashed potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, light brown sugar, butter, sweet sherry, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender. ; name: vanilla mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, half-and-half, pure vanilla extract, orange zest, butter, kosher salt, white pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: spicy mashed sweet potatoes with raisins ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, salt, butter, pepper, ginger, cinnamon, cayenne, brown sugar, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: best ever mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, heavy cream, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla, salt ; preparation:

name: sausages bell peppers ; ingredients: sausages, olive oil, onions, red peppers, green peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: mozzarella topped peppers with tomatoes and garlic ; ingredients: red bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Spread the pepperoni between two paper towels and blot to remove the excess grease. Brush the olive oil over the pizza crusts and cover with the pizza sauce. Next add the cheese, pepperoni, and tomatoes in that order. Finally topped with the chopped vegetables. Place pizzas on pizza stones or pizza pans. These really work better than cookie sheets. Change the oven temperature to 425 before putting the pizzas in the oven. Bake until the crust is a golden brown. About 15 minutes. ; name: bell pepper bean stew ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic clove, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, tomato puree, cannellini beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn. Stir until beginning to dry and brown, about 8 minutes. Transfer to small bowl. Add oil to skillet. Heat over medium-high heat. Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic. Saut until peppers are tender, about 8 minutes. Mix in cilantro and chili powder, then corn. Stir until heated through, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: broccoli and sweet peppers ; ingredients: broccoli, sweet red pepper, yellow sweet pepper, vegetable oil, onion, fresh gingerroot, chicken stock, soy sauce ; preparation:In a saucepot, bring 2 inches of water to a boil. Add broccoli. Cover. Cook for 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender. Place peppers and tomatoes in colander, pour in cooked broccoli and hot water to drain. In skillet over high heat, cook garlic in olive oil 1 minute. Add vegetables and seasoning blend. Cook 2 minutes. Arrange on serving platter. ; name: peperonata peppers tomatoes onions ; ingredients: red bell peppers, green bell peppers, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaves, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: creamy deviled eggs ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, paprika, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill. ; name: sweet sour deviled eggs ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, sugar, cider vinegar, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, paprika, parsley ; preparation:Cook eggs in simmering water for 15 minutes and cool. Cut hard boiled eggs in half lengthwise. Transfer yolks to small bowl and mash with fork. Mix in sour cream, mayonnaise, and mustard. Stir in lemon zest, lemon juice, and cayenne pepper. Add salt to your taste. Spoon yolk mixture into whites. Sprinkle generously with chopped parsley. Cover loosely and refrigerate. ; name: parker s deviled eggs ; ingredients: light mayonnaise, dill, mustard, cider vinegar, hard-boiled eggs, paprika, onion powder ; preparation:Slice eggs in half and remove yolks. Mash yolks, dill and powdered spices together first for smoother filling. Then add wet ingredients - mayo, mustard, vinegar. Stir until smooth. Spoon into egg halves and chill. ; name: blue smoke deviled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, tarragon-infused champagne vinegar, dry mustard, dijon mustard, cayenne, curry powder, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil eggs, shell and cut in half lengthwise. In small bowl mash the yolks with a fork. Stir in the sour cream, mayonnaise and the mustard. Stir in the lemon zest, lemon juice and cayenne pepper. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide mixture and spoon into egg halves. Garnish with fresh parsley or thyme. If not eating immediately, cover well and refrigerate. ; name: deviled eggs done bobby s way ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, miracle whip, prepared yellow mustard, sweet pickle relish, salt & pepper, paprika ; preparation:Peel shells off cooled hard-boiled eggs and slice into halves lengthwise. Remove yolks from whites and set aside in a small round bowl and mash with a fork into fine pieces. Add 2 tablespoons miracle whip, 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard, 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish, salt and pepper to taste. Stir mixture until creamy. Spoon mixture into a zip-locked sandwich bag, snip off one corner of bag. Squeeze mixture out of corner of bag into each white egg half. Sprinkle tops of filled deviled eggs with paprika. Chill in refrigerator 1-2 hours or until cold before serving. ; name: gourmet deviled eggs ; ingredients: russet potato, hard-boiled eggs, sour cream, fresh lemon juice, red onion, fresh dill, dijon mustard, smoked salmon ; preparation:

name: tomato chilli dip ; ingredients: red chilies, hot peppers, onions, tomatoes, shrimp paste, salt, sugar, oil ; preparation:Place tomato in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: onion and yoghurt dip ; ingredients: yoghurt, onion, coriander leaves, mint leaf, ginger, cumin seed, salt, mustard seeds, green chilies, red chili powder ; preparation:Peel and mince the onion. Clean, wash and chop corriander and mint leaves. Wash and mince the green chillies. Peel and chop the ginger. Roast and powder the cumin seeds. Powder the mustard seeds. Put the onions in water for 15 minutes. Drain thoroughly and keep aside. Blend the yoghurt with 2 tablespoons of water and seasonings. Beat till smooth. Stir in the rest of the ingredients. Serve garnished with a slit green chilli. ; name: red hot rice ; ingredients: butter, onion, uncooked rice, red pepper, chili powder, origanum, tomato juice, tomato puree, water, salt ; preparation:In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve. ; name: spicy mexican rice ; ingredients: red onion, garlic clove, salt, bacon grease, rotel diced tomatoes, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin, instant rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: a plaything for your tongue ; ingredients: chicken, yogurt, ginger paste, garlic paste, tomato puree, salt, red chili powder, black pepper, oil ; preparation:

name: almond sponge cake ; ingredients: egg whites, baking soda, salt, sugar, cornstarch, almond meal ; preparation:Whip the egg whites till very stiff with salt and baking soda. Add the sugar a little at a time while continuously beating. Mix cornstarch and almonds. Fold into meringue. Spread batter into two circles, roughly 21 cm in diameter, on baking paper. Bake in the middle of the oven at 150 degrees celcious for about an hour. Let cool on a grill. ; name: basic sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon extract, cake flour, salt, cream of tartar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean. ; name: sponge cake roll ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, whipping cream, powdered sugar, flavoring, fresh strawberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350c. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean. ; name: fluffy sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, caster sugar, cornflour, baking powder, cream, sugar, icing sugar, passion fruit pulp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c grease a patty tin or use paper cups. Sift flour and baking powder. Cream fat and sugar until mixture is light and creamy. Add in vanilla essence. Beat egg and add it gradually to the mixture, beating well after each addition. Fold in the sifted flour with a metal spoon. Add a little milk if necessary to give it a soft dropping consistency. Mix in the raisins. Fill greased patty tin or paper cups half full with the mixture. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: hot milk sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, skim milk, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean. ; name: sondra s passover sponge cake ; ingredients: cake crumbs, potato starch, eggs, sugar, orange, zest of, lemon, zest of, orange juice, walnuts ; preparation:

name: hot turkey sandwiches ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, water, butter, white bread, deli turkey, turkey gravy ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: hot roasted turkey mountain hot turkey sandwich ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter, water, bread, cooked turkey breast, turkey gravy ; preparation:Heat a large non stick skillet or the grill to medium heat. Butter each slice of bread on one side, turn 4 slices butter facing down. Put 1 slice of cheese each on 4 slices of bread. Spread 1-2 tbsp marinara sauce over the cheese. Sprinkle evenly with parmesan. Layer each with even amounts of turkey. Top each with another slice of cheese. Top with remaining bread, butter side facing up. Grill sandwiches until bread is golden brown, about 3 minutes per side. Slice diagonally and serve. ; name: turkey ham swiss grilled cheese ; ingredients: ranch dressing, sourdough bread, smoked turkey, maple ham, swiss cheese, pickles, butter ; preparation:Put butter on one side of each piece of bread. Put ham and cheese onto the bread then cook like you would grilled cheese. In a pan with butter, or stick on an electric grill. Cook on each side till brown. Open sandwich on side without cheese and add your condiments. ; name: blushing turkey and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: french rolls, goat cheese, bing cherries, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh basil, deli turkey, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts. ; name: colbys turkey breast cheese sandwich ; ingredients: turkey breast, butter, white bread, provolone cheese ; preparation:First butter all four slice of bread. Heat skillet on medium heat, the add the 2 slices of bread butter side down on skillet, add provolone, then turkey. Top with the other pieces of bread butter side up. Cook for about 3 minutes until toasted well but not burnt, flip and cook the other side for another 3 minutes or so. Cut in half and serve. ; name: hot turkey and cheddar cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: sourdough bread, smoked turkey breast, cheddar cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: wild rice and chicken casserole ; ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, green onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, hollandaise sauce mix, water, cooked chicken, frozen broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: wild rice and turkey casserole ; ingredients: cooked white rice, cooked wild rice, cooked turkey breast, lowfat mozzarella cheese, fat-free evaporated milk, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, eggs, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: sausage and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: wild rice, sausage links, onion, celery salt, mushrooms, water, cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan brown sausage, drain well and crumble. Set aside. In same pan saute onion and celery in 1 teaspoon oil. Mix in carrots and sausage. Place uncooked rice in bottom of a 9 x 9 or 3 quart baking dish. Place sausage mixture in baking dish on top of uncooked rice. In a medium size bowl mix soup, chicken broth, water, dry ranch mix and salt. Pour over sausage mixture and cover with foil. Bake in a 350 degree oven for approximately 50 minutes. ; name: wild rice chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, boiling water, milk, onion, cream of mushroom soup, long grain rice, mushroom ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. Blend in soup and next 6 ingredients. Mix gently. Add broth and mix. Spread in a 9x13x2 inch dish. Sprinkle with topping. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour. ; name: nif s wild rice casserole ; ingredients: wild rice, olive oil, mushroom, onion, old cheddar cheese, tomatoes, salt, water, slivered almonds ; preparation:

name: crisp peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, peanut butter, granulated sugar, dark brown sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: fruity cookie crispies ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vegetable oil, water, egg, fruity pebbles cereal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: dietetic cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, splenda granular, egg, vanilla, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Combine margarine, sugar, egg, vanilla and cinnamon. Stir until creamy and smooth. I microwave the margarine for about 30 seconds to soften. Add flour and baking powder and stir until completely combined. Add oats and then chocolate chips. Spoon onto greased cookie sheets with a soup spoon with about an inch between each cookie. Bake at 350 f for 11 minutes. I used two sheets in the oven at once, and if you do that, switch the bottom sheet with the top sheet after about 5 minutes and then continue cookie. Let cool. ; name: crispy quinoa cookies wheat free ; ingredients: honey, brown sugar, margarine, peanut butter, vanilla, rice flour, quinoa, baking soda, salt, nuts ; preparation:

name: marinated feta with greek olives appetizer ; ingredients: feta cheese, black greek olive, roasted red peppers, olive oil, red onion, garlic, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:Place feta cheese in a bowl.
