In a jar with a tight fitting lid, add all the other ingredients and cap jar. Shake until well blended. Pour over feta and stir gently as not to break up cubes. Divide mixture between 2 half pint jars with lids. Store in the fridge for up to a week. To serve, let cheese come to room temp for about 30 minutes. Serve with assorted crackers, chips or crisp breads. Makes 2 half pint jars. To serve as a spread, mash cheese with some of the marinade to desired thickness. ; name: italian shrimp fettuccine ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh mushrooms, green onions, garlic, diced tomatoes, fresh parsley, white wine, fettuccine, raw shrimp, lemon juice ; preparation:Cook fettuccini according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute the peas, red pepper, carrots, and garlic in 2 tablespoons of the oil until tender. Remove from skillet. Add remaining oil to skillet and saute shrimp until pink in color. Return vegetables to skillet. Mix well. Drain pasta. Place pasta on serving dishes, drizzle with aflredo sauce, and top with shrimp mixture. ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: feta and mint rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, long grain brown rice, chicken stock, salt, feta cheese, of fresh mint, orange zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add garlic and saut for 2 minutes. Add drained tomatoes, basil, oregano, chili flakes and salt. Bring to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently and breaking up the tomatoes as they cook. In a medium bowl, toss artichoke quarters, rice and feta together. Pour into a medium oiled casserole dish when tomato sauce is ready, pour over the rice mixture, shaking the dish so the tomato sauce settles. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: garides saganaki greek shrimp with feta ; ingredients: large shrimp, oregano, lemon juice, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, feta cheese, cream, green onion, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: 25 clove garlic soup ; ingredients: garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche ; preparation:Heat oil in a pot and saute garlic until golden brown. Add garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche. Stir, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Add more water if soup appears too thick. Stir in cheese and serve. ; name: black bean onion soup ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, canola oil, black beans, water, green pepper, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: tomato and garlic soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, chicken broth, plum tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: hearty cream of tomato basil soup ; ingredients: fresh basil, onion, butter, paprika, garlic cloves, cream cheese, cream of tomato soup, milk, stewed tomatoes ; preparation:In a 2 to 3 quart pan, combine butter, onion, flour, milk, crushed tomatoes, herbs, salt and pepper. Stir occasionally over medium heat until onion is limp and slightly tinged with brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in flour to coat onion. Gradually stir in broth, and bring to a boil on high heat. Add potato and carrots. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in basil. Ladle into bowl and offer cheese to add to taste. ; name: garlic soup with potatoes and cumin ; ingredients: garlic cloves, vegetable broth, olive oil, salt, bay leaf, sage, potatoes, cumin, egg yolks, gruyere ; preparation:In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, saute the garlic until aromatic. Add the potatoes, and saute for another minute or so, then add the broth. Scramble the egg, parmesean cheese, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a serving bowl. When the broth comes to a boil, add the egg mixture while stirring. Remove from heat, place in a bowl, top with fresh ground pepper, and enjoy. ; name: cream of garlic soup with cilantro ; ingredients: garlic, onions, water, butter, heavy cream, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: chili s monterey chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce, crisp bacon, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Pound out the chicken breasts to flatten. Season each with a little southwest seasoning. Cook the chicken in a skillet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray over medium-low heat until no longer pink. Place each breast onto a baking sheet and top each breast with 2 tablespoon of barbeque sauce, 2 tablespoon cheese, 2 tablespoon rotel tomatoes, green onions and 1 tablespoon of bacon bits. Place into the oven and bake until the cheese has melted. Place into the ; name: chicken breast with chili cheese ; ingredients: chicken breasts, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilis, green onion, bacon, avocado, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: bacon jack chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, butter, bacon, onion, fresh mushrooms, monterey jack pepper cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: chicken something casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, dry onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, quick-cooking rice, water ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: christi s heavenly catalina chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, catalina dressing, bacon, monterey jack cheese, green onion ; preparation:

name: spinach salad with bacon and croutons ; ingredients: bacon, sandwich bread, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, baby spinach, cucumber, buttermilk, mayonnaise, fresh herbs ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the bacon and croutons. Mix well. Cook just until the bacon is cooked through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: goat cheese salad ; ingredients: beets, olive oil, lettuce, pineapple, avocado, goat cheese ; preparation:Put the beets in a large saucepan. Cover with cold water, bring to the boil. Simmer 40 minutes or till tender, cool in pan. Drain beetroot. Use your hands to rub off skin. Combine beetroot, rocket, onion, cheese and pinenuts in serving bowl. Shake oil, juice and sugar together. Season to taste. Drizzle salad with dressing just before serving. ; name: warm spinach and dried fig salad from sun maid ; ingredients: red onions, olive oil, dried mission figs, brown sugar, sherry wine vinegar, baby spinach leaves, feta cheese, hazelnuts, cracked black pepper ; preparation:To make dressing, combine all ingredients in a pan and bring to the boil. Set aside. Preheated oven to 200c. Toss pumpkin lightly in 2 tablespoons of the vegetable oil, place in baking tray and baked in until golden brown, about 45 minutes. Heat remaining oil in wok and stir-fry prawns until just cooked, about 2-3 minutes. Drizzle half the dressing over the prawns and toss to coat. To assemble, combine pumpkin, baby spinach and onion in a bowl. Divide mixture between individual serving plates. Arrange prawns on top of salad and drizzle remaining dressing around the plates. ; name: goats cheese salad with tomatoes peppers and rocket ; ingredients: red peppers, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, goat cheese, pine nuts, rocket, basil ; preparation:Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place tomatoes on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide tomatoes among serving plates. Top with tomatoes peppers and rocket, and drizzle with vinaigrette. ; name: spinach strawberry salad with goat cheese bruschetta ; ingredients: spinach, strawberries, poppy seed dressing, slivered almonds, goat cheese, french bread ; preparation:

name: graham cracker bars ; ingredients: graham cracker, brown sugar, coconut, milk, butter, graham crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars. ; name: graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, oleo, brown sugar, nuts ; preparation:Lay graham crackers in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Boil oleo and brown sugar 4 minutes. Pour over graham crackers. Sprinkle top with nuts. Bake at 350 for 6-8 minutes. ; name: 100 whole wheat graham crackers or pie crust ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, honey, water, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Mix together flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda. In a seperate bowl combine flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda. In a separate bowl combine honey and butter then pour into dry ingredients. Mix well then drop onto a greased baking sheet. Press out the mixture to the corners of the baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes. Cut them quickly when they come out or use cookie cutter for fun shapes. ; name: almond graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: graham cracker squares, butter, brown sugar, sliced almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars. ; name: boysenberry graham cracker dessert ; ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, milk, butter, boysenberries, mini marshmallows, whipped cream, nutmeats, lemon juice, cornstarch ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: homemade graham crackers ; ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, flour, graham flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, sour milk, vanilla ; preparation:

name: fruitful pie ; ingredients: pie crust, sugar, cornstarch, water, jello gelatin, fruit, cool whip ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the pies into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the pies and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: amazing coconut pie ; ingredients: milk, sugar, biscuit mix, eggs, butter, vanilla, flaked coconut ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool. ; name: texas pecan pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell ; preparation:Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for about 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top. ; name: creamy lemon pie ; ingredients: milk, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, frozen lemonade concentrate, cool whip topping, graham cracker pie crust, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight. ; name: water pie ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unbaked pie shells, butter, vanilla, cold water ; preparation:Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until mixed well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping. ; name: worth a million dollars pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip, maraschino cherries, pie shells ; preparation:

name: sticky sesame chicken wings ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, sesame oil, cayenne, chicken wings, sesame seeds, scallion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve. ; name: sticky chicken ; ingredients: sugar, soy sauce, white wine, water, garlic, chicken thighs ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, covered for 20 - 25 minutes or until nice and crispy and cooked through. Turn about 4 or 5 times to avoid burning. Drain on paper towels and serve hot with rice or noodles. ; name: oriental hot wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, maple syrup, soy sauce, ginger, ground red pepper, ketchup, dry mustard, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In large bowl mix teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, minced garlic, sesame seeds, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, maple syrup. Place chicken in sauce and toss to coat. Pour chicken and sauce into a large disposable baking pan. Bake for 1 hour, tossing every 20 minutes. The liquid will gradually evaporate the longer you cook it. After 1 hour, increase the oven temperature to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Turn wings to coat evenly and cook for an additional 45 minutes. ; name: barbecued wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, tomato sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. In a shallow baking pan, arrange the chicken wings so they do not touch each other. Bake for 30 minutes. In small sauce pan combine the tomato sauce, sugar and soy sauce and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm. ; name: hot chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, oil, hot sauce, butter ; preparation:Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add wing pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone. ; name: mama s sticky wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, italian salad dressing, worcestershire sauce, spicy mustard ; preparation:

name: dees pineapple chicken breast ; ingredients: bell pepper, crushed pineapple, chicken breasts, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: pineapple mandarin ginger chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, skinless chicken breast halves, pepper, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, cornstarch, green onion, brown sugar, fresh ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: raspberry pineapple chicken nibbles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh ground pepper, vegetable oil, seedless raspberry preserves, chili sauce, pineapple chunks ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: spicy chicken with pineapple ; ingredients: cooking oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, paprika, chili powder, red pepper, pineapple slices in juice, tomatoes, red kidney beans ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: low fat pineapple chicken stir fry ; ingredients: light soy sauce, sugar, cider vinegar, ketchup, ground ginger, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, stir fry vegetables, unsweetened pineapple chunks ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving. ; name: pineapple baked chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, lime juice, dijon mustard, light soy sauce ; preparation:

name: spicy cajun shrimp and sausages ; ingredients: large shrimp, creole seasoning, vegetable oil, andouille sausages, onion, green pepper, dried thyme, chicken broth, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine shrimp, creole seasoning, vegetable oil, andouille sausages. Toss to coat& set aside. In a large skillet, saute onion& garlic in vegetable oil until tender. Add soup, milk, and paprika, and bring to a boil. Add seasoned shrimp and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: chicken and andouille sausage with peppers ww 5 points ; ingredients: cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cajun spices, garlic powder, andouille sausage, red pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, tomato paste ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Bake cut up sausages for about 20 minute while sausage is cooking put onion and oil in large skillet saute chicken breasts, cajun spices, garlic powder, andouille sausage, red pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, tomato pastepreparation:Preheat oven to 400. Bake cut up sausages for about 20 minute while sausage is cooking put onion and oil in ; name: spicy cajun chicken with capers and lemons ; ingredients: unbleached flour, cajun seasoning, paprika, skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, olive oil, chicken stock, fresh lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve. ; name: cajun chicken sausage pasta ; ingredients: grilled chicken breast strips, cajun seasoning, low-fat smoked sausage, fresh mushrooms, onion, green bell pepper, diced tomatoes with jalapenos, fettuccine pasta, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook chicken and onions until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, and chiles. Cook over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, ; name: cajun chicken and sausage saute ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, andouille sausage, boneless skinless chicken breast half, diced tomatoes, cajun seasoning, celery salt ; preparation:

name: lemon chicken kabobs ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, dried thyme, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, sweet green peppers ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once. ; name: honey chicken kabobs ; ingredients: vegetable oil, honey, soy sauce, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, onions, mushroom ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 hours. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: chicken mango kabobs ; ingredients: olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cayenne pepper, salt, sugar, chicken breast halves, mangoes ; preparation:Heat the ghee, then add the onions and cook until golden, about 5 or 6 minutes. Add the chicken bouillon and water. Once the mixture boils, stir in the rice. Cover, reduce heat and cook on low for about 25 minutes until rice is tender. Serve rice with chicken on top. Garnish with toasted almonds. ; name: bbq caribbean beef kabobs ; ingredients: beef, lemon juice, lite olive oil, honey, hot pepper, fresh ginger, soy sauce, allspice, cinnamon, clove ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 minutes. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: pick me up party chicken kabobs ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast, garlic, salt, cumin, paprika, thyme, olive oil, lemon juice, cayenne, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken with roasted red pepper sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, red wine vinegar, roasted red peppers, parmesan cheese, parsley sprig ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Saut chicken portions in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and put in a casserole dish. Heat remaining oil. Add onion and garlic, and cook for 3 minutes. Add peppers and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add tinned tomatoes and herbs and simmer for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over the chicken and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: orange teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen vegetables, quick-cooking tapioca, chicken stock, orange marmalade, teriyaki sauce, dry mustard, ground ginger ; preparation:In a skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours. ; name: asian grilled chicken salad ; ingredients: ground ginger, honey, red wine vinegar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, mixed greens ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: oven fried creole chicken ; ingredients: chicken, sour cream, dry breadcrumbs, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, cayenne pepper, thyme ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: kahlua paradise chicken ; ingredients: frying chickens, chicken broth, kahlua, red wine vinegar, heinz ketchup, soy sauce, cornstarch, garlic, ginger ; preparation:

name: banana raspberry bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, shortening, sugar, eggs, bananas, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 9 x 5 x3 inch loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: coconut banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, yoghurt, flour, baking powder, baking soda, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: brown sugar banana bread ; ingredients: unbleached white flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg whites, canola oil, brown sugar, vanilla, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: lynne s banana bread ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour batter into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: banana and strawberry bread ; ingredients: bananas, eggs, brown sugar, buttermilk, olive oil, self-raising flour, plain flour, baking powder, cinnamon, strawberry jam ; preparation:

name: cranberry banana oat muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, oats, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, bananas, butter, cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20-25 minute until done. ; name: cranberry cornbread ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, buttermilk, cranberries, cornmeal, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: apple cranberry pudding ; ingredients: cooking apple, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, cranberries, butter, sugar, eggs, ground almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine sugar, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Mix well. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cranberry pecan muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, dried cranberries, pecans, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: cranberry kissel ; ingredients: cranberries, water, sugar, potato flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Combine the sugar, flour and butter, using a pastry blender. Pour cranberry kissel into prepared dish and cover with the flour mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes. Cut into 9 pieces and serve warm or cold. ; name: baked cranberry oatmeal ; ingredients: skim milk, brown sugar, margarine, ground cinnamon, old fashioned oats, apples, dried cranberries, walnuts ; preparation:

name: garlic mashed potatoes ii ; ingredients: garlic cloves, butter, potatoes, flour, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic herb mashed potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, milk, garlic & herb spreadable cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350, wrap garlic in foil, roast about 1 hour. Peel and put in a small bowl, and mash. Cook potatoes in pot of boiling water until tender, about 20 minutes, drain. Heat oil in pot over medium heat, add garlic and shallots. Saute 2 minutes. Add to potatoes, mash potatoes with garlic and shallots, add the butter, cheese and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: country herb mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, garlic, milk, butter, fresh rosemary, fresh chives, fresh parsley, sour cream, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the garlic. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies. ; name: roasted garlic make ahead mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, chicken broth, cream cheese, roasted garlic clove, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: perfect roasted potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, cornstarch, garlic powder, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, garlic clove, parsley, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: mashed potatoes with roasted garlic and herbs ; ingredients: potatoes, cream, butter, salt, pepper, roasted garlic cloves, lavender flowers ; preparation:

name: green chili soup ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic cloves, cumin, black pepper, oregano, potatoes, chicken broth, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl. ; name: chicken soup with rice ; ingredients: chicken parts, onion, carrot, celery ribs, garlic cloves, parsley, whole cloves, dried thyme, salt and pepper, long grain white rice ; preparation:In a stock pot, place chicken parts, onion, carrot, celery ribs, garlic cloves, parsley, whole cloves, dried thyme, salt and pepper, long grain white rice. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment. ; name: rice broccoli soup ; ingredients: cooked brown rice, frozen broccoli, cream of chicken and mushroom soup, low-fat milk, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, black pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed. ; name: stuffed pepper soup ; ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, ground beef, green peppers, onion, chunky tomato pasta sauce, italian-style diced tomatoes, beef broth ; preparation:In a pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: green chile chicken soup ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, chicken broth, chicken, green chili pepper, garlic powder, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: easy appetizer meatballs ; ingredients: meatballs, brown gravy mix, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, water ; preparation:In a 2qt saucepan, mix the brown gravy according to package directions. Once gravy is thickened, add the cream of mushroom soup and sour cream. Blend well. Place the thawed or partially thawed meatballs in a crockpot. Add the gravy to crockpot and heat on low. May be served over rice, noodles, or potatoes. ; name: grape flavored meatballs ; ingredients: chili sauce, grape jelly, brown sugar, ground beef, egg, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, italian seasoning mix, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: apple and turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, fresh breadcrumbs, apple, egg, thyme, flour, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: busy day meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, egg, soft breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, vinegar ; preparation:Put meatballs in crock pot. In a medium sized bowl mix together all remaining ingredients. Microwave on high for approximately 3 minutes or until boiling. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour. Cook on low for 3 hours, ; name: wine meatball appetizer ; ingredients: ground sirloin, dry onion soup mix, egg, cracker crumb, ketchup, apple jelly, blackberry wine ; preparation:

name: coconut oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, rolled oats, coconut, baking powder, baking soda, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: easy oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: spice cake mix, egg whites, quick-cooking oats, vegetable oil, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack. ; name: oatmeal drop cookies ; ingredients: margarine, milk, granulated sugar, cocoa, peanut butter, vanilla, oatmeal ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: peanut butter no bake cookies ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, milk, peanut butter, vanilla, rolled oats ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, margarine, milk and peanut butter. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. ; name: sultana oat cookies ; ingredients: self raising flour, muesli, sultana, rolled oats, brown sugar, butter, egg, honey ; preparation:

name: ham delights ; ingredients: butter, prepared mustard, poppy seeds, onion, worcestershire sauce, rolls, ham, swiss cheese ; preparation:Saute onion in butter till tender. Add mustard, worcestershire sauce and poppy seeds. Place in refrigerator until it reaches spreading consistency. Open the rolls, spread both sides with the mixture. Place small amount of ham and cheese on roll and replace the top of the roll. Cover with foil and heat at 425 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: ham balls in sauce ; ingredients: ground ham, ground pork, ground beef, eggs, milk, graham cracker crumbs, tomato soup, vinegar, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix ham ball ingredients together. I use a stand mixer, but this can be done by hand. Form mixture into large meatballs. Place in a 9x13 pan. Combine sauce ingredients and pour over meatballs in pan. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. If desired, spoon some of the sauce over the meatballs a couple times as they bake to keep the tops moist. ; name: tasty ham olive spread ; ingredients: cooked ham, mayonnaise, celery, green onions, dijon mustard, green olives, parsley, salt and fresh pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:In a medium bowl combine the first 6 ingredients together. In a small bowl mix together the mayonnaise and yellow mustard until well combined. Add to the mixture in the ham mixture. Mix to combine. Season with black pepper to taste. Cover and chill a minimum of 2 or more hours before using. ; name: egg and ham sandwich england ; ingredients: eggs, butter, curry powder, mayonnaise, bread, ham ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham and egg pie ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, ham, white sauce, yellow mustard, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly oil a 12 hole muffin pan. Line moulds with a slice of ham so the ends stick out over the top. Break an egg into each hollow, top with tomato and scatter with chives, parmesan, salt and pepper. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is set. Remove from oven and leave to cool for 5 minutes. Run a knife around each mould to loosen ham. Cool on rack. ; name: ham stacks ; ingredients: horseradish, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, pepper, cream cheese, deli ham ; preparation:

name: special rhubarb cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, rhubarb ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Butter 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Alternate adding milk in 2 additions and fold in flour in 3 additions. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipped cream. ; name: simple rhubarb cake ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, shortening, egg, baking soda, vanilla, sour milk, flour, rhubarb, cinnamon-sugar mixture ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 inch pan. Cream together both sugars and shortening. Add egg and mix together. Mix in all remaining ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and sugar. Bake for 35 minutes or until toothpic comes out clean. ; name: apple rhubarb pie ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, butter, orange zest, salt, rhubarb, baking apples, sugar, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Place rhubarb in a bowl and cover with boiling water for about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, with a mixer, mix sugar, egg, butter and flour until smooth. Strain rhubarb well. With wooden spoon, add strawberries and rhubarb to batter and mix. Pour into uncooked pie shell. Mix topping ingredients with a fork, and sprinkle over uncooked pie. Bake at 375 for 50 minutes or until set. Top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: butterscotch pudding cake quick and easy ; ingredients: butterscotch pudding mix, yellow cake mix, butterscotch chips, nuts ; preparation:Cream butter and granulated sugar. Add butter and granulated sugar. Mix until smooth. Spread into greased 8x13-inch pan. Boil water and dissolve brown sugar. Pour over batter. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: rhubarb pudding cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: soft heaven chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: different chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, oil, eggs, vanilla, kosher salt, baking powder, all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: chocolate chip cookies from cooking light ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, sugar, butter, vanilla, egg whites, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: very delicious chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, baking soda, vanilla, eggs, instant vanilla pudding, flour, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: tomato and garlic soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, chicken broth, plum tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: tomato and spinach soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onion, sugar, dried oregano, whipping cream, frozen chopped spinach, fresh basil, milk, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired. ; name: onion and tomato noodle soup ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, garlic, noodles, salt and pepper, water ; preparation:In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender. ; name: tomato pasta and spinach soup ; ingredients: minced garlic clove, oil, water, crushed tomatoes, chicken bouillon cubes, dried sage, shell pasta, frozen chopped spinach, white kidney beans, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives. ; name: tomato onion soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, sliced mushrooms, kluski noodles, basil, crushed tomatoes, water, crouton, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: the best peanut butter fudge ever ; ingredients: sugar, salt, white corn syrup, peanut butter, whole milk, butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add butter and peanut butter. Stir around a few times and let cool slightly. Then add vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares. ; name: gluten free chocolate fudge cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, bittersweet chocolate, unsweetened chocolate, walnuts, salted butter, eggs, sugar, rice flour, vanilla, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Melt chocolate chips and butter on low heat. Stir then add eagle brand milk,. Flour, nuts and vanilla. Cool. Spoon by teaspoon onto greased pan. Bake at 325f for 10-12 minutes. ; name: peanut butter chocolate chip fudge ; ingredients: granulated sugar, brown sugar, fat-free evaporated milk, butter, light corn syrup, salt, natural-style peanut butter, vanilla extract, cooking spray, semisweet mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add semisweet mini chocolate chips. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool. Cut when hard. ; name: gluten free chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: vegan margarine, brown sugar, caster sugar, egg, rice flour, soy flour, dark chocolate ; preparation:Cream margarine. Add gradually and beat in brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift and stir in flour, salt, baking soda. Add chocolate chips. Bake 10 minutes at 375. ; name: easiest chocolate peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, peanut butter, vanilla flavoring, pecans ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, milk, vanilla flavoring, pecans. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares. ; name: rich peanut butter fudge gluten free vegan ; ingredients: vegan margarine, brown sugar, milk, natural-style peanut butter, vanilla extract, icing sugar ; preparation:

name: country ham quiche ; ingredients: pie shells, eggs, half-and-half, ham, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, black pepper, ground red pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 8 or 9 inch pie plate. Mix eggs in large bowl. Add shredded cheeses, folding. Fold in milk. Add salt and pepper to taste and any other spice to taste. Add any meats or veggies at this time, fold gently. Pour into pie plate and spread out. Bake for about 40 minutes. ; name: asparagus with country ham and egg gravy ; ingredients: asparagus, country ham, unsalted butter, unbleached all-purpose flour, whole milk, hard-boiled eggs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh dill ; preparation:In large skillet, melt butter, stir in flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk, cook until bubbly. Add cheese, salt and pepper, mix well. Remove from heat. Put 3 pieces asparagus on each ham slice. Roll up and place in 13x9 baking pan. Cover with the cheese sauce. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. ; name: ham asparagus pie ; ingredients: crescent rolls, ham, asparagus spears, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Spray a pie plate with vegetable spray. Press rolls out evenly into a 9-inch pie plate. Combine all remaining ingredients and pour into crust. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes before cutting. ; name: hash brown quiche ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, butter, eggs, half-and-half, cooked ham, green onion, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: baked asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender. ; name: asparagus ham quiche ; ingredients: asparagus, ham, swiss cheese, onion, eggs, milk, buttermilk baking mix, dried vegetable flakes, pepper ; preparation:

name: bacon jack chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, butter, bacon, onion, fresh mushrooms, monterey jack pepper cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: homemade chicken bacon sausages ; ingredients: chicken breasts, streaky bacon, dried chives, dried thyme, dried rosemary, dried sage, ground pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic ; preparation:Preheat grill. Finely dice the bacon. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes. ; name: blt fried egg and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: bacon, monterey jack cheese, white bread, mayonnaise, tomatoes, butter lettuce, unsalted butter, egg ; preparation:Slice the sandwich in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: italian chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, light italian dressing, french bread, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: bacon jack chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: bacon, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, poultry seasoning, monterey jack pepper cheese, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, onion, dill pickle slices ; preparation:

name: deluxe acorn squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, ground pork, apple, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes. ; name: roasted acorn squash with bourbon ; ingredients: acorn squash, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly. ; name: squash with apples cranberries ; ingredients: acorn squash, butter, apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes. ; name: baked butternut squash with apples and maple syrup ; ingredients: butternut squash, granny smith apples, dried currant, nutmeg, salt and pepper, pure maple syrup, butter, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Combine the chopped butternut squash, granny smith apples, dried currant, nutmeg, salt and pepper. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve warm over ice cream if desired. ; name: low calorie baked acorn squash with orange ; ingredients: acorn squash, fresh orange juice, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes. ; name: pureed acorn squash with maple syrup ; ingredients: acorn squash, water, unsalted butter, maple syrup, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: crabmeat dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, prepared horseradish, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine everything in a small bowl that can be put in the oven or toaster oven. Stir together until fairly smooth. Place in the oven at 350 degrees for 30 minutes until edges are brown. Let cool for 30 minutes and serve with triscuits. Best served warm. ; name: shrimp cream cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, chili sauce, baby shrimp, parsley, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: creamy baked crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, green onions, milk, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: crab dip surprise ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, crabmeat, seafood cocktail sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, white onion, tomatoes, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: best crab dip on the planet ; ingredients: fat free cream cheese, jumbo lump crab meat, green onion, parmesan cheese, garlic, marinated artichoke hearts, crushed red pepper flakes, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: creamy mexican crab dip ; ingredients: neufchatel cheese, fat-free cream cheese, lump crabmeat, salsa ; preparation:

name: beef soup with barley ; ingredients: beef stock, onion, pearl barley, beef, carrots, potatoes, celery ribs, dried rosemary ; preparation:Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced barley and bring to a boil. Cook until barley is tender, about 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: creamed vegetable soup ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, onion, frozen mixed vegetables, ham, creamed corn, chicken broth, fat free cream cheese, skim milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, celery ribs, vegetable broth, creamed corn, bay leaf, paprika, green onion toppreparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with ; name: irish potato soup ; ingredients: russet potatoes, water, onions, bay leaf, half-and-half, salt, pepper, butter, smoked sausage ; preparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, and celery. Stir and cook until potatoes are soft. Add liquefied potatoes, cooked cream corn, bay leaf, and paprika, stir. Add green onions, stir. ; name: vegetable beef with rice soup ; ingredients: ground beef, oil, rice, diced tomatoes, beef broth, water, frozen mixed vegetables, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a rice pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: yorkshire corned beef hash soup ; ingredients: cold water, bay leaves, green lentils, onion, carrots, button mushrooms, potato, beef stock cube, corned beef ; preparation:

name: jalapeno popper dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, green chilies, jalapeno peppers, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place the peppers on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side. ; name: hot beef and cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, milk, dried beef, green onions, green peppers, chopped pimiento, pepper, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: cream cheese salsa dip w cheddar olives ; ingredients: cream cheese, salsa, cheddar cheese, black olives ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: jalapeno cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, hormel dried beef, jalapeno pepper, pecans ; preparation:In medium to large bowl, combine cream cheese, cheddar cheese, and cinnamon. Beat until well blended. Stir in apples until evenly distributed. Shape mixture into a ball by rolling it around inside the bowl. Once ball is formed, pour crushed nuts into a second bowl, and roll cheese ball in the crushed nuts until the outside is covered. Presenting the cheese ball on a plate, place cinnamon stick and bay leaf in the top of the ball to make it look like an apple. ; name: pepper cream cheese dip and spread ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, cherry peppers, jalapenos ; preparation:

name: cream of carrot soup ; ingredients: onion, butter, carrots, potato, fat free chicken broth, ginger powder, evaporated milk, dried rosemary, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until smooth cook and stir over med heat for 2 minutes. Add cream, lemon juice, lemon zest and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for at least 5 minutes but do not boil. Garnish with chopped parsley and very thin slices of carrot. ; name: orange carrot soup ; ingredients: butter, carrots, onion, vegetable stock, orange juice, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, salt, plain yogurt, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onions, carrots, celery, salt, and chili paste. Stirring frequently, saute the vegetables over high heat for 5 minutes. Add in the water, cover the pot, and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until the carrots are soft. Add in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice. Stir to combine. Puree the soup in batches using an electric blender. Reheat soup if necessary and serve hot. ; name: carrot and ginger soup ww ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, celery, ginger, vegetable stock cubes, boiling water, carrot, plain low-fat yogurt ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan add leeks and garlic and cook until soft. Add carrots, pumpkin, stock and water and cook covered until pumpkin is soft. Spoon 2 cups of liquid out, blend or process soup until smooth. Add pepper to your liking. Serve soup in bowls pour a about 1-2 tablespoons of cream over top and serve immediately. Makes about 6-8 servings great for lunches or as a starter. ; name: creamy carrot white bean and pear soup ; ingredients: butter, leek, water, carrots, canned white beans, pear, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and saut for about 3 minutes, until translucent. Add the carrots, broth and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered for about 20 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Stir in the chiles, leek, water, carrots, canned white beans, pear, fresh rosemary. Cool and pure the soup with a food processor, blender or immersion blender. The easiest way to puree is to add the solid ingredients to your food processor with just enough liquid to puree and then mix this thick pureed mixture back into the broth. Reheat, if necessary and serve warm. ; name: carrot and apple soup ; ingredients: carrot, granny smith apples, canned chicken broth, ground nutmeg, fat-free evaporated milk ; preparation:

name: chocolate covered peanut butter krispies ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, smooth peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar& corn syrup. Stir. Occasionally, bring to a boil over medium heat. And boil 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter until smooth. Pour over cereal, stir to coat well. Press evenly into 9 inch square pan coated. With shortening or cooking spray. Cool completely. Invert pan on cutting board. And cut into bars. ; name: chocolate crispy bars rice krispies ; ingredients: sugar, white syrup, chunky peanut butter, chocolate chips, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: peanut butter rice krispies bars no bake ; ingredients: sugar, light brown sugar, light corn syrup, creamy peanut butter, vanilla, rice krispies, salted peanuts ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: easy frozen peanut butter rice krispie treat bars ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, butter, rice krispies ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: peanut butter and chocolate chip rice krispies balls ; ingredients: chocolate-covered english toffee bars, rice krispies, chunky peanut butter, marshmallows, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, canola oil ; preparation:

name: easy make ahead turkey gravy ; ingredients: butter, flour, chicken broth, salt and pepper, pan drippings from turkey ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or until tender, stirring occassionally. Add cooked turkey. Blend water, gravy mix, milk, flour, and season-all. Pour over turkey gravy mixture. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: turkey and dressing patties with gravy ; ingredients: cooked turkey, turkey stuffing, turkey gravy, breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together, cut up large pieces of turkey in the patties. Bake on the preheated grill for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool. ; name: mini turkey meatloaves ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, onion, prepared horseradish, dried parsley, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: what to do with ground turkey ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, curry powder, oregano, thyme, red wine vinegar, vegetables ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: turkey dinner casserole ; ingredients: turkey gravy, mixed vegetables, prepared stuffing, cooked turkey, mashed potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well. ; name: salisbury turkey ; ingredients: turkey, cavenders all purpose greek seasoning, turkey gravy, mushroom pieces ; preparation:

name: goat cheese salad ; ingredients: beets, olive oil, lettuce, pineapple, avocado, goat cheese ; preparation:Put the beets in a large saucepan. Cover with cold water, bring to the boil. Simmer 40 minutes or till tender, cool in pan. Drain beetroot. Use your hands to rub off skin. Combine beetroot, rocket, onion, cheese and pinenuts in serving bowl. Shake oil, juice and sugar together. Season to taste. Drizzle salad with dressing just before serving. ; name: mediterranean goat cheese pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, mozzarella cheese, goat cheese, roasted red pepper, kalamata olive, oregano, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place italian bread shell on an ungreased baking sheet. Stir together the cream cheese, goat cheese or feta, garlic and black pepper in a small mixing bow. Spread mixture over the bread shell. Place the tomato slices and sweet pepper strips over the cheese mixture. Bake in the preheated oven about 12 minutes or till heated through.
