Sprinkle with fresh basil. ; name: bacon wrapped goat cheese chicken breasts ; ingredients: tomatoes, goat cheese, salt and black pepper, olive oil, oregano, chicken breast fillets, bacon ; preparation:Heat oil over medium-high heat. Add the goat cheese, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: goats cheese salad with tomatoes peppers and rocket ; ingredients: red peppers, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, goat cheese, pine nuts, rocket, basil ; preparation:Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place tomatoes on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide tomatoes among serving plates. Top with tomatoes peppers and rocket, and drizzle with vinaigrette. ; name: cheese olive raisin sandwiches ; ingredients: cream cheese, french dressing, pimento stuffed olive, seedless raisin, bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Place the rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 400 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking or cookie sheet. In a bowl, blend together the cheese, the puree and the butter. Blend in the flour, a little at a time, to form a sticky dough. Drop by tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheet, and form into patties. Press the olives into the centers, and pull the dough up to completely cover. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from the oven and serve. ; name: radish and goat cheese canapes ; ingredients: radishes, fresh goat cheese, baguette, coarse salt ; preparation:

name: frozen pudding ; ingredients: milk, heavy cream, instant lemon pudding mix, sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: berry cream dessert ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, cold water, strawberry yogurt, raspberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, combine strawberry and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until strawberry is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top. ; name: spiked spiced berries ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, fresh blueberries, sweet marsala wine, nutmeg, ground cinnamon, powdered sugar, fresh raspberry, fresh blackberries ; preparation:Place berries in a large saucepan and add vinegar and spices. Boil for 30 minutes. Add sugar and boil for an additional 30 minutes or until thickened sufficiently. Stir occasionally after adding sugar to prevent scorching. Pour into sterilized jars and seal. ; name: canadian pudding ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, milk, raisins, nuts, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the flour. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: heather s apple cranberry bread pudding ; ingredients: non-fat soymilk, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, allspice, egg, whole wheat bread, apples, cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: danish berry pudding rdgrd ; ingredients: frozen raspberries, frozen strawberries, cornstarch, granulated sugar, cold water, lemon juice, slivered almonds ; preparation:

name: slow cooked bacon cheese potatoes ; ingredients: bacon, onions, potatoes, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, butter, spring onion ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 8-10 minutes, depending on the size of the potatoes cubes. Meanwhile, fry bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned and crisp. Remove bacon from the skillet to drain on paper towels. Add the potatoes to the bacon grease in the skillet and fry until tender, stirring often. Drain excess grease. When the potatoes are done, drain the water out of pot and mash. Mix in the buttermilk until you get your desired consistency. Crumble in the bacon and stir in the onions. You can also stir in between 1-2 tablespoons of the bacon grease if you like. Mix together and serve. ; name: parmesan baked potato halves ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, parmesan cheese, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: creamy cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: breaded baked parmesan potatoes ; ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper, potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time. ; name: quick cheese potatoes ; ingredients: half-and-half, margarine, onion, cheddar cheese, velveeta cheese, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, bacon bits ; preparation:

name: mexican pickled cauliflower salad coliflor encurtido ; ingredients: head cauliflower, fresh lime juice, rice vinegar, hot red chili pepper flakes, garlic, ground cumin, salt, fresh cilantro leaves ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is a deep golden color, about 20 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper. Cook until most of the moisture evaporates and cauliflower is deep brown, about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, steam or microwave the cauliflower until tender but still firm. Put cauliflower on a platter and top with caramelized onions. Sprinkle with pine nuts. ; name: baked cauliflower ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, olive oil, frozen cauliflower, salt, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: red cauliflower ; ingredients: onion, lime, cauliflower, chopped tomatoes, bell peppers, caster sugar, feta cheese, salt, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat oil until you think it is hot enough. You can check with a cube of bread. Drain the cauliflower and let cool. Mix together in a bowl the red cauliflower, onion, lime, cauliflower, chopped tomatoes, bell peppers, caster sugar, feta cheese, salt, flat leaf parsley. Fry until golden brown. As soon as you remove it from the fat, sprinkle it with more cheese. ; name: simply roasted cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place cauliflower on a platter, cover with water and salt lightly. Bring to a boil and cook until easily pierced with a skewer, about 20 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving plate. Mix oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, pour over potatoes and cauliflower, breaking them up a bit as you do. Serve immediately. ; name: pickled cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower heads, white pearl onions, pickling salt, sugar, white vinegar, white mustard seeds, celery seed, hot pepper ; preparation:

name: simple chocolate cream pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, instant chocolate pudding mix, dream whip topping mix, milk, cool whip ; preparation:Pour 2 cups milk into a medium bowl. Add pudding mix. Beat with an electric mixer 1 minute. Spread mixture evenly into crust. Beat cream cheese, sugar and 1 tablespoon milk with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping on low speed. Spread over chocolate mixture. Sprinkle with chocolate, if desired. Cover with dome. Chill at least 3 hours before serving. ; name: chocolate ice cream pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, hersheys chocolate syrup, whipping cream, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries. ; name: sugar free coconut cream pie ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, milk, coconut extract, coconut flakes, cool whip topping ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool. ; name: sugar free lemon ice box pie ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, lemonade mix, milk, cool whip, graham cracker crust ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping. ; name: chocolate mint pie ; ingredients: sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, powdered milk, water, mint extract, green food coloring, cool whip free, miniature chocolate chips, chocolate graham wafer pie crust ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pieplate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack ; name: sugar free double layered chocolate pie ; ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, nonfat milk, fat-free sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, reduced-fat cream cheese, equal sugar substitute, sugar-free fat-free frozen whipped topping ; preparation:

name: simply baked monte cristos ; ingredients: bread, ham, gruyere cheese, eggs, milk, cinnamon sugar, vanilla, powdered sugar, raspberry jam ; preparation:In a wide shallow dish, whisk the egg, yogurt and salt. Brush one side of bread slices with melted butter. Layer the ham, swiss and cheddar on the buttered side of 2 slices of the bread. Top with remaining bread, buttered side inward. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a cast iron skillet over medium-low heat. Carefully dip both sides of the sandwich into the egg mixture, holding sides of sandwich together. Cover and cook in skillet until golden, then turn and cook other side until cheese is melted. Add additional butter to skillet as needed. Dust with powdered sugar and serve immediately. ; name: grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: monte cristo grinder ; ingredients: ham, turkey, green bell pepper, minced garlic clove, olive oil, maui onion, tomatoes, french bread, swiss cheese, dried oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. In skillet, over medium-high heat, saute bell peppers and onions and garlic in oil until bell pepper is crisp-tender. Remove bell pepper and onion from skillet, reserving oil mixture. Layer the ham, smoked turkey, tomato, bell pepper and onion on the bottom half of french bread. Drizzle the oil mixture over the top. Sprinkle with oregano. Top with cheese and remaining half of bread. Wrap loaf in foil. Bake 25 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: grilled monte cristo sandwich ; ingredients: bread, turkey breast, provolone cheese, ham, butter, egg, strawberry jam ; preparation:

name: mini mignon s velveeta meat dip ; ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, tomato soup, hot peppers, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown the ground beef. Add tomato soup and chilies or peppers. Let this simmer for 40 minute. Stir in velvetta cheese and continue to stir until melted. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: oklahoma dip ; ingredients: ground beef, hot sausage, onion, velveeta cheese, rotel tomatoes ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and sauté for 1 minute. Add sausage and sauté for 1 minute. Add onion and sauté for 1 minute. Add tomato sauce and sauté for 1 minute. Add tomato ; name: swiss cheese dip ; ingredients: mayonnaise, onion, swiss cheese, chives, sourdough bread ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread. ; name: carolina panthers cheese dip ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, pepper, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, pace picante sauce, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Cook beef, onion and garlic in large skillet until well browned. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients. Cook on medium till cheese is melted and mixture is heated through. Stir often. Serve warm with corn chips, nachos, potato chips, etc. This same recipe may be made in a crock pot. ; name: bacon cheese dip southern living ; ingredients: sour cream, blue cheese, cream cheese, diced onions, hot sauce, bacon, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, beat together cheese, sour cream, and onion with electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in blue cheese, walnuts, and bacon. Mix well. Chill up to 24 hours. If dip thickens after chilling, stir in 1 to 2 tablespoons milk. Serve and enjoy. ; name: family secret cheese dip ; ingredients: velveeta cheese, ground sausage, salsa, beer ; preparation:

name: chocolate marshmallow swirl fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, butter, vanilla extract, salt, walnuts, miniature marshmallows ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and butter in a saucepan. Bring mixture to a rolling boil stirring constantly. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate chips until completely melted. Add marshmallow creme and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 pan. ; name: uncooked fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces. ; name: white cocont fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Mix sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme in a large buttered saucepan. Cook without stirring until candy temp. Reaches 235 degrees f. Or until a soft ball forms in very cold water. Add butter. Stir just til blended. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Let sit until cool. Add chopped nuts. Beat until creamy, and just until it starts to loose its glossy appearance dulls slightly. Pour into prepared buttered 8 x 8 inch pan. Cut into squares while still soft and warm. ; name: fudge krispies ; ingredients: milk chocolate chips, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, powdered sugar, rice krispies ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine chocolate chips, butter and corn syrup. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Remove from heat and add vanilla, peanut butter and powdered sugar. Mix well. Stir in cereal and pecans and mix ell. Spread into greased 9x13 pan. Chill until firm. ; name: mom s fantasy fudge ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, marshmallow cream, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:

name: chili jam ; ingredients: garlic, onions, birds eye chiles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, white sugar, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: minted fruit salad ; ingredients: strawberry, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, grapes, honey, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: mint limeade ; ingredients: water, sugar, of fresh mint, fresh lime juice, mint sprigs, lime slices ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired. ; name: spice rubbed snapper with lime and cilantro ; ingredients: red snapper fillets, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lime juice, olive oil, fresh cilantro, ground turmeric, ground ginger, shallot, garlic clove ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450-degrees f. Brush 4 ovenproof plates with olive oil and then sprinkle with kosher salt and white pepper. Divide fish among the four plates, skin side up in the center of the plates. Brush fish with olive oil and then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Press wax paper over fish. Chop herbs in a processor and then pour in three tablespoons olive oil through food tube while the machine is running. Transfer to small bowl or dish and stir in lemon juice, salt and pepper. Set aside. Bake fish for 4 minutes. Remove plates from oven, discard wax papper. Let plates stand for 30 seconds and then spoon 2 tablespoons herb mixture along each piece of fish. Serve with rice pilaf and green vegetables. ; name: raspberry mint dressing ; ingredients: lime juice, raspberry jam, mint jelly, vegetable oil, garlic, salt, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken salad with broccoli ; ingredients: whole chicken breasts, broccoli, dried dill, lemon, juice of, red onion, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version. ; name: chunky chicken salad for a crowd ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, apples, red onion, celery, walnuts, light mayonnaise, garlic mustard, italian parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version. ; name: barbequed chicken salad spread ; ingredients: chicken breasts, sweet onion, celery ribs, ranch dressing, mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: chicken cantaloupe salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, low sodium chicken broth, mayonnaise, sour cream, red apple, lemon, juice of, celery ribs, green seedless grapes, cantaloupe, slivered almonds ; preparation:

name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: one pan eggless chocolate cake ; ingredients: spelt flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, sea salt, oil, cider vinegar, vanilla extract, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt, and set aside. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cider vinegar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. ; name: chocolate cake with chocolate sauce ; ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, low-fat mayonnaise, vinegar, prune juice, water, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except the brown sugar and 4 tbsp cocoa and hot water. Spread into a 9x9 pan or equivalent. Mix brown sugar and cocoa and spread over batter. Carefully pour the hot water over all. Bake at 350f for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: quick yellow cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: cake mix up sizer ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:

name: chipas argentinean cheese bread ; ingredients: egg, milk, italian cheese blend, butter, tapioca starch, self-rising flour ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine the tapioca and milk. Set aside for 5 minutes. Add the brown sugar, salt and egg yolks, mix well. Cook on low heat. Stirring often, for 15 to 20 minutes, until the mixture begins to bubble and thicken. The tiny pearls of tapioca will become more visible as the cook. Remove from the heat and stir in the butter until it melts. Add the vanilla. The pudding will continue to thicken as it cools. Pour equal amounts into 4 serving cups. Chill for about an hour until cold. ; name: zesty raspberry chipotle black bean dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, black beans, monterey jack pepper cheese, chipotle salsa, tortilla chips ; preparation:Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Stir in black pepper, cheese, chipotle peppers, and adobo sauce. Divide steaks and pepper-and-onion mixture among 4 baguette slices. Top with cheese sauce and remaining 4 bread slices. ; name: potato and chipotle shrimp appetizer ; ingredients: green onion, sun-dried tomato, basil, sweet corn, simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, raw shrimp, chipotle paste, seasoned pepper, butter, goat cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Add thinly sliced beef and cook with the pepper mix another 5 minutes set aside and keep warm. For cheese sauce, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir in black pepper, cheese, chipotle peppers, and adobo sauce. Divide steaks and pepper-and-onion mixture among 4 baguette slices. Top with cheese sauce and remaining 4 bread slices. ; name: cheesy hot pizza dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, green peppers, green onions, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: delicious chipa rolls a type of cheese rolls ; ingredients: tapioca flour, eggs, butter, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, cheese, manchego cheese ; preparation:

name: spice rubbed snapper with lime and cilantro ; ingredients: red snapper fillets, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lime juice, olive oil, fresh cilantro, ground turmeric, ground ginger, shallot, garlic clove ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450-degrees f. Brush 4 ovenproof plates with olive oil and then sprinkle with kosher salt and white pepper. Divide fish among the four plates, skin side up in the center of the plates. Brush fish with olive oil and then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Press wax paper over fish. Chop herbs in a processor and then pour in three tablespoons olive oil through food tube while the machine is running. Transfer to small bowl or dish and stir in lemon juice, salt and pepper. Set aside. Bake fish for 4 minutes. Remove plates from oven, discard wax papper. Let plates stand for 30 seconds and then spoon 2 tablespoons herb mixture along each piece of fish. Serve with rice pilaf and green vegetables. ; name: grilled meat marinade ; ingredients: soy sauce, vegetable oil, apple juice, lemon juice, vanilla, ground ginger, garlic powder, pepper, chicken ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: chili jam ; ingredients: garlic, onions, birds eye chiles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, white sugar, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: mojo marinated snapper ; ingredients: fresh orange juice, fresh lime juice, cilantro, garlic, red snapper fillets, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: dumplings in canadian maple syrup ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, light maple syrup ; preparation:Sift flour, baking powder and salt. Beat egg until light and fluffy and add to dry ingredients. Stir in milk. Drop by tablespoonfuls on gently boiling vegetable gravy. Cover tightly and cook 15 minutes. Do not peek. ; name: maple stewed dumplings ; ingredients: buttermilk baking mix, milk, pure maple syrup, water, whipped cream ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Stir in the milk unitl the mixture forms a thick batter. Drop the batter on top of the chicken a tablespoonful at a time. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. In a small bowl, ; name: canadian maple cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, egg, real maple syrup, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks. ; name: fruit dumplings ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, small curd cottage cheese, flour, fruit, milk ; preparation:Put the dumplings in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Add flour, one tablespoon sugar, salt, and mix well. The dough will be sticky. Divide in 8. Make a square from each part. Wash the plums well, remove the pips and in their place put a little sugar and cinnamon. Put a plum on each square and fold the dough around the fruit to obtain a dumpling. Bring to boil water in a large saucepan and put a little sugar and cinnamon. Put a plum on each square and ; name: buttermilk dumplings ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, buttermilk, egg, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Combine all dry ingredient together. Cut in shortening. Add milk and mix. Drop by spoonfuls into simmering soup or stew. Cook 10 minutes uncovered, and 10 minutes covered. Do not take the lid off until the 10 minutes are up. ; name: maple syrup dumplings ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, unsalted butter, milk, vanilla extract, water, maple syrup ; preparation:

name: wholesome nutty granola ; ingredients: rolled oats, walnuts, almonds, pecans, sunflower seeds, maple syrup, olive oil, cinnamon, raisins, dried cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Spray a large, shallow baking pan with no-stick cooking spray. In a large bowl toss together shredded wheat and walnuts. Set aside. In a small bowl stir together honey, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt, if using. Pour over the dry ingredients and toss thoroughly to combine. Spread evenly in the prepared baking pan and bake for 25-30 minutes, stirring two or three times, until the mixture is lightly toasted. If it seems damp, it will crisp as it cools. Cool completely, then add the dried fruit. Store in an airtight container. ; name: baked honey granola ; ingredients: rolled oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt, slivered almonds, honey, light olive oil, craisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container. ; name: ohh sweet granola ; ingredients: oats, walnuts, coconut, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt, vegetable oil, honey, water, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container. ; name: yummy healthy granola ; ingredients: oats, applesauce, brown sugar, honey, cinnamon, vanilla, flax seed meal, cashew pieces, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Coat an 8-inch square pan using nonstick cooking spray. Combine oats, flour, wheat germ, and cinnamon. Stir until well mixed. Fold in raisins. Press mixture into pan and bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature, cut into 12 bars and serve. ; name: nut and honey granola ; ingredients: canola oil, light maple syrup, honey, orange, rolled oats, pecans, cinnamon, nutmeg, raisins ; preparation:

name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: guacamole perfecto ; ingredients: avocados, serrano chilies, tomatoes, fresh cilantro, red onions, lime, oregano, salt & pepper ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: guac and roll ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, lime, juice of, red onion, tomatoes, garlic clove, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, ground cumin, kosher salt, black pepper ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: easy guacamole dip ; ingredients: avocados, roma tomatoes, onion, garlic, kosher salt, lime juice ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: alton brown s guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, lime, juice of, kosher salt, ground cumin, cayenne, onion, roma tomatoes, cilantro, garlic clove ; preparation:

name: fresh garlic green beans with olives ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, butter, yellow onion, oregano, black olives, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a separate bowl combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: fresh green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted green beans with garlic and onions ; ingredients: green beans, garlic cloves, onions, olive oil, salt, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: great greek green beans ; ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, diced tomatoes, black olives, dried oregano, frozen french-cut green beans, feta cheese ; preparation:Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute longer or until heated through. ; name: green beans with garlic butter ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Cook beans according to package directions. In a separate bowl, combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: garlic green beans with manchego ; ingredients: olive oil, green beans, garlic, dry white wine, lime juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper, manchego cheese ; preparation:

name: crock pot savory pork roast ; ingredients: pork loin roast, onion, bay leaf, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve. ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: crock pot shredded pork ; ingredients: pork butt, water, taco seasoning, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Place shredded pork in crock pot. Cover with lid and cook on low heat 8-10 hours. I like to cook mine a long time so they fall apart in the crock pot. Serve with brown rice and a green veggie. ; name: crock pot roast ; ingredients: roast, dry mustard, butter, garlic, onion, white sugar, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, bisto ; preparation:Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Season all sides of roast liberally with the kosher salt and ground pepper. Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Combine mustard, sugar, worcestershire sauce, beef broth and red wine in a separate bowl and pour over roast. Set crock pot to low and cook for 3 hours. After 3 hours, turn the roast onto one side and cook for 20 minutes. After 20 minutes, turn the roast on the next side and cook 20 minutes, repeat until the roast has the fat side on the bottom again. Cook for about 2 more hours usually 6 hours total. The roast is done when it shreds easily with a fork. ; name: beaudacious crock pot pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork roast, portabella mushrooms, cream of celery soup, chicken gravy, brown gravy mix, lipton onion soup mix, ranch dressing mix, water ; preparation:

name: french green beans sauted with mushrooms and almonds ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, button mushrooms, whole almond, frozen french-cut green beans, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture. ; name: fresh garlic green beans with olives ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, butter, yellow onion, oregano, black olives, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a separate bowl combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with garlic almonds ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, garlic, slivered almonds, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in pan over medium heat and saute garlic 1 minute. Add beans and turn to coat with oil. Add lemon juice, salt& pepper and mix. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic roasted green beans with almonds ; ingredients: fresh green beans, scallions, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemon peel, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sliced almonds ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Cook scapes, peppers& seasoning, stirring occasionally, until tender-crisp, about 2 minutes. Drain& chill under cold water, then drain well& pat dry. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Stir in almonds. ; name: asian style green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, red sweet bell pepper, oyster sauce, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving. ; name: fasoliyyeh bi zayt syrian green beans with olive oil ; ingredients: frozen cut green beans, extra virgin olive oil, salt, garlic clove, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: pizza bagel omelets ; ingredients: eggs, parmesan cheese, italian spices, fresh garlic, pizza toppings, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, bagels ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the parmesan cheese, italian spices, and garlic and mix well. Add the beaten eggs to the pan and cook until almost set. Top with the pizza toppings and cook until the eggs are set and the toppings are heated through. Remove the omelet from the pan and cut in quarters. Fold each quarter into a triangle and place on top of a bagel half. Top with the tomatoes and mozzarella. Broil until the cheese melts and the toppings are hot. ; name: grilled pizza sandwiches ; ingredients: mayonnaise, dried italian seasoning, whole wheat bread, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Stir together mayonnaise and italian seasoning. Spread half of mixture on one side of each bread slice. Layer pepperoni and cheese on each of 4 slices of bread. Top with remaining bread slices. Spread half of remaining mayonnaise mixture on 1 side of sandwiches. Place sandwiches, mayonnaise side down, on a hot nonstick skillet or griddle. Cook over medium heat until bread is browned. Spread remaining mayonnaise mixture on ungrilled sides of sandwiches. Turn and cook until sandwiches are browned. ; name: italian country sandwich ; ingredients: prepared pizza crust, cream cheese, tomatoes, green bell peppers, pastrami, salami, red onions, provolone cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: italian sausage casserole ; ingredients: italian sausage, potatoes, green bell pepper, garlic, onion, crushed tomatoes, dried basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: italian bagel sandwich ; ingredients: bagels, ham, tomatoes, onions, mozzarella cheese, dried basil ; preparation:

name: full meal quesadilla ; ingredients: flour tortilla, cooked chicken, refried beans, onion, bell pepper, raw mushrooms, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: chorizo quesadilla ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, flour tortillas ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy. ; name: sausage and corn quesadillas ; ingredients: cream cheese, cumin, all purpose greek seasoning, cayenne pepper, 10-inch flour tortillas, spicy bulk sausage, monterey jack cheese, green chilies, frozen corn, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: potato cheddar quesadilla ; ingredients: burrito-size flour tortillas, olive oil, cheddar cheese, mashed potatoes, onions, black pepper, hot salsa, canned jalapeno slices ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: quesadilla pie ; ingredients: green chilies, sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, biscuit mix, hot salsa ; preparation:

name: applemint iced tea ; ingredients: of fresh mint, peppermint tea bags, boiling water, apple juice, fresh lime juice, apple ; preparation:In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: touch of mint iced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, of fresh mint, frozen lemonade concentrate, lemon slice, mint ; preparation:In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint. ; name: fabulous mint tea ; ingredients: boiling water, of fresh mint, tea bags, fresh lemon juice, sugar, cold water, ice, mint ; preparation:In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir hot tea until sugar is dissolved. Add 4 cups cold water and lemon juice. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon. ; name: iced sweet mint tea ; ingredients: tea, boiling water, mint, sugar, lemons ; preparation:In a hot water bath, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all.
