Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: turkish apple tea ; ingredients: dried apples, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, cold water, honey ; preparation:Combine the water and apple juice in a small pan. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Add the camomile tea, cinnamon, clove and ginger. Let simmer gently for 10 minutes to infuse flavours. Strain into a heated teapot and serve immediately. Garnish with the orange slices. ; name: apple mint tea ; ingredients: tea bags, fresh mint leaves, fresh lemon juice, boiling water, unsweetened apple juice, lemon slices, of fresh mint ; preparation:

name: fresh corn and green bean salad ; ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: three bean salad ; ingredients: green beans, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground cumin, chili powder, red onions, chickpeas, red kidney beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator. ; name: 3 or 4 bean salad ; ingredients: yellow wax beans, green beans, red kidney beans, butter beans, onion, oil, white vinegar, white sugar, celery salt ; preparation:Combine beans, onions and parsley in a large bowl. Combine dressing, sugar and garlic. Pour over bean mixture and toss. Cover. Refrigerate at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally. Just before serving, remove bean mixture with slotted spoon to lettuce-lined salad bowl. ; name: south african green bean salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sweet white onion, stuffed green olive ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for ; name: green bean and hazelnut salad ; ingredients: hazelnuts, green beans, grainy mustard, balsamic vinegar, fine sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, flax seed oil, hazelnut oil, red onion ; preparation:

name: crock pot bbq pulled pork sandwiches ; ingredients: pork roast, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, onion, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove pork and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: crock pot beef brisket sandwiches ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, onion, garlic cloves, buns, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place brisket in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 2-3 hours or until brisket is tender. Discard brisket. Remove brisket. When cool enough to handle, shred brisket. Return brisket to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount. ; name: crock pot barbecued beef and bean soup ; ingredients: dried great northern beans, salt, onion, ground pepper, short rib of beef, water, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Place beef in crock pot. Cover with lid and cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: crock pot beef and broccoli ; ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, beef consomme, soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic cloves, cornstarch, fresh broccoli florets ; preparation:Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice. ; name: bbq beef sandwiches crock pot ; ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, barbecue sauce, apricot preserves, red bell peppers, dijon mustard, brown sugar, onion, kaiser rolls ; preparation:

name: beef roll ups ; ingredients: ground beef, onion soup mix, cheese, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes. ; name: bacon cheeseburger roll up ; ingredients: ground beef, bacon, onion, velveeta cheese, pizza crusts, garlic powder, pepper, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes. ; name: beef rollup ; ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated butter flake crescent dinner rolls, ground beef, barbecue sauce, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, chicken, bacon and salsa. Gently stir until well combined. Spread beef mixture on each tortilla. Roll up and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate until serving time. To serve, cut beef mixture on each tortilla. To ; name: easy turkey roll ups ; ingredients: fat free cream cheese, reduced-fat mayonnaise, dried basil, dried oregano, dill weed, garlic powder, flour tortillas, onions, deli turkey, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes. ; name: horseradish beef roll ups ; ingredients: fat-free cream cheese, prepared horseradish, dijon-style mustard, 8-inch flour tortillas, fresh spinach, roast beef, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: ginger and lemongrass iced green tea ; ingredients: water, fresh lemongrass, sugar, fresh ginger, mint sprigs, green tea ; preparation:In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: ginger lemon tea ; ingredients: water, sugar, fresh ginger, lemon peel, green tea bags, lemon slice ; preparation:Combine juice and water in a saucepan, and bring to a boil. Add ginger and bring to boil. Add sugar and lemon juice, strain tea. Allow to cool and add ice. Garnish with lemon balm leaves. ; name: lemon ginger cayenne tea ; ingredients: lemon, honey, cayenne, fresh ginger, water ; preparation:In a medium saucepan on high heat, bring the water to a boil. Add the ginger and cayenne and reduce heat. Simmer for 20 minutes and strain. Add sweetener to taste. Drink and be healthy. ; name: green jasmine mint iced tea with lemon ; ingredients: jasmine tea, fresh mint leaves, water, lemon juice, honey, cold water ; preparation:In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint. ; name: spicy mint tea ; ingredients: orange pekoe tea bag, mint sprigs, cayenne pepper, boiling water, white sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, lemons ; preparation:Steep 1 tea bag, 6 mint stems and cayenne pepper in 2 cups of boiling water. Strain the mixture, keeping only the liquid. Add the sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon stick to the mint mixture and refrigerate. When ready to serve, remove the cinnamon stick and dilute the mint mixture with equal parts of water. Serve in a tall glass with ice, add a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice for garnishing. ; name: spicy ginger tea with lemongrass ; ingredients: water, gingerroot, lemongrass, herbal tea, lemon, honey ; preparation:

name: apple butternut squash soup ; ingredients: butternut squash, onion, carrot, butter, granny smith apples, chicken broth, salt, fresh thyme, black pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, carrots, broth, and salt. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired. ; name: creamy butternut squash soup ; ingredients: celery rib, carrot, onion, olive oil, butternut squash, potato, salt, hot water ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste. ; name: butternut squash soup with bacon and cheddar ; ingredients: butter, onion, butternut squash, cooked bacon, vegetable stock, cream, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, sage, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable stock and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste. ; name: ww curried butternut squash soup ; ingredients: butternut squash, onions, chicken broth, curry powder, salt, pepper, sour cream, scallion ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, carrots, broth, and salt. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired. ; name: potato and squash soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, potatoes, butternut squash, chicken stock, spinach, green onions, cider vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: marinated green olives ; ingredients: green olives in brine, fresh rosemary, fennel seed, peppercorn, dried chilies, preserved lemons, olive oil ; preparation:Crush the fennel and peppercorns in a pestle and mortar. Chop the chillies into smallish pieces. Discard the flesh of the preserved lemon and rinse the skin to remove excess salt. Cut into fine strips. Drain the olives and give them a rinse off in water. Place the olives in a clean jar and add the remaining ingredients. Cover with olive oil and leave to marinate. I have left them as little as a couple of hours and up to a few weeks. Pop them in the fridge, but bring back to room temperature before serving. ; name: olive spread ; ingredients: green olives, black olives, capers, garlic, olive oil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium-low heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley. ; name: garlic stuffed olives ; ingredients: jumbo black olives, garlic, olive oil, italian seasoning, red chili pepper ; preparation:In a food processor or blender, mix all the herbs, garlic and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil and pulse until finely chopped. Add the olives and parsley and pulse again until just combined. With the processor running, add the mayonnaise, lemon juice and salt and pulse until just combined. With the processor running, ; name: red hot green olives ; ingredients: green olives, tomato juice, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, dried basil, oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olives and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid is thickened and coats olives, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in lemon slices. Transfer to a shallow dish and marinate, chilled, at least 24 hours. These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator. ; name: lemon and olive oil dressing ; ingredients: sea salt, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, lemon, zest of ; preparation:In a large skillet combine olive oil and butter over medium heat. Add garlic, pepper and the lemon zest. Salt water when it boils then cook cappellini to al dente, 2 to 3 minutes. Add a ladle of cooking water to lemon pepper butter and stir in the lemon juice. Drain pasta and toss with lemon-pepper butter and salt, to taste. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course. ; name: peppered olives ; ingredients: green olives, black peppercorns, meyer lemon, fresh thyme sprigs, olive oil ; preparation:

name: spaghetti with garlic hot pepper and parsley ; ingredients: spaghetti, virgin olive oil, garlic, hot pepper flakes, salt, chicken broth, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with olive oil garlic and anchovies ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovy fillets, spaghetti, fresh lemon juice, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling, salted water according to package directions stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk the olive oil, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a large bowl. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Toss the pasta with the lemon sauce, and add the reserved cooking liquid and toss again. Season with the salt & pepper. Garnish with lemon zest and chopped basil. ; name: spaghetti with summer tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomato, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, spaghetti, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large skillet combine cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomatoes, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer for 5 minutes or until tomatoes are tender. Remove from heat. Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add spaghetti and cook according to package directions. Just before pasta is done reheat sauce. Slice basil leaves and add to the sauce. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve. ; name: one pot spaghetti supper ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, onion, pasta sauce, olives, capers, tuna, salt, red pepper flakes ; preparation:

name: pork chops potatoes and onion casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, baking potato, onion, bacon grease, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of potatoes. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender. ; name: dee s pork chops casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, cream of mushroom soup, lipton onion soup mix ; preparation:Season pork chops, in a baking dish, with pepper and paprika. Add boullion cubes, onion, and water. Cover with foil paper. Bake at 375 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours or until tender. Uncover and allow to brown, not burn, making sure there is still water in the bottom of the pan, for 10 to15 minutes. ; name: breakfast casserole from southern living ; ingredients: pork sausage, white bread, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: baked breaded pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, breadcrumbs, oregano, garlic ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using baked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: charlie walkers pork chop casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onions, salt and pepper, american cheese ; preparation:

name: easy apple oatmeal crisp ; ingredients: apples, white sugar, lemon juice, old-fashioned oatmeal, brown sugar, flour, butter, ground cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute. ; name: instant oatmeal apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, butter, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, instant maple and brown sugar oatmeal, salt, walnuts, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a small bowl, soak the apples in brandy for 5 minutes. Blend flour, brown sugar, salt and butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add oats and almonds and toss. In a 9 inch glass pie dish, toss together apples, apricots and brandy. Sprinkle oat mixture evenly over top and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until apples are tender and topping is browned. ; name: 1 2 3 apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden. ; name: old fashioned apple crisp ; ingredients: tart apples, light brown sugar, flour, rolled oats, cinnamon, allspice, butter, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place tart apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the tart apples. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, butter, whipped cream. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: apple oatmeal crisp ; ingredients: quick-cooking rolled oats, unbleached flour, light brown sugar, unsalted butter, apples, lemons, zest of, sugar, whipped cream, frozen yogurt ; preparation:

name: ham delights ; ingredients: butter, prepared mustard, poppy seeds, onion, worcestershire sauce, rolls, ham, swiss cheese ; preparation:Saute onion in butter till tender. Add mustard, worcestershire sauce and poppy seeds. Place in refrigerator until it reaches spreading consistency. Open the rolls, spread both sides with the mixture. Place small amount of ham and cheese on roll and replace the top of the roll. Cover with foil and heat at 425 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: ham and cheese breakfast puffs ; ingredients: butter, ham, cheddar cheese, plain yogurt, eggs, green onions, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Spray a small baking sheet with nonstick spray coating. Set aside. Open the biscuit carton, and separate the biscuits. Place them on the baking sheet in a single layer without crowding together. With a small spoon, spread the tomato sauce on the biscuits, dividing the mixture evenly. Top with the ham and cheese, dividing evenly. Bake in the center of the oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden. Serve hot. ; name: turkey ham swiss grilled cheese ; ingredients: ranch dressing, sourdough bread, smoked turkey, maple ham, swiss cheese, pickles, butter ; preparation:Put butter on one side of each piece of bread. Put ham and cheese onto the bread then cook like you would grilled cheese. In a pan with butter, or stick on an electric grill. Cook on each side till brown. Open sandwich on side without cheese and add your condiments. ; name: decadent grilled ham and cheese sandwich ; ingredients: cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread ; preparation:Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ham cheese noodle casserole ; ingredients: ham, egg noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: quick and easy ham rollups ; ingredients: flour tortillas, cream cheese, ham, dill pickle slices ; preparation:

name: vanilla wafer almond pie crust ; ingredients: vanilla wafer cookies, unsalted butter, salt, pure vanilla extract, almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees. Process cookies in food processor until finely ground. Combine crumbs, butter, salt, vanilla and almonds, stirring until crumbs are moistened. Press mixture evenly across 9-inch pie plate. Bake crust until crisp, about 7 minutes. Let cool completely before filling. Crust may also be wrapped tightly in plastic and frozen up to one month. ; name: chocolate mint pie ; ingredients: sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, powdered milk, water, mint extract, green food coloring, cool whip free, miniature chocolate chips, chocolate graham wafer pie crust ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pieplate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack ; name: coffee ice cream pie ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate squares, butter, evaporated milk, sugar, coffee ice cream, chocolate crumb crusts, frozen whipped topping, pecans ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small mixing bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: chocolate chip cookie pie ; ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, brown sugar, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: chocolate wafer pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, granulated sugar, chocolate wafer crumbs, pecans, vanilla extract, frozen non-dairy topping, chocolate ; preparation:

name: banana loaf cake ; ingredients: butter, bananas, bicarbonate of soda, baking powder, sugar, plain flour, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease four 9 x 5-in loaf pans. Cream butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda in a separate bowl. Let stand until foamy. Add vanilla, bananas, salt and flour. Mix well. Place in 4 prepared loaf pans. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake tests done. ; name: banana cherry cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add cherries, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish. ; name: grandma b s coffee cake ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, butter, raisins, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly. ; name: banana mug cake ; ingredients: mashed banana, maple syrup, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease cupcake, 9 x 13, or 2 layer pans. Dump all ingredients into large bowl. Mix by hand using a wire whisk or wooden spoon just until the dry ingredients are combined. Do not overmix. If using walnuts, mix with a teaspoon of flour and then fold into batter. Bake 350 degrees about 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool on wire rack and frost with favorite frosting, if desired. ; name: grandma solberg s banana cake ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, butter, vanilla, sugar, eggs, mashed banana, buttermilk ; preparation:

name: sausage brunch casserole ; ingredients: pork sausage, crescent roll dough, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: brunch eggs ole ; ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, jalapeno peppers, small curd cottage cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, jalapeno pepper, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: apple cheddar brunch pizza ; ingredients: flour, bread dough, tart apples, brown sugar, white sugar, apple pie spice, nutmeg, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put apples in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. ; name: creamy rice and parmesan spoon bake ; ingredients: cooked rice, half-and-half cream, water, salt and pepper, butter, egg yolks, egg whites, parmesan cheese, green onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle rice over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Combine soup and water. Pour carefully over the rice. Lay the chicken pieces over the rice without overlapping. Sprinkle the sliced scallions and grated cheese over the top. Cover dish with foil. Bake in preheated oven 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer. ; name: country brunch skillet ; ingredients: bacon, hash browns, green pepper, onion, salt, pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon. Crumble and set aside. Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper to drippings. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are browned and tender, about 15 minutes. Make six wells in the potato mixture. Break one egg into each well. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes or until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and bacon. ; name: fire and ice brunch bake ; ingredients: white rice, ground sausage, salsa, light sour cream, cheddar cheese, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: hot fudge sauce ; ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, unsalted butter, whole milk, heavy whipping cream, granulated sugar, vanilla extract ; preparation:Melt chocolate and butter over low heat. Stir in sugar and salt. Gradually stir in cream. Cook and stir over medium heat for 3 - 4 minutes until mixture is thick and sugar is completely dissolved, stirring after 3 minutes. Stir in vanilla. Let cool before refrigerating. ; name: white fudge opera fudge ; ingredients: sugar, heavy cream, salt, vanilla ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, heavy cream and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat. Stir in white chocolate and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: uncooked fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces. ; name: burnt sugar fudge ; ingredients: sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large saucepan. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 7 minutes or until softball stage. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate until melted. Add marshmallow cream and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 inch baking pan. Cool at room temperature. ; name: halvah fudge ; ingredients: brown sugar, milk, tahini, vanilla ; preparation:Combine the first 5 ingredients in a heavy pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. When it comes to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, reduce heat and simmer until it comes to the softball stage or 236f on a candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, allspice, margarine, and vanilla. Cool, then beat until thick and mixture looses its gloss. Pour into buttered square dish and let cool before cutting. ; name: nutella fudge sauce ; ingredients: water, nutella, sugar, salt, butter, vanilla essence ; preparation:

name: omelet ; ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: asparagus mushroom and cheese omelet with herbs ; ingredients: eggs, water, ground black pepper, fresh thyme, asparagus spears, brown button mushroom, unsalted butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees f. Arrange asparagus and mushrooms on aluminum foil-lined 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan. Sprinkle garlic, salt and pepper on top. Drizzle melted butter over vegetables. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Serve immediately. ; name: potato omelette ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add eggs, water, flour, salt, pepper, cheese, olive oil and cook for about 5 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back into the pan, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5 minutes longer, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back ; name: omelet with corn and smoked mozzarella ; ingredients: fresh corn, water, eggs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, basil leaves, smoked mozzarella cheese, unsalted butter ; preparation:Cut corn from cob or use frozen and place in a small skillet with a few tablespoons water. Cook over medium heat until heated through and drain. Meanwhile, combine eggs, a tablespoon water in a medium bowl and beat lightly. Add corn to the eggs and season with salt and pepper, add cheese and basil. Stir. Wipe out skillet, add butter and heat over medium high heat. When the butter just starts to foam, add egg mixture and stir once or twice. Cover and cook until the bottom is pale golden, then carefully invert with a plate and slide back into the skillet. Cook an additional 1 or 2 minutes and serve. ; name: baked mushroom omelette ; ingredients: eggs, dried basil, dried oregano, low-fat ricotta cheese, tomatoes, onion, mushrooms, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: creamy shrimp pasta ; ingredients: unsalted butter, green bell pepper, onions, fresh parsley, cajun seasoning, raw shrimp, heavy whipping cream, angel hair pasta ; preparation:In blender or food processor, puree the first 6 ingredients until smooth. Pour into serving bowl. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss. ; name: garlicky pasta sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, tomato paste, dried basil, salt, fresh ground pepper, pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: pasta with shrimp ww ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, capers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried oregano, dried tarragon, feta cheese, orzo pasta ; preparation:Shell and devein shrimp. In a large skillet heat olive oil and then add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss. ; name: baked pasta sauce ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, onion, salami, dried basil, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta. ; name: shrimp scampi pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, salt, black pepper, unsalted butter, capellini, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: crustacean inspired garlic noodles recipe ; ingredients: noodles, olive oil, garlic cloves, unsalted butter, garlic powder, chicken bouillon powder, oyster sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: easy apple crumble ; ingredients: apples, powdered sugar, all-purpose flour, butter, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: blueberry apple crumble ; ingredients: rolled oats, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, canola oil, cooking apples, lemon juice, lemon rind, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: e z apple crumble ; ingredients: cooking apples, water, cloves, self-rising flour, butter, brown sugar, rolled oats ; preparation:Place apple slices in slow cooker. In medium bowl, combine sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, peanut butter. Mix in butter and peanut butter with pastry blender or fork. Sprinkle over apples. Cover pot and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Serve warm. Plain or with ice cream. ; name: cherry cranberry apple muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cherry-cranberry pie filling, butter, egg, apple ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean. ; name: apple and passionfruit crumble ; ingredients: gala apples, passion fruit, sugar, biscuits, butter, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:

name: kentucky fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, vegetable oil, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley. ; name: garlic baked potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: seasoned baked potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, dried basil, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover a baking sheet with parchment paper. Wash and cut potatoes into somewhat uniform chunks. Pat dry. Crush and break rosemary and thyme leaves by hand. Put potatoes, olive oil, rosemary and thyme into a container with a lid and shake well to coat the potatoes. Spread potatoes on baking sheet in a single layer. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake 45 - 60 minutes or until nicely brown, stirring and turning occasionally. ; name: oven fried potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: roasted potatoes and peppers ; ingredients: tiny new potatoes, onion, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. ; name: home cooked potatoes and onions ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, extra virgin olive oil, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: christmas morning crock pot breakfast ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, bacon, onion, green bell pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: hash browns breakfast bake ; ingredients: sausage links, eggs, frozen hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, half-and-half, bell pepper, onion, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with frozen hash browns. Cover hash browns with sausage. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir together the remaining ingredients. Pour this mixture over everything. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving. ; name: southwest crock pot breakfast ; ingredients: butter, breakfast sausage, onion, green bell pepper, green chilies, monterey jack cheese, eggs, sour cream, salsa ; preparation:Place breakfast sausage in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours or high for 3-4 hours. Remove sausage from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way. ; name: breakfast casserole weight watchers ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, lean ham, onion, green pepper, egg substitute ; preparation:Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: breakfast in a crock pot ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, lean ham, onion, green pepper, cheese, eggs, skim milk, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: baked chicken and mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, paprika, fresh mushrooms, butter, chicken broth, green onions, garlic clove, salt, pepper, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: creamy mushroom chicken and pasta ; ingredients: pasta, unsalted butter, olive oil, white button mushrooms, heavy cream, rotisserie-cooked chicken, frozen peas, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving. ; name: chicken in a pot ; ingredients: chicken broth, tomato paste, ground black pepper, dried oregano, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, dry breadcrumbs, olive oil, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: chicken and mushroom marsala ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, mushrooms, marsala wine, low sodium chicken broth, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: chicken with mushroom frittata ; ingredients: white chicken meat, egg beaters egg substitute, skim milk, salt, pepper, cooking oil, fresh mushrooms, green onions, fresh parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: egg fried bread ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, butter ; preparation:In a shallow bowl, beat eggs. In another shallow bowl, combine the following four ingredients. Dip the fish pieces into the crumbs, into the egg, and then into the crumbs again. Pat crumbs into fish fillets. In 12-inch non-stick skillet, heat 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon oil until butter melts. Add 2 pieces of fish and cook. Only turn fish once while browning both sides, approximately 6 minutes. When fillets are golden brown add remaining butter, oil, and fish. Repeat the steps above to cook fillets. ; name: orange cinnamon french toast ; ingredients: butter, honey, ground cinnamon, eggs, orange juice, salt, bread ; preparation:In a large bowl beat the eggs, milk, and salt. Dip bread in batter. Fry in a frying pan with butter. Add powdered sugar on top. Add the juice of an orange on top. ; name: french toast or eggy bread ; ingredients: white bread, egg, water, caster sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup. ; name: california breakfast bread ; ingredients: low-fat buttermilk, honey, molasses, baking soda, salt, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, all-purpose flour, raisins, nuts ; preparation:In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled. ; name: french toast forest casserole ; ingredients: white bread, eggs, milk, apricot jam, sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Put the bread cubes in a greased 13x9 inch baking dish. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, vanilla, powdered sugar, maple syrup. Pour egg mixture evenly over the bread cubes. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. Remove from refrigerator 20 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve with maple syrup, if desired. ; name: fried bread with honey and lemon spain ; ingredients: milk, honey, lemon rind, ground cinnamon, bread, eggs, vegetable oil, sour cream, clear honey, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: crabbies ; ingredients: margarine, cheese spread, mayonnaise, garlic powder, seasoning salt, crabmeat, english muffins ; preparation:In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f. ; name: crab and corn bisque ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, curry powder, frozen corn, milk, heavy whipping cream, salt, pepper, crabmeat ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the corn in butter until smooth. Add in the flour. Stir until smooth. Cook for 1 minute stirring constantly. Gradually add in the milk. Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Add in crabmeat and shrimp. Cook and stir over low heat until shrimp turn pink. Add in parsley and stir to combine. Serve. ; name: crab bake ; ingredients: crabmeat, margarine, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs, onion, garlic cloves, parsley, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Pour milk over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean. ; name: crab shrimp mold ; ingredients: cream cheese, cream of celery soup, sweet onion, celery, mayonnaise, unflavored gelatin, imitation crabmeat, salt and pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:Heat cream cheese mixture in saucepan over low heat, whisking until smooth. In small bowl, soften gelatine in cold water and add to cream cheese mixture. Stir until well blended. In separate bowl, mix together mayonnaise, scallions and celery. Stir into cream cheese mixture until well blended. Gently fold in shrimp until well mixed and turn into a lightly oiled 4 cup mold. Chill several hours or overnight. To unmold, place mold in warm water for a few seconds and invert onto a plate. Place crackers around. ; name: crab puffs ; ingredients: wonton skins, cream cheese, crabmeat, breadcrumbs, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine cream cheese and cream, stirring until smooth. Stir in onion, horseradish, old bay, cheddar and chives. Add crabmeat with liquid and fold in gently. Place in a small baking dish, bake 8-10 minutes or until hot. ; name: cream of crab soup ; ingredients: lump crabmeat, margarine, flour, chicken broth, milk, old bay seasoning, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: asian style couscous ; ingredients: vegetable oil, scallion, water, soy sauce, sugar, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, couscous ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add cous cous, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: herbed israeli couscous ; ingredients: olive oil, israeli couscous, chicken broth, fresh parsley, tarragon, rosemary, lemon juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium-high heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add couscous, curry powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, couscous, chicken broth, salt, pepper and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: red bell pepper couscous ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell peppers, dried thyme, salt, fresh black pepper, vegetable broth, couscous ; preparation:Place the couscous in a large bowl. Bring 2 cups of lightly salted water to a boil. Pour the water over couscous and cover with plastic wrap. Let sit for 10 min. Uncover and fluff with a fork. Meanwhile heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and zucchini and cook until lightly browned. Add the zucchini and onion, along with the remaining ingredients to the couscous and mix well. Season with aditional salt and freshly ground pepper if desired. ; name: pistachio couscous ; ingredients: pistachios, low sodium chicken broth, salt, couscous, fresh mint leaves, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, ground pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan with a lid, heat oil over medium. Add 1 cup water. Bring to a boil. Add pistachios and remaining pistachios. Season with salt and pepper. Fluff with a fork, and serve. ; name: corn couscous ; ingredients: couscous, chicken stock powder, boiling water, butter, spring onions, corn, parsley ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add couscous, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: asian couscous ; ingredients: couscous, chicken broth, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic clove, soy sauce, ground ginger, lemon juice, parsley flakes ; preparation:

name: uncooked fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Combine powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces. ; name: candy cane fudge ; ingredients: vanilla baking chips, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: white cocont fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Mix sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme in a large buttered saucepan. Cook without stirring until candy temp. Reaches 235 degrees f. Or until a soft ball forms in very cold water. Add butter. Stir just til blended. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Let sit until cool. Add chopped nuts. Beat until creamy, and just until it starts to loose its glossy appearance dulls slightly. Pour into prepared buttered 8 x 8 inch pan. Cut into squares while still soft and warm. ; name: rocky road fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, chocolate fudge frosting, miniature marshmallows, mixed nuts ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan over low heat, melt 1 cup of the semisweet chocoalte chips with the unsweetened chocoalte. Remove pan from heat. Add the butter, vanilla, and salt to the melted chocolate and stir until the butter melts and is incorporated into the chocolate. Let stand until the mixture is at room temperature. Using an electric mixer at high speed, whip the chocolate until it holds soft peaks. Fold in the remaining chocolate chips, marshmallows, and nuts. Frost as desired. ; name: pilgrim fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: blazin venison steaks ; ingredients: venison steak, portabella mushroom caps, vegetable oil, jalapeno peppers, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, salt, dry red wine, dry mustard, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Place steaks in a casserole dish and arrange the mushrooms on top of each. Set aside. In a skillet, over medium heat, add the oil and sautee the jalapenos until slightly tender. Then, add the worcestershire sauce, garlic and salt -- heat until it sizzles a bit. Remove from the heat and add the wine, mustard and cinnamon -- whisk until blended. Pour the skillet contents over the steaks, cover with cling wrap and allow to marinate in the refrigerator overnight. After marinating overnight, remove them from the dish and grill the steaks and portabellos over hot charcoal. Baste with the marinade, grilling the steaks for about 6 minutes to a side and allowing the portabellos slightly longer. Do not baste for the final 3 minutes and discard any extra marinade. Serve with some buttery garlic noodles as a side dish. ; name: sweet and sour venison stew ; ingredients: venison, onion, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, water, vinegar, dry mustard, salt, sugar, paprika ; preparation:In a crockpot place the onions, bell pepper on the bottom. Add the sweet potatoes, peas and canned tomatoes, sprinkle with the thyme and the hot sauce, tuck the bay leaf into the juices. Place the leftover pork roast on top and cover with the leftover gravy. Cook on low for about 6 hours, or on high for 3 hours. Just until the flavors are melded and the onions and bell peppers are cooked. Serve with hot crusty bread and a salad. This can be done on top of the stove or baked as a casserole also. ; name: bacon wrapped venison tenderloin with portabella mushrooms ; ingredients: venison tenderloin, bacon, yellow onion, portabella mushrooms, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground pepper, salt, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Combine t olive oil, garlic, pepper, and salt. Rub seasonings onto the tenderloin. Wrap the tenderloin in bacon and place into the roaster. name: moroccan fried eggs with cumin and salt ; ingredients: eggs, olive oil, salt, cumin ; preparation:Heat the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the eggs, break the yolks with a spatula, and allow the eggs to set. Occasionally lift the edges of the eggs to let the uncooked egg run underneath. When the eggs have cooked, sprinkle with salt and cumin, and serve. ; name: southern beer joint pickled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, cider vinegar, black peppercorns, whole allspice, mace, coriander seed, cardamom seed, clove, hot red peppers, sugar ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week. ; name: garlic eggs from the provene ; ingredients: garlic cloves, eggs, anchovies packed in oil, capers, olive oil, wine vinegar, salt, pepper, fresh tarragon ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Serve immediately. ; name: pickled peppered eggs ; ingredients: eggs, yellow pepper, red pepper, green pepper, onion, white vinegar, water, sugar, cloves, salt ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. name: super easy slow cooker roast ; ingredients: beef roast, onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, water ; preparation:Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables. ; name: slow cooker barbecue ; ingredients: boneless chuck roast, garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the barbecue sauce packet. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. name: sugar free lemon ice box pie ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, lemonade mix, milk, cool whip, graham cracker crust ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: cheese and herb bread ; ingredients: self raising flour, cayenne pepper, butter, fresh parmesan cheese, tasty cheese, spring onions, parsley, egg, milk, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. name: cabbage skillet hasty tasty ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic powder, cabbage, brown rice, rotel tomatoes, broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender. ; name: sausage pepper and potato skillet ; ingredients: italian sausage, onion, green pepper, sweet red pepper, tiny new potatoes, water, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley. ; name: fresh vanilla bean vinaigrette ; ingredients: vanilla bean, olive oil, champagne vinegar, hot water, honey, dried tarragon, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Put vanilla bean in a small saucepan and heat to medium low, so the garlic is just barely sizzling but not browning. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in the flavored oil until the dessing is creamy and blended. Roll the remaining vanilla bean leaves into a tight roll and slice across to make thin shreds. name: shrimp crescents ; ingredients: cream cheese, shrimp, parmesan cheese, milk, crescent rolls, egg, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll crescent rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked shrimp, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: bacon onion appetizers ; ingredients: butter, onion, bacon, fresh parsley, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes, onion salt, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, french-fried onionspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes and onion salt. Separate crescent dough into 4 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal. Cut each rectangle crosswise into 8 strips. Dip each strip in egg mixture. Coat with crushed onions. Place on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake in for 8 to 12 minutes until golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheets. ; name: creamy chicken crescents ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cooked chicken, cheddar cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Unroll crescent dough and place in a circle on round stone, with the wide ends in the middle and the pointed ends to the outside. You should have an circle in the middle of the stone. You will need to overlap the wide ends a bit to make a circle. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, using more mayo if mixture appears to be dry. Place the mixture in a circle on the crescent rolls on the wide ends. Fold the pointed ends over the mixture to the middle of the stone. Tuck the ends under. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown. Slice and serve. ; name: crescent roll breakfast casserole ; ingredients: crescent rolls, brown and serve sausages, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, green peppers, salt, pepper, oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: bacon crescents ; ingredients: cream cheese, bacon, parmesan cheese, onion, fresh parsley, milk, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:

name: fried chicken livers ; ingredients: chicken liver, flour, pepper, dried parsley, vegetable oil, margarine, onion, white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over medium heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: beef liver creole ; ingredients: beef liver, celery, onion, green pepper, garlic clove, stewed tomatoes, sugar, water, hot sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, celery, green pepper, garlic clove, stewed tomatoes, sugar, water, hot sauce. Bring to a boil, stirring well. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed, and rice is tneder, about 10-12 minutes. Remove from heat, and let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: pasta with chicken livers broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, chicken livers, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, pasta ; preparation:Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook broccoli, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until chicken is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley. ; name: chicken liver and bacon appetizer ; ingredients: chicken liver, butter, bacon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut livers in two, season with salt and pepper. Melt butter in saute pan and add livers. Cook for one minute. Wrap each piece of liver in a strip of bacon and fasten with a toothpick. About ten minutes before serving, place bacon wrapped livers in a baking pan and broil until bacon is crisp. Drain on paper towels. Serve hot, either with toothpicks or on a small square of toast. ; name: slow cooker marinara with fresh basil ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, diced onion, garlic cloves, kosher salt, red pepper flakes, olive oil, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage. ; name: chicken livers marinara ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken liver, garlic, whole tomatoes, green peas, dried basil, black pepper ; preparation:

name: angel hair pasta with scallops tomato basil ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, bay scallop, diced tomatoes with balsamic vinegar basil and oil, fresh basil leaves, angel hair pasta, salt, pepper, italian spices ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: angel hair pasta with artichokes and mustard sauce ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, artichoke hearts, olive oil, red pepper, garlic clove, dijon mustard, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: angel hair with spicy eggplant sauce ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, eggplant, italian-style stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, red wine, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook garlic until tender. Add tomatoes, salt, basil, and black pepper. Cook three minutes. Add cooked spaghetti. Toss well. Add chicken broth and stir. Toss with parmesan cheese. ; name: olive garden angel hair and three onion soup ; ingredients: olive oil, white pearl onion, red onion, vidalia onion, chicken stock, salt, red pepper flakes, angel hair pasta, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese ; preparation:In oil in a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic about 10 minutes until lightly browned. Add broth and herbs, bring to boil. Stir in vidalia, reduce heat and simmer 10-15 minutes. Serve with a sprinkling of cheese on top. ; name: angel hair pasta with tomato scallop sauce ; ingredients: seafood, olive oil, onion, bell pepper, garlic clove, diced tomatoes, oregano, salt & pepper, angel hair pasta ; preparation:

name: chicken with vermouth ; ingredients: chicken breasts, dry vermouth, chicken stock, shallots, canned artichoke hearts, green grape, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 325 degrees f. Place half hens skin side up on broiler pan or in shallow roasting pan. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat 8 to 10 minutes or until tender, basting occasionally. ; name: meyer lemon drop martini ; ingredients: water, sugar, lemon, zest of, lemons, juice of, vodka ; preparation:In a small bowl, dissolve the sugar in the hot water. Press the grated ginger through a fine strainer set over the bowl, releasing the juice. In a cocktail shaker, muddle the diced cucumber with the 2 torn basil leaves. Add the ginger syrup, gin, lime juice and a handful of ice. Shake well, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish the martini with a cucumber slice and the remaining whole basil leaf and serve. ; name: pineapple upside down cake martini ; ingredients: pineapple juice, vanilla vodka, grenadine, maraschino cherries, ice ; preparation:Preheat oven according to instructions on cake mix. Melt the butter over medium high heat in the iron skillet. Remove from the heat and sprinkle the brown sugar evenly to cover the butter. Next, arrange pineapple rings around the bottom of the pan, one layer deep. Place a maraschino cherry into the center of each pineapple ring. Prepare the cake mix by mixing the mix, water, oil and eggs together, substitute some of the pineapple juice for some of the liquid in the directions. Pour the batter over the pineapple layer in dutch oven. Bake as directed by the cake mix directions. Cool for 10 minutes, then carefully turn out onto a plate. ; name: shaken but not stirred chocolate martini ; ingredients: ice, chocolate-flavored liqueur, vodka, chocolate ; preparation:Place rim of chilled glass into rasperry preserves. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the chocolate liqueur, raspberry preserves and vodka to the shaker. Shake briskly to mix and chill. Strain into the martini glass. Garnish with the chocolate. ; name: blood orange martini ; ingredients: blood orange juice, vodka, cointreau liqueur, fresh lime juice, ice cubes, blood orange ; preparation:Chill four martini glasses. Peel, core and slice the pear. Combine the vodka, syrup, liquer, ice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Dip the rims of the chilled glasses in the sugar. Pour the cocktails and garnish the glasses with pear slices. ; name: fritz martini ; ingredients: blue cheese, green olives, gin, dry vermouth ; preparation:

name: decadent chocolate chip cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, cocoa, sugar, butter, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, vanilla, mini chocolate chip, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: unbaked cherry cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, icing sugar, whipping cream, vanilla, graham cracker crumbs, white sugar, butter, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: strawberry white chocolate cheesecake ; ingredients: graham crackers, unsalted butter, white chocolate, soft cream cheese, mascarpone cheese, strawberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
