Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: cheesecake no bake ; ingredients: white chocolate chips, cream cheese, cool whip, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Melt chocolate chips in the microwave for a minute, stir, then cook for another minute and stir. Cube cream cheese and add to the white chocolate. Mix with beaters until smooth. Fold in whip cream until completely incorporated. Pour into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. ; name: rich and creamy chocolate mini cheesecakes low fat ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, fat free cream cheese, cocoa powder, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, egg ; preparation:

name: sweet corn pudding ; ingredients: frozen corn kernels, eggs, whipping cream, whole milk, sugar, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine corn, sugar, salt, butter, eggs, and milk. Dissolve cornstarch in water and stir into corn mixture. Pour into a greased 2-quart baking dish. Bake for 1 hour in the 350f oven. ; name: corn pudding ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Combine sugar, flour, salt and pepper. Add milk and slightly beaten eggs. Stir in corn. Dot with butter on top. Bake in 375 degree oven, in pan of water for 1 hour. ; name: cornbread pudding ; ingredients: butter, sour cream, eggs, cream-style sweet corn, white shoepeg corn, mexicorn, corn muffin mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Mix butter, sour cream, eggs, cream-style sweet corn, white shoepeg corn, mexicorn, corn muffin mix. Pour margarine mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven. ; name: easy vanilla pudding ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding. ; name: slow cooker corn pudding ; ingredients: cream cheese, eggs, sugar, frozen sweet corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, milk, margarine, salt, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Mix flour and corn. Then add sugar, milk, salt and butter. Add eggs and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven. ; name: majarete corn pudding dessert ; ingredients: whole milk, corn, sugar, coconut milk, vanilla, salt, cinnamon sticks, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: royal hot chocolate ; ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, boiling water, salt, vanilla extract, whipped cream, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make royal hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately. ; name: pumpkin spiced white hot chocolate ; ingredients: heavy cream, milk, white chocolate chips, pure vanilla extract, pumpkin pie spice, whipped cream ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine the heavy cream, milk, white chocolate, and salt. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth. Remove from heat and add in vanilla. Whisk until frothy. Pour into warmed mugs. Garnish with whipped cream. ; name: white chocolate buttercream ; ingredients: unsalted butter, milk, white chocolate, vanilla extract, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: the avenue s classic hot chocolate ; ingredients: lowfat chocolate milk, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, semisweet chocolate chunks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine milk, water, dry milk powder, chocolate chips, sugar and cornstarch. Over medium-high heat, bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low. Cook, whisking occasionally, until slightly thickened, 1-2 minutes. Top each serving with whipped topping and a cookie. ; name: brandied white hot chocolate ; ingredients: whole milk, half-and-half cream, white chocolate, white sugar, vanilla, brandy ; preparation:

name: pork chops with applesauce ; ingredients: pork chops, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cooking oil, applesauce, white wine, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Add pork chops. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until cooked. Remove pork chop from skillet. Add watr, applesauce, apple, cinnamon to skillet. Stir. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Top with chops. Cover and cook on low heat for 5 minutes ; name: pork chops with apples and swiss ; ingredients: pork chops, cloves, dry white wine, celery leaves, bay leaves, celery ribs, butter, apples, brown sugar, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f and butter a baking pan. Press a clove into each chop, then add the chops to the pan, followed by the wine, celery leaves, and bay leaves. Bake the chops for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan and saute the diced celery for 5 minutes, tehn add the apples and brown sugar. Turn the heat to low and cook for 10 minutes, or until just tender. After 30 minutes, remove the pork chops, discard the bay and celery leaves and sprinkle cheese on each chop. Baste with juices and broil a few minutes to brown. Add a few pan juices to the apple-celery mixture, and serve as a side with the pork chops. ; name: pan fried pork chops with glazed apples cider and cream sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pippin apples, pork chops, fresh sage, dry cider, red currant jelly, creme fraiche, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: crock pot pork loin chops with apples ; ingredients: pork loin chops, chicken broth, apple pie filling, lemon juice, chicken bouillon granule, cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours. ; name: sticky maple pork with apples ; ingredients: pork fillets, olive oil, apples, garlic clove, maple syrup, wine vinegar, coarse grain mustard, water ; preparation:

name: roasted potatoes and peppers ; ingredients: tiny new potatoes, onion, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. ; name: perfect roasted potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, cornstarch, garlic powder, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, garlic clove, parsley, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: roasted rosemary onions ; ingredients: onions, red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh rosemary leaf ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the onions in a large baking dish. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: oven crisped potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, green onions, dried italian herb seasoning, salt and pepper, chicken broth, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: oven roasted vegetables with rosemary bay leaves and garlic ; ingredients: salad potatoes, butternut squash, red onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, bell peppers, rosemary, bay leaves, sea salt ; preparation:

name: apple cinnamon quinoa cereal ; ingredients: quinoa, water, granny smith apple, raisins, almonds, cinnamon, soy margarine, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender. ; name: raisin spice hot cereal with quinoa ; ingredients: almonds, quinoa, water, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg, quick-cooking oatmeal, brown sugar, vanilla yogurt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely enjoy. ; name: quick peaches and cream breakfast cereal with quinoa ; ingredients: quinoa, milk, honey, cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, peach ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine oats, peaches and sugar. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Beat with a fork or wire whisk until blended. Add to oat mixture, mixing well. Place mixture in prepared pan. Bake, uncovered, 50 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: hot quinoa cereal with blueberries and almond butter ; ingredients: water, quinoa, sea salt, frozen blueberries, almond butter, almond extract ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. In a bowl toss the almonds, butter, sugar, cajun seasoning. Pour the nut mixture onto a rimmed baking sheet. Roast, stirring occasionally until nuts are one shade darker - about 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with salt. Set aside to cool. When cool toss the nuts with the cranberries. This will last 1 week at room temperature or 3 weeks in the freezer. ; name: apple strudel breakfast cereal with quinoa ; ingredients: almonds, quinoa, water, dried apple, raisins, cinnamon, vanilla extract, brown sugar, vanilla yogurt ; preparation:

name: skillet chili mac ; ingredients: ground beef, beans in chili sauce, dark red kidney beans, crushed tomatoes, chili powder, elbow macaroni, water, cheese ; preparation:Preheat skillet to 350f. Spray skillet with vegetable spray. Add ground beef and onions and cook until beef is no longer pink. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Cover and reduce heat to simmer for 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: skillet macaroni and ground beef ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, vegetable oil, elbow macaroni, green pepper, tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Remove from skillet, using a slotted spoon so as to save liquid in the skillet. Cook macaroni, onion and green pepper in drippings until macaroni is yellow. Return meat to skillet along with tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer 25 minutes. ; name: dar s hot dog chili sauce ; ingredients: lean ground beef, diced tomatoes, minced garlic clove, mccormick mild chili seasoning, oregano, basil, ground cayenne pepper, sugar ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in ketchup, water, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, pepper and cayenne. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until mix reaches desired thickness. Place hotdogs in buns and top each with about 2 t. Beef mix. ; name: skillet taco mac n cheese ; ingredients: kraft macaroni and cheese, milk, butter, ground beef, diced tomatoes, whole kernel corn, white onion, celery, taco seasoning, sour cream ; preparation:In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts. ; name: beeferoni mac ; ingredients: ground beef, kraft macaroni and cheese, water, barbecue sauce, tomato sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, white onion ; preparation:In a skillet saute onion and ground beef until meat is no longer pink. Stir in tomato sauce, macaroni and spices. Cover. Simmer on low heat for 15 minutes. Remove cover. If sauce is too thick add water. Serve topped with grated parmesan cheese and a side salad if desired. ; name: dee s chili mac ; ingredients: onion, ground beef, garlic and ginger seasoning, chili seasoning mix, tomato sauce, water, cheese, sour cream, macaroni ; preparation:

name: crunchy banana cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, banana, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, granola cereal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: no flour peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: protein peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, artificial sweetener, brown sugar, peanut butter, egg, all-purpose flour, protein powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: banana and peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, banana, brown sugar, golden syrup, egg, baking soda, soy flour, rice flour ; preparation:

name: country breakfast skillet ; ingredients: bacon, frozen cubed hash brown potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt, pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: omelet ; ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: potato omelette ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add eggs, water, flour, salt, pepper, cheese, olive oil and cook for about 5 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back into the pan, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5 minutes longer, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back ; name: oven omelette ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, frozen hash browns, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: jean s western omelet in a crock pot ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, cooked bacon, onion, bell pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: italian tricolore salad ; ingredients: avocado, buffalo mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, basil leaves, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, salt, and pepper. Season with salt and pepper. Add tomatoes, green beans, potatoes, carrots, pickle, peas, tomatoes, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese. Toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours, and up to 8 hours. Just before serving, stir in basil. ; name: corn tomato and avocado salad ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, cilantro, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh corn kernels, avocados, cherry tomatoes, red onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180deg. Place corn on baking tray and roast for 30 mins, allow corn to cool and then squeeze out the flesh and mash in a small bowl. Add the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and dijon mustard and whish well together. Season with salt and pepper. Chop corn into bite sized pieces, then grill or dry fry for 3-5 mins or until crisp. Place salad leaves into bowl and add bacon, onion, tomato and avocado. Toss well. Whisk the dressing ingredients again to ensure they are mixed well and then pour over salad. ; name: chicken quinoa salad ; ingredients: water, quinoa, slivered almonds, white wine vinegar, olive oil, chicken breasts, grapes, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: mixed green and mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: mandarin oranges in light syrup, olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, black pepper, romaine lettuce, baby spinach, red cabbage ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the mandarin orange sections on top and serve. ; name: arroz con pollo salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, cooked brown rice, mild chili pepper, tomatoes, cucumber, skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: beef and garlic ; ingredients: beef sirloin, garlic cloves, vegetable oil cooking spray, green onions, bok choy, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, low-fat beef broth, tomatoes, salt & pepper ; preparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: thai sesame beef ; ingredients: green onion, low sodium soy sauce, water, dry sherry, brown sugar, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, lean beef ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender. ; name: crock pot beef and broccoli ; ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, beef consomme, soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic cloves, cornstarch, fresh broccoli florets ; preparation:Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice. ; name: crock pot beef and broccoli ; ingredients: rib eye, soy sauce, white wine, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, sesame oil, ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, frozen broccoli florets ; preparation:Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice. ; name: orange beef and rice ; ingredients: oil, top round beef, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, carrot, rice pilaf mix, orange juice, beef broth ; preparation:Briefly heat oil in large, deep pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed. ; name: thai beef with broccoli in oyster sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic, boneless beef roast, broccoli floret, oyster sauce, fish sauce, sugar, pepper, water ; preparation:

name: processor marmalade ; ingredients: grapefruit, lemon, oranges, water, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients in a medium saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, for about 15 mins. Or until the mixture is of desired consistency. Pour into sterilized jars and seal. Store processor marmalade in a cool place. ; name: orange lemon grapefruit marmalade ; ingredients: oranges, lemons, grapefruits, water, sugar ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. ; name: grape cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, fresh lemon rind, vanilla, egg whites, flour, green seedless grapes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Butter and flour a 10-inch tube pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in applesauce and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and then sift over applesauce mixture. Sprinkle with raisins and blend gently. Pour batter into pan and bake approximately 65-75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes up clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes then remove from pan to finish cooling. ; name: grape clusters ; ingredients: seedless grapes, premium white baking chocolate, honey-roasted cashews, fresh grape leaves ; preparation:Rinse grapes and drain well. Cut grapes into clusters of 3. Set on paper towels and let dry completely. Melt chocolate in the top of a double boiler over hot water. When completely melted, remove from heat. Place cashews in a shallow bowl. Holding the grape clusters by the stem, dip in the chocolate and allow excess to drain back into pan. Roll grapes gently in the cashews. Place grapes, stem side up, on waxed paper. Refrigerate until firm. Serve within 4 hours. Garnish with grape leaves if desired. ; name: orange blossom ; ingredients: oranges, almond syrup, gin, pink grapefruit juice, angostura bitters ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: sweet broiled grapefruit ; ingredients: grapefruits, butter, sugar, cinnamon, maraschino cherry ; preparation:

name: tomato mozzarella salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Meanwhile, cut the mozzarella into small cubes and quarter the cherry tomatoes. When the pasta is cooked, drain it and rinse it in cold water until the pasta is cold. Drain it again. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil and parmesan in with the pasta. In a large serving bowl, mix the pasta with the mozzarella and tomatoes. Sprinkle the pine nuts over the top and serve. ; name: sliced tomato salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, lemon, lemon pepper, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, capers ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and cook the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and cook about 2 minutes. Season calamari rings with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet. Saute, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Transfer to a colander to drain a bit. Place the lemon juice, olive oil, capers, and lemon zest into a clean glass jar with a lid. Shake to combine, taste, and season with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh parsley. ; name: potato corn and tomato salad ; ingredients: frozen corn, boiling potatoes, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil, red onion, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Season with salt ; name: sliced tomato salad with capers and basil ; ingredients: tomatoes, capers, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, water, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and cook the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and cook about 2 minutes. Season calamari rings with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet. Saute, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Transfer to a colander to drain a bit. Place the lemon juice, olive oil, capers, and lemon zest into a clean glass jar with a lid. Shake to combine, taste, and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl, pour dressing over top and gently toss to coat with dressing. Garnish with fresh parsley. ; name: warm salad of zucchini and tomato ; ingredients: butter, shallots, cream, fresh basil, fresh lemon juice, red wine vinegar, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper, zucchini, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, deli ham, swiss cheese, flour, butter, chicken bouillon cube, garlic, milk, onion salt, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done. ; name: chicken cordon bleu the easy way ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ham, swiss cheese, white wine, parsley, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes. ; name: new chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, reduced-sodium chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, black pepper, cooked ham, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salad greens, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes. ; name: low carb chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ham, cream cheese, garlic salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes. ; name: flounder cordon bleu ; ingredients: flounder fillets, cooked ham, swiss cheese, orange rind, white pepper, egg, margarine, all-purpose flour, milk, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: dutch beets ; ingredients: beets, onion, butter, all-purpose flour, cider vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425 degrees f. Heat a heavy-based oven roasting pan on top of the stove and toss the vegetables and garlic. Sprinkle with the oil. Stir until they start to brown. Add the herbs, sprinkle over the vinegar and season well. Put the pan in the oven and roast for about 15 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375 degrees f and continue cooking for another 30 minutes or so, stirring 2 or 3 times until the beets are tender. If the vegetables start to burn, add a little more oil and vinegar to the pan. ; name: roasted beets with a rosemary glaze ; ingredients: beet, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn. ; name: honey lemon beets ; ingredients: beets, butter, onion, honey, lemon juice, nutmeg, salt and pepper ; preparation:Scrub beets but do not peel. Place beets in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 40 minutes, or until just tender. Drain. When cool enough to handle, peel beets, cut into quarters and place them in a oven-proof casserole dish, with a lid. Pre-heat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and mix in honey and ginger. Season with salt and pepper and pour over beets. Cover with lid and bake 45-60 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beets are well glazed. ; name: pickled red beet eggs ; ingredients: eggs, red beets, water, cider vinegar, brown sugar, onion ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week. ; name: continental beets ; ingredients: cider vinegar, tarragon vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar, olive oil, beets, flour, lemon juice, sour cream ; preparation:

name: macaroni and cheese pizza ; ingredients: macaroni, eggs, lean ground beef, onion, pizza sauce, mushrooms, pepperoni slices, mexican cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: baked macaroni cheese with pizzazz ; ingredients: shell noodles, butter, condensed cheddar cheese soup, evaporated milk, chicken bouillon cube, season-all salt, onion powder, black pepper, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts. ; name: pizza pizzazz ; ingredients: pepperoni, eggs, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, onion, tomatoes, mushroom, olive ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large wedges. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown. ; name: beefy macaroni casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, condensed cream of broccoli soup, del monte zesty jalapeno pepper diced tomato, macaroni, mild cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: contest winner pizza hotdish ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, ground beef, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, pizza sauce ; preparation:

name: buffalo chicken pizza ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, hot sauce, bleu cheese salad dressing, prepared pizza crust, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: vegetarian chicken pizza ; ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pizza sauce, fat-free cheddar cheese, vegetarian chicken pieces, roma tomato, dried basil, dried oregano, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Place pizza crust on baking sheet. Melt butter in 8-inch skillet until sizzling. Add chicken and garlic powder. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink. Stir in salsa. Spread evenly onto crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned and bubbly. ; name: pizza pizzazz ; ingredients: pepperoni, eggs, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, onion, tomatoes, mushroom, olive ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large wedges. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown. ; name: delicious chicken garlic pizza ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast half, butter, garlic cloves, green onions, dried basil, pizza dough, roma tomatoes, fresh cilantro, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: meatball pizza ; ingredients: pizza crusts, pizza sauce, cheddar cheese, meatballs, dried italian seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: buffalo chicken pizza single ; ingredients: pizza crusts, olive oil, chicken breast, buffalo wing sauce, blue cheese dressing, celery, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: holy chicken and rice ; ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, instant rice, vegetables ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad. ; name: portuguese beef and onions bifes de cebolada ; ingredients: olive oil, beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes. Cook on the preheated grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Knead together the beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes. Add beef steak ; name: happy humus ragu ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, black beans, garlic, parsley, basil, cilantro, rag pasta sauce, feta cheese, cream cheese ; preparation:Place 2 cups garbanzo beans in a food processor. Press for 30 seconds, add olive oil, lime juice, salt. Continue pressing until smooth hummus consistency. Heat a skillet and add ragu sauce until warm. Assemble the hummus by placing garbanzo dip first, ragu sauce, crispy garbanzo beans on top. Sprinkle cilantro, lime, feta cheese, salt and pepper. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: chicken holy basil ; ingredients: garlic cloves, thai chiles, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, southeast asian fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar, black pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve over hot rice. ; name: hippie rice pilaf ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, long-grain white rice, vermicelli, garlic clove, water, herbs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add parsley and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in parsley. Reduce ; name: ceci ragu ; ingredients: chicken broth, tomatoes, garbanzo beans, artichoke hearts, garlic, dried basil, dried oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chocolate cream pound cake ; ingredients: whipping cream, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 175 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil. ; name: rich and gooey ice cream cake ; ingredients: oreo cookies, butter, ice cream, chocolate syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, cool whip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil. ; name: icebox cherry dessert ; ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cherry pie filling, cool whip ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spread on top of cake. Top cake with strawberries. Be careful to not put too much of the juice on the cake, or else it will be too moist. Refrigerate for an hour. ; name: fresh strawberry cream cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, water, oil, eggs, powdered sugar, cream cheese, heavy cream, fresh strawberries, strawberry glaze ; preparation:Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Place strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. Add the other remaining ingredients and blend for 30 seconds or so. You may need to add a little of the cream ; name: creamy birthday cake batter ice cream ; ingredients: skim milk, granulated sugar, heavy cream, pure vanilla extract, cake mix, candy sprinkles ; preparation:

name: raspberry chocolate muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, fat free raspberry yogurt, skim milk, canola oil, raspberries, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut almond paste into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of almond paste. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: fruit filled muffins ; ingredients: milk, vegetable oil, egg, bisquick baking mix, fruit preserves, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: double chocolate banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, baking powder, bananas, vegetable oil, egg, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. ; name: chocolate chip eggnog muffins ; ingredients: flour, chocolate chips, baking powder, ground nutmeg, salt, sugar, eggs, eggnog, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add flour mixture to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack. ; name: colossal chocolate chunk muffins ; ingredients: eggs, biscuit mix, sugar, milk, vegetable oil, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: garlic parmesan orzo ; ingredients: orzo pasta, garlic, butter, parmesan cheese, milk, fresh parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in l skillet over medium high heat until oil is shimmering and then add the orzo. Toast, stirring frequently, until it starts to turn golden brown. Stir in broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until orzo is tender and broth is absorbed. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Uncover and stir in butter, salt, peper and parsley. ; name: pasta with shrimp ww ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, capers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried oregano, dried tarragon, feta cheese, orzo pasta ; preparation:Shell and devein shrimp. In a large skillet heat olive oil and then add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss. ; name: creamy italian orzo ; ingredients: orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, cremini mushroom, half-and-half, canned peas, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: baked italian shrimp ; ingredients: fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, large shrimp, fresh garlic, seasoning salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: creamy parmesan shrimp and orzo ; ingredients: butter, minced garlic cloves, orzo pasta, water, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, shrimp, fresh basil ; preparation:

name: cherry marshmallow magic cake ; ingredients: miniature marshmallows, cherry pie filling, white cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Grease bottom only of 13x9x2 pan with shortening. Do not flour. Beat cake mix, sour cream, oil, almond extract and egg whites in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in chopped cherries and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until cake springs back when touched lightly in center. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Spread frosting over top of cake. Store loosely covered at room temperature. ; name: cherry marshmallow cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, miniature marshmallows, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: banana bundt cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, banana ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour two baking pans and set aside. Mash banana and set aside. Combine cake mix and baking soda in the large bowl of an electric mixer. Add the rest of the ingredients and beat on low speed until combined. Beat at medium speed for 4-5 minutes. Divide batter between the two pans and bake 30-35 minutes or until center of cake springs back with lightly tapped. Allow to cool on a wire rack and frost. ; name: luscious lemon bundt cake ; ingredients: lemon supreme cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, vegetable oil, eggs, lemon gelatin, water ; preparation:Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. Sprinkle powdered sugar ; name: moist poppy seed bundt cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, sugar, oil, poppy seed, sour cream, eggs ; preparation:

name: mexican skillet eggs and rice ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, spanish rice, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until browned stirring often. When done cut into strips. Place back into skillet and add soup, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas. Bring to a boil. Cover, cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until hot. Top with cheese and serve. ; name: spanish baked eggs ; ingredients: eggs, onions, green peppers, butter, virgin olive oil, cheese, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Stir together eggs, yogurt, onion and mexican seasoning. Lightly toast english muffins and place on a foil covered baking sheet. Top each muffin with equal amounts of egg mixture, chilies and cheese. Bake for 10 min or until eggs are warmed and cheese is melted. ; name: bacon avocado burritos ; ingredients: eggs, flour tortillas, vegetable oil, cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, bacon, salsa ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown. ; name: rosie s eggs mexicana chile casserole ; ingredients: eggs, butter, flour, baking powder, cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilies, tomatoes, sour cream, salsa ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: spanish potato tortilla ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, onion, eggs ; preparation:Slice the potatoes as thin as possible and dry with a paper towel. Saut potatoes and onions in olive oil over medium heat, turning frequently, until golden brown. Meanwhile, beat the eggs with salt and pepper until foamy, 1-2 minutes. Pour the eggs over the potatoes, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and slide the omelette back into the pan, so that the cooked side is on top. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: scrambled huevos rancheros ; ingredients: eggs, milk, margarine, mexican blend cheese, flour tortillas, salsa ; preparation:

name: fennel salad with citrus zests and toasted pine nuts ; ingredients: fennel bulb, lemon, orange, pine nuts, olive oil, fleur de sel, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In a large heavy saucepan cook the julienned fennel and the shallots in the butter over moderately low heat, stirring occassionally, for 5 minutes. Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Simmer the mixture, covered for 15 minutes or until the fennel is just tender but not soft, and remove the pan from the heat. In a heatproof bowl whisk together the lemon juice and the yolks. Whisk 1 cup of the soup liquid, a little at a time, into the yolk mixture. Add yolk mixture to the soup, whisking. Return soup to the stove and reheat over low heat, stirring constantly. Stir in the minced fennel leaves just prior to serving. ; name: artichoke and fennel salad ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, artichoke hearts, tomatoes, brine-cured black olives, anchovy fillet, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, dried thyme, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a saut pan over medium heat, add the garlic and cook until golden. Add the artichokes and saut until the outsides are just browned. Stir through the basil leaves and pine nuts and serve. ; name: fennel with orangeslices ; ingredients: fennel, orange, orange zest, onion, bay leaf, salt & pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place fennel, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds. ; name: fennel apple slaw ; ingredients: cider vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, ground fennel, grainy mustard, olive oil, apples, fennel bulb, fresh thyme, red onion ; preparation:Slice end of fennel and remove shoots from top. If exterior of bulb is discoloured or at all ugly, peel it. Slice fennel and apples thinly into matchstick pieces. Place in a serving bowl. Place all dressing ingredients in a blender or food processor and process until well combined. Pour dressing over fennel and apples and toss. Let stand for 5 minutes, then serve. ; name: fennel salad with apples and fresh corn ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, apple, red onion, corn, olive oil, lemon juice, fennel leaves, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: lovely smoked salmon and cream cheese entree ; ingredients: smoked salmon, cream cheese, capers, lemon juice, lemon zest, spring onions, parsley, sambal oelek ; preparation:In a food processor, add cream cheese, lemon juice, dill and capers. Combine for a few minutes. Toast chosen bread. Once the bread has been toasted spread cream cheese mix thickly onto both pieces of bread. Top with the smoked salmon and red onions. ; name: smoked salmon and goat cheese toasts ; ingredients: soft fresh goat cheese, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, lemon peel, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil, french baguettes, smoked salmon, lemon ; preparation:In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve. ; name: creamed salmon on toast ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, green onions, milk, salmon, salt, pepper, bread ; preparation:1 thaw frozen peas in a collendar. 2 melt the margarine in a saucepan. 3 add the flour and blend. 4 add the salmon, peas, salt and pepper and warm through. 5 as the salmon is warming, toast the bread. 7 after toasted, spoon salmon mixture over the toast. ; name: baked eggs and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, small curd cottage cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: cream cheese and salmon smorrebrod ; ingredients: pumpernickel bread, butter, cream cheese, smoked salmon, cucumbers ; preparation:

name: noodles and pot cheese ; ingredients: egg noodles, pot cheese, butter, salt ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: simple chinese noodles ; ingredients: fried chinese noodles, ginger, green onions, oil, oyster sauce, soya sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this. ; name: stir fried ramen noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, frozen vegetables, water, water chestnuts, soy sauce, beef-flavor ramen noodles ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non ; name: asian chicken noodles with vegetables ; ingredients: cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breast, ground ginger, salt & pepper, water, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, frozen mixed vegetables, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium- ; name: cabbage noodles with crispy bacon ; ingredients: cabbage, butter, sea salt, pepper, bacon, wide egg noodles, dried thyme, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook cabbage on stove until crispy. Cook noodles in boiling water until al dente. When bacon is cool, crumble it into small pieces. Add the sour cream and chopped onion to the cooked noodles. Add the bacon and half of the cheese into the noodles, stir well. Pour mixture into a square casserole dish and top with remaining cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 15 minutes or until bubbly and cheese has melted. ; name: fried noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, butter, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: shrimp bruschetta ; ingredients: cooked shrimp, old bay seasoning, garlic powder, plum tomato, green onions, olive oil, egg white, french baguette, mayonnaise, kosher salt ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: shrimp tomato coleslaw ; ingredients: baby shrimp, mayonnaise, sherry wine vinegar, onion, celery seed, salt, pepper, coleslaw, grape tomatoes ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, onion, celery seed, salt and pepper until smooth. Add the cabbage, tomatoes and shrimp. Toss well until combined. Cover and refrigeratoe until well chilled. Serve chilled. ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: bruschetta with gorgonzola cheese and honey ; ingredients: baguette, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, gorgonzola, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture. Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the egg mixture, then serve immediately. ; name: baked italian shrimp ; ingredients: fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, large shrimp, fresh garlic, seasoning salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: caramelized onion and shrimp bruschetta ; ingredients: golden raisin, canola oil, yellow onions, capers, fresh dill, fresh ground pepper, hot sauce, salt, baguette, cooked shrimp ; preparation:

name: blue cheese garlic bread ; ingredients: butter, blue cheese, parmesan cheese, chives, garlic powder, french bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice. ; name: buttery garlic bread ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, black pepper, dried oregano, french bread, garlic cloves, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve. ; name: italian garlic bread ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, parsley, dried thyme, dried marjoram, paprika, parmesan cheese, french bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice. ; name: herb garlic bread ; ingredients: garlic cloves, flat leaf parsley, fresh basil leaf, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, baguette ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve. ; name: garlic bread crotes ; ingredients: french bread, butter, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: chili cheese coney dogs ; ingredients: hot dogs, hot dog buns, chili sauce, fresh onion, cheese sauce ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. Cover grill and grill for 15 to ; name: beer brats with onions and peppers ; ingredients: bratwursts, beer, onion, hot pepper, olive oil, hot dog bun, mustard ; preparation:Put your brats in a large pot and dump in the 2 beers, onion, season all and garlic powder. Add water until the brats are fully covered. Cook 20 minutes on medium heat, meanwhile, heat up your grill. Transfer your brats to the grill and cook 4-5 minutes on each side. Be careful not to pierce the brats with a fork or anything because this will let the good tasting juices out. Discard the beer & onion mixture. Place a slice of cheese in each hot dog bun and add your brats on top. Add desired condiments. ; name: dogs and taters ; ingredients: beef hot dogs, oil, onion, garlic salt, pepper, potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat until onions start to soften and brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add potatoes, onion, garlic, salt and pepper to taste, and any seasonings you are using. Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until onions are golden and heated through. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through. ; name: sloppy dogs ; ingredients: vegetable oil, green bell pepper, onion, barbecue sauce, ketchup, mustard, garlic powder, hot dog, hot dog buns ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread. ; name: chili dog wraps ; ingredients: corn tortillas, hot dogs, chili, salsa, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook tortillas for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Roll up and serve. ; name: cheese dogs ; ingredients: onion, oil, pepper, hot dog buns, hot dogs, cheese whiz ; preparation:

name: scalloped potatoes and ham ; ingredients: smoked ham, flour, cream of mushroom soup, milk, potatoes, carrot, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:In an ungreased 2 qt baking dish, combine potatoes with sauce mix. Boiling water and butter. Stir in milk, ham, and beans. Bake, uncovered, in a 400 degree oven for 35 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring occassionaly. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: quick ham and potato scallop ; ingredients: scalloped potatoes mix, boiling water, butter, milk, ham, frozen cut green beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In an ungreased 2 qt baking dish, combine potatoes with sauce mix. Boiling water and butter. Stir in milk, ham, and beans. Bake, uncovered, in a 400 degree oven for 35 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring occassionaly. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: crock pot ham and potatoes ; ingredients: ham, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, cream of celery soup, paprika ; preparation:Bake potatoes at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour until soft. Slice potatoes in half lengthwise. Scoop out insides, leaving a firm shell. Place potato pulp, cheddar cheese, milk, ham, sour cream, onion salt, pepper, butter, paprika or parsley in a mixing bowl. Beat at high speed until smooth. Fill potato shells with mixture. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 20 to 30 minutes. Garnish with paprika or parsley. ; name: heavenly potatoes and ham ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, butter, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, green onions, cooked ham, salt and pepper, seasoned bread crumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: homeade scalloped potatoes and ham ; ingredients: light margarine, flour, skim milk, ham, white onion, cheddar cheese, potatoes ; preparation:

name: ranch pasta salad ; ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cucumber, tomatoes, ranch salad dressing, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Pour dressing into large bowl and add dry ranch dressing mix, stirring well. Add diced cucumbers, sliced tomatoes, olives and basil, cover and marinate a couple of hours. In a large pot, place enough water for pasta and drop crab boil bag into water. When water comes to boil, place pasta into water and cook until almost done, then turn heat off, add the frozen shrimp and let sit in crab boil water until pasta is tender. Drain shrimp and pasta mixture into a large bowl. Pour dressing mixture over pasta and shrimp, mixing well. Cover and let chill before serving--overnight is even better. ; name: pasta house salad ; ingredients: iceberg lettuce, romaine lettuce, artichoke heart, red onion, pimiento, olive oil, red wine vinegar, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. ; name: pasta salad greek style ; ingredients: rotini noodles, boneless chicken breast, celery, sweet red pepper, black olives, feta cheese, green onions, greek salad dressing ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the rotini noodles and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the celery and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the green onions and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the feta cheese and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the feta ; name: garlic pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta, orange bell pepper, red bell pepper, carrot, fresh parsley, garlic vinaigrette dressing, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add vinaigrette and mix well. Add feta cheese, mix lightly, lifting the pasta and cheese mixture until the cheese is distributed throughout. Chill for an hour before serving. ; name: de lightful pasta salad ; ingredients: vegetable oil, vinegar, sugar, mayonnaise, cucumber, red onion, cauliflower, broccoli, black olives, tri-color spiral pasta ; preparation:

name: luscious lemon bars ; ingredients: butter, flour, powdered sugar, lemon juice, fresh lemon rind, sugar, eggs, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together butter, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown. ; name: chewy lemon bars ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, egg, butter, powdered sugar, eggs, cream cheese, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown. ; name: frosted lemon cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar and lemonade mix until fluffy. Beat in egg, vanilla and lemon extract. In a separate bowl, mix flour and baking soda. Add dry ingredients to batter, beating until thoroughly combined. Form dough into 1-inch ball and roll in granulated sugar. Place balls 2-inch apart on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. ; name: lemon crumb bars ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, butter, egg, egg yolks, saltine crackers, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown. ; name: creamy lemon oat bars ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, flour, old fashioned oats, brown sugar, unsalted butter, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown. ; name: so easy lemon bars ; ingredients: pillsbury sugar cookie dough, eggs, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, lemon juice, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: easy bruschetta ; ingredients: tomatoes, sweet onion, olive oil, fresh oregano, fresh basil, fresh parsley, italian bread, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Spray 9x13 pan with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange tenderloins in pan and sprinkle with mozzarella. In seperate bowl, mix tomatoes, chicken stuffing, and water. Mix until stuffing is moistened. Spread evenly over chicken. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: bruschetta with roasted sweet red peppers ; ingredients: italian bread, olive oil, roasted sweet red peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil, onion, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Prepare a medium-hot charcoal fire or preheat the broiler. Place on grill or under the broiler the slices of bread. Grill or broil, turning once, until golden brown, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from the heat and rub the surface with 2 large cloves of garlic. Brush with 3-4 t of the olive oil. Combine the tomatoes, basil leaves, salt and pepper in bowl. Divide the tomato among the brushetta and serve immediately. ; name: peach and roasted red pepper bruschetta ; ingredients: red pepper, peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture.
