Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette. Serve immediately. ; name: cherry tomato bocconcini and basil bruschetta ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, bocconcini, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, country bread, garlic, arugula leaf ; preparation:Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well. ; name: tandoori naan bruschetta ; ingredients: flat bread, olive oil, rosemary, yellow bell pepper, orange bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: baked dijon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking. ; name: garlic broiled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people. ; name: chicken in many mustards marinade for the grill ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, apple juice, dijon mustard, whole grain mustard, sweet-hot mustard, white wine vinegar, vegetable oil, lemon juice, shallot ; preparation:Combine apple juice, mustards, vinegar, oil, lemon juice and shallot in a medium bowl and mix well. Place chicken in a single layer in a shallow non-reactive pan. Pour marinade over, cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight. To cook, drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken over medium-hot coals and grill 6-7 minutes per side, until internal temperature is 165 degrees fahrenheit. While chicken is grilling, place reserved marinade in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 8 minutes, or until chicken has finished cooking. Spoon sauce over chicken and serve. ; name: oregano dijon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, dried breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, garlic salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Dredge chicken in flour and shake of excess. Dip in egg, allowing excess to drip off. Saut in skillet a few pieces at a time, turn once, browning on both sides. Arrange chicken in a buttered, shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, oregano and cheese. Cover with foil, bake 15 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about 15-20 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about ; name: grilled lemon dijon chicken ; ingredients: fresh parsley, garlic cloves, shallot, dried italian seasoning, fresh rosemary, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: irish beer bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, egg, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix dry ingredients and beer. Pour into a greased loaf pan. Pour melted butter over mixture. Bake 1 hour, remove from pan and cool at least 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: scottish brown bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, golden syrup, milk, baking soda, cream of tartar, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: easy and fast bread with baking powder ; ingredients: bread flour, flour, baking powder, salt, water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Slowly add milk to form a soft dough. Knead on a floured surface 4 times. Roll into 10 inch by 5 inch rectangle. Cut into 12 sticks. Put butter in 13x9 baking dish. Roll breadsticks in butter. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake at 425 for 16 minutes, or until golden. ; name: french bread ; ingredients: french bread, warm water, yeast, salt, sugar, shortening, flour ; preparation:Mix water, sugar and yeast in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: finnish flat bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, shortening, buttermilk ; preparation:

name: cornbread with corn ; ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, low-fat milk, eggs, butter, corn ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: grandma s corn flake cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, salt, baking soda, flour, corn flakes, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack. ; name: good eats creamed corn cornbread alton brown ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, kosher salt, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f place a 10-inch cast iron skillet into the oven. In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, salt, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Whisk together to combine well. In a large bowl, combine the buttermilk, eggs, and creamed corn, whisking together to combine thoroughly. Add the dry ingredients to the buttermilk mixture and stir to combine. If the batter will not pour, add more buttermilk to the batter. Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to the cast iron skillet. Pour the batter into the skillet. Bake until the cornbread is golden brown and springs back upon the touch, about 20 minutes. ; name: quick cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking mix, baking powder, eggs, honey, milk, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: grandma s cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, unsifted flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sour cream, milk, egg, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: farmhouse barbecue muffins ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuit, ground beef, ketchup, cider vinegar, chili powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butter, buttermilk. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir till the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes. ; name: savory white cheddar muffins ; ingredients: butter, fresh chives, garlic, buttermilk, baking mix, sharp white cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes. ; name: meatloaf muffins very simple to make and kids can help ; ingredients: lean ground beef, egg, light bread, onion rings, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix salt, meat, egg, and torn up bread together. Fill each muffin cup of muffin pan almost to the top. Top with a onion ring and ketchup in the middle of the ring. Place in oven until thoroughly cooked, about 20-30 minutes. ; name: basic cheese muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, cayenne pepper, egg, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes. ; name: cheesy muffins ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, paprika, eggs, milk, dried thyme, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, broccoli and scallions and mix at low speed for another minute. Coat a 12 cup muffin pan with cooking spray. Divide batter among muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on a rack before turning muffins out of pan. ; name: bbq cheddar mini meatloaf muffins ; ingredients: ground beef, stove top stuffing mix, water, egg, barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: easy peasy fudge ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, condensed milk, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:In 2-quart pyrex bowl melt chips on high or till melted. Stir. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Spray or butter a 9x13 pan and pour fudge into pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares. ; name: easiest chocolate peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, peanut butter, vanilla flavoring, pecans ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, milk, vanilla flavoring, pecans. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares. ; name: maple walnut fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, miniature marshmallows, white chocolate chips, walnuts, maple extract, walnut halves ; preparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half. ; name: chocolate marshmallow swirl fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, butter, vanilla extract, salt, walnuts, miniature marshmallows ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and butter in a saucepan. Bring mixture to a rolling boil stirring constantly. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate chips until completely melted. Add marshmallow creme and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 pan. ; name: easy no fail chocolate fudge no thermometer ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: easy walnut and chocolate fudge ; ingredients: condensed milk, walnuts, salted butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate, vanilla essence, coconut ; preparation:

name: spicy chicken pasta ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic cloves, spaghetti, chili powder, chicken broth, butter, rotel, onion, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven 350. Mix half of chopped fresh basil, melted butter and garlic together in baking casserole dish. Place chicken breasts on top of mixture and top with remaining fresh chopped basil. Bake covered for 45 minutes. Bake uncovered for 15 minutes. Prepare spaghetti noodles boil for 7-10 minutes to preferred taste. Over low heat warm alfredo sauce, stir often. Be careful not to scorch. Serve. Pepper to taste. ; name: lemon pepper chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, lemons, black pepper, garlic cloves, honey, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400. Cover a glass baking dish with aluminum foil and place the chicken breasts on top. Zest all 3 of the lemons into a small bowl, and then add the juice of 2 of the lemons. Add the pepper and all the other ingredients into the bowl. Mix the combine and pour over all the chicken breasts. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill. ; name: chicken in a pot ; ingredients: chicken broth, tomato paste, ground black pepper, dried oregano, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, dry breadcrumbs, olive oil, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: chicken with creamy sun dried tomato sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, chicken broth, heavy cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat oil from tomatoes in a heavy skillet, over medium heat. Add chicken to skillet and saute until golden, about 4 minutes per side. Add garlic and stir 30 seconds--do not brown garlic. Add white wine, cream, pepper, and tomatoes, and bring to a boil. Cover skillet, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until chicken is just cooked through, about 3-5 minutes. Transfer chicken to plates. Add most of basil to sauce in skillet. Increase heat and boil until sauce thickens enough to coat spoon, and peppers and tomatoes are soft-about 2-5 minutes. Season sauce to taste with salt and pepper, spoon over chicken and top with fresh basil and serve. ; name: ww italian spicy chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast, garlic cloves, dried chili pepper flakes, oregano, olive oil, lemon juice, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: grilled brown sugar pork chops ; ingredients: brown sugar, apple juice, vegetable oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, salt and pepper, cornstarch, water, boneless pork chops ; preparation:Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook. ; name: pork with pear and ginger sauce ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, lemon juice, sugar, white wine, chicken stock, pears, cornstarch, ground ginger, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, mix together peaches, marmalade, lemon juice, ginger, mustard, cinnamon and soy sauce. Place pork in medium baking dish. Glaze pork with peach mixture, using it all. Roast in oven for approximately one and a half hours. Serve. ; name: grilled swordfish steaks ; ingredients: swordfish steaks, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dijon mustard, olive oil, lemon, juice of, bay leaf, dill, lemon wedge ; preparation:In large skillet, heat italian dressing and cook fish over medium heat, turning once, 8 minutes or until fish flakes. Remove to serving platter and keep warm. Into skillet, add wine, then pepper, dill and mustard. Bring to a boil, then simmer, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes. Stir in cream and heat 1 minute or until thickened. Serve over fish. Garnish, if desired, with baby vegetables. ; name: applesauce barbecue pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, dried thyme, barbecue sauce, chunky applesauce, chili powder ; preparation:In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly. ; name: grilled ham steak with peppered peach glaze ; ingredients: peach preserves, fresh ginger, lime juice, dijon mustard, lime peel, ham steaks, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: teriyaki lime salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, green onions, fresh lime juice, teriyaki sauce, thyme, lime ; preparation:Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime. ; name: orange teriyaki fish ; ingredients: white fish fillets, orange juice, green onions, teriyaki sauce, fresh ginger, cornflour, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish in baking pan. Mix orange juice and butter. Pour half this mixture over the fish. Sprinkle the rind over. Bake for 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange mixture over. Bake another 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: teriyaki salmon skewers ; ingredients: soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, garlic clove, salmon fillet, green onion, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk together soy and hoisin sauces, vinegar and garlic in a bowl. Slice salmon fillet across the grain into thin strips. Add to soy mixture and let stand for 15 minutes, turning occasionally. Thread each salmon strip onto small metal or soaked wooden skewers. Place skewers on baking sheet and broil, turning and basting with marinade once, for about 4 minutes or until golden and fish flakes easily when tested. Alternatively, cook skewers on oiled grill pan on grill. Before serving, sprinkle with green onion and sesame seeds, if using. ; name: orange teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen vegetables, quick-cooking tapioca, chicken stock, orange marmalade, teriyaki sauce, dry mustard, ground ginger ; preparation:In a skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours. ; name: orange marinated grilled salmon ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salmon steaks ; preparation:Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre. ; name: citrus teriyaki salmon ; ingredients: orange juice, ginger, green onion, teriyaki sauce, lime juice, garlic, salmon steaks ; preparation:

name: cinnamon teacake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, egg, vanilla, self raising flour, milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool. ; name: cocoa syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, dutch-processed cocoa powder, vanilla extract, kosher salt, light corn syrup ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: breakfast eggcake ; ingredients: egg, milk, pancake mix, butter, bacon bits, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Stir ingredients together gently. Add more milk as necessary to make batter the consistency of buttermilk. Melt butter in omelette pan or small skillet over medium high heat. Pour batter into skillet and cook until edges appear dry. Flip eggcake over and cook until set, about another minute. Slide onto serving plate and serve with maple syrup or your favorite pancake topping. ; name: coffee liqueur with vanilla cinnamon cream ; ingredients: thickened cream, powdered sugar icing, vanilla bean paste, coffee liqueur, espresso coffee, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c. ; name: the simple but perfect pancake ; ingredients: eggs, milk, vanilla, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place butter in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk and vanilla. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings. ; name: cinnamon vanilla pancake syrup ; ingredients: water, dark brown sugar, heavy cream, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: 1 2 3 biscuits ; ingredients: salt, flour, baking powder, oil, milk ; preparation:Melt butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 17 minutes at 175c. ; name: fast food biscuits ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: butter dip biscuits ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220 degree c. Grease and flour a 8cm deep, 19cm square cake tin. Place flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Add butter and using finger. Make a well in the centre and add buttermilk and using a flat bladed knife, stir until dough almost comes together. Press out to a 3cm thick round. Dip a 5cm round cutter into flour to prevent dough sticking and cut out scones. Gently press leftover dough pieces together and repeat cutting out more scones - should make a total of 16 scones. Place scones, touching into prepared tin. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until light golden and hollow when tapped on top. Serve with jam and cream or honey and cream. ; name: basic biscuits from paula deen ; ingredients: yeast, water, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugar, solid shortening, buttermilk ; preparation:Melt the butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add golden syrup. Stir until golden syrup is dissolved. Stir in sugar, rolled oats and flour. In a small bowl or cup, dissolve baking soda in water and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put teaspoon lots onto a greased oven tray. Bake at 170 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden. Store in an airtight container. ; name: biscuits ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cream cheese, baking powder, salt, granulated sugar, milk ; preparation:

name: baby baked potatoes with bleu cheese topping ; ingredients: new potatoes, canola oil, kosher salt, sour cream, blue cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:To make filling, melt butter in a small skillet and cook apple over a low heat for 2-3 minutes or until just heated through. Remove pan from heat. Set aside and keep warm. To make omelet, melt butter in a small skillet. Place eggs, water and black pepper to taste in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Pour egg mixture into pan and cook over medium heat, continually drawing in the edge of the omelet with a fork during cooking, until no liquid remains, and the omelet is lightly set. Top half of the omelet with apple slices, cheese, and chives and fold in half. Slip onto a plate and serve immediately. ; name: harvest potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion, corn flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large microwave-safe bowl, microwave frozen hash browns for 4 minutes on high. Stir sour cream, butter, onion, soup, and cheese into potatoes. Spread mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle corn flakes over top. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until bubbly around edges. ; name: half baked potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, garlic salt, dried parsley flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: seasoned baked potato chunks ; ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, dried basil, mexican chili powder, brown rice flour, olives ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: mini me baked potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, oil, sea salt, sour cream, blue cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:
